[10:56PM, 5/7/2017] ‪+234 803 934 7743‬: *Ki kula da kanki kafin aure ko bayan aure*

*KASHI NA DAYA (1)*
*ana so mace ta ringa gyara kanta tun tana gidan iyayenta ba sai tayi aure ko kuma ta zo yin aure kafin ta Fara gyara kanta ba.*
*wasu da yawan yan'mata sai kaga suna yin abin har yana gona da iri*
*TSARKI DA RUWAN DUMI :*
*tsarki da ruwan dumi ba karamin taimakawa yake yi ba wajen gyaran ( farji )*
*Mata Ku kiyaye tsarki da ruwan sanyi saboda ba karamin illa yake yi ma mace ba.*
✎ *GANYEN MAGARYA:*
*ana so mace ta dinga yin tsarki da ganyen magarya idan da so Samu ne ya zama shine permanent ruwan tsarkin ki shi ma ba karamin gyara ( farji ) yake yi ba.*
✎           *ZUMA:*
*ana so mace ta ringa shan Zuma cokali daya (1) da safe daya (1) da daddare 1 wannan yana taimakawa wajen dawo miki da ni'iman ki da ya tafi yayin da kike jinin al'ada.*
❑     *SHAN ZUMA*
*ana so macen da take cikin jinin al'ada ta rinka shan zuma cokali uku (3) kullum da safe har tsawon kwanaki da zata gama al'ada.*
☛ *MAN HABBATUSSAUDA :*
*zaki sami man habbatussauda shima ki rinka sha kina shafawa a ( farji)*
 *KANKANA DA MADARA :*
*Ana so mace ta rinka shan kankana da madara a ko wane lokaci da ta gama al'adarta.*
☛ *KANKANA DA CUCUMBER:*
*zaki yanka kankana da cucumber sai ki hade su kiyi blanding ki rinka sha a duk lokacin da kika sami Hali.*
          ❑ *AL'MISKI*
*ana so mace ta sami miski ki rinka sa kadan a ( farji ) dinki.*
*Ko da kin wanke pants dinki wannan kamshi yana jikinki.*
            ✿ *IYAYE* ❀
*wadannan abubuwan Dana lissafa irin wadanda ya kamata mace ta rinka yi kenan tun tana gaban iyayenta.*
✎ *mata a daina yawan cushe-cushe a ( farji ) yawan yin hakan ba karamin matsala yake jawo wa ba.*
❏ *TURAREN ( FARJI )*
*wannan hadin shi zai sa farji ya dinga kamshi a duk lokacin gabatar da jima'i:*
➽ *anbar.*
➽ *miski.*
➽ *ganyen magarya.*
➽ *rihatul-hubbi.*
➽ *ma'ul miyami.*
*Sai ki hade su waje daya ki tafasa su ki juye a roba ki Kara ruwa ki zauna a ciki kamar (30) min*
*Lilacin da zaki kwanta ki Kama ruwa da shi ki shafa ruwa a gefen ( farji ) wannan shi zai Hana mijinki ya guje ki
*Dr bodmas*

                 *❖ GYARAN NONO ❖*

❅ hulba
❅zuma

*MATSALOLIN DA SUKE ADABAR MATA A YAU, GA HANYOYIN MAGANCESU*

                     *_GYARAN NONO_*

 farar shinkafa
↬ garin alkama
↬ garin habbatussauda
↬ garin ayaba(plantain)
↬ gyada mai malfa( mai zabo)
↬ aya
↬ madara
↬ zuma

Zaki sami plantain dinki ki shanyashi ya bushe sai ki daka ki hada da garin alkama da garin farar shinkafa saiki hada aya da gyadar a malkada a tace ruwan, sai ki dora akan wuta a zuba garikan akai, a zuba madarar gari data ruwa da zuma, sannan ki dama yayi kauri.

Kiyi kamar sati biyu ko hudu kina haka sannan kisami rigar nono acuci maza kisaka. 

Waiyyo yaruwa maigida tambayarki zaiyi yace my lyf balanbalan kika hura? Kinsan amsar da zaki bashi..........

               *_GYARAN NONO NA 2_*

Zaki sami hulba a tafasa arinka gasa nono dashi sannan ashafa man hulba . Ko kuma ki tafasa hulbar ki gasa nonon sannan ki kada kwan salwa ki shafa sai ki kada guda uku ki shanye.

[7:51AM, 5/10/2017] ‪+234 803 934 7743‬: 🌹ASSALAMU ALAIKUM🌹.       




YAR UWA GA HANYOYIN DA ZAKIBI DON RABUWA DA INFECTION

🍀☘🍀☘🍀☘🍀

1) yar uwa indai kinason rabuwa da infection tofa saikinbi qa,idodi nashan magani abinda mata basu saniba shine mace me infection ba,aso tana shan ruwa me sanyi koh me kankara to shine dalilin dayasa mace taita shan magani amma bata rabudashi ba abinda nakeso mata su gane shine mace koh batada infection shan ruwan sanyi sosai ba harka bane.

🌹☘🌹☘🌹☘🌹

2) da rashin yin tsarki da ruwan dumi abinda nakeso me infection tagane shine lkcn da kk jin kaikayi inda zaki samu ruwa me dan zafi kiyi tsarki dashi zaki sha mmki don wlhy ji zakiyi kamar anyi ruwa an dauke yar uwa kinga ashe amfani da ruwan dumi yanada kyau tunda yana taimakawa har a bangaren infection yan uwa a kiyaye lkcn yin amfani da ruwan sanyi yawuce ba,a yayinsa yanzu.

Allah yasa mudace ameen

🌻🌻🌹🌻🌻🌹🌻

3) sai kula da tsaftar toilet yar uwa yanada kyau kikula da irin toilet da zaki shiga don kare kanki Allah ya karemu daga wannan cuta.

🍎🍏🍎🍏🍎🍏🍎

 
ALLAH YASA MUDACE AMEEEEEN

TSOKANO SHA'AWA


SHA'AWA: wani sinadari ne da Allah (s.w.a) ya halitta a jinsina biyu Na Dan Adam,aljannu da kuma dabbobi,Wanda sanadiyar hakan yasa daya jinsin bukatuwar daya jinsin ( macce ko namiji),sannan da Shiga wani yanayi a lokacin da daya jinsin ya rasa daya.
  TSOKANO SHA'AWA:
Tsokano sha'awa nauyi ne da ya rataya a tsakanin jinsuna biyu(mata da Maza),amma saidai kash mafiya yawan mata suna zaton cewa wasa da motsa sha'awa aikin Maza ne,wani lokacin mazan ke ganin aikin mata ne,duk mata ko mijin dake tunanin hakan sun fadi jarabawa a fagen soyayyar zamantakewar aure.
Sai dai wannan matsalar tafi kamari da kuma illa a gurin mata,domin kuwa shi namiji tarairaya yake bukata a koda yaushe,idan ya rasa hakan to a lokacin wata zata kwace maki shi a cikin sauki,galibin Maza sunfi so da kuma karkata wajen matar da take masu wasa kala kala.A saboda haka nake  shawartar ki da kada kiji kunya ko gudun karda mijinki hace kin fiye jaraba,ba haka bane ki janye wannan tunanin,ki sani cewa mu'amalar aure ibada ce kuma duk lokacin da kika bada gudummawa gurin tsokano sha'awar maigidan ki,kema zaki samu wani kaso najin dadi hadi da nishadi a gurin mu'amalar aure.

Kamar yanda kuka sani addini Yazo mana d hanyoyi kala kala wadanda zamubi wurin magance matsalolin mu
Sai dai idan iliminmu bai kai wurin b

Akwai hanyoyin da na kebi wurin taimakawa mata wadanda suke Neman mijin Aure 
Akwai ingantattun magungunan da muka tanadarwa masu wannan matsalar 
Sannan akwai taimako NA Addu'o'in d muke yiwa masu wannan matsalar dmn ganin cewa Allah ya yaye musu matsalarsu

Munyi kokari Wurin sarrafa magunguna NA Farin Jini d tsare JIKI
Sannan akwai addu'o'i NA wadannan matsalolin wadanda idan har aka bisu Allah zai biya bukata insha Allahu

Muna saida hadaddun kayan mata d magungunan gargajiya masu kyau ingantattu
KAMAR
Hadadden Maganin GIRMAN NONO, CIKAR NONO, TSAYUWAR NONO DA LAUSHINSA
Mun sarrafa wannan Magani Ne dmn matan d suka Dade suna kashe kudadensu a banza babu biyan bukata, kokuma wadanda mazajensu suke sha'awar NONUWA Amma basuda su

Muna saida ingantaccen Maganin GIRMAN DUWAWU Hadi mai kyau NA musamman
Mun bada lokaci wurin sarrafa wannan Magani dmn  sharewa yan'uwa mata hawayensu

Muna saida ingantaccen MATSI mai matse mace sosai yanda ko yatsa bazai shiga b
Wannan Matsi yana maida baxawara budurwa

Akwai Maganin infection kaikayi, kuraje, fitar ruwa, Rashin Sha'awa, jin zafi lokacin saduwa, Ciwon Mara Wanda yahana daukar ciki, Bushewar Gaba Rashin Ni'ima

Akwai Maganin rage Tumbi, Kiba, JIKI, ciki
Akwai hadadden Sabulun Gyaran JIKI mai magance kurajen fuska, kyasfi, Bakalwa, d duk wasu matsaloli NA JIKI
Akwai Sabulun tsarki mai wanke Gaba ya magance duk matsalolin d suke cikin farji

Akwai Maganin Gashi maisa Gashi tsawo, baki, ya habashi kakkaryewa sannan yana magance amosanin kai
Muna saida Maganin mallakar miji ko saurayi

AMARYA
Muna gyaran Amarya complete settings Komai d Komai sama ruwa Kasa ruwa Daren farko ango yabaki babbar kyauta
Muna Gyaran Matar data haihu, 
Muna saida Maganin kara Kiba da kuma ragewa
Akwai NA rage GIRMAN NONO

Muna saida kalolin Kaya kamar

*Yarda zaki gyara kanki*

Zaki samu wadan nan kayayyaki sai ki daka su ki tankaďe ki hada su waje guda sai ki kwashe a roba ki dinga sha da madarar ruwa, wannan hadin yana da matukar kyau,yana sawa mace ni'ima,kuma zaki iya bawa maigidan ki dan zai kara mishi kuzari ya kuma hana shi inzali da wuri. 

*Dr bodmas 08039347743*
[12:20AM, 5/11/2017] ‪+234 803 934 7743‬: 💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝💝 
Na zari a rayuwa

A rayuwa duk wanda ya sami mai son shi ya rike shi domin yafi wanda a koda yaushe baya sonka ko har yaga ka sami. Wani abun cigaban rayuwa 
haka yasa a koda yaushe nake dubin yarda ake yawan samin matsala a rayuwa aure

A cikin rayuwar aure akwai wani babban kuskure da mata muke tafkawa wanda muke dauka ba komai ba a rayuwa bayan wannan abun babban hadari ne ga rayuwarmu ta kiyama wanda ke janyo azabar qiyama.
 Duk hukuncin dake gidan aure ba mazajenmu ne suka tsara ba Allah ne ya tsara da kanshi
Tomu sani wannan dokar bata kowa bace face Allah 
Mata munada wata dabi a ta idan muka tambayi mazajenmu fita unguwa da sunan zuwa gida daya ko biyu tofa saimu zarce biya nan gidan biya can gidan 


Wani lokacin sai muce ai mijina bayada matsala idan na koma gida zan gaya mishi 

Wata kuma tace ai baisan na yi wannan biyebiyen ba
Lokacin da manzon Allah SAW yaje isra i da mi iraji yaga wata mata anyimata turke irin na dabbobi a cikin wutar jahannama yayin da aka daureta da wata sarka ta wuta aka kuma sanyata tana zagayawa a wannan turken
Mala ika yana binta a baya yana dukan kanta da wata irin guduma ta azaba 

A duk lokacin daya bugi kanta sai kan ya lotse Allah ya umurceshi daya dawo yanda yake. Haka ake ta yimata azaba har shekaru masu yawa 

Sai Annabin tsira da Amincin Allah su tabbata a gareshi ya tambayeni mala ika jibril wannan mata menene laifinta?
 Sai yacewa Annabin rahama wannan itace matar dake fita da sunan zuwa unguwa amma ta biye gidaje da dama ba tare da izinin mijin ta ba da 

Da kuma wacce takeyin leke a waje 

Da kuma wacce take daga muryarta har zuwa waje wasu mazan sunaji bayan kuma muryarta al'aurane. 
Domin gujewa azabar Allah SWT
Ya allah katsare mu
Mu gyara kurakuran da muke aikatawa saboda Allah 😭😭😭
Saboda haka sisters muji tsoron Allah
 Dan Allah duk wacce takeda dama ta tura zuwa wani group da 'yan uwan mu mata zasu amfana

*FARAR HUMRA*
turaren alajin na ruwa ko na marakana ko na matan arewa
✭ jan ambur
✭ farin ambur
✭ misik
✭ madarar turaren kwamando
✭ madarar turaren suzan
✭ madarar turaren sarkin turare
✭ madarar turaren sandol
✭ madarar turaren ismiyaki
zaki yi ki daka farin ambar dinki wanda ake sayarwa a kasuwa guda uku,
sannan ki daka jan dan kanti guda uku, sai ki zuba a kan ruwan turaren alajin
ko marajana ko matan arewa roba daya, ki sami misik dinki guda hudu ki
zuba a kofin silver ko a tukunyar silver ki dora a kan garwashi zai narke, idan
ya narke sai ki yi sauri ki juye a cikin ruwan turaren da kika zuba garin
abubuwan, sannan ki daka misik din ki sa cokali uku sannan ki zuba madarorin turaranki ko wanne cikin kwalbar fiya-fiya ki jua sosai ki rufe ya tsumu, wannan garin misik dinda ambar din shi zai dinga kara tsuma humra ta
dinga kara kamshi za ki iya rufewa kwana bakwai ko zuwa sati biyu ta tsumu

YAR UWA GA HANYOYIN DA ZAKIBI DON RABUWA DA INFECTION

🍀☘🍀☘🍀☘🍀

1) yar uwa indai kinason rabuwa da infection tofa saikinbi qa,idodi nashan magani abinda mata basu saniba shine mace me infection ba,aso tana shan ruwa me sanyi koh me kankara to shine dalilin dayasa mace taita shan magani amma bata rabudashi ba abinda nakeso mata su gane shine mace koh batada infection shan ruwan sanyi sosai ba harka bane.

🌹☘🌹☘🌹☘🌹

2) da rashin yin tsarki da ruwan dumi abinda nakeso me infection tagane shine lkcn da kk jin kaikayi inda zaki samu ruwa me dan zafi kiyi tsarki dashi zaki sha mmki don wlhy ji zakiyi kamar anyi ruwa an dauke yar uwa kinga ashe amfani da ruwan dumi yanada kyau tunda yana taimakawa har a bangaren infection yan uwa a kiyaye lkcn yin amfani da ruwan sanyi yawuce ba,a yayinsa yanzu.

Allah yasa mudace ameen

🌻🌻🌹🌻🌻🌹🌻

3) sai kula da tsaftar toilet yar uwa yanada kyau kikula da irin toilet da zaki shiga don kare kanki Allah ya karemu daga wannan cuta.

🍎🍏🍎🍏🍎🍏🍎

                 MAGANI A MUSLUNCI

       ❊  MATSALA KANKANCEWAR GABA  ❊

Kankancewar gaba lalura ce dake tayar da hankalin mutum.

Abubuwan dake haifar da kankancewar gaban
namiji suna da yawa.

Amma manya daga ciki sune girman jiki wasu
mutane don wani dalili gaban su kan kankance
idan jikinsu na kara girma.

Wasu kuma kankacewar gabansu na faruwa ne
saboda suna sa hannunsu suna inzali da
kansu wato masturbation.

Wasu daga cikin abubawan dake kawo
kankancewar gaba kenan.

To magunguna dai sai a kiyaye abinda ake
zato ya kawo shi.

Misali in kiba ne a rage kibar in mastubation ne
abari Abnda kesa kankancewar gaba da saurin
inzali.

➜. Yawan Kiba (obesity) nahana maza karfin
mazakuta, kuzari da kuma haddasa kankancewar al’aura.
Dan haka idan kasan kanada ita to lalle Ne ka nemi ragiyarta.

Bayan haka Kasami Mazakutar Bijimin Sa.
Wanda ba'a dandake shiba.

Saika dafa tareda 'danyar chitta.

(Kar a sanya Gishiri ko maggi, amma za'a
sanya dukkan kayan Qamshi).

Idan ya dahu sai ka cinyeshi duka.

Zaka rika maimaitawa a wata sau 2 haka.
Wannan na girmane.

                       ◈  GYARAN NONO ◈

08039347743

Kiyayewa da gyaran nono wani lokacin yana iya zama wajibi awajen mace tun tana budurwa musamman awannan lokacinda maza da dama suke bukatar hakan...

Namiji yanason mace me gyara nononta musamman lokacinda mace tayi yaye don lokacinne nono yake kwanciya ta yanda wani ya tafi kenan bazai dawoba kuma kyakyawana nono a wajen mace ba karamin muhimmaci yake dashiba Akwai mata wadanda sunsha jarraba maganinda zai gyara musu nono kala kala amma shiru babu wani canji wasu har matsala yake jawo musu kuma gaskiya akwai rashin sanin lokacinda mace zata gyara nono da kuma hanyoyin gyaran da kuma maganinda zaisa nono ya gyaru...

   ▣👙    LOKACIN GYARA NONO...  👙 ▣
☏08039347743

Tun kina budurwa zaki fara kiyaye nononki wato kamar yawan tsalle ko daurin kirji da zani ko kuma mummunan kwanciya wanada zaki danne su sannan akwai rigar nono (brezy) itama dole kisan wanda ya kamata kisaka wato wacce bazata matsesuba da dai sauran abubuwanda zasu wahalarda su to idan kika kiyaye wannan har lokacin aurenki nononki zai kasance a tsaye yanda oga zai rude Lokacinda kika zama matar aure saboda saduwar jima i da sauran uzirin mijinki a wajen nononki zai rinka karuwa yana kwanciya to wannan lokacin zaki rinka daukar ingantattun magunguna na gargajiya Wanda zasu karawa nononki kyauwu wannan duk muna bayaninsu a posting dinmu to bayan kin haifu kuma zaki iya rabuwa da kowanne magani kedai kirinka shan abubuwanda zai karawa nononki ruwa kamarsu nonon saniya ko madara peak ko luna ko yougut ko garin madara kika jika da ruwa kika zuba garin zogale kikasha zai miki amfani ko kunun kanwane zaki iyasha ya danganta da yanayin wadatarda kike dashi har lokacinda zakiyi yaye zakiga nononki da ruwa sosai to bayan kin yaye sai kuma kiyi gyara na masuyin yaye shine zakiga kinayi kinyi nasara kuma za a dade ana miki kallon budurwa kuma zakiga yanda zaki samu kulawa da soyayya awajen mijinki kinga babu maganar kishiya a gidanki.

🍃🌿 MAGANI WARIN GABA (FARJI)  🌿🍂
abubuwan dakesa gaban mace yana wari.

➽ tafiya babu wando pant.
➽ rashin sanya takalmi koda kuwa a cikin gida ne.
➽ dadewa akan (toilet) masai.
➽ rashin canza pant da wuri.
➽ yawaita cin danyar albasa.
➽ istimna'i ko masturbation (wato mace ta biyawa kanta bukata ta hanyar wasa da gabanta lesbian).
➽ tsarki da ruwan sanyi.
➽ rashin aske gaba dadai sauransu.

        🍂◉ MAGINI WANNAN CUTA ◉🍃

¹ mace ta dinga tsarki da ruwan dumi.
² ki dinga yawan canza wando a kullum kamar sau.
³ ki rage cin danyar albasa.
⁴ a duk lokacin da mace ta gama haila ta dinga
wanke gabanta da ganyen magarya ko bagaruwa da almiski fari.
⅝ ki daina tsugunawa akan Masai kina dauka
lokacin domin yin haka yana da matsala.
6 ta yawaita aske gabanta duk sati ¹ ko ² idan
mace zata bin wa'yannan dokokin zata samu
waraka daga duk wata cutar farji.

      |(￣MAGANIN CIWON MARA NA MATA￣)|

✦ Garin hulba cokali 7
✦ garin habbur rashad cokali 7
✦ zaitun cokali ¹0
Ki gauraya su Sannan ki rinka diban cokali 2 kina dafawa kullum idan ya tafasa sai ki sauke ki tace sannan ki zuba ruwan zuma kisha.

Zaki Fara amfani dashi tun kwana biyar kafin
zuwan al'adarki sannan ki cigaba da amfani dashi har lokacin da al'adar take.

Kina yin wannan da yarda Allah zai Kara miki
ni'imar jikin ki bayan kuma ya miki maganin
wannan ciwon Mara.

        ▣ MAGANI CIWON MARA MAI ZAFI ▣

Ｏ tsamiya
Ｏ habbatussauda
Ｏ zuma

'yannan Ku tafasa tsamiya mai kyau da habbatussauda sai Ku ringa diba kuna sa zuma a ciki kuna sha shi ma za'a sami waraka insha
Allah.

               (⌒MAHADIN GYRAN GASHI⌒)

💆🏼wannan hadi zai tai makawa mace wadda
gashin ta yake yawan lalacewa, domin kuwa
gashinki ba shi ba karai rayewa zai rinka laushi
kuma ya Kara tsaho idan har kina San kada ya
lalace kina iya samun wannan kiyi amfani dashi.

¹🍂 ganyen Kai da magarya
Ki da kashi kina yin amfani dashi wajan wanke
kanki wanke gashi da shi, yana kara karfafa gashi ya kuma hanashi zubewa ko kuma ki nemi:
¹ danyen kwai 2
² sabulun salo 3
³ garin shanmar
A fasa kwai amma banda kwan duwar farin kadai Zaki yi amfani da shi, sai ki zuba sabulun salo a ciki, ki matse ki zuba garin shammar a ciki sai ki wanke Kai da shi idan har kina yin wannan hadin lai-lai kanki zai yi gashi mai kyau insha Allah.

        ◇👙☆ ZUBEWAR NONO ☆👙◇

⌣̀_⌣́ da kayan gyaran sa Wasu matan daga sun yi haihuwa daya Zaka ga nononsu ya zube, hakan yana damun maigida idan kina san yin maganin wannan matsala sai ki nemi .

〇 habbatussauda
〇 hulba
〇 alkama
〇 gyada
〇 ridi
〇 danyar shinkafa
〇 busasshe karas
Duk ki daka su waje daya, kina yin amfani dashi a duk wani sa'i wane lokacin kina amfani da wannan hadi.

               ♡´･ GYARAN NONO ² ･`♡

tabbas matsalar nono tana da yawa domin zaka ga wasu matan nonon su ya kwanta ko ya koma dan kankanin saka makon tso-tso idan kina San ya taso Yayi kyau sai kiyi wannan hadin ki gani .

づ albasa madaidaiciya
づ zuma 🍯
づ garin gero
づ madara
ki samu albasa madaidaiciya ki yanyanka sai ki
saka a tukunya da ruwanki ta tafasa shi sosai har sai ruwan ya koma baki, sai ki juye ruwan ki sami zumar ki mai kyau, garin gero ludayi daya, madara na gwangwani daya na ruwa sai ki juye su kan ruwan tafasasshe albasa nan ki sha .

Amma fa karki bari ya kwana baki shanye ba.
Wannan hadine da zai gyara miki nono 👙.

             ⊂👙 GYARAN NONO ³ 👙⊃

Idan Ana so nono yayi kyau yayi laushi da sulbi da girma sai Ayi wannan hadin domin samun waraka.

□ aya
□ gyada 🍠
□ ayaba 🍌 (plantain)
◎ alkama
◎ madara
Ki sami aya, gyada ayaba da alkama sai madara Zaki wanke ayarki sai ki hada da gyadarki ki markada su ki tashe dama kin yanyanka ayabarki kin busar kinyi gari da shi kin tankade sai ki rikka diban garin plantain din kina hadawa da ruwan ayaba gyadarki kina sa madara ta ruwa kina sha, zai gyara nono 👙 domin wannan hadin ne Wanda sai kisha mamaki.

ᕙᕗ bagaruwa

dan huce sai a zauna ciki sannan kuma ashafa
man habbatussauda kamar yadda za'ayi matsi
Wadannan magunguna da akayi amfani dashi zai magance MATSALAR ciwon sanyi sannan kowane yana Kara dawwamar da ni'ima ga mace.

           ○ TSUKE GABA DA BAGARUWA ○

ni'ima a wajan mace ba karamin taimakawa mata take a gidan miji ba domin idan kina da ni'ima Zaki birge maigidanki idan kina San hakan sai kiyi wannan hadin.

🌴 dabino
🌑 kwakwa
🐂 madara
🍯 zuma

wanke da ruwan sanyi idan kina da fata mai gautsi to Zaki iya hadawa da man zaitun idan kuma fatarki bata da shi kada kisa man zaitun.

     ─▽─AMFANI╭╮KUR-KUR─▽─

yana da amfani sosai awajan gyara fata ko jiki
hakan nema ya saka muka gane muku wannan
hadin na gyara jiki.

ヮ kurkun
┌┐dakakkiyar alkama
┌┐man zaitun

Ki samu kurkun sai ki daka, daga nan sai ki hada da dakakkiyar alkamanki, sannan ki hada da man zautun daga nan sai ki shafa a fuskarki ko a jikinki bayan awa biyu ko uku sai ki wanke fuskarki ko jikinki da ruwan dumi..

            ◉ AMFSNIN MAN KWA-KWA ◉

¹ Taushin fata - Ana iya shafawa kamar man jiki a shafa a ko'ina har wuya.
² man fuska - Ana shafawa a zagage kwayar Ido da shi yana maganin bakin da ke fitowa zagaye Ido yana kuma maganin tamushewar fata na tsufa.
³ Ana shafa man kwakwa kadan a jikin auduga a goge fuska da shi yana gagawan cire kwalliya da ta dankare a fuska mata.
⁴ yana Hana fashewan lebe musamman a lokacin sanyi.
⅝ yana gyara gashin mata yana sasu Kara karfi yana kashe amosani sannan yana karshe
kwarkwata.
6 Ana iya hada man kwakwa da sugar a murza a fata sannan a wanke da ruwa da sabulun yana sa fata yayi laushi.

   🥝🍊AMFANIN KUBEWA GA MACE🍊🥝

¹ a markada kabewa da goba da ayaba a tace a
dinga sha ruwan jifa-jifa yana maganin gajiya da saurin kosawa, sannan yana taimakawa matuka yayin bukata ko sha'awa.

² a cire hanzar nan ta kabewa a zuba a ruwan
zafi, babban kofi daya a rufe , bayan hanzar ta jiku sosai sai a tace a zuba zuma cikin cokali cin abinci uku a kada har sai ya hadu shi ma a
shayen shima yana taimakawa matukar wajen
ni'ima da Karin kuzari.

      ◎▼◎ KARFIN MAZAKUTA ◎▼◎

domin samun karfin gaba wannan hadin Wanda ko da mutum ya tsufa zai iya yi Tsami lafiya da yarda Allah.

¹ habbatussauda cokali 1
² danyen kwai 3
Kanemi garin habbatussauda cokali ¹ sannan
kasamu ruwan danyen kwai 3 sannan ka gauraya ka soya kada ya gama soyuwa ka rinka ci..
        🍃= ｘDADEWA ANA JIMA'Iｘ=🍂

Idan mutum baya da dewa akan matar sa ko once maigidanki baya dadewa yana jima'i sai kiyi masa wannan hadin.
Idan kina so ya rika dadewa a kanki kuna jima'i to yi masa wannan hadin ki sha mamaki.
🍆 cucumber (gurji)
🍯 zuma
Ka samu cucumber ka markada sai zuma me kyau ka matse a ciki ka rinka sha zakayi mamaki wajen jimawa kana jima'i baka zubar da maniyyi ba.

(⌣̀_⌣́) GIRMAN HIPS (DUWAWU) KUGU (⌣̀_⌣́)

Girman kugun mace yana daya daga cikin abubuwan dake janyo sha'awa tare da tayar da
hankalin maigida idan ya kallo Uwargida
musamman idan tayi kwalliya da matsasu kaya
masu nuna jikinta.

Shi dai duwawu a jikin mace wata baiwa ce ta
halitta wacce Allah yakan halicci dan Adam da ita idan kina San samun kugu duwawunki ya girma ki yawaita cin.
🧀 abarba
🍌 ayaba
🍠gwanda
🍉 kankana
🍯 zuma
🍶madarar
A kan hada su waje guda, a markada su, har sai
sun zama ruwa, sai a dan Kara zuma da madara idan dai har kina shan wannan hadin Zaki sami hips duwawunki ko ince kugu.

  (⌣̀_⌣́). KINA IYA WANNAN SHIMA  (⌣̀_⌣́)

shima wannan hadin yana karawa mace duwawu
🌿 zogale dafaffe
♻ ganyen alayahu
🍅 tumatir
🌰 albasa
Yi kwadonsu ki rikka ci idan har kina wannan
samfur na hadin tudun duwawu Zaki sha mamaki domin duwawunki zai zama kato ne sosai

TSOKANO SHA'AWA


SHA'AWA: wani sinadari ne da Allah (s.w.a) ya halitta a jinsina biyu Na Dan Adam,aljannu da kuma dabbobi,Wanda sanadiyar hakan yasa daya jinsin bukatuwar daya jinsin ( macce ko namiji),sannan da Shiga wani yanayi a lokacin da daya jinsin ya rasa daya.
  TSOKANO SHA'AWA:
Tsokano sha'awa nauyi ne da ya rataya a tsakanin jinsuna biyu(mata da Maza),amma saidai kash mafiya yawan mata suna zaton cewa wasa da motsa sha'awa aikin Maza ne,wani lokacin mazan ke ganin aikin mata ne,duk mata ko mijin dake tunanin hakan sun fadi jarabawa a fagen soyayyar zamantakewar aure.
Sai dai wannan matsalar tafi kamari da kuma illa a gurin mata,domin kuwa shi namiji tarairaya yake bukata a koda yaushe,idan ya rasa hakan to a lokacin wata zata kwace maki shi a cikin sauki,galibin Maza sunfi so da kuma karkata wajen matar da take masu wasa kala kala.A saboda haka nake  shawartar ki da kada kiji kunya ko gudun karda mijinki hace kin fiye jaraba,ba haka bane ki janye wannan tunanin,ki sani cewa mu'amalar aure ibada ce kuma duk lokacin da kika bada gudummawa gurin tsokano sha'awar maigidan ki,kema zaki samu wani kaso najin dadi hadi da nishadi a gurin mu'amalar aure.

Kamar yanda kuka sani addini Yazo mana d hanyoyi kala kala wadanda zamubi wurin magance matsalolin mu
Sai dai idan iliminmu bai kai wurin b

Akwai hanyoyin da na kebi wurin taimakawa mata wadanda suke Neman mijin Aure 
Akwai ingantattun magungunan da muka tanadarwa masu wannan matsalar 
Sannan akwai taimako NA Addu'o'in d muke yiwa masu wannan matsalar dmn ganin cewa Allah ya yaye musu matsalarsu

Munyi kokari Wurin sarrafa magunguna NA Farin Jini d tsare JIKI
Sannan akwai addu'o'i NA wadannan matsalolin wadanda idan har aka bisu Allah zai biya bukata insha Allahu

Muna saida hadaddun kayan mata d magungunan gargajiya masu kyau ingantattu
KAMAR
Hadadden Maganin GIRMAN NONO, CIKAR NONO, TSAYUWAR NONO DA LAUSHINSA
Mun sarrafa wannan Magani Ne dmn matan d suka Dade suna kashe kudadensu a banza babu biyan bukata, kokuma wadanda mazajensu suke sha'awar NONUWA Amma basuda su

Muna saida ingantaccen Maganin GIRMAN DUWAWU Hadi mai kyau NA musamman
Mun bada lokaci wurin sarrafa wannan Magani dmn  sharewa yan'uwa mata hawayensu

Muna saida ingantaccen MATSI mai matse mace sosai yanda ko yatsa bazai shiga b
Wannan Matsi yana maida baxawara budurwa

Akwai Maganin infection kaikayi, kuraje, fitar ruwa, Rashin Sha'awa, jin zafi lokacin saduwa, Ciwon Mara Wanda yahana daukar ciki, Bushewar Gaba Rashin Ni'ima

Akwai Maganin rage Tumbi, Kiba, JIKI, ciki
Akwai hadadden Sabulun Gyaran JIKI mai magance kurajen fuska, kyasfi, Bakalwa, d duk wasu matsaloli NA JIKI
Akwai Sabulun tsarki mai wanke Gaba ya magance duk matsalolin d suke cikin farji

Akwai Maganin Gashi maisa Gashi tsawo, baki, ya habashi kakkaryewa sannan yana magance amosanin kai
Muna saida Maganin mallakar miji ko saurayi

AMARYA

Muna Gyaran Matar data haihu, 
Muna saida Maganin kara Kiba da kuma ragewa

*Ga yarda zaki hada shi mashi ni ima yashi kamar ya shiga kandami*

Yar uwa ki samu roba ki fasa kwai a ciki (iya yawan da zaki iya cinyewa,kamar biyu haka)sai ki wanke gadali ko farar albasa ko kuma dika biyun ki yanyanka a kan kwan ki barbaďa maggi ki kawo garin kanumfari ki sa sai ki yanyanka tumatir a ciki sai ki kaďa da kyau, ki ďora farantin suya a kan wuta ki zuba man zaitun (Dan bada man gyada zaki soya ba)idan ya ďau zafi sai ki zuba kwan a ciki ki soya amma kar ki bari ya 'kame ki barshi da ruwa ruwa, sama sama zaki soya shi, ki sauke ki cinye abinki, ni'ima kam ba'a magana dan sai kinfi masa kowa ni ima haka kema dake kawai ze kwanta yaji dadi  🙈🙈🙊🙊.

*KASHI NA DAYA (1)*
*ana so mace ta ringa gyara kanta tun tana gidan iyayenta ba sai tayi aure ko kuma ta zo yin aure kafin ta Fara gyara kanta ba.*
*wasu da yawan yan'mata sai kaga suna yin abin har yana gona da iri*
*TSARKI DA RUWAN DUMI :*
*tsarki da ruwan dumi ba karamin taimakawa yake yi ba wajen gyaran ( farji )*
*Mata Ku kiyaye tsarki da ruwan sanyi saboda ba karamin illa yake yi ma mace ba.*
✎ *GANYEN MAGARYA:*
*ana so mace ta dinga yin tsarki da ganyen magarya idan da so Samu ne ya zama shine permanent ruwan tsarkin ki shi ma ba karamin gyara ( farji ) yake yi ba.*
✎           *ZUMA:*
*ana so mace ta ringa shan Zuma cokali daya (1) da safe daya (1) da daddare 1 wannan yana taimakawa wajen dawo miki da ni'iman ki da ya tafi yayin da kike jinin al'ada.*
❑     *SHAN ZUMA*
*ana so macen da take cikin jinin al'ada ta rinka shan zuma cokali uku (3) kullum da safe har tsawon kwanaki da zata gama al'ada.*
☛ *MAN HABBATUSSAUDA :*
*zaki sami man habbatussauda shima ki rinka sha kina shafawa a ( farji)*
 *KANKANA DA MADARA :*
*Ana so mace ta rinka shan kankana da madara a ko wane lokaci da ta gama al'adarta.*
☛ *KANKANA DA CUCUMBER:*
*zaki yanka kankana da cucumber sai ki hade su kiyi blanding ki rinka sha a duk lokacin da kika sami Hali.*
          ❑ *AL'MISKI*
*ana so mace ta sami miski ki rinka sa kadan a ( farji ) dinki.*
*Ko da kin wanke pants dinki wannan kamshi yana jikinki.*
            ✿ *IYAYE* ❀
*wadannan abubuwan Dana lissafa irin wadanda ya kamata mace ta rinka yi kenan tun tana gaban iyayenta.*
✎ *mata a daina yawan cushe-cushe a ( farji ) yawan yin hakan ba karamin matsala yake jawo wa ba.*
❏ *TURAREN ( FARJI )*
*wannan hadin shi zai sa farji ya dinga kamshi a duk lokacin gabatar da jima'i:*
➽ *anbar.*
➽ *miski.*
➽ *ganyen magarya.*
➽ *rihatul-hubbi.*
➽ *ma'ul miyami.*
*Sai ki hade su waje daya ki tafasa su ki juye a roba ki Kara ruwa ki zauna a ciki kamar (30) min*
*Lilacin da zaki kwanta ki Kama ruwa da shi ki shafa ruwa a gefen ( farji ) wannan shi zai Hana mijinki ya guje ki

[10:25PM, 5/13/2017] ‪+234 803 934 7743‬: *NAMIJIN DA YAFI GIRMA A GURIN MATAN SHI*

Wani lokaci, Zaku dade da mace tsawon shekaru, amma dakun rabu zata manta da kai, wani lokacin kuma zaku zauna Dan lokaci da mace, amma sai ta rike ka azuci, har karshen rayuwa ta.


Mai yake faruwa?


Ga wasu siffofi da muke gani, sakamakon yau da gobe, suna yiwa Mata tasiri idan mutumin da suka hadu dashi. Yana da su. 


1. Namiji wanda yasan kimar mace, da darajar ta.

2. Namiji da yake yabon mace da riritata da daukan ta da MAHIMMANCI.


3. Namiji mai rikon amana wanda baya juyawa matar sa, baya, komai tsawon shekarun da suka dauka, da kowacce larura ta gamu da ita.


4. Namiji da yake bawa mace cikakken lokaci, domin sauraronta da Jin raayinta.


5. Namiji mai kyauta.


6. Namijin da yake bawa mace hakuri kuma ya lallashe ta idan ya bata mata rai,ko ta shiga wata damuwa.


7. Namijin da ya tsaratar da mace daga wani Hadari da ta fuskanta a rayuwa.

8. Namijin da mace tasan zai iya mutuwa saboda ita.

9. Namiji mai faraa da murmushi da sakin fuska, da tafiye-tafiye da mace.

10. Namiji Mai tsafta da kwalliya, da Lafiyar jiki musamman wajan biyar bukatar iyalin sa

Mafiya yawa daga cikin mata na kuka da ciwon mara wanda kan hanawa wasu rawar gaban hantsi. So dayawa xakaga mace na xullumin tsayuwar wata domin tasan irin axabar datakesha duk adalilin ciwon mara.
Ciwone dakan tsananta agurin wasu yakuma galabaitar dasu wasuma har amai xakaga sunayi yayin da wasu numfashinsu ke dauke yakaisu ga suma.
La'akari dahakan yasa nima nafadada bincike domin kawo ma 'yan uwa mata wasu daga cikin hanyoyin daxasubi
dan ganin Allah yasauwake yakuma basu lafia.
1.kisamu dabino masu kyau sabbin tsinka guda bakwai, kici dasafe kafin kici komai.
2.kisamu xogale kadan da tsamiya kisa akofi, sannan kisamu tafasashen ruwa kixuba akofin idan yadan huce kishanye alokacin. Kiyi haka har sau uku. Insha Allahu xaki samu sauki
3.kisamu dauwa kamar rabin mudu kijikata akwano natsawon kwana biyu sannan ki mutssiketa kitace sannan kisha. Yana maganin ciwon mara sosai yanakuma tsinka jini gawadda ciwon yadameta jini baixoba idan dai tai hakan jinin xaixo ciwon yayi sauki.
Allah yabama masu fama da wannan matsalar lafiya ameen

       ❊  MATSALA KANKANCEWAR GABA  ❊

Kankancewar gaba lalura ce dake tayar da hankalin mutum.

Abubuwan dake haifar da kankancewar gaban
namiji suna da yawa.

Amma manya daga ciki sune girman jiki wasu
mutane don wani dalili gaban su kan kankance
idan jikinsu na kara girma.

Wasu kuma kankacewar gabansu na faruwa ne
saboda suna sa hannunsu suna inzali da
kansu wato masturbation.

Wasu daga cikin abubawan dake kawo
kankancewar gaba kenan.

To magunguna dai sai a kiyaye abinda ake
zato ya kawo shi.

Misali in kiba ne a rage kibar in mastubation ne
abari Abnda kesa kankancewar gaba da saurin
inzali.

➜. Yawan Kiba (obesity) nahana maza karfin
mazakuta, kuzari da kuma haddasa kankancewar al’aura.
Dan haka idan kasan kanada ita to lalle Ne ka nemi ragiyarta.

Bayan haka Kasami Mazakutar Bijimin Sa.
Wanda ba'a dandake shiba.

Saika dafa tareda 'danyar chitta.

(Kar a sanya Gishiri ko maggi, amma za'a
sanya dukkan kayan Qamshi).

Idan ya dahu sai ka cinyeshi duka.

Zaka rika maimaitawa a wata sau 2 haka.
Wannan na girmane.

                       ◈  GYARAN NONO ◈

08039347743

Kiyayewa da gyaran nono wani lokacin yana iya zama wajibi awajen mace tun tana budurwa musamman awannan lokacinda maza da dama suke bukatar hakan...

Namiji yanason mace me gyara nononta musamman lokacinda mace tayi yaye don lokacinne nono yake kwanciya ta yanda wani ya tafi kenan bazai dawoba kuma kyakyawana nono a wajen mace ba karamin muhimmaci yake dashiba Akwai mata wadanda sunsha jarraba maganinda zai gyara musu nono kala kala amma shiru babu wani canji wasu har matsala yake jawo musu kuma gaskiya akwai rashin sanin lokacinda mace zata gyara nono da kuma hanyoyin gyaran da kuma maganinda zaisa nono ya gyaru...

   ▣👙    LOKACIN GYARA NONO...  👙 ▣
☏08039347743

Tun kina budurwa zaki fara kiyaye nononki wato kamar yawan tsalle ko daurin kirji da zani ko kuma mummunan kwanciya wanada zaki danne su sannan akwai rigar nono (brezy) itama dole kisan wanda ya kamata kisaka wato wacce bazata matsesuba da dai sauran abubuwanda zasu wahalarda su to idan kika kiyaye wannan har lokacin aurenki nononki zai kasance a tsaye yanda oga zai rude Lokacinda kika zama matar aure saboda saduwar jima i da sauran uzirin mijinki a wajen nononki zai rinka karuwa yana kwanciya to wannan lokacin zaki rinka daukar ingantattun magunguna na gargajiya Wanda zasu karawa nononki kyauwu wannan duk muna bayaninsu a posting dinmu to bayan kin haifu kuma zaki iya rabuwa da kowanne magani kedai kirinka shan abubuwanda zai karawa nononki ruwa kamarsu nonon saniya ko madara peak ko luna ko yougut ko garin madara kika jika da ruwa kika zuba garin zogale kikasha zai miki amfani ko kunun kanwane zaki iyasha ya danganta da yanayin wadatarda kike dashi har lokacinda zakiyi yaye zakiga nononki da ruwa sosai to bayan kin yaye sai kuma kiyi gyara na masuyin yaye shine zakiga kinayi kinyi nasara kuma za a dade ana miki kallon budurwa kuma zakiga yanda zaki samu kulawa da soyayya awajen mijinki kinga babu maganar kishiya a gidanki.

abubuwan dakesa gaban mace yana wari.

➽ tafiya babu wando pant.
➽ rashin sanya takalmi koda kuwa a cikin gida ne.
➽ dadewa akan (toilet) masai.
➽ rashin canza pant da wuri.
➽ yawaita cin danyar albasa.
➽ istimna'i ko masturbation (wato mace ta biyawa kanta bukata ta hanyar wasa da gabanta lesbian).
➽ tsarki da ruwan sanyi.
➽ rashin aske gaba dadai sauransu.

        🍂◉ MAGINI WANNAN CUTA ◉🍃

¹ mace ta dinga tsarki da ruwan dumi.
² ki dinga yawan canza wando a kullum kamar sau.
³ ki rage cin danyar albasa.
⁴ a duk lokacin da mace ta gama haila ta dinga
wanke gabanta da ganyen magarya ko bagaruwa da almiski fari.
⅝ ki daina tsugunawa akan Masai kina dauka
lokacin domin yin haka yana da matsala.
6 ta yawaita aske gabanta duk sati ¹ ko ² idan
mace zata bin wa'yannan dokokin zata samu
waraka daga duk wata cutar farji.

✦ garin habbur rashad cokali 7
✦ zaitun cokali ¹0
Ki gauraya su Sannan ki rinka diban cokali 2 kina dafawa kullum idan ya tafasa sai ki sauke ki tace sannan ki zuba ruwan zuma kisha.

Zaki Fara amfani dashi tun kwana biyar kafin
zuwan al'adarki sannan ki cigaba da amfani dashi har lokacin da al'adar take.

Kina yin wannan da yarda Allah zai Kara miki
ni'imar jikin ki bayan kuma ya miki maganin
wannan ciwon Mara.

Allah.

               (⌒MAHADIN GYRAN GASHI⌒)

💆🏼wannan hadi zai tai makawa mace wadda
gashin ta yake yawan lalacewa, domin kuwa
gashinki ba shi ba karai rayewa zai rinka laushi
kuma ya Kara tsaho idan har kina San kada ya
lalace kina iya samun wannan kiyi amfani dashi.

¹🍂 ganyen Kai da magarya
Ki da kashi kina yin amfani dashi wajan wanke
kanki wanke gashi da shi, yana kara karfafa gashi ya kuma hanashi zubewa ko kuma ki nemi:
¹ danyen kwai 2
² sabulun salo 3
³ garin shanmar
A fasa kwai amma banda kwan duwar farin kadai Zaki yi amfani da shi, sai ki zuba sabulun salo a ciki, ki matse ki zuba garin shammar a ciki sai ki wanke Kai da shi idan har kina yin wannan hadin lai-lai kanki zai yi gashi mai kyau insha Allah.

               ♡´･ GYARAN NONO ² ･`♡

tabbas matsalar nono tana da yawa domin zaka ga wasu matan nonon su ya kwanta ko ya koma dan kankanin saka makon tso-tso idan kina San ya taso Yayi kyau sai kiyi wannan hadin ki gani .

づ albasa madaidaiciya
づ zuma 🍯
づ garin gero
づ madara
ki samu albasa madaidaiciya ki yanyanka sai ki
saka a tukunya da ruwanki ta tafasa shi sosai har sai ruwan ya koma baki, sai ki juye ruwan ki sami zumar ki mai kyau, garin gero ludayi daya, madara na gwangwani daya na ruwa sai ki juye su kan ruwan tafasasshe albasa nan ki sha .

Amma fa karki bari ya kwana baki shanye ba.
Wannan hadine da zai gyara miki nono 👙.

             ⊂👙 GYARAN NONO ³ 👙⊃

            ◉ AMFSNIN MAN KWA-KWA ◉

¹ Taushin fata - Ana iya shafawa kamar man jiki a shafa a ko'ina har wuya.
² man fuska - Ana shafawa a zagage kwayar Ido da shi yana maganin bakin da ke fitowa zagaye Ido yana kuma maganin tamushewar fata na tsufa.
³ Ana shafa man kwakwa kadan a jikin auduga a goge fuska da shi yana gagawan cire kwalliya da ta dankare a fuska mata.
⁴ yana Hana fashewan lebe musamman a lokacin sanyi.
⅝ yana gyara gashin mata yana sasu Kara karfi yana kashe amosani sannan yana karshe
kwarkwata.
6 Ana iya hada man kwakwa da sugar a murza a fata sannan a wanke da ruwa da sabulun yana sa fata yayi laushi.

        🍃= ｘDADEWA ANA JIMA'Iｘ=🍂

Idan mutum baya da dewa akan matar sa ko once maigidanki baya dadewa yana jima'i sai kiyi masa wannan hadin.
Idan kina so ya rika dadewa a kanki kuna jima'i to yi masa wannan hadin ki sha mamaki.
🍆 cucumber (gurji)
🍯 zuma
Ka samu cucumber ka markada sai zuma me kyau ka matse a ciki ka rinka sha zakayi mamaki wajen jimawa kana jima'i baka zubar da maniyyi ba.

🙈🙈🙈🙈🙈🙈🙈
: NAU'OIN KWANCIYA



1.zaki tsaya atsaye oga ya rungumoki ta baya saiki sunguya kidafa gado ki turomai ta baya sai ya zura azzakarinsa cikin gindinki, saiki hade kafafunki ki matsesu shikuma ya dafa duwawunki, yana motsawa

2 zaki kwanta rufda ciki oga yahau kan duwawunki yazura azzakarinsa, kekuma kidinga dago duwawunki sama kina tayashi motsawa

3 zaki yi kamar kinyi sujada sai shikuma ya kafa gwuiwarsa akangado yasa hannu ya rike kwankawasonki yana motsawa

4 zaki kwanta rigingine kibuda kafarki inya zura saiki daga kafarki sama kihardesu ki daura akafadarsa saikisa hannu kidago duwawunki yadda zaidinga shiga sosai

5  zaki kwanta rigingine kafarki ta hagu saiki lankwasata kamar mai tankwashe kafa saiki tokareta da kirjinsa shikuma yaita zurawa

6  wannan zaki kwanta arigingine amma kidan karkace bangaren hagu sai oga ya daga kafarki ta hagu yasata a akafadarsasai yakanta ahannun damansa yana rungume da kafar hagunji sai ya zura azzakarinsa, saiya mikarda hannun damansa zuwa kan nononki yana murzasu, yana motsawa, hmn kudai kawai ku tabbatar kofa arufe take

 
7  oga zai kwanta agefen gado kafafuwansa akasa kekuma daman kin lailaya banana tamike car, saiki juyamai baya kizauna akansa banana ta lume cikin kogi saikiyita sukuwa shikuma yana shafa duwawunki jinata sukuwa

8  zai kwanta akan gado sosai kihau kansa ki zura banana ta lume sai ki samai filo kidago kansa saikisamai nononki abakinsa yana tsotsa kina sukuwa hmn ranar za'a nad'a ki sarauniya

‎TSOTSAN BURA

darasinmmu shine (shan buran namiji)wato!yay￼a mace zata sha ko ta
tsotsi buran namiji.Gaskiya mafi yawan yan matanmu na Arewa kokuma
ince matan hausawa wallahi basu iya sha ko tsotsan buran namiji ba!
Na farko shine shin hajiya kinsan babu abunda namiji yafi so kaman
shan(Bura?)Hm!b￼awai kawai zakizo ki kwanta ki ware kafafuwanki
namiji ya hau ki cikin minti uku har yayi release ba!mu maza bamu son
haka!Hajiya abunda zakiyi shine,kishiga cikin dakin mijinki ki cire mishi
kaya,ki dauko madara mai sanyi ta gwangwani ki bashi abaki yasha,sai
ki cire mishi kayan jikin shi duka yarage(pant)kaw￼ai!sai ki fara

*DAUWAMA A CIKIN GIDA*
.
Cigaba
.
.
Anaso mace ta lizimci dakin mijinta. Allah ta'ala yace *(kunatsu a cikin gedajen ku)* wato kamar asamu ruwa azuba acikin kwano idan aka bar ruwan yasamu kamar minti 5 zakuga ruwan ya natsu ya kwanta lif! A cikin kwanon haka akeso mace ta zamo agidan mijinta, wato abinda ayar take nufi anaso yazama duk inda kikaje aduniya bakya samun natsuwa sai kin dawo dakinki idan kinje gidanku kiji kamar bisa kaya kike sai kin dawo dakin mijinki.****
.
.
In kinje gidan kawarki kiji kamar kan kaya kike bazaki samu natsuwa da kwanciyar hankali ba sai kin dawo gidan mijinki. To irin wannan matar zakuga mijin yana sonta akwai mata wadanda kafarsu kaikayi takeyi saboda yawon bala'i da takeda shi in tana dakin miji sai taji kamar mintsilinta akeyi. Kawai saita figi hijabi tayi waje, na'am wannan ba daidai bane, kuskure ne.****
.
.
To kenan haramun ne mace tafita daga dakin mijinta? Ya halatta, amma da sharadi guda biyu: 1- yazama tayi shiga wanda ya dace da islam, 2- da izinin mijinta, saboda haka bazaki fita ba sai kin nemi izinin mai gida neman izinin mai gida kuma da dama daga cikinku basu iya neman izini wajen mai gida ba. Zakuga labari kawai ake baiwa mijin, irin abinda ake cewa "for your information; ba wai bukatace ta kawo nema ba, a'a sanar dashi takeyi.****
.
.
.
Zamu dakata anan sai wani lokaci zamuci gaba insha Allah 
.
.

🌰Abu na farko🌰

⛄GEFEN HAMMATA

☀Yar uwa idan kika iya biyawa oga bukata ta wannan hanyar wato hammatarki,hmmmm to da oga yaji dadi,yadda zakiyi 

☀saiki kama bananar🍌🍌🍌🍌oga ki matseta (either left or right hand)ki zauna ko kwance sai oga ya sanya bananarsa🍌🍌🍌tsakani yana sokawa,idan da man (cream)saiki dan shafa mata don saukin sokawa haka kuma kina kama (twice)kina matsewa hmmmmmmmm harya biya bukatarsa

🙌🏾Shafar hannu🙌🏾

Kowa yasan yadda ake kama banana 🍌🍌🍌🍌da hannu a murza akama (twice)a matsa haka zaki dinga yi masa harya kawo

💋Yayin  kiss👄

Bawai kawai kiss ake da baki ba,harda biyawa oga bukata yayin (period)

Wasu matan ko kiss basu iya ba don haka zasu koyi yadda akeyinsa

Hmmmmmmmm ina kike yar uwa kisani wallahi idan kik gwada yiwa oga hakan yayinda yake bukace domin hmmmmm lallai zaki sha mamaki domin zaki ga yadda oga zaikamayi idan mah ace kin gwane

Alokacin da kika kama zakarin sa saiki saka abakinki amman kafin ki saka saiki dan fara lasata kina lasawa sama sama saiki dan kamu dai dai wajan dan kan kaciyarsa ki tsotsa kina murzawa saiki sakata doka kinayi kina cirewa kina tsotsa,wai dadi kan dadi amman sai kingwada,


Wallahi mata kocire konya domin reke mazajenko da kyau kosani wani lokacin idan kona (period)shike sawa mazajanko so shiga wani hali

Amman idan konayi musu haka ai shikenna

👞Tafin kafa👞

Yar uwa saiki saka oga ya kwanta rigir gine ya ware kafarsa kamar zaki masa kaciya sai kisa tautausar tafin kafarki guda biyu kina murmurza bananar🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌sa ki taba kanta kinataba (twice)har saikinga ya kawo

💧Dadin Nono💧

Da yawanmu musan yadda ake biyawa oga bukata da nono 

Kisani bawai anyi shidan kawai ki bawa jariri bane yadda ake (sucking)haka zaki wa oga wato ki hada masa su guri daya,shi kuma yasa bananarsa🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌a tsakiya yayita sakata kada ki tsaya haka ki dinga tufa mata miyau (yawu)danya samu sauki

🎱Banda wasa🎱

Duk wadannan abunuwan bazasu samu ba sai kin iya wasa da miji wato ki zama mace wadda bata da kunya a wajansa,domin shine zai sa yabiya masa bukatarsa da kyau

👎🏻A kula👎🏻

Yar uwa kada ki bari ya sadu dake,idan kina haila wato (period)don hakan sabawa Allah ne da manzonsa,hakanan ki nisanxi sanya banana🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌cikin duburan ki wato (duwawu)yin hakan haramun ne,

Sai de idan kika fahimci yana da sha awa sosai sai ki kama yi masa wasa da 🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌 a saman nononki  har sai ya kawo 

In kuma zaki iya ki matse masa 🍌 ita a cinya yayi tayi dan in kin iya ma sai kin gama kin gaya masa cinya ce yace maki ba ita bace ba amma kisa wani abu ki toshe jinin karya zubo

WACCE TAKE SO KAR AJI WARI A JIKINTA SAI DAI QAMSHI_*
         
 *_Dr bodmas_*
*IDAN MACE TANA SO IDAN MUJINTA YANA SADUWA DA ITA QAMSHI YA RINGA TASHI:*
Sai ki nemi:
Miski.
Ambar.
Ganyen magarya.
Rihatul Hubbi.
Zam-zam.
Ma'ul ma'i.
Sai ki haxa su guri guda a kwano sai ki xan tafasa su, yayin da ya huce sai ki nemi buta mai kyau ki zubashi ki qara masa ruwa. Yayin da zaki je ki kwanta sai ki kama ruwa dashi ki shashshafeshi har gefen farjin ki, da cikinsa. Da qirjinki zuwa cinyoyinki. Wannan shi zai hana mujinki ya gujeki, kuma zaki ga yadda zai riqa nuna kwaxayinki.
*WACCE TAKE SO KAR AJI WARI A JIKINTA SAI DAI QAMSHI A YAYIN SADUWA KO FIRA DA OGA*
Sai ta nemi:
Alumun.
Kanwa ungurnu.
Lemon tsami.
Turaren bahur.
Sai ta cakuxasu waje guda sai ki ringa gogawa a jikinki zuwa Hammatarki.
Domin wari ta guri uku yake futowa a jikin mace:
Hammata.
Baki.
Farji.
Idan kika kula da waxannan gurare, to zaki tsira daga dukkan wari. To bayan kin gama goga waxannan abubuawa to sai kiyi wanka. To jikinki ba zai rinqa wari ba. Baki yana warinsa ne yayin Magana. Kuma kinga dole ne kiyi Magana.
Hammata tana warinta ne yayin motsi, kinga dole kiyi motsi-farji yana warin sane yayin jima'i. Ki kula da waxannan abubuwan. Kar kice jikina baya wari ko baya xoyi, domin idan mutum yana yi shi baya ji, don Hausawa suna cewa java bata jin warin jikinta.


 *Dr bodmas*

       Idan kina tare da maigida, karki zama mai zama nesa da shi,
      ki zauna yanda jikin ku zai rika shafar juna domin ba abinda
      ke kara shakuwa kamar "body contact" wato gogayyar jiki, idan
      kun kasanta ki langabe masa tamkar baki da lafia koda kuwa
      lafiarki lau, akwai abinda bature ke kira "subconscious mind"
      koda lafiyarki kalau zuciyarsa zata kasance cikin wasuwasi
      bazai sami natsuwaba in ba yaga kin zama daidai ba, koda kin
      kwana 2, ki bukace shi ya ware maki koda awa daya ne a cikin
      lokutansa da niyyar kina so ya koya maki wani abu wanda baki
      sani ba na rayuwar aure, dalilin haka tamkar ka baiwa dan
      makarantane assignment, ba zai cireki a zuciyarsa ba har sai
      ya sami abinda zai fada koya maki, kinga kin baiwa zuciyarsa
      aiki bashi da lokacin tunanin wata! kafin mai gida ya ci
      abinci ki, ki tabbatar kin caba kwalliya domin hakan zai
      bashi damar cika tumbinsa! Idan kun kebe a makwancin ku,
      baiwar Allah, karki barshi yayita wahala shi kadai! Kwanciyar
      aure ba dan namiji kadai akayi ba, kema kina da sha'awarki,
      yana nasa kina naki, in ya taba nan ke taba can, idan ya
      matsa nan ko cafko can, idan kika sakar masa jiki abin bazai
      armashi ba, amma idan aikin ya zama na mutum 2, zaki ga
      fa'ida! Namiji yaro ne saida rarrashi, yanayin tafiyarki
      karta zama kamar ta masu noman dankali, yangar da mata ke a
      waje ba kugu suka fiki ba, ba nonuwa suka fiki ba, jujjuyasu
      ki sami lada, idan kika barsu a cikin kaya ba abinda zasu
      kareki da su, komin kankantar abinda zai ja maigida yace
      Allah maki albarka karki raina! Wacce ta mayarda miji uba ita

      ballagaza ta rabaki da uban yaranki!ka/ki tura ma mata qanwa
      ko yaruwa don qaruwar junanmu baki daya

Mu kula da kanmu kuma mu gyara jikinmu,mu nunawa mazajenmu soyayya.Idan yadawo jeki rungumeshi ki hada goshinki da nashi kice" u r welcome darling",seyaji har cikin kwakwalwanshi....ki kama hanunshi kije kicire mai kaya kirakashi bandaki inda halima kiyi mai wanka,ki rakoshi ki gogemai jiki da towel sannan kisamai kaya marar nauyi....kijashi kufito falo kinamai hira me dadi yanacin abinci inyagama ki tattare plates kikai kitchen ko gun wanke wanke.kije ki kara wanka kifeshe jikin ki da turare me dadin kamshi kisa kaya marar nauyi kaman evenin show ko English gown marar nauyi...kizo kizauna akan cinyanshi kice "HI darling" zakiga to salon ze sanja....mata suna yawan complain wai mijinsu baya dawowa da wuri daga kasuwa ko aiki,to yadawo an batamai rai dan me gobe ze dawo dawuri akuma batamai rai din...in mijinki bedawowa da wuri kibarshi, kiyimai duk abunda na lissafa asama in kin zauna a cinyannashi se ki riko kanshi ki hada goshinshi da naki kidan ciji hancinshi ko kumatu zedanyi kara inyace meyamiki,seki amsa cikin shagawaba kice"to ba kaine kaki dawowa da wuriba yau,naita jiranka har nagaji.kwalliyan da nama har ya goge" nitsuwa zeyi ya baki hakuri kuma gobe baze sake yakara dawowa ba dawuriba.kinga yadda akeyi ba wai ki haushi da masifaba kaaman kekika aipeshi...maza kaman jarirai suke, lallabi sukeso da ladabi.kuma inkika musu riban nakine.Domin ga lada agun ubangiji ga kuma soyayya agun miji...mata don ALLAH mu kula mu kwatan wa kanmu hakki.....munaji muna kallo wata awaje da kwacemana miji... Da wannan kalaman take kwacemusu zuciya.In kuna dan zaune kizama me kwanciya ajikin mijinki ko kuma kimai kiss haka kawai inkuna zaune kidan taso kaman meyin wani abu ki zagayo tabayan kujera ta sama ki dago kanshi kisa bakinki anashi ki tsotsi abinki nakine,in son samu kisa kankara bakinkin yadan jima kadan sekicire kapinnan bakin naki yadau sanyi sekiwa Oga kiss...seyaji har cikin kwakwalwanshi....kuma bawai dole se da dare kuma adaki akan gado ake HARKA BA..A a ba haka abun yakeba,darana da safe da yamma duk lokacin da kike bukata ba sekinjira Oga kullum ace  shi yake nemankiba...kema wataran ki bushi iska kinemeshi,kiyi wanka tsab ki wanke HQ a turarashi da turare me dadin kamshi,ki shafa mai me santsi a nononki kisa sleepin dress dinki musamman chest out kinadoso shi zeji tsikar jikinshi ya tashi...kinazuna ki dale kansa kiciremai kaya inzeyi magana kisa bakinki anashi kina murza kan nononshi da hannunki...karki sake kullum yazo yahau kanki yayi ta sukuwa kaman wata doki badole seyasa banana a HQ bane kawai zeyi releasing,there are numerous ways kaman da tafin kapa ko tsakankanun nonuwanki ETc inkikaga gamanan sau kasa da hannayenki zuwa" Oga at the top" wato🍌 kisa dankaramin yatsanki abakin bulin🍌 kina masa tafiyar tsutsa tare da saka harce kina dan lasa kaman meshan lollipop...ki hada nonuwanki waje daya kisaka bananan a tsakaninsu kina sama da kasa inkingama kihada tafin kafanki ki tabbata kinshafa mai sanna kisa banana a tsakiyansu kina sama da Kasa nanma ahaka har ya releasin dis are ways n tips dat should b often considered mu dear sisters...Allah bamu zaman lafia agidan mazajenmu wanda basuyi aureba kuma Allah basu mazaje nagari..bissalam
ADDU,AR DA YADACE MACE TAGARI TAYI MA MIJINTA:1)Allah ya kare shi daga sharrin shedan,2)Allah ka kare mani mijina daga sharrin mahassada,sharrin miyagun mutane,sharrin miyagun aljanu,sharrin makiya,3)Allah kayi ma mijina budi ta  hanyar halali,4)Allah ka kare mijina daga zina,5)Allah ka kare mani mijina da sharrin mazinatan mata,6)Allah idan ka kaddari mijina da karin aure ka hadashi da mace tagari kamarni ba wacce zata ruguza mashi gida ba ko rashin adalci ameen. idan ko kika kasance mai wannan addu'ar bake ba wani matsala a gidanki,sai dai farin ciki da karin kaunar juna ke da mijinki.DON ALLAH DUK MACEN DA TA SAMU WANNAN SAKON TAYI KOKARIN TURA MA YAN UWANTA MATA AMMA NAGARI.

MAI MALLAKAN SIRRI MIJIN TA
ZAKI HADA DA KANKI
Ki dafa kanunfari idan ya dauko nuna saiki
zuba zuma
a ciki, bayan kin sauke ki sami garin ridi ki
zuba ki
hada nonon shanu mara tsami ki gauraya
idan yayi
sanyi ki sha......sai naji daga gare ku............
ki sami kanunfari da dabino ki jika sai sun
tsima saiki
rinka diban ruwan kinasa zuma da madara
kina sha,
duk abinda aka ji na yafe kar a fada min.........
GYARA 3
ta sami sassaken baure ta dafashi da
kanumfari citta
da lipton ta hada ta tafada sai ta tace ta sa a
fridge
tarim ga sha tsimine wlhy yana da kyau
sosai
GYARA 1
,zaki samu garin zogale ne ki jika ki ringa sha
sau biyu
a rana. Kina tashi daga bacci kafin kici komai
ki sha
ruwan zogale,sai kuma in zaki kwanta Ya
zamo na
karshe.
Sai kuma in Kina infection ki ringa seat bath
dashi
GYARA 4
Ki daka aya ki tankade sai ki samu
bushasshen dabino
shima ki dake shi, hade da mazarkwaila ki
hade su da
garin ayar. Ki sami nono ki rinka damawa
kina sha.
AMFANIN TAFARNUWA GA MATA :::::
*************************
Idan mace tana ciwon mara ko ciwon ciki alokacin al'ada ko jinin yarikayi mata wasa, tasamu zuma cokali 5 tahada da man tafarnuwa cokali 2, in an hada sai tarika sha cokali 1 dasafe 1 da yamma,

MATAR DA JINI YAKI DAUKE MATA tarika shan man tafarnuwa rabin karamin cokali sau 4 arana.

RIGA KAFIN CIWON NONO GA WACCE TA HAIHU; Anacin
dabino guda 7 asha man tafarnuwa karamin cokali sau 1 arana kwana uku.

DAUREWAR CIKI
KO MARA BAYAN HAIHUWA; Asamu ruwa mai zafi kofi 1 azuba man tafarnuwa karamin cokali asha sau 1 kwana 3.

YAWAN LALACEWAR CIKI KO
YAWAN BARI; asamu kwan agwagwa asoya da man tafarnuwa abaiwa matar taci sau 2 arana kwana 7.

TSAWON GASHI DA HANASHI
KAKKARYEWA; Asamu man kwakwa ahada da man zaitun da man tafarnuwa arinka shafawa akai, amma man tafarnuwa 50% za,asa sauran
kuma 100&... Allah yasa mudace...zan kawo wasu da yarda Allah
Muhammadurrasulillah (saw) yace: lelle mace tana fuskantowa da fuskan sheitan (kirjin ta) kuma tana juya baya daga sheitan (duwawukan ta).... Saboda haka aka umarce mu da mu sa hajibi domin mu rufe wadannan ababe guda biyu.    Yaci gaba da cewa (maza) idan dayan ku yaga mace ta burge shi to ya koma ga iyalan sa haka ze cire masa abinda ke cikin ransa. To yan'uwa mata muji tsoron  Allah mu dinga shigan mutunci domin wasu basu da matan  wasu kuwa matansu ba su da irin sirrin da Allah ya ba ki, wasu masu hakuri wasu marasa hakuri. Kinga idan muka fiddo da wadannan abubuwa muna yawo bisa titi ba karamin fitana muke sanyawa yan'uwammu musulmi (maza) koma na yayan mu. Dibi yar'uwa yanda muke yafa gyale azamanin nan  nonuwa waje duwawuka waje. Muji tsoron Allah mu gyara. Yar'uwa idan kin samu wannan sako ki turawa masoyanki  mata don Allah dan darajar annabi (saw). Cikakkiyar masoyiyar  manzo Allah (saw) zata iya turawa karanci mata 5 idan ko ta kasa to ta sawa kanta alamar tambaya? Shin ta cika masoyiya


MATA KO KUNSAN KISS KALA KALA



      1.FRENCH KISS: Wannan shine sannannen sumba da kowa ya sani kuma maza sunfi zaquwa akansa. Amma shine mafi wahala wajen koyo. Ynda ake yi shine zaki kusanto oga ne ki soma tsotsan lips dinsa a hnkli sama sama har ki zura harshenki cikin bakin Oga kina mai jujjuya harshenki cikin salon shauki da iyawa, ki kamo harshensa cikin natsuwa ba cafka zakiyi da karfi ba a'a a hnkali zaki kama kan harshen nasa kina jujjuyawa kina tsotsa a hnkli. Zaki ga ya cafki taki kma sai ki sau masa ragamar kina jan numfashi a hnkli.                                     2. EARLOPES KISS: A nan zaki kama kasan kunnen Oga a hnkli a tsakanin lips dinki ki dinga turawa a natse kina tsotsa a hnklu hadi da lasa. Wannan zai sa jikin Oga ya tsirga kuma zai tuna masa da zazzafar kaunarki.             3.NECK KISS:  Wannan ma yana da muhimmanci sosai. Kiss ne dake nuna cewa kina bukatar oga. *oga im ready*... A nan zaki daura lips dinki a kan wuyan Oga ki bashi 'yar karamar sumba bayan kin jiqa lebbanki da miyau kadan kafin kiyi. Jikin oga zai mutu zai ji shima babu abnda yake sha'awa irin ya kasance tare dake.      4.CHEEK KISS(kumatu): Shine wanda zaki sumbaci kumatun abun kaunarki ta hnyar shimfida lips dinki akan kumatun tare da bada sautin iska a hnkli cikin salo da jan hnkli. Wannan wani salo ne na bayyana godiyarki ga Oga bayan wata bajinta ko kyauta ko wata 'yar tsaraba idan ya kawo maki..                             5. ANGEL KISS: Ana yinsa ne a hnkli cikin salo na amfani da saman lebbanki; a inda zaki daura lips dinki akan saman idon Oga a hnkli cikin kulawa. Wannan kiss ana amfani dashi wajen tashin Oga daga barci. Kuma yana dasa kauna a zuciyar Ogan...                                      6. BUTTERFLY KISS:  A nan zaki matso kusa da Oga ne ki manna fuskarki a tasa ya zamana gashin idonki yana gogan nasa sai ki marmara gashin idon naki a hnkli kiyi sama da gashn idonki a kan goshinsa. Wannan salo yana nuna ynda kike jin Oga a ranki. Zaiyi tasiri idan kuna zaune kuna kallo ko ma idan zai fita..                                    7. SOLO KISS: Wannan wani salo ne da zaki wajen kama lip(lebe) daya na Oga na 'dan sec 10-15. Ki tsotsi leben kasa ko na sama a hnkli cikin salon soyayya

NI'IMA ADON MACE
     yau nazo muku da wasu sirrikan da zasu taimaka muku mata yan uwana. Namiji abin tattaline. Kusani mata namiji dangoyone ga wadda ta iya. Ku girmama mazajenku kwa sami Aljannar Ubangijinku cikin sauki. Muje zuwa main point dinmu yanuwa.
       GYARAN JIKI
*Lalle
*Kwaiduwar kwai uku 
*Manja cokali uku
*Cocumber
*Kur-kur
     Ki sami wadannan kayan dana lissafa ki hadasu waje daya ki kwaba amma cocumber sai kin malkada kin tace ruwan sannan ki zuba akai ki kwaba ki bashi kamar minti goma ko ashirin ya tsumu sannan ki shafa a jikinki ki bashi awa guda sannan kiyi wanka da sabulun gana kona salo.
  Sai an gwada zaa tabbatar da amfaninsa saboda haka na baki kiyi kamar sati biyu kina haka zakiga yadda jikinki zai koma.
       GYARAN JIKI KASHI NA 2
 *Ayaba( banana)
*Lemon tsami
*Tatacciyar madara
*kwai guda daya
*Man kadanya
*Cocumber
       Kihada ayabarki da cocumber ki markadasu a blender su malkadu sosai ki juye a dan wani abun sannan  ki zuba tatacciyar madararki aciki sai kwai sai ki matsa lemon tsami kadan ki chakudasu su hadu sosai sannan ki shafa kibarshi yayi kamar awa daya sai ki shafa man kadanya kibarshi yayi kamar minti talatin sannan kiyi wanka da ruwan zafi idan kin fito ki shafa duk wani cream da kikasan ya karbeki. Waiyyo yaruwa  ki lazimci yin haka kamar na sati daya zakiga canji. Sai an gwada akansan na kwarai.
        KARIN NI'IMA
* Gyada mai bargo
* Kwakwa
* Aya
* Dabino
* Cukwi
* Garin zogale(shanyar inuwa)
* Garin sassaken baure
* Garin sassaken gamji
      Da farko zaki sami gyadarki mai bargo sai kisassabata ki cire jan bawon sannan ki dakata. Sai ki sami kwakwarki ki markadata tare da ayarki da dabino. Ki daka cukwi, zogale, sassaken baure, da sassaken gamji.
   Sai ki hada wadannan kayan guri daya ki rinkasha tsawan sati daya zakisha mamaki. Sai kin zarce saa yaruwa.
      KARUWAR NI'IMA NA 2
*Alkama
* danyar gyada
*waken suya
*aya
*madarar ruwa
*kwakwa
   Ki sami alkamarki kofi daya da danyar gyada kofi daya sai aya kofi daya da waken suya kofi daya sannan kwakwa kwallo biyu , ki jika ki markada sannan ki tace kibarshi yazama gasara sai kirinka damawa kamar koko ki zuba madara ta ruwa kiyi kamar sati biyu kina shan wannan hadin. Sai angwada akansan na kwarai uwargida
     GYARAN NONO
*farar shinkafa
*garin alkama
*garin habbatussauda
*garin ayaba(plantain)
*gyada mai malfa( mai zabo)
*aya
*madara
*zuma
     Zaki sami plantain dinki ki shanyashi ya bushe sai ki daka ki hada da garin alkama da garin farar shinkafa saiki hada aya da gyadar a malkada a tace ruwan, sai ki dora akan wuta a zuba garikan akai, a zuba madarar gari data ruwa da zuma, sannan ki dama yayi kauri. 
Kiyi kamar sati biyu ko hudu kina haka sannan kisami rigar nono acuci maza kisaka. Waiyyo yaruwa maigida tambayarki zaiyi yace my lyf balanbalan kika hura? Kinsan amsar da zaki bashi..........
    GYARAN NONO NA 2
   Zaki sami hulba a tafasa arinka gasa nono dashi sannan ashafa man hulba . Ko kuma ki tafasa hulbar ki gasa nonon sannan ki kada kwan salwa ki shafa sai ki kada guda uku ki shanye. 
Waishhhhhh yaruwa ba magana kidai gwada.

*KASHI NA DAYA (1)*
*ana so mace ta ringa gyara kanta tun tana gidan iyayenta ba sai tayi aure ko kuma ta zo yin aure kafin ta Fara gyara kanta ba.*
*wasu da yawan yan'mata sai kaga suna yin abin har yana gona da iri*
*TSARKI DA RUWAN DUMI :*
*tsarki da ruwan dumi ba karamin taimakawa yake yi ba wajen gyaran ( farji )*
*Mata Ku kiyaye tsarki da ruwan sanyi saboda ba karamin illa yake yi ma mace ba.*
✎ *GANYEN MAGARYA:*
*ana so mace ta dinga yin tsarki da ganyen magarya idan da so Samu ne ya zama shine permanent ruwan tsarkin ki shi ma ba karamin gyara ( farji ) yake yi ba.*
✎           *ZUMA:*
*ana so mace ta ringa shan Zuma cokali daya (1) da safe daya (1) da daddare 1 wannan yana taimakawa wajen dawo miki da ni'iman ki da ya tafi yayin da kike jinin al'ada.*
❑     *SHAN ZUMA*
*ana so macen da take cikin jinin al'ada ta rinka shan zuma cokali uku (3) kullum da safe har tsawon kwanaki da zata gama al'ada.*
☛ *MAN HABBATUSSAUDA :*
*zaki sami man habbatussauda shima ki rinka sha kina shafawa a ( farji)*
 *KANKANA DA MADARA :*
*Ana so mace ta rinka shan kankana da madara a ko wane lokaci da ta gama al'adarta.*
☛ *KANKANA DA CUCUMBER:*
*zaki yanka kankana da cucumber sai ki hade su kiyi blanding ki rinka sha a duk lokacin da kika sami Hali.*
          ❑ *AL'MISKI*
*ana so mace ta sami miski ki rinka sa kadan a ( farji ) dinki.*
*Ko da kin wanke pants dinki wannan kamshi yana jikinki.*
            ✿ *IYAYE* ❀
*wadannan abubuwan Dana lissafa irin wadanda ya kamata mace ta rinka yi kenan tun tana gaban iyayenta.*
✎ *mata a daina yawan cushe-cushe a ( farji ) yawan yin hakan ba karamin matsala yake jawo wa ba.*
❏ *TURAREN ( FARJI )*
*wannan hadin shi zai sa farji ya dinga kamshi a duk lokacin gabatar da jima'i:*
➽ *anbar.*
➽ *miski.*
➽ *ganyen magarya.*
➽ *rihatul-hubbi.*
➽ *ma'ul miyami.*
*Sai ki hade su waje daya ki tafasa su ki juye a roba ki Kara ruwa ki zauna a ciki kamar (30) min*
*Lilacin da zaki kwanta ki Kama ruwa da shi ki shafa ruwa a gefen ( farji ) wannan shi zai Hana mijinki ya guje ki

TSOKANO SHA'AWA


SHA'AWA: wani sinadari ne da Allah (s.w.a) ya halitta a jinsina biyu Na Dan Adam,aljannu da kuma dabbobi,Wanda sanadiyar hakan yasa daya jinsin bukatuwar daya jinsin ( macce ko namiji),sannan da Shiga wani yanayi a lokacin da daya jinsin ya rasa daya.
  TSOKANO SHA'AWA:
Tsokano sha'awa nauyi ne da ya rataya a tsakanin jinsuna biyu(mata da Maza),amma saidai kash mafiya yawan mata suna zaton cewa wasa da motsa sha'awa aikin Maza ne,wani lokacin mazan ke ganin aikin mata ne,duk mata ko mijin dake tunanin hakan sun fadi jarabawa a fagen soyayyar zamantakewar aure.
Sai dai wannan matsalar tafi kamari da kuma illa a gurin mata,domin kuwa shi namiji tarairaya yake bukata a koda yaushe,idan ya rasa hakan to a lokacin wata zata kwace maki shi a cikin sauki,galibin Maza sunfi so da kuma karkata wajen matar da take masu wasa kala kala.A saboda haka nake  shawartar ki da kada kiji kunya ko gudun karda mijinki hace kin fiye jaraba,ba haka bane ki janye wannan tunanin,ki sani cewa mu'amalar aure ibada ce kuma duk lokacin da kika bada gudummawa gurin tsokano sha'awar maigidan ki,kema zaki samu wani kaso najin dadi hadi da nishadi a gurin mu'amalar aure.

Kamar yanda kuka sani addini Yazo mana d hanyoyi kala kala wadanda zamubi wurin magance matsalolin mu
Sai dai idan iliminmu bai kai wurin b

Akwai hanyoyin da na kebi wurin taimakawa mata wadanda suke Neman mijin Aure 
Akwai ingantattun magungunan da muka tanadarwa masu wannan matsalar 
Sannan akwai taimako NA Addu'o'in d muke yiwa masu wannan matsalar dmn ganin cewa Allah ya yaye musu matsalarsu

Munyi kokari Wurin sarrafa magunguna NA Farin Jini d tsare JIKI
Sannan akwai addu'o'i NA wadannan matsalolin wadanda idan har aka bisu Allah zai biya bukata insha Allahu

Muna saida hadaddun kayan mata d magungunan gargajiya masu kyau ingantattu
KAMAR
Hadadden Maganin GIRMAN NONO, CIKAR NONO, TSAYUWAR NONO DA LAUSHINSA
Mun sarrafa wannan Magani Ne dmn matan d suka Dade suna kashe kudadensu a banza babu biyan bukata, kokuma wadanda mazajensu suke sha'awar NONUWA Amma basuda su

Muna saida ingantaccen Maganin GIRMAN DUWAWU Hadi mai kyau NA musamman
Mun bada lokaci wurin sarrafa wannan Magani dmn  sharewa yan'uwa mata hawayensu

Muna saida ingantaccen MATSI mai matse mace sosai yanda ko yatsa bazai shiga b
Wannan Matsi yana maida baxawara budurwa

Akwai Maganin infection kaikayi, kuraje, fitar ruwa, Rashin Sha'awa, jin zafi lokacin saduwa, Ciwon Mara Wanda yahana daukar ciki, Bushewar Gaba Rashin Ni'ima

Akwai Maganin rage Tumbi, Kiba, JIKI, ciki
Akwai hadadden Sabulun Gyaran JIKI mai magance kurajen fuska, kyasfi, Bakalwa, d duk wasu matsaloli NA JIKI
Akwai Sabulun tsarki mai wanke Gaba ya magance duk matsalolin d suke cikin farji

Akwai Maganin Gashi maisa Gashi tsawo, baki, ya habashi kakkaryewa sannan yana magance amosanin kai
Muna saida Maganin mallakar miji ko saurayi

AMARYA
Muna gyaran Amarya complete settings Komai d Komai sama ruwa Kasa ruwa Daren farko ango yabaki babbar kyauta
Muna Gyaran Matar data haihu, 
Muna saida Maganin kara Kiba da kuma ragewa
Akwai NA rage GIRMAN NONO

Muna saida kalolin Kaya kamar

*KASHI NA DAYA (1)*
*ana so mace ta ringa gyara kanta tun tana gidan iyayenta ba sai tayi aure ko kuma ta zo yin aure kafin ta Fara gyara kanta ba.*
*wasu da yawan yan'mata sai kaga suna yin abin har yana gona da iri*
*TSARKI DA RUWAN DUMI :*
*tsarki da ruwan dumi ba karamin taimakawa yake yi ba wajen gyaran ( farji )*
*Mata Ku kiyaye tsarki da ruwan sanyi saboda ba karamin illa yake yi ma mace ba.*
✎ *GANYEN MAGARYA:*
*ana so mace ta dinga yin tsarki da ganyen magarya idan da so Samu ne ya zama shine permanent ruwan tsarkin ki shi ma ba karamin gyara ( farji ) yake yi ba.*
✎           *ZUMA:*
*ana so mace ta ringa shan Zuma cokali daya (1) da safe daya (1) da daddare 1 wannan yana taimakawa wajen dawo miki da ni'iman ki da ya tafi yayin da kike jinin al'ada.*
❑     *SHAN ZUMA*
*ana so macen da take cikin jinin al'ada ta rinka shan zuma cokali uku (3) kullum da safe har tsawon kwanaki da zata gama al'ada.*
☛ *MAN HABBATUSSAUDA :*
*zaki sami man habbatussauda shima ki rinka sha kina shafawa a ( farji)*
 *KANKANA DA MADARA :*
*Ana so mace ta rinka shan kankana da madara a ko wane lokaci da ta gama al'adarta.*
☛ *KANKANA DA CUCUMBER:*
*zaki yanka kankana da cucumber sai ki hade su kiyi blanding ki rinka sha a duk lokacin da kika sami Hali.*
          ❑ *AL'MISKI*
*ana so mace ta sami miski ki rinka sa kadan a ( farji ) dinki.*
*Ko da kin wanke pants dinki wannan kamshi yana jikinki.*
            ✿ *IYAYE* ❀
*wadannan abubuwan Dana lissafa irin wadanda ya kamata mace ta rinka yi kenan tun tana gaban iyayenta.*
✎ *mata a daina yawan cushe-cushe a ( farji ) yawan yin hakan ba karamin matsala yake jawo wa ba.*
❏ *TURAREN ( FARJI )*
*wannan hadin shi zai sa farji ya dinga kamshi a duk lokacin gabatar da jima'i:*
➽ *anbar.*
➽ *miski.*
➽ *ganyen magarya.*
➽ *rihatul-hubbi.*
➽ *ma'ul miyami.*
*Sai ki hade su waje daya ki tafasa su ki juye a roba ki Kara ruwa ki zauna a ciki kamar (30) min*

*MATSALOLIN DA SUKE ADABAR MATA A YAU, GA HANYOYIN MAGANCESU*

                     *_GYARAN NONO_*

 farar shinkafa
↬ garin alkama
↬ garin habbatussauda
↬ garin ayaba(plantain)
↬ gyada mai malfa( mai zabo)
↬ aya
↬ madara
↬ zuma

Zaki sami plantain dinki ki shanyashi ya bushe sai ki daka ki hada da garin alkama da garin farar shinkafa saiki hada aya da gyadar a malkada a tace ruwan, sai ki dora akan wuta a zuba garikan akai, a zuba madarar gari data ruwa da zuma, sannan ki dama yayi kauri.

Kiyi kamar sati biyu ko hudu kina haka sannan kisami rigar nono acuci maza kisaka. 

Waiyyo yaruwa maigida tambayarki zaiyi yace my lyf balanbalan kika hura? Kinsan amsar da zaki bashi..........

               *_GYARAN NONO NA 2_*

Zaki sami hulba a tafasa arinka gasa nono dashi sannan ashafa man hulba . Ko kuma ki tafasa hulbar ki gasa nonon sannan ki kada kwan salwa ki shafa sai ki kada guda uku ki shanye.

: NAU'OIN KWANCIYA



1.zaki tsaya atsaye oga ya rungumoki ta baya saiki sunguya kidafa gado ki turomai ta baya sai ya zura azzakarinsa cikin gindinki, saiki hade kafafunki ki matsesu shikuma ya dafa duwawunki, yana motsawa

2 zaki kwanta rufda ciki oga yahau kan duwawunki yazura azzakarinsa, kekuma kidinga dago duwawunki sama kina tayashi motsawa

3 zaki yi kamar kinyi sujada sai shikuma ya kafa gwuiwarsa akangado yasa hannu ya rike kwankawasonki yana motsawa

4 zaki kwanta rigingine kibuda kafarki inya zura saiki daga kafarki sama kihardesu ki daura akafadarsa saikisa hannu kidago duwawunki yadda zaidinga shiga sosai

5  zaki kwanta rigingine kafarki ta hagu saiki lankwasata kamar mai tankwashe kafa saiki tokareta da kirjinsa shikuma yaita zurawa

6  wannan zaki kwanta arigingine amma kidan karkace bangaren hagu sai oga ya daga kafarki ta hagu yasata a akafadarsasai yakanta ahannun damansa yana rungume da kafar hagunji sai ya zura azzakarinsa, saiya mikarda hannun damansa zuwa kan nononki yana murzasu, yana motsawa, hmn kudai kawai ku tabbatar kofa arufe take

 
7  oga zai kwanta agefen gado kafafuwansa akasa kekuma daman kin lailaya banana tamike car, saiki juyamai baya kizauna akansa banana ta lume cikin kogi saikiyita sukuwa shikuma yana shafa duwawunki jinata sukuwa

8  zai kwanta akan gado sosai kihau kansa ki zura banana ta lume sai ki samai filo kidago kansa saikisamai nononki abakinsa yana tsotsa kina sukuwa hmn ranar za'a nad'a ki sarauniya

       Idan kina tare da maigida, karki zama mai zama nesa da shi,
      ki zauna yanda jikin ku zai rika shafar juna domin ba abinda
      ke kara shakuwa kamar "body contact" wato gogayyar jiki, idan
      kun kasanta ki langabe masa tamkar baki da lafia koda kuwa
      lafiarki lau, akwai abinda bature ke kira "subconscious mind"
      koda lafiyarki kalau zuciyarsa zata kasance cikin wasuwasi
      bazai sami natsuwaba in ba yaga kin zama daidai ba, koda kin
      kwana 2, ki bukace shi ya ware maki koda awa daya ne a cikin
      lokutansa da niyyar kina so ya koya maki wani abu wanda baki
      sani ba na rayuwar aure, dalilin haka tamkar ka baiwa dan
      makarantane assignment, ba zai cireki a zuciyarsa ba har sai
      ya sami abinda zai fada koya maki, kinga kin baiwa zuciyarsa
      aiki bashi da lokacin tunanin wata! kafin mai gida ya ci
      abinci ki, ki tabbatar kin caba kwalliya domin hakan zai
      bashi damar cika tumbinsa! Idan kun kebe a makwancin ku,
      baiwar Allah, karki barshi yayita wahala shi kadai! Kwanciyar
      aure ba dan namiji kadai akayi ba, kema kina da sha'awarki,
      yana nasa kina naki, in ya taba nan ke taba can, idan ya
      matsa nan ko cafko can, idan kika sakar masa jiki abin bazai
      armashi ba, amma idan aikin ya zama na mutum 2, zaki ga
      fa'ida! Namiji yaro ne saida rarrashi, yanayin tafiyarki
      karta zama kamar ta masu noman dankali, yangar da mata ke a
      waje ba kugu suka fiki ba, ba nonuwa suka fiki ba, jujjuyasu
      ki sami lada, idan kika barsu a cikin kaya ba abinda zasu
      kareki da su, komin kankantar abinda zai ja maigida yace

 🙉‬: INA KUKE MATA? Mu kula da kanmu kuma mu gyara jikinmu,mu nunawa mazajenmu soyayya.Idan yadawo jeki rungumeshi ki hada goshinki da nashi kice" u r welcome darling",seyaji har cikin kwakwalwanshi....ki kama hanunshi kije kicire mai kaya kirakashi bandaki inda halima kiyi mai wanka,ki rakoshi ki gogemai jiki da towel sannan kisamai kaya marar nauyi....kijashi kufito falo kinamai hira me dadi yanacin abinci inyagama ki tattare plates kikai kitchen ko gun wanke wanke.kije ki kara wanka kifeshe jikin ki da turare me dadin kamshi kisa kaya marar nauyi kaman evenin show ko English gown marar nauyi...kizo kizauna akan cinyanshi kice "HI darling" zakiga to salon ze sanja....mata suna yawan complain wai mijinsu baya dawowa da wuri daga kasuwa ko aiki,to yadawo an batamai rai dan me gobe ze dawo dawuri akuma batamai rai din...in mijinki bedawowa da wuri kibarshi, kiyimai duk abunda na lissafa asama in kin zauna a cinyannashi se ki riko kanshi ki hada goshinshi da naki kidan ciji hancinshi ko kumatu zedanyi kara inyace meyamiki,seki amsa cikin shagawaba kice"to ba kaine kaki dawowa da wuriba yau,naita jiranka har nagaji.kwalliyan da nama har ya goge" nitsuwa zeyi ya baki hakuri kuma gobe baze sake yakara dawowa ba dawuriba.kinga yadda akeyi ba wai ki haushi da masifaba kaaman kekika aipeshi...maza kaman jarirai suke, lallabi sukeso da ladabi.kuma inkika musu riban nakine.Domin ga lada agun ubangiji ga kuma soyayya agun miji...mata don ALLAH mu kula mu kwatan wa kanmu hakki.....munaji muna kallo wata awaje da kwacemana miji... Da wannan kalaman take kwacemusu zuciya.In kuna dan zaune kizama me kwanciya ajikin mijinki ko kuma kimai kiss haka kawai inkuna zaune kidan taso kaman meyin wani abu ki zagayo tabayan kujera ta sama ki dago kanshi kisa bakinki anashi ki tsotsi abinki nakine,in son samu kisa kankara bakinkin yadan jima kadan sekicire kapinnan bakin naki yadau sanyi sekiwa Oga kiss...seyaji har cikin kwakwalwanshi....kuma bawai dole se da dare kuma adaki akan gado ake HARKA BA..A a ba haka abun yakeba,darana da safe da yamma duk lokacin da kike bukata ba sekinjira Oga kullum ace  shi yake nemankiba...kema wataran ki bushi iska kinemeshi,kiyi wanka tsab ki wanke HQ a turarashi da turare me dadin kamshi,ki shafa mai me santsi a nononki kisa sleepin dress dinki musamman chest out kinadoso shi zeji tsikar jikinshi ya tashi...kinazuna ki dale kansa kiciremai kaya inzeyi magana kisa bakinki anashi kina murza kan nononshi da hannunki...karki sake kullum yazo yahau kanki yayi ta sukuwa kaman wata doki badole seyasa banana a HQ bane kawai zeyi releasing,there are numerous ways kaman da tafin kapa ko tsakankanun nonuwanki ETc inkikaga gamanan sau kasa da hannayenki zuwa" Oga at the top" wato🍌 kisa dankaramin yatsanki abakin bulin🍌 kina masa tafiyar tsutsa tare da saka harce kina dan lasa kaman meshan lollipop...ki hada nonuwanki waje daya kisaka bananan a tsakaninsu kina sama da kasa inkingama kihada tafin kafanki ki tabbata kinshafa mai sanna kisa banana a tsakiyansu kina sama da Kasa nanma ahaka har ya releasin dis are ways n tips dat should b often considered mu dear sisters...Allah bamu zaman lafia agidan mazajenmu wanda basuyi aureba kuma Allah basu mazaje nagari..bissalam
ADDU,AR DA YADACE MACE TAGARI TAYI MA MIJINTA:1)Allah ya kare shi daga sharrin shedan,2)Allah ka kare mani mijina daga sharrin mahassada,sharrin miyagun mutane,sharrin miyagun aljanu,sharrin makiya,3)Allah kayi ma mijina budi ta  hanyar halali,4)Allah ka kare mijina daga zina,5)Allah ka kare mani mijina da sharrin mazinatan mata,6)Allah idan ka kaddari mijina da karin aure ka hadashi da mace tagari kamarni ba wacce zata ruguza mashi gida ba ko rashin adalci ameen. idan ko kika kasance mai wannan addu'ar bake ba wani matsala a gidanki,sai dai farin ciki da karin kaunar juna ke da mijinki.DON ALLAH DUK MACEN DA TA SAMU WANNAN SAKON TAYI KOKARIN TURA MA YAN UWANTA MATA AMMA NAGARI.

MAI MALLAKAN SIRRI MIJIN TA
ZAKI HADA DA KANKI
Ki dafa kanunfari idan ya dauko nuna saiki
zuba zuma
a ciki, bayan kin sauke ki sami garin ridi ki
zuba ki
hada nonon shanu mara tsami ki gauraya
idan yayi
sanyi ki sha......sai naji daga gare ku............
ki sami kanunfari da dabino ki jika sai sun
tsima saiki
rinka diban ruwan kinasa zuma da madara
kina sha,
duk abinda aka ji na yafe kar a fada min.........
GYARA 3
ta sami sassaken baure ta dafashi da
kanumfari citta
da lipton ta hada ta tafada sai ta tace ta sa a
fridge
tarim ga sha tsimine wlhy yana da kyau
sosai
GYARA 1
,zaki samu garin zogale ne ki jika ki ringa sha
sau biyu
a rana. Kina tashi daga bacci kafin kici komai
ki sha
ruwan zogale,sai kuma in zaki kwanta Ya
zamo na
karshe.
Sai kuma in Kina infection ki ringa seat bath
dashi
GYARA 4
Ki daka aya ki tankade sai ki samu
bushasshen dabino
shima ki dake shi, hade da mazarkwaila ki
hade su da
garin ayar. Ki sami nono ki rinka damawa
kina sha.
AMFANIN TAFARNUWA GA MATA :::::
*************************
Idan mace tana ciwon mara ko ciwon ciki alokacin al'ada ko jinin yarikayi mata wasa, tasamu zuma cokali 5 tahada da man tafarnuwa cokali 2, in an hada sai tarika sha cokali 1 dasafe 1 da yamma,

MATAR DA JINI YAKI DAUKE MATA tarika shan man tafarnuwa rabin karamin cokali sau 4 arana.

RIGA KAFIN CIWON NONO GA WACCE TA HAIHU; Anacin
dabino guda 7 asha man tafarnuwa karamin cokali sau 1 arana kwana uku.

DAUREWAR CIKI
KO MARA BAYAN HAIHUWA; Asamu ruwa mai zafi kofi 1 azuba man tafarnuwa karamin cokali asha sau 1 kwana 3.

YAWAN LALACEWAR CIKI KO
YAWAN BARI; asamu kwan agwagwa asoya da man tafarnuwa abaiwa matar taci sau 2 arana kwana 7.

TSAWON GASHI DA HANASHI
KAKKARYEWA; Asamu man kwakwa ahada da man zaitun da man tafarnuwa arinka shafawa akai, amma man tafarnuwa 50% za,asa sauran
kuma 100&... Allah yasa mudace...zan kawo wasu da yarda Allah
Muhammadurrasulillah (saw) yace: lelle mace tana fuskantowa da fuskan sheitan (kirjin ta) kuma tana juya baya daga sheitan (duwawukan ta).... Saboda haka aka umarce mu da mu sa hajibi domin mu rufe wadannan ababe guda biyu.    Yaci gaba da cewa (maza) idan dayan ku yaga mace ta burge shi to ya koma ga iyalan sa haka ze cire masa abinda ke cikin ransa. To yan'uwa mata muji tsoron  Allah mu dinga shigan mutunci domin wasu basu da matan  wasu kuwa matansu ba su da irin sirrin da Allah ya ba ki, wasu masu hakuri wasu marasa hakuri. Kinga idan muka fiddo da wadannan abubuwa muna yawo bisa titi ba karamin fitana muke sanyawa yan'uwammu musulmi (maza) koma na yayan mu. Dibi yar'uwa yanda muke yafa gyale azamanin nan  nonuwa waje duwawuka waje. Muji tsoron Allah mu gyara. Yar'uwa idan kin samu wannan sako ki turawa masoyanki  mata don Allah dan darajar annabi (saw). Cikakkiyar masoyiyar  manzo Allah (saw) zata iya turawa karanci mata 5 idan ko ta kasa to ta sawa kanta alamar tambaya? Shin ta cika masoyiya


MATA KO KUNSAN KISS KALA KALA



      1.FRENCH KISS: Wannan shine sannannen sumba da kowa ya sani kuma maza sunfi zaquwa akansa. Amma shine mafi wahala wajen koyo. Ynda ake yi shine zaki kusanto oga ne ki soma tsotsan lips dinsa a hnkli sama sama har ki zura harshenki cikin bakin Oga kina mai jujjuya harshenki cikin salon shauki da iyawa, ki kamo harshensa cikin natsuwa ba cafka zakiyi da karfi ba a'a a hnkali zaki kama kan harshen nasa kina jujjuyawa kina tsotsa a hnkli. Zaki ga ya cafki taki kma sai ki sau masa ragamar kina jan numfashi a hnkli.                                     2. EARLOPES KISS: A nan zaki kama kasan kunnen Oga a hnkli a tsakanin lips dinki ki dinga turawa a natse kina tsotsa a hnklu hadi da lasa. Wannan zai sa jikin Oga ya tsirga kuma zai tuna masa da zazzafar kaunarki.             3.NECK KISS:  Wannan ma yana da muhimmanci sosai. Kiss ne dake nuna cewa kina bukatar oga. *oga im ready*... A nan zaki daura lips dinki a kan wuyan Oga ki bashi 'yar karamar sumba bayan kin jiqa lebbanki da miyau kadan kafin kiyi. Jikin oga zai mutu zai ji shima babu abnda yake sha'awa irin ya kasance tare dake.      4.CHEEK KISS(kumatu): Shine wanda zaki sumbaci kumatun abun kaunarki ta hnyar shimfida lips dinki akan kumatun tare da bada sautin iska a hnkli cikin salo da jan hnkli. Wannan wani salo ne na bayyana godiyarki ga Oga bayan wata bajinta ko kyauta ko wata 'yar tsaraba idan ya kawo maki..                             5. ANGEL KISS: Ana yinsa ne a hnkli cikin salo na amfani da saman lebbanki; a inda zaki daura lips dinki akan saman idon Oga a hnkli cikin kulawa. Wannan kiss ana amfani dashi wajen tashin Oga daga barci. Kuma yana dasa kauna a zuciyar Ogan...                                      6. BUTTERFLY KISS:  A nan zaki matso kusa da Oga ne ki manna fuskarki a tasa ya zamana gashin idonki yana gogan nasa sai ki marmara gashin idon naki a hnkli kiyi sama da gashn idonki a kan goshinsa. Wannan salo yana nuna ynda kike jin Oga a ranki. Zaiyi tasiri idan kuna zaune kuna kallo ko ma idan zai fita..                                    7. SOLO KISS: Wannan wani salo ne da zaki wajen kama lip(lebe) daya na Oga na 'dan sec 10-15. Ki tsotsi leben kasa ko na sama a hnkli cikin salon soyayya
