NI'IMA ADON MACE
     yau nazo muku da wasu sirrikan da zasu taimaka muku mata yan uwana. Namiji abin tattaline. Kusani mata namiji dangoyone ga wadda ta iya. Ku girmama mazajenku kwa sami Aljannar Ubangijinku cikin sauki. Muje zuwa main point dinmu yanuwa.
       GYARAN JIKI
*Lalle
*Kwaiduwar kwai uku 
*Manja cokali uku
*Cocumber
*Kur-kur
     Ki sami wadannan kayan dana lissafa ki hadasu waje daya ki kwaba amma cocumber sai kin malkada kin tace ruwan sannan ki zuba akai ki kwaba ki bashi kamar minti goma ko ashirin ya tsumu sannan ki shafa a jikinki ki bashi awa guda sannan kiyi wanka da sabulun gana kona salo.
  Sai an gwada zaa tabbatar da amfaninsa saboda haka na baki kiyi kamar sati biyu kina haka zakiga yadda jikinki zai koma.
       GYARAN JIKI KASHI NA 2
 *Ayaba( banana)
*Lemon tsami
*Tatacciyar madara
*kwai guda daya
*Man kadanya
*Cocumber
       Kihada ayabarki da cocumber ki markadasu a blender su malkadu sosai ki juye a dan wani abun sannan  ki zuba tatacciyar madararki aciki sai kwai sai ki matsa lemon tsami kadan ki chakudasu su hadu sosai sannan ki shafa kibarshi yayi kamar awa daya sai ki shafa man kadanya kibarshi yayi kamar minti talatin sannan kiyi wanka da ruwan zafi idan kin fito ki shafa duk wani cream da kikasan ya karbeki. Waiyyo yaruwa  ki lazimci yin haka kamar na sati daya zakiga canji. Sai an gwada akansan na kwarai.
        KARIN NI'IMA
* Gyada mai bargo
* Kwakwa
* Aya
* Dabino
* Cukwi
* Garin zogale(shanyar inuwa)
* Garin sassaken baure
* Garin sassaken gamji
      Da farko zaki sami gyadarki mai bargo sai kisassabata ki cire jan bawon sannan ki dakata. Sai ki sami kwakwarki ki markadata tare da ayarki da dabino. Ki daka cukwi, zogale, sassaken baure, da sassaken gamji.
   Sai ki hada wadannan kayan guri daya ki rinkasha tsawan sati daya zakisha mamaki. Sai kin zarce saa yaruwa.
      KARUWAR NI'IMA NA 2
*Alkama
* danyar gyada
*waken suya
*aya
*madarar ruwa
*kwakwa
   Ki sami alkamarki kofi daya da danyar gyada kofi daya sai aya kofi daya da waken suya kofi daya sannan kwakwa kwallo biyu , ki jika ki markada sannan ki tace kibarshi yazama gasara sai kirinka damawa kamar koko ki zuba madara ta ruwa kiyi kamar sati biyu kina shan wannan hadin. Sai angwada akansan na kwarai uwargida
     GYARAN NONO

*zuma
     Zaki sami plantain dinki ki shanyashi ya bushe sai ki daka ki hada da garin alkama da garin farar shinkafa saiki hada aya da gyadar a malkada a tace ruwan, sai ki dora akan wuta a zuba garikan akai, a zuba madarar gari data ruwa da zuma, sannan ki dama yayi kauri. 
Kiyi kamar sati biyu ko hudu kina haka sannan kisami rigar nono acuci maza kisaka. Waiyyo yaruwa maigida tambayarki zaiyi yace my lyf balanbalan kika hura? Kinsan amsar da zaki bashi..........

                 MAGANI A MUSLUNCI

       ❊  MATSALA KANKANCEWAR GABA  ❊

Kankancewar gaba lalura ce dake tayar da hankalin mutum.

Abubuwan dake haifar da kankancewar gaban
namiji suna da yawa.

Amma manya daga ciki sune girman jiki wasu
mutane don wani dalili gaban su kan kankance
idan jikinsu na kara girma.

Wasu kuma kankacewar gabansu na faruwa ne
saboda suna sa hannunsu suna inzali da
kansu wato masturbation.

Wasu daga cikin abubawan dake kawo
kankancewar gaba kenan.

To magunguna dai sai a kiyaye abinda ake
zato ya kawo shi.

Misali in kiba ne a rage kibar in mastubation ne
abari Abnda kesa kankancewar gaba da saurin
inzali.

➜. Yawan Kiba (obesity) nahana maza karfin
mazakuta, kuzari da kuma haddasa kankancewar al’aura.
Dan haka idan kasan kanada ita to lalle Ne ka nemi ragiyarta.

Bayan haka Kasami Mazakutar Bijimin Sa.
Wanda ba'a dandake shiba.

Saika dafa tareda 'danyar chitta.

(Kar a sanya Gishiri ko maggi, amma za'a
sanya dukkan kayan Qamshi).

Idan ya dahu sai ka cinyeshi duka.

Zaka rika maimaitawa a wata sau 2 haka.
Wannan na girmane.

                       ◈  GYARAN NONO ◈

08039347743

Kiyayewa da gyaran nono wani lokacin yana iya zama wajibi awajen mace tun tana budurwa musamman awannan lokacinda maza da dama suke bukatar hakan...

Namiji yanason mace me gyara nononta musamman lokacinda mace tayi yaye don lokacinne nono yake kwanciya ta yanda wani ya tafi kenan bazai dawoba kuma kyakyawana nono a wajen mace ba karamin muhimmaci yake dashiba Akwai mata wadanda sunsha jarraba maganinda zai gyara musu nono kala kala amma shiru babu wani canji wasu har matsala yake jawo musu kuma gaskiya akwai rashin sanin lokacinda mace zata gyara nono da kuma hanyoyin gyaran da kuma maganinda zaisa nono ya gyaru...

   ▣👙    LOKACIN GYARA NONO...  👙 ▣
☏08039347743

Tun kina budurwa zaki fara kiyaye nononki wato kamar yawan tsalle ko daurin kirji da zani ko kuma mummunan kwanciya wanada zaki danne su sannan akwai rigar nono (brezy) itama dole kisan wanda ya kamata kisaka wato wacce bazata matsesuba da dai sauran abubuwanda zasu wahalarda su to idan kika kiyaye wannan har lokacin aurenki nononki zai kasance a tsaye yanda oga zai rude Lokacinda kika zama matar aure saboda saduwar jima i da sauran uzirin mijinki a wajen nononki zai rinka karuwa yana kwanciya to wannan lokacin zaki rinka daukar ingantattun magunguna na gargajiya Wanda zasu karawa nononki kyauwu wannan duk muna bayaninsu a posting dinmu to bayan kin haifu kuma zaki iya rabuwa da kowanne magani kedai kirinka shan abubuwanda zai karawa nononki ruwa kamarsu nonon saniya ko madara peak ko luna ko yougut ko garin madara kika jika da ruwa kika zuba garin zogale kikasha zai miki amfani ko kunun kanwane zaki iyasha ya danganta da yanayin wadatarda kike dashi har lokacinda zakiyi yaye zakiga nononki da ruwa sosai to bayan kin yaye sai kuma kiyi gyara na masuyin yaye shine zakiga kinayi kinyi nasara kuma za a dade ana miki kallon budurwa kuma zakiga yanda zaki samu kulawa da soyayya awajen mijinki kinga babu maganar kishiya a gidanki.

🍃🌿 MAGANI WARIN GABA (FARJI)  🌿🍂
abubuwan dakesa gaban mace yana wari.

➽ tafiya babu wando pant.
➽ rashin sanya takalmi koda kuwa a cikin gida ne.
➽ dadewa akan (toilet) masai.
➽ rashin canza pant da wuri.
➽ yawaita cin danyar albasa.
➽ istimna'i ko masturbation (wato mace ta biyawa kanta bukata ta hanyar wasa da gabanta lesbian).
➽ tsarki da ruwan sanyi.
➽ rashin aske gaba dadai sauransu.

        🍂◉ MAGINI WANNAN CUTA ◉🍃

¹ mace ta dinga tsarki da ruwan dumi.
² ki dinga yawan canza wando a kullum kamar sau.
³ ki rage cin danyar albasa.
⁴ a duk lokacin da mace ta gama haila ta dinga
wanke gabanta da ganyen magarya ko bagaruwa da almiski fari.
⅝ ki daina tsugunawa akan Masai kina dauka
lokacin domin yin haka yana da matsala.
6 ta yawaita aske gabanta duk sati ¹ ko ² idan
mace zata bin wa'yannan dokokin zata samu
waraka daga duk wata cutar farji.

      |(￣MAGANIN CIWON MARA NA MATA￣)|

✦ Garin hulba cokali 7
✦ garin habbur rashad cokali 7
✦ zaitun cokali ¹0
Ki gauraya su Sannan ki rinka diban cokali 2 kina dafawa kullum idan ya tafasa sai ki sauke ki tace sannan ki zuba ruwan zuma kisha.

Zaki Fara amfani dashi tun kwana biyar kafin
zuwan al'adarki sannan ki cigaba da amfani dashi har lokacin da al'adar take.

Kina yin wannan da yarda Allah zai Kara miki
ni'imar jikin ki bayan kuma ya miki maganin
wannan ciwon Mara.

                          [Bi ta zai-zai]

        ▣ MAGANI CIWON MARA MAI ZAFI ▣

Ｏ tsamiya
Ｏ habbatussauda
Ｏ zuma
Idan ciwon Mara yayi tsanani sai Ku samo wa
'yannan Ku tafasa tsamiya mai kyau da habbatussauda sai Ku ringa diba kuna sa zuma a ciki kuna sha shi ma za'a sami waraka insha
Allah.

               (⌒MAHADIN GYRAN GASHI⌒)

💆🏼wannan hadi zai tai makawa mace wadda
gashin ta yake yawan lalacewa, domin kuwa
gashinki ba shi ba karai rayewa zai rinka laushi
kuma ya Kara tsaho idan har kina San kada ya
lalace kina iya samun wannan kiyi amfani dashi.

¹🍂 ganyen Kai da magarya
Ki da kashi kina yin amfani dashi wajan wanke
kanki wanke gashi da shi, yana kara karfafa gashi ya kuma hanashi zubewa ko kuma ki nemi:
¹ danyen kwai 2
² sabulun salo 3
³ garin shanmar
A fasa kwai amma banda kwan duwar farin kadai Zaki yi amfani da shi, sai ki zuba sabulun salo a ciki, ki matse ki zuba garin shammar a ciki sai ki wanke Kai da shi idan har kina yin wannan hadin lai-lai kanki zai yi gashi mai kyau insha Allah.

        ◇👙☆ ZUBEWAR NONO ☆👙◇

⌣̀_⌣́ da kayan gyaran sa Wasu matan daga sun yi haihuwa daya Zaka ga nononsu ya zube, hakan yana damun maigida idan kina san yin maganin wannan matsala sai ki nemi .

〇 habbatussauda
〇 hulba
〇 alkama
〇 gyada
〇 ridi
〇 danyar shinkafa
〇 busasshe karas
Duk ki daka su waje daya, kina yin amfani dashi a duk wani sa'i wane lokacin kina amfani da wannan hadi.

               ♡´･ GYARAN NONO ² ･`♡

tabbas matsalar nono tana da yawa domin zaka ga wasu matan nonon su ya kwanta ko ya koma dan kankanin saka makon tso-tso idan kina San ya taso Yayi kyau sai kiyi wannan hadin ki gani .

づ madara
ki samu albasa madaidaiciya ki yanyanka sai ki
saka a tukunya da ruwanki ta tafasa shi sosai har sai ruwan ya koma baki, sai ki juye ruwan ki sami zumar ki mai kyau, garin gero ludayi daya, madara na gwangwani daya na ruwa sai ki juye su kan ruwan tafasasshe albasa nan ki sha .

Amma fa karki bari ya kwana baki shanye ba.
Wannan hadine da zai gyara miki nono 👙.

             ⊂👙 GYARAN NONO ³ 👙⊃

Idan Ana so nono yayi kyau yayi laushi da sulbi da girma sai Ayi wannan hadin domin samun waraka.

□ aya
□ gyada 🍠
□ ayaba 🍌 (plantain)
◎ alkama
◎ madara
Ki sami aya, gyada ayaba da alkama sai madara Zaki wanke ayarki sai ki hada da gyadarki ki markada su ki tashe dama kin yanyanka ayabarki kin busar kinyi gari da shi kin tankade sai ki rikka diban garin plantain din kina hadawa da ruwan ayaba gyadarki kina sa madara ta ruwa kina sha, zai gyara nono 👙 domin wannan hadin ne Wanda sai kisha mamaki.

      ✿ฺ´ HADIN CIWON SANYI`  INFECTION ✿ฺ

ᕙᕗ hulba
ᕙᕗ bagaruwa
ᕙᕗ man habbatussauda
Yadda za'a yi shine.
A hada bagaruwa da hulba a tafasa sai idan ya
dan huce sai a zauna ciki sannan kuma ashafa
man habbatussauda kamar yadda za'ayi matsi
Wadannan magunguna da akayi amfani dashi zai magance MATSALAR ciwon sanyi sannan kowane yana Kara dawwamar da ni'ima ga mace.

           ○ TSUKE GABA DA BAGARUWA ○

Bawon bagaruwa shi kuma wani sirrin ne Wanda idan mace na son ta zama kullum a tsuke kamar dan'uwa ta dunga dafa bawon ta na shiga kamar yadda ake shiga ruwan dumi in kin haihu.

╥╥╥╥🍂 NI'IMA GA MACE╥╥╥╥

ni'ima a wajan mace ba karamin taimakawa mata take a gidan miji ba domin idan kina da ni'ima Zaki birge maigidanki idan kina San hakan sai kiyi wannan hadin.

🌿 zogale
🌴 dabino
🌑 kwakwa
🐂 madara
🍯 zuma
Ku samu zogale ku wanke shi ku nika shi tare da dabino da kuma kwakwa sai ku tace kusa zuma tare da madara sai ku saka yayi sanyi bayan kungama sallar mangariba sai ku sha.


                     🍋LEMON TSAMI🍋

lemon tsami na daya daga cikin ya'yan itatuwa da jama'a suke amfani da shi wajen yin abubuwan da dama.

🍋lemon tsami na da matukar muhimmanci ga dan Adam musamman ma wajen
➽ gyara fuska
Saboda haka muka kawo
Amfani dashi domin gyaran fatar fuska.
🍋 lemon tsami
🐝 zuma
🍶man zaitun
Ki Debi Rabin cokali ruwan lemo tsami da kuma
Rabin cokali zuma sai a kwaba su, daga nan ki
shafa a fuskarki na tsawon minti ¹5 sannan ki
wanke da ruwan sanyi idan kina da fata mai gautsi to Zaki iya hadawa da man zaitun idan kuma fatarki bata da shi kada kisa man zaitun.

   .    👙 HADIN GYARAN FATA DA NONO 👙

wannan hadin shima yana gyara fata yana sawa fata kyau musamman fatar fuska.
🐄 nono kindirmo
🍋 lemon tsami
Zaki hada Rabin cokali ruwan lemon tsami da
Rabin cokali nono sai ki kwaba sosai bayan haka sai ki shafa a fuska na tsawon minti ³0 kafin ki wanke.

     ─▽─AMFANI╭╮KUR-KUR─▽─

yana da amfani sosai awajan gyara fata ko jiki
hakan nema ya saka muka gane muku wannan
hadin na gyara jiki.

ヮ kurkun
┌┐dakakkiyar alkama
┌┐man zaitun

Ki samu kurkun sai ki daka, daga nan sai ki hada da dakakkiyar alkamanki, sannan ki hada da man zautun daga nan sai ki shafa a fuskarki ko a jikinki bayan awa biyu ko uku sai ki wanke fuskarki ko jikinki da ruwan dumi..

            ◉ AMFSNIN MAN KWA-KWA ◉

¹ Taushin fata - Ana iya shafawa kamar man jiki a shafa a ko'ina har wuya.
² man fuska - Ana shafawa a zagage kwayar Ido da shi yana maganin bakin da ke fitowa zagaye Ido yana kuma maganin tamushewar fata na tsufa.
³ Ana shafa man kwakwa kadan a jikin auduga a goge fuska da shi yana gagawan cire kwalliya da ta dankare a fuska mata.
⁴ yana Hana fashewan lebe musamman a lokacin sanyi.
⅝ yana gyara gashin mata yana sasu Kara karfi yana kashe amosani sannan yana karshe
kwarkwata.
6 Ana iya hada man kwakwa da sugar a murza a fata sannan a wanke da ruwa da sabulun yana sa fata yayi laushi.

   🥝🍊AMFANIN KUBEWA GA MACE🍊🥝

¹ a markada kabewa da goba da ayaba a tace a
dinga sha ruwan jifa-jifa yana maganin gajiya da saurin kosawa, sannan yana taimakawa matuka yayin bukata ko sha'awa.

² a cire hanzar nan ta kabewa a zuba a ruwan
zafi, babban kofi daya a rufe , bayan hanzar ta jiku sosai sai a tace a zuba zuma cikin cokali cin abinci uku a kada har sai ya hadu shi ma a
shayen shima yana taimakawa matukar wajen
ni'ima da Karin kuzari.

ma'ana mazakuta ko tsayi sai yayi wannan hadin domin samun lafiya.

da nono abarshi ya kwana har yai tsami sai me

hadida karfi hadine da yake Kara.

      ◎▼◎ KARFIN MAZAKUTA ◎▼◎

domin samun karfin gaba wannan hadin Wanda ko da mutum ya tsufa zai iya yi Tsami lafiya da yarda Allah.

¹ habbatussauda cokali 1
² danyen kwai 3
Kanemi garin habbatussauda cokali ¹ sannan
kasamu ruwan danyen kwai 3 sannan ka gauraya ka soya kada ya gama soyuwa ka rinka ci..
        🍃= ｘDADEWA ANA JIMA'Iｘ=🍂

Idan mutum baya da dewa akan matar sa ko once maigidanki baya dadewa yana jima'i sai kiyi masa wannan hadin.
Idan kina so ya rika dadewa a kanki kuna jima'i to yi masa wannan hadin ki sha mamaki.
🍆 cucumber (gurji)
🍯 zuma
Ka samu cucumber ka markada sai zuma me kyau ka matse a ciki ka rinka sha zakayi mamaki wajen jimawa kana jima'i baka zubar da maniyyi ba.

(⌣̀_⌣́) GIRMAN HIPS (DUWAWU) KUGU (⌣̀_⌣́)

Girman kugun mace yana daya daga cikin abubuwan dake janyo sha'awa tare da tayar da
hankalin maigida idan ya kallo Uwargida
musamman idan tayi kwalliya da matsasu kaya
masu nuna jikinta.

Shi dai duwawu a jikin mace wata baiwa ce ta
halitta wacce Allah yakan halicci dan Adam da ita idan kina San samun kugu duwawunki ya girma ki yawaita cin.
🧀 abarba
🍌 ayaba
🍠gwanda
🍉 kankana
🍯 zuma
🍶madarar
A kan hada su waje guda, a markada su, har sai
sun zama ruwa, sai a dan Kara zuma da madara idan dai har kina shan wannan hadin Zaki sami hips duwawunki ko ince kugu.

  (⌣̀_⌣́). KINA IYA WANNAN SHIMA  (⌣̀_⌣́)

          *TSAFTA⬜*
Ya xama dole kiyi tsafta  kuma wace kala,ki tashi sassafe dan ganin kin rigashi tashi ki share falo tare da goge goge komai ki tabbatar kin gyara komai kinsa turaren kamshi.
         
Tsaftan jiki abune me mahimmace mussaman  a irin wanan lokacin na zafi se kina kula sosai da duk wani sassa na jikin ki.

 ya kamata ki kula dasu  a jikinki a matsayinki na ya mace.
Sune kaman haka

(1) HAMMATA :yana da kyau ki dinga wanke hammantanki a ko da yaushe ki dena barin  gashin a hammata kasance kullum cikin sheving ke kanki zakiji dadi.

(2)KASAN NONUWA: kidinga wanke kasan nonuwanki sbd zafi ke kanki zakiji dadi
(3)GASHIN KAI:wanke kai yana daga cikin tsafta ammah wlh wata se takai kusan shekara bata wanke kaiba ita da ruwa se alwala ko wankan janaba ,ammah baza tasa shampoo ta wanke kanta bah kullum kai na kunshe ba shan iska se wari mijinki na gudunki tsafta shine mace.
yar uwa kinsa HQ shine abin gyara ba sai anfada mikibah😊 kasance kullum cikin gyara da kamshi SBD tsaro kodan me house yaji dadi🙈
(5)DA MATSEMATSIN CINYOYINKI. Yana da kyau ki kula da gurin nan sbd yana rike dadti musaman mata masu  kiba  dinga kyarashi a ko da yaushe.
          *GIRKI♨♨*
Ki shiga ki dafa masa abincin Wanda kinsan xaki birge shi Wanda kuma yake so tare da wani dan abunsha ki kuma tsaftace kicin din tare da kwanukan bayan kin gama.
            *KWALLIYA*
Sannan kije kiyi wanka tare da Sa kayan da xai rikitashi ki kuma yi kwalliya bance kisa less ko atamfa ba ,kisa kaya Wanda xai fidda miki komai kamar english wears Wanda xaki birgeshi.
 *TASHIN OGA A BACCI🛌*
   Bance kije ki tsaya akansa kina faman kwala masa kira ba,bayan kinyi kwalliyan kin Sa turaren sai ki xoh ki kwanta akan kirjinsa basai kinyi magana ba xaiji numfashinki tare da kamshi turare xai bude ido sannan yaci karo da tsaleminikwalliyan ki sai ki danyi shagawaba🙈 kina ba kaine kaki tashi kayi wanka kaci abinci ba to wlh sai yaji kin burgeshi.
  *BREAK FAST🍞🍗🍜🍝*
Bayan yayi wanka yana fitowa sai ki bashi kayan da kika xaba masa sannan ki kama hannun sa ki kaishi gurin cin abinci dama kuma kafin ya fito kin Gyara dakin.sannan ki fara tafiya kina rangwada kina juwa batoms dama kuma kinsha kayaa sannan kisa msa abinci kuna ci kin yanda kin shagwaba.
        *SOYAYYA💋❤💘*
Aunty bayan kun gama sai ki tattara kayan kina juyi kin shagwaba sannan kixo ki xauna kina bashi labari masu dadi zaki ga kinsa nishadin sosai .
  *MOTSO DA SHA,AWA👙*
   Aunty  sai ki xauna a chinyarsa kina shagwaba kin juyi ki cire nono ki a bra kice  yana  miki ciwo ko nayi miki kaykayi kice ya sosa miki shi ko ya tsotsa🙈 kina shagwaba kina kwar kwasa.duk wata hanya da xaki Tayarmasa   da sha,awa ita xsoyayyar sannan wanka  kala Daban daban xakiyi.aranar
     *SOYAYAR DARE👙💋*
Bayan kun gama soyayya in dare yayi bayan kunci abinci kinyi wanka kin fesa wanka sai ki xauna kina masa hira kina shagwaba ta yadda xaki bir geshi INA gaya miki baxai so ya bar gurinki ba

dan oga yaji dadin sarrafa ki sosai) akwai kuma magani kara kiba ga masu son su dan kara kiba su cuka suyi bulbul akwai maganin rage tumbi wasu da sunyi ciki sun haihu sai kiga tumbi ya taran musu majina ko mai saki ciwon mara ko mai fama da kurajen gaba ko mai hanaki haihuwa ko mai bushe miki da gaba ko mai dauke miki ni ima ko mai dauke miki da sha awa kwata kwata kiji bakyason mijinki ya tabaki ko wadda yake dauke miki al ada tadaina zuwa kwata kwata ko wadda idan anyi sex da ita take jin zapi ko take ganin jinin da sauransu duk munada ma ganin kala kala wanda idan kinyi amfani su kullum kara sonki zaiyi saboda kullum kina cikin ni ima ina masu matsalar ni ima wanda zasuce sunyi amfani da maganin ni ima kala kala amma basu ga chanji ba wannan idan kukayi amfani dashi zaku ga gyaran fata matar tayi kyau tayi kyalli ko da kinada kuraje zasu mutu ko masu pinpus ne duk wata matsala ta fuska muna da maganin akwai hadin gyaran amarya kiyi kyau kiyi ras oga kuma yasha dadi akwai hadin dilka mai kyau fata tayi kyau ta haske akwai hadin mandamo da man ayu original wanda idan kina amfani da zai matseki kuma zai kara miki ni ima kuma mijinki zaiji dadinki sosai bazaiji dadin wata mace ba bayanki saidai idan itama tayi amfani dashi akwai hadi matan suke matsalar haihuwa suna son su haihuwa amma shiru ba labari sunyi maganin sunyi amma shiru yar idan kinyi amfani da wannan ne akwai maganin karpin maza da magani masu saurin kawo acikin minti daya har yakawo akwai maganin dake karawa mace sha awa da akwai matan da sukeda wannan matsala tarashin sha awa akwai pad muna *ZABI DA KANKI KI GYARA DA KANKI*  kici moriyar mijin karki zama koma baya ga mai gidan ki
        ✥ 👙 *GYARAN NONO* 👙✥

idan muka ce gyaran nono akasari ba kowace mace zata gane me muke nufi ba saboda basu damu da gyarawaba.

      alhali kuma rashin gyaran ba karamar illa yake yi masuba Amma su basu San hakanba.

       to gaskiya yana da matukar muhimmanci da tasiri ga mace 

↸☛ *amarya*
↸☛ *uwargida*
↸☛ *budurwa*
↸☛ *bazawara*

da Ku gyara nonon Ku, karki bar nononki hakanan sharaf ba kyan gani sai kaga mace tabar nono a zube, in tana shara maigida yaga suna ta reto kamar an ratayo agwagi a bayan keke, idan kuka Lura sai kuga matan wadansu yarurrukan wadanda ba hausawaba ( kamar larabawa) matansu sun tsufa ko sun manyanta Amma martabar nonuwansu nanan daram , ta yadda ko nonuwan wata budurwa a nan baza ka samesu a hakaba.

        ☛ hanyoyin da Zaki bi don kada nononki ya fadi ko kuma idan ya fadi kuma kina son ya tashi sune zaki Samu:

☛ alkama ki rinka yin kunu da ita kina sha safe da Rana.

☛ ko kisamu garin hulba.
☛ da garin tsamiya.
☛ da zuma farar saka.
☛ da lemun tsami.

Sai ki hadasu guri daya ki rinka shafawa a nonon bayan awa �� ko minti 30minutes sai ki wanke ki shafa man zaitun.


                   
❊👙 *GYARAN NONO DA KINDIRMO* 👙

shima wanna wani hadine da akeyi don gyaran nono kuma yanada muhimmanci sosai , yanda akeyi shine za'a Samu 
       ↣ kindirmo
       ↣ tumatur
       ↝ lemun tsami
       ⇢ garin kubewa
        ⇥ da garin sallaja
   Sai ki hadasu guri daya ki kwabasu ki rinka shafe nonon dashi, bayan kimanin 1hr ko minti 30 sai ki wanke ki shafe nonon da man ridi.

      wanna wani hadine da akeyi don gyaran nono musamman ga budurwa, shi wanna hadi kuma kowace mace inda tana da bukata zata Iya amfani dashi saboda tasirinsa, yanda akeyi shine.
         ⇇ garin waken soya.
         ⇊ garin alkama.
         ↳ garin zogale.
         ↴ garin bawon lemun Zaki.
          ↳ kunfan maliya.
           ⇗ Zuma 
 Sai ki cakudasu guri daya sai ki rinka shafawa a nonon bayan minti 30 ko sama da haka sai a wanke, sannan kuma ki rinka shan kunun alkama.

To daga lokacin fa nono yake lalacewa daga lokacin da mace ta haihu musamman haihuwa farko.

Idan ya kasance yan uwa mahaifinta mata suna da manya nono to itama zata iya kasancewa mai manya nono.

To idan kika kasance mai daya daga ciki wadannan kina kuma bukatar gyara to ga hanyar.

               ・ *TUMBIN CIKI* ・

Mace mai tumbin ciki a koda yaushe Zaki ga cikinta kamar mai ciki, kuma duk wani kaya da zaka saka sai kafa wannan tumbin ya fito.

 *SHIN ℳENENE YAKE KAWO TUMBIN CIKI* 

a zahiri yake haifar da tumbin ciki shine, yawan cin kayayyaki masu saka kiba.
Wato abinci mai maiko haka nan shi kanshi wannan tumbin ( phyver) ne yake dagowa shine sai ki ga ciki yana dagawa.

shuwaka sannan ki sha ruwa na karshe.

dafaffen kwai da garin kuli kici daf magriba

*KASHI NA DAYA (1)*
*ana so mace ta ringa gyara kanta tun tana gidan iyayenta ba sai tayi aure ko kuma ta zo yin aure kafin ta Fara gyara kanta ba.*
*wasu da yawan yan'mata sai kaga suna yin abin har yana gona da iri*
*TSARKI DA RUWAN DUMI :*
*tsarki da ruwan dumi ba karamin taimakawa yake yi ba wajen gyaran ( farji )*
*Mata Ku kiyaye tsarki da ruwan sanyi saboda ba karamin illa yake yi ma mace ba.*
✎ *GANYEN MAGARYA:*
*ana so mace ta dinga yin tsarki da ganyen magarya idan da so Samu ne ya zama shine permanent ruwan tsarkin ki shi ma ba karamin gyara ( farji ) yake yi ba.*
✎           *ZUMA:*
*ana so mace ta ringa shan Zuma cokali daya (1) da safe daya (1) da daddare 1 wannan yana taimakawa wajen dawo miki da ni'iman ki da ya tafi yayin da kike jinin al'ada.*
❑     *SHAN ZUMA*
*ana so macen da take cikin jinin al'ada ta rinka shan zuma cokali uku (3) kullum da safe har tsawon kwanaki da zata gama al'ada.*
☛ *MAN HABBATUSSAUDA :*
*zaki sami man habbatussauda shima ki rinka sha kina shafawa a ( farji)*
 *KANKANA DA MADARA :*
*Ana so mace ta rinka shan kankana da madara a ko wane lokaci da ta gama al'adarta.*
☛ *KANKANA DA CUCUMBER:*
*zaki yanka kankana da cucumber sai ki hade su kiyi blanding ki rinka sha a duk lokacin da kika sami Hali.*
          ❑ *AL'MISKI*
*ana so mace ta sami miski ki rinka sa kadan a ( farji ) dinki.*
*Ko da kin wanke pants dinki wannan kamshi yana jikinki.*
            ✿ *IYAYE* ❀
*wadannan abubuwan Dana lissafa irin wadanda ya kamata mace ta rinka yi kenan tun tana gaban iyayenta.*
✎ *mata a daina yawan cushe-cushe a ( farji ) yawan yin hakan ba karamin matsala yake jawo wa ba.*

: NAU'OIN KWANCIYA



1.zaki tsaya atsaye oga ya rungumoki ta baya saiki sunguya kidafa gado ki turomai ta baya sai ya zura azzakarinsa cikin gindinki, saiki hade kafafunki ki matsesu shikuma ya dafa duwawunki, yana motsawa

2 zaki kwanta rufda ciki oga yahau kan duwawunki yazura azzakarinsa, kekuma kidinga dago duwawunki sama kina tayashi motsawa

3 zaki yi kamar kinyi sujada sai shikuma ya kafa gwuiwarsa akangado yasa hannu ya rike kwankawasonki yana motsawa

4 zaki kwanta rigingine kibuda kafarki inya zura saiki daga kafarki sama kihardesu ki daura akafadarsa saikisa hannu kidago duwawunki yadda zaidinga shiga sosai

5  zaki kwanta rigingine kafarki ta hagu saiki lankwasata kamar mai tankwashe kafa saiki tokareta da kirjinsa shikuma yaita zurawa

6  wannan zaki kwanta arigingine amma kidan karkace bangaren hagu sai oga ya daga kafarki ta hagu yasata a akafadarsasai yakanta ahannun damansa yana rungume da kafar hagunji sai ya zura azzakarinsa, saiya mikarda hannun damansa zuwa kan nononki yana murzasu, yana motsawa, hmn kudai kawai ku tabbatar kofa arufe take

 
7  oga zai kwanta agefen gado kafafuwansa akasa kekuma daman kin lailaya banana tamike car, saiki juyamai baya kizauna akansa banana ta lume cikin kogi saikiyita sukuwa shikuma yana shafa duwawunki jinata sukuwa

8  zai kwanta akan gado sosai kihau kansa ki zura banana ta lume sai ki samai filo kidago kansa saikisamai nononki abakinsa yana tsotsa kina sukuwa hmn ranar za'a nad'a ki sarauniya

       *👌👌HADIN KANUNFARI NI'IMA DA MOTSO SHA'AWA👌👌*
Ki jika kanunfari shi kadai ki rinka sha ki kuma kama ruwa da shi tsarki shima wani nau'in karin ni'ima.

    *👌👌HADIN KAYAN ITATUWA KARIN RUWAN GABA👌👌*
*1.KANKANA*
*2.KOKUMBA*
*3.TUMATUR*
*4.MAXARKWAILA*
*5.MADARA PEAK*
*6.DABINO*
Ayanka kankana duka harda yayanta, itama kukumba dukanta xaa yanka harda bayan, kada a cire ya'yan a yanka tumatur shima kada a mitse ruwan cikin sosai ki daka kanunfari ki jika dabino ki cire kwalayen ki hade su guri guda,ki markada a blander sai ki juye ki saka maxarkwaila a narke ki xuba xuma sai ki juye madara peak gwangwani daya ki rinka sha safe da yamma. xaki sha mamaki insha Allaah.

   *👌👌HADIN GWANDA SA KISHIYA TAGUMI👌👌*
Wannan hadin shi ake cewa sa kishiya tagumi idan kuma ke daya ce tofa saidai a kirashi mutu karaba.

*1.KANKANA*
*2.GWANDA*
*3.DABINO*
*4.XUMA*

XA A samu kankana a gyarata a jika dabino sai a hade su gu daya amarkade su a xuba xuma a ciki a rinka sha.

*👌👌HADIN FUREN XOGALE NA KARIN NI'IMA👌👌*
wannan hadin anso namiji yarinka amfani dashi domin karin ni'ima da kixari a sannan kada yaushe xai bukacin mace kusa dashi.

*1.FUREN XOGALE*
*2.YA'YAN XOGALE*
*3.DABINO*
*4.CUKWU*

A shanya furen xogale da ya'yan xogale a ciki inuwa sai a hada da dabino a daka a rinka sha da nonoko madarar peak
Wannan hadin yana saurin sauko da ni'ima.

*👌👌HADIN KANKANA WANNAN YANA GIGITA MAIGIDA👌👌*
kankana A matse ruwanta, mace xata yi matsi da shi idan ya samu kamar minti goma sai a warke yana kara ni'ima sosai.

*👌👌HADIN KABEWA KARIN NI'IMA👌👌*

*1.DANYAAR KABEWA*
*2.MADARA PEAK*
*3.XUMA*

SINADARAN GIRKI🍲

A wannan post din nawa zaki samu takaitaccen bayani da idea yadda zakiyi anfani da sinadaran girki wato kayanwa kamshi na gida dana waje.

Wani jan hankali da zanyi anan shine,baa zabga spices a abinci,kadan kadan zaki dinga sakawa a girki,kuma kisan spices din da suke going well a kowanne girki,su kansu spices din sai kin san wanne ne yake tafiya da wanne,idan ba haka ba a karshe zaa rasa inda kamshin girkinki ya dosa!

1⃣CLOVES (Kanunfari):-kanunfari sinadari ne mai matukar dadi a girki,musammam idan kika gano yadda zakiyi anfani dashi,kuma da irin abincin da ya dace ki saka shi..
*Duk lokacin da Zaki tafasa nama ki jepa Dan kanunfari Guda 2 ko uku 
*idan zakiyi farfesun nama,kayan ciki,kifi ko kaza,ki tabbata kanunfari yana ciki.
*kanunfari yana dadi sosai a wajen anfani da nama,kuma a farkon girki ake saka shi!

2⃣BLACK PEPPER(masoro):-masoro yana da dadin kamshi idan kika iya anfani dashi,yadda zakiyi amfani dashi kuwa shine.
*duk lokacin da zakiyi fried rice dinki,ki daka shi tare da tafarnuwa,zakiji banbanci
*ki daka masoro da albasa idan zakiyi miyar yauki,taji daddawa da gyadar miya,zaki ji banbanci!

3⃣GARLIC(tafarnuwa) :-
Tafarnuwa sinadarin girki ce mai karawa abinci kamshi mai kwantar da hankalin mai chi,akwai hanyoyi da yawa yadda zakiyi anfani da ita..
*hada tafarnuwa da ginger ki saka a soup ko farfesun kayan ciki
*ki hada tafarnuwa da kanunfari ki saka a ruwan miyarki
*idan zakiyi (marinade) ki tabbata kin saka hadin tafarnuwa,ginger da kanunfari,kin hada su wuri daya kin daka su liqwi,ki saka a kaza ko nama..yana matukar dadi a wajen gashi,na nama ko kifi
*zaki iya daka ta ita kadai ki saka a jollof dinki
*amma kada ki soma anfani da ita a miyar yauki,dan kuwa baya dadi.


4⃣GINGER(citta):- basai nace komai ba game da citta ba saboda duk inda zaayi anfani da kanunfari,masoro toh tabbas citta tana da matsuguni a wurin, ita citta tana da banbancin kamshi da fresh ginger,fresh ginger yafi dadi a lokacin da zakiyi anfani da tafarnuwa,ita kuma citta alokacin da zakiyi anfani da ragowae yen uwanta su masoro da kanunfari.

5⃣KIMBA:-kimba itama tana cikin kayan kamshin da yawa mutane basu waye daita ba,tana matukar dadi idan zaki hada garin kununki na gero,ki tabbata tana ciki,ko kuma idan markaden kunune na hasara,shima a jefa ta ciki a markado da ita tare da sauran kayan kamshi su citta,kanunfari da masoro

6⃣NUTMEG(gyadarmiya) :--
Idan ma bakya anfani da nutmeg to ki fara,saboda sinadari ce  matukar kamshi a miyar yauki,kuka,kubewa karkashi da sauransu,tafi dadi ida kika hada ta da daddawa da masoro da yer citta kadan kika dakasu liqwi,ki saka a ruwan namanki idan zakiyi miyar yauki,kuma  a farkon girki ake anfani ita,saboda idan ta dahu sosai,shine kamshinta zaifito sosai.

7⃣CINNAMON (girfa):- Ina son girki da cinnamon,akwai na gari akwai kuma na stick,yana matukar dadi a shyi mai kyan kanshi,kuma yana dadi a home made drinks kamar su tamarind drink,milk shakes,ana saka cinnamon a baked foods  kamar chocolates cakes,swissrolls,cinnamon rolls ,ana garnishing dashi,ana matukar dadi a soup na kayan ciki da kuma soup din nama.

8⃣CURRY:- Curry sinadarin girki ne da kowa ya sanshi amma ba lallai yadda yakamat kike anfani dashi ba, hanya mafi kyau yadda zakiyi anfani da curry shine ki sakashi a farkon girkinki da kuma tsakiyar girki,misala idan jollof rice zakiyi ana saka shi a farko wajen bayan kin tsaida ruwan jollof dinki,idanya tafasa,kika zuba shinkafarki,tayi tafasa kamar biyu sai ki qara..

9⃣THYME:- thyme yawanci anfi anfani da na kanti,amma akwai ganyen sa,wanda shima zaki iya anfani dashi ki saka a nama,kifi ko kaza, ana anfani da ganyen thyme a recipes na dankali yana matukar kawata abinci.

🔟POTASH(kanwa):-
Akwai ungurnu,akwai jar kanwa akwai ,bakar kanwa da sauransu,amma anfi anfani da ungurnu da kuma bakar kanwa,duk dai wacce kike anfani da ita,ba lokacin da zakiyi anfani da ita yakamata ki fara kokawar jikata ba,zaki samu robar lemo mai kyau ki wanke kanwarki ki zuba a robar sannan ki zuba ruwa ki cika tap,duk sanda zakiyi anfani da ita daman tana kusa sai tsiyaya a murfin robar ko chokali ki zuba a girkinki.

1⃣1⃣TUMERIC:- wannan indian spices ne ,zaki ganshi yallow shar,kanshinshi bashi da karfi,yana da kyau a girki,domin yana kawata girki da wannan kalar tasa,misali zaki iya saka a farar shinkafa,ki dafa dashi kiyi garnishing da carrots da kume peas,yana kayu sosai,ana saka shi a recipes na dankali,idan zaayi fried chips zakiga yayi  kala mai kyau,abin shaawa.

1⃣2⃣PAPRIkA:- yana da dadi sosai a girki, gashi zaki ganshi da jar kala,ana saka shi stew,ana zaka shi a gashi kamar idan zakiyi gashin nama,kifi,kaza da sauransu,zakiga namanki yayi wani jar kala mai kyau,ana saka chi kuma a blend spice,idan zaki hada home made spices dinki


1⃣4⃣CHILL POWDER:- chill  combination ne na wasu spice,irinsu chili ,cumin ,oregano,cayyene da sauransu, zaki ji chill powder yana kamshi na musamman,kuma ana anfani da shi a miya da kuma kashin nama


1⃣5⃣ALL SPICES:- all spice sinadarin girki ne mai zaman kansa,wanda da yawa mutane suna zaton wasu combination ne na spice,haka yake round kamae masoro ko kanunfari,yana da dadin kamshi a girki,ana saka shi a dahuwar nama,soup da kuma brown rice,ana saka shi a salad dressing da kuma spice mix.


1⃣6⃣OREGANO:- sinadrin girki ne,zakiji shi da lemony flavor yana going perfectly da garlic da kuma curry a girki.


1⃣7⃣BASIL:-wannan ganye ne wanda yake matukar dadi da kyau a pasta recipes ,kuma ana saka shi a sandwich da burger da sauransu.


1⃣8⃣ CILLANTRO/ CORIANDER:- da yawa anacewa cilantro da coriander leaves daya ne,kwai babncin suna ne aka samu, zaki ganshi kamar parsely leaves,sai dai yafi parsely haske,ana saka shi a recipe na nama,kaza,kifi da kuma vegetables.


1⃣9⃣PARSELY:- parsely ganye ne kore shar,mai kyau a girki da kuma dadin kamshi,ana saka shi a minced meat,ko baked food,ana garnishing dashi,kuma ana saka shi a pasta recipe da recipes na dankali,yana kawata girki sosai.


2⃣0⃣CHIVES:- chieves shine lawashin albasa,yana da dadi a nama,ko fate,ko kuma recipes na dambu,yana da kyau a wajen garnish,ana saka shi a recipes na dankali,zaki iya barinshi ya bushe,idan zakiyi wani recipe na flour ki marmasa shi,zai baki kala mai kyau,ko ki marnasashi a bread crumbs shima yana kyau,ko a saka shi a kwai idan zaka soya.


2⃣1⃣MINT LEAVES:- Shine ganyen na'ana'a, dayawa an shayi ake anfani dashi,ana anfani da shi a recipes na drinks,kamar lemon tsamiya,mango drinks,milk shakes da sauransu,kuma yana dadi sosai a girki,ganshinsa yana da karfi,kadan ake saka wa a girki.


2⃣2⃣SPINACH:- Spinach shine allayyahu ana saka shi a miyar agushi,miyar ganye,miyar taushes da sauransu,ana sakashi a alala,fate da kuma jollofs.ana saka shi ne a karshen girki.


2⃣3⃣CUMIN:-sinarin girki zaki ganshi kanar buntun shinkafa, ana saka shi a kayn kamshi spices,kamar idan zakiyi home made spice,spice blend, ana saka shi a stews.



2⃣4⃣CARDAMOM:-cardamon spices ne na indian cuisine,yana da dadin kamshi a girki,ana saka shi tare da su kanunfari ko cinnamon,kuna ana saka shi a baked foods.


2⃣5⃣MEAT TENDARIZER:- sinadarin girki ne da ake sakawa a nama,especially nama mai tauri,zaki fara sakawa a nama yayi wasu yen mintuna sannan ki dora,yana taimakawa sosai namanki ya dahu da wuri.


2⃣6⃣7 SPICES:-wannan combination ne na kayn kamshi,yan matukse dadi a brown rice ,fried spagetti da kuma soups. 

SUMMARY LIST:-ga list na spices din ake samu a kantuna masu dadin kamshi da kuma kawata girki akwai na kanmpanin "spice supreme" "ducros"  da sauransu

       Idan kina tare da maigida, karki zama mai zama nesa da shi,
      ki zauna yanda jikin ku zai rika shafar juna domin ba abinda
      ke kara shakuwa kamar "body contact" wato gogayyar jiki, idan
      kun kasanta ki langabe masa tamkar baki da lafia koda kuwa
      lafiarki lau, akwai abinda bature ke kira "subconscious mind"
      koda lafiyarki kalau zuciyarsa zata kasance cikin wasuwasi
      bazai sami natsuwaba in ba yaga kin zama daidai ba, koda kin
      kwana 2, ki bukace shi ya ware maki koda awa daya ne a cikin
      lokutansa da niyyar kina so ya koya maki wani abu wanda baki
      sani ba na rayuwar aure, dalilin haka tamkar ka baiwa dan
      makarantane assignment, ba zai cireki a zuciyarsa ba har sai
      ya sami abinda zai fada koya maki, kinga kin baiwa zuciyarsa
      aiki bashi da lokacin tunanin wata! kafin mai gida ya ci
      abinci ki, ki tabbatar kin caba kwalliya domin hakan zai
      bashi damar cika tumbinsa! Idan kun kebe a makwancin ku,
      baiwar Allah, karki barshi yayita wahala shi kadai! Kwanciyar
      aure ba dan namiji kadai akayi ba, kema kina da sha'awarki,
      yana nasa kina naki, in ya taba nan ke taba can, idan ya
      matsa nan ko cafko can, idan kika sakar masa jiki abin bazai
      armashi ba, amma idan aikin ya zama na mutum 2, zaki ga
      fa'ida! Namiji yaro ne saida rarrashi, yanayin tafiyarki
      karta zama kamar ta masu noman dankali, yangar da mata ke a
      waje ba kugu suka fiki ba, ba nonuwa suka fiki ba, jujjuyasu
      ki sami lada, idan kika barsu a cikin kaya ba abinda zasu
      kareki da su, komin kankantar abinda zai ja maigida yace
      Allah maki albarka karki raina! Wacce ta mayarda miji uba ita
      ce "sarauniya" Mata Allah ya mana albarka! Karki yarda wata
      ballagaza ta rabaki da uban yaranki!ka/ki tura ma mata qanwa
      ko yaruwa don qaruwar junanmu baki daya

      ,,,,Ki bari sai kuna zaune da Oga kina dan Shafa Nan da  sai ki kallesa a shagwabance kice gaskiya yau so nake na
      shayar dakai nono,,,cikin shagwaba fa,,kinayi kina narkewa!!

      wayau,,sai ki tuntsire da dariya kina fadin re u ready? Wani
      zaiyi murmushin jin dadi wani dariya zaiyi inkuma kuna so
      free da maigida zaice dake shan nono sai kace wani baby? Sai
      kice da menene kai? Ai baby nane ko kana ganin ba haka bane
      in Nuna maka? Duk cikin hikima da tankwasa harce zaki dinga
      wannan maganganu! Kinayi kina shafo banana a wando...in kinga
      alamar yana so ki ciro boobs ki basa ,,basai lallai in zaayi
      ML ya kamata mu dinga faranta ran masugida ba muna kuskure

      da ido ya tun riga ya bude sai gyarañ Allah,,,wasu tun a waje

      masa kalmar da zaki Sasa cikin zumudin dawowa gida da
      wuri,,,ki bari sai kindan rumgumosa zakiyi masa bye bye sai
      kidan shafo kasan wandonsa kice kash! Badan fita zakayi ba da
      naga lafiyar nan, *sai ki Taba sandar girma* ki Shafa naki ne
      ba haufi da haka karuwai ke kwace mazajen da azal ta hausu!

      zaayi masa tunda ya ajiye jjc a gida! Sai ki manne nashi kina

      amma na tanadar maka wannan

 🙉‬: INA KUKE MATA? Mu kula da kanmu kuma mu gyara jikinmu,mu nunawa mazajenmu soyayya.Idan yadawo jeki rungumeshi ki hada goshinki da nashi kice" u r welcome darling",seyaji har cikin kwakwalwanshi....ki kama hanunshi kije kicire mai kaya kirakashi bandaki inda halima kiyi mai wanka,ki rakoshi ki gogemai jiki da towel sannan kisamai kaya marar nauyi....kijashi kufito falo kinamai hira me dadi yanacin abinci inyagama ki tattare plates kikai kitchen ko gun wanke wanke.kije ki kara wanka kifeshe jikin ki da turare me dadin kamshi kisa kaya marar nauyi kaman evenin show ko English gown marar nauyi...kizo kizauna akan cinyanshi kice "HI darling" zakiga to salon ze sanja....mata suna yawan complain wai mijinsu baya dawowa da wuri daga kasuwa ko aiki,to yadawo an batamai rai dan me gobe ze dawo dawuri akuma batamai rai din...in mijinki bedawowa da wuri kibarshi, kiyimai duk abunda na lissafa asama in kin zauna a cinyannashi se ki riko kanshi ki hada goshinshi da naki kidan ciji hancinshi ko kumatu zedanyi kara inyace meyamiki,seki amsa cikin shagawaba kice"to ba kaine kaki dawowa da wuriba yau,naita jiranka har nagaji.kwalliyan da nama har ya goge" nitsuwa zeyi ya baki hakuri kuma gobe baze sake yakara dawowa ba dawuriba.kinga yadda akeyi ba wai ki haushi da masifaba kaaman kekika aipeshi...maza kaman jarirai suke, lallabi sukeso da ladabi.kuma inkika musu riban nakine.Domin ga lada agun ubangiji ga kuma soyayya agun miji...mata don ALLAH mu kula mu kwatan wa kanmu hakki.....munaji muna kallo wata awaje da kwacemana miji... Da wannan kalaman take kwacemusu zuciya.In kuna dan zaune kizama me kwanciya ajikin mijinki ko kuma kimai kiss haka kawai inkuna zaune kidan taso kaman meyin wani abu ki zagayo tabayan kujera ta sama ki dago kanshi kisa bakinki anashi ki tsotsi abinki nakine,in son samu kisa kankara bakinkin yadan jima kadan sekicire kapinnan bakin naki yadau sanyi sekiwa Oga kiss...seyaji har cikin kwakwalwanshi....kuma bawai dole se da dare kuma adaki akan gado ake HARKA BA..A a ba haka abun yakeba,darana da safe da yamma duk lokacin da kike bukata ba sekinjira Oga kullum ace  shi yake nemankiba...kema wataran ki bushi iska kinemeshi,kiyi wanka tsab ki wanke HQ a turarashi da turare me dadin kamshi,ki shafa mai me santsi a nononki kisa sleepin dress dinki musamman chest out kinadoso shi zeji tsikar jikinshi ya tashi...kinazuna ki dale kansa kiciremai kaya inzeyi magana kisa bakinki anashi kina murza kan nononshi da hannunki...karki sake kullum yazo yahau kanki yayi ta sukuwa kaman wata doki badole seyasa banana a HQ bane kawai zeyi releasing,there are numerous ways kaman da tafin kapa ko tsakankanun nonuwanki ETc inkikaga gamanan sau kasa da hannayenki zuwa" Oga at the top" wato🍌 kisa dankaramin yatsanki abakin bulin🍌 kina masa tafiyar tsutsa tare da saka harce kina dan lasa kaman meshan lollipop...ki hada nonuwanki waje daya kisaka bananan a tsakaninsu kina sama da kasa inkingama kihada tafin kafanki ki tabbata kinshafa mai sanna kisa banana a tsakiyansu kina sama da Kasa nanma ahaka har ya releasin dis are ways n tips dat should b often considered mu dear sisters...Allah bamu zaman lafia agidan mazajenmu wanda basuyi aureba kuma Allah basu mazaje nagari..bissalam
ADDU,AR DA YADACE MACE TAGARI TAYI MA MIJINTA:1)Allah ya kare shi daga sharrin shedan,2)Allah ka kare mani mijina daga sharrin mahassada,sharrin miyagun mutane,sharrin miyagun aljanu,sharrin makiya,3)Allah kayi ma mijina budi ta  hanyar halali,4)Allah ka kare mijina daga zina,5)Allah ka kare mani mijina da sharrin mazinatan mata,6)Allah idan ka kaddari mijina da karin aure ka hadashi da mace tagari kamarni ba wacce zata ruguza mashi gida ba ko rashin adalci ameen. idan ko kika kasance mai wannan addu'ar bake ba wani matsala a gidanki,sai dai farin ciki da karin kaunar juna ke da mijinki.DON ALLAH DUK MACEN DA TA SAMU WANNAN SAKON TAYI KOKARIN TURA MA YAN UWANTA MATA AMMA NAGARI.
SARAUNIYAR MACE
MAI MALLAKAN SIRRI MIJIN TA
ZAKI HADA DA KANKI
Ki dafa kanunfari idan ya dauko nuna saiki
zuba zuma
a ciki, bayan kin sauke ki sami garin ridi ki
zuba ki
hada nonon shanu mara tsami ki gauraya
idan yayi
sanyi ki sha......sai naji daga gare ku............
ki sami kanunfari da dabino ki jika sai sun
tsima saiki
rinka diban ruwan kinasa zuma da madara
kina sha,
duk abinda aka ji na yafe kar a fada min.........
GYARA 3
ta sami sassaken baure ta dafashi da
kanumfari citta
da lipton ta hada ta tafada sai ta tace ta sa a
fridge
tarim ga sha tsimine wlhy yana da kyau
sosai
GYARA 1
,zaki samu garin zogale ne ki jika ki ringa sha
sau biyu
a rana. Kina tashi daga bacci kafin kici komai
ki sha
ruwan zogale,sai kuma in zaki kwanta Ya
zamo na
karshe.
Sai kuma in Kina infection ki ringa seat bath
dashi
GYARA 4
Ki daka aya ki tankade sai ki samu
bushasshen dabino
shima ki dake shi, hade da mazarkwaila ki
hade su da
garin ayar. Ki sami nono ki rinka damawa
kina sha.
AMFANIN TAFARNUWA GA MATA :::::
*************************
Idan mace tana ciwon mara ko ciwon ciki alokacin al'ada ko jinin yarikayi mata wasa, tasamu zuma cokali 5 tahada da man tafarnuwa cokali 2, in an hada sai tarika sha cokali 1 dasafe 1 da yamma,

MATAR DA JINI YAKI DAUKE MATA tarika shan man tafarnuwa rabin karamin cokali sau 4 arana.

RIGA KAFIN CIWON NONO GA WACCE TA HAIHU; Anacin
dabino guda 7 asha man tafarnuwa karamin cokali sau 1 arana kwana uku.

DAUREWAR CIKI
KO MARA BAYAN HAIHUWA; Asamu ruwa mai zafi kofi 1 azuba man tafarnuwa karamin cokali asha sau 1 kwana 3.

YAWAN LALACEWAR CIKI KO
YAWAN BARI; asamu kwan agwagwa asoya da man tafarnuwa abaiwa matar taci sau 2 arana kwana 7.

TSAWON GASHI DA HANASHI
KAKKARYEWA; Asamu man kwakwa ahada da man zaitun da man tafarnuwa arinka shafawa akai, amma man tafarnuwa 50% za,asa sauran
kuma 100&... Allah yasa mudace...zan kawo wasu da yarda Allah
Muhammadurrasulillah (saw) yace: lelle mace tana fuskantowa da fuskan sheitan (kirjin ta) kuma tana juya baya daga sheitan (duwawukan ta).... Saboda haka aka umarce mu da mu sa hajibi domin mu rufe wadannan ababe guda biyu.    Yaci gaba da cewa (maza) idan dayan ku yaga mace ta burge shi to ya koma ga iyalan sa haka ze cire masa abinda ke cikin ransa. To yan'uwa mata muji tsoron  Allah mu dinga shigan mutunci domin wasu basu da matan  wasu kuwa matansu ba su da irin sirrin da Allah ya ba ki, wasu masu hakuri wasu marasa hakuri. Kinga idan muka fiddo da wadannan abubuwa muna yawo bisa titi ba karamin fitana muke sanyawa yan'uwammu musulmi (maza) koma na yayan mu. Dibi yar'uwa yanda muke yafa gyale azamanin nan  nonuwa waje duwawuka waje. Muji tsoron Allah mu gyara. Yar'uwa idan kin samu wannan sako ki turawa masoyanki  mata don Allah dan darajar annabi (saw). Cikakkiyar masoyiyar  manzo Allah (saw) zata iya turawa karanci mata 5 idan ko ta kasa to ta sawa kanta alamar tambaya? Shin ta cika masoyiya


MATA KO KUNSAN KISS KALA KALA



      1.FRENCH KISS: Wannan shine sannannen sumba da kowa ya sani kuma maza sunfi zaquwa akansa. Amma shine mafi wahala wajen koyo. Ynda ake yi shine zaki kusanto oga ne ki soma tsotsan lips dinsa a hnkli sama sama har ki zura harshenki cikin bakin Oga kina mai jujjuya harshenki cikin salon shauki da iyawa, ki kamo harshensa cikin natsuwa ba cafka zakiyi da karfi ba a'a a hnkali zaki kama kan harshen nasa kina jujjuyawa kina tsotsa a hnkli. Zaki ga ya cafki taki kma sai ki sau masa ragamar kina jan numfashi a hnkli.                                     2. EARLOPES KISS: A nan zaki kama kasan kunnen Oga a hnkli a tsakanin lips dinki ki dinga turawa a natse kina tsotsa a hnklu hadi da lasa. Wannan zai sa jikin Oga ya tsirga kuma zai tuna masa da zazzafar kaunarki.             3.NECK KISS:  Wannan ma yana da muhimmanci sosai. Kiss ne dake nuna cewa kina bukatar oga. *oga im ready*... A nan zaki daura lips dinki a kan wuyan Oga ki bashi 'yar karamar sumba bayan kin jiqa lebbanki da miyau kadan kafin kiyi. Jikin oga zai mutu zai ji shima babu abnda yake sha'awa irin ya kasance tare dake.      4.CHEEK KISS(kumatu): Shine wanda zaki sumbaci kumatun abun kaunarki ta hnyar shimfida lips dinki akan kumatun tare da bada sautin iska a hnkli cikin salo da jan hnkli. Wannan wani salo ne na bayyana godiyarki ga Oga bayan wata bajinta ko kyauta ko wata 'yar tsaraba idan ya kawo maki..                             5. ANGEL KISS: Ana yinsa ne a hnkli cikin salo na amfani da saman lebbanki; a inda zaki daura lips dinki akan saman idon Oga a hnkli cikin kulawa. Wannan kiss ana amfani dashi wajen tashin Oga daga barci. Kuma yana dasa kauna a zuciyar Ogan...                                      6. BUTTERFLY KISS:  A nan zaki matso kusa da Oga ne ki manna fuskarki a tasa ya zamana gashin idonki yana gogan nasa sai ki marmara gashin idon naki a hnkli kiyi sama da gashn idonki a kan goshinsa. Wannan salo yana nuna ynda kike jin Oga a ranki. Zaiyi tasiri idan kuna zaune kuna kallo ko ma idan zai fita..                                    7. SOLO KISS: Wannan wani salo ne da zaki wajen kama lip(lebe) daya na Oga na 'dan sec 10-15. Ki tsotsi leben kasa ko na sama a hnkli cikin salon soyayya

NI'IMA ADON MACE
     yau nazo muku da wasu sirrikan da zasu taimaka muku mata yan uwana. Namiji abin tattaline. Kusani mata namiji dangoyone ga wadda ta iya. Ku girmama mazajenku kwa sami Aljannar Ubangijinku cikin sauki. Muje zuwa main point dinmu yanuwa.
       GYARAN JIKI
*Lalle
*Kwaiduwar kwai uku 
*Manja cokali uku
*Cocumber
*Kur-kur
     Ki sami wadannan kayan dana lissafa ki hadasu waje daya ki kwaba amma cocumber sai kin malkada kin tace ruwan sannan ki zuba akai ki kwaba ki bashi kamar minti goma ko ashirin ya tsumu sannan ki shafa a jikinki ki bashi awa guda sannan kiyi wanka da sabulun gana kona salo.
  Sai an gwada zaa tabbatar da amfaninsa saboda haka na baki kiyi kamar sati biyu kina haka zakiga yadda jikinki zai koma.
       GYARAN JIKI KASHI NA 2
 *Ayaba( banana)
*Lemon tsami
*Tatacciyar madara
*kwai guda daya
*Man kadanya
*Cocumber
       Kihada ayabarki da cocumber ki markadasu a blender su malkadu sosai ki juye a dan wani abun sannan  ki zuba tatacciyar madararki aciki sai kwai sai ki matsa lemon tsami kadan ki chakudasu su hadu sosai sannan ki shafa kibarshi yayi kamar awa daya sai ki shafa man kadanya kibarshi yayi kamar minti talatin sannan kiyi wanka da ruwan zafi idan kin fito ki shafa duk wani cream da kikasan ya karbeki. Waiyyo yaruwa  ki lazimci yin haka kamar na sati daya zakiga canji. Sai an gwada akansan na kwarai.
        KARIN NI'IMA
* Gyada mai bargo
* Kwakwa
* Aya
* Dabino
* Cukwi
* Garin zogale(shanyar inuwa)
* Garin sassaken baure
* Garin sassaken gamji
      Da farko zaki sami gyadarki mai bargo sai kisassabata ki cire jan bawon sannan ki dakata. Sai ki sami kwakwarki ki markadata tare da ayarki da dabino. Ki daka cukwi, zogale, sassaken baure, da sassaken gamji.
   Sai ki hada wadannan kayan guri daya ki rinkasha tsawan sati daya zakisha mamaki. Sai kin zarce saa yaruwa.
      KARUWAR NI'IMA NA 2
*Alkama
* danyar gyada
*waken suya
*aya
*madarar ruwa
*kwakwa
   Ki sami alkamarki kofi daya da danyar gyada kofi daya sai aya kofi daya da waken suya kofi daya sannan kwakwa kwallo biyu , ki jika ki markada sannan ki tace kibarshi yazama gasara sai kirinka damawa kamar koko ki zuba madara ta ruwa kiyi kamar sati biyu kina shan wannan hadin. Sai angwada akansan na kwarai uwargida
     GYARAN NONO
*farar shinkafa
*garin alkama
*garin habbatussauda
*garin ayaba(plantain)
*gyada mai malfa( mai zabo)
*aya
*madara
*zuma
     Zaki sami plantain dinki ki shanyashi ya bushe sai ki daka ki hada da garin alkama da garin farar shinkafa saiki hada aya da gyadar a malkada a tace ruwan, sai ki dora akan wuta a zuba garikan akai, a zuba madarar gari data ruwa da zuma, sannan ki dama yayi kauri. 
Kiyi kamar sati biyu ko hudu kina haka sannan kisami rigar nono acuci maza kisaka. Waiyyo yaruwa maigida tambayarki zaiyi yace my lyf balanbalan kika hura? Kinsan amsar da zaki bashi..........
    GYARAN NONO NA 2
   Zaki sami hulba a tafasa arinka gasa nono dashi sannan ashafa man hulba . Ko kuma ki tafasa hulbar ki gasa nonon sannan ki kada kwan salwa ki shafa sai ki kada guda uku ki shanye. 
Waishhhhhh yaruwa ba magana kidai gwada.
  KAYAN DAKE DA AMFANI

*man zaitu da yayansa

*magarya
*baga ruwa

*zogale( komai nashi)
*gyada
*mazarkwaila
*habbatussauda
*ridi
*kanunfari da chitta
*zuma
*baure
*kwakwa
*madara
*nono
*dabino
*lemon tsami
*dasauransu domin kuwa zasuyi wuyar kirguwa.
   Yar uwa wadannan abubuwan zasuyi tasirine idan kina da tsafta, ladabi, biyayya, nutsuwa, sanin ya kamata, juriya da kuma hakuri. Da shikenansuba amma na tabbata idan kinsan ciwon kanki zaki san sauran. To uwargida ya rage naki kisan yadda zaki tafikar da rayuwar aurenki. ALLAH YA SHIRYEMU AKAN HANYA MADAIDAICIYA.

 kada ku matsanta bincike kudai[8:38AM, 4/24/2017] ‪+234 906 097 2894‬: 🎋FADAKRWA GA MA'AURATA🎋

Hakika aure sunnane na annabinmu muhammad (s a w) kamar yanda yace aure sunnatane kuyi aure ku hayayyafa don inyi alfahari daku ranar alkiyama,


🎋 amma gaskiya muna wasa da wannan babbar sunna,domin dama mu mata anyimune don maza suji dadi damu,kuma munada matukar daraja,amma wasu matan sukan zamo tamkar mazane suke saka kayan mata 🎋


🎋Kasancewar xakaga mace ta xama ba tsafta ba kwalliya ba iya girki then ba iya entertainment din miji dole ki rinka ganin matsaloli a cikin gidanki🎋

  
🎋ya kamata ki xama very careful akan al'amurran rywrki inhar kinaso kiji dadin rywr aurenki na har abada🎋

🎋ya kasance kafin mai gidanki ya dawo kin gyara ko ina da ko ina ke ma kinsha wanka kin dandara daurin kallabi ga kamshi kinsha abinci ya zama ready ayayin da mai gda ya dawo kin taroshi kina mar murmushin kauna tayaya baxaki sace xcyr mai gidankiba🎋


🎋kinbashi ruwa mai sanyi yasha kin ragemar zufa da hanki yaje yayi wanka ki kawo girki wanda yake da kyan gani ga kamshi to balle ya kai abakinsa🎋



🎋iyq girki yakansa mijin ki bazai dinga cin abncn wajeba amma idan baki iya girki ba to saidai muce innalillahi wa inna ilaihirraji,un🎋



💅 BY

💅SAFIYYA ABDULLAHI (MOMY)💅
[9:49PM, 4/26/2017] ‪+234 906 097 2894‬: KFC ORIGINAL SECRET CHICKEN RECIPE

Ingredients

1 whole chicken, cut into pieces
3 beaten eggs
4 tablespoons oil

For the coating

2 cups flour
4 teaspoons paprika
1 teaspoons salt
1 teaspoon pepper
1 teaspoon poultry seasoning (or chicken stock powder)
1 teaspoon oregano
1 teaspoon tarragon
1 teaspoon parsley
1/2 teaspoon thyme
1 teaspoon chives
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
1/2 teaspoon onion powder
1/2 teaspoon celery salt

Directions:

Sift flour and add together all the coating ingredients and grind finely with a mortar and pestle and place in a clean plastic bag. Coat each chicken piece first with the beaten egg, then with the flour mixture in the bag. Make sure you coat each piece completely with the flour.

Heat the oil in a skillet. Brown the chicken in oil slowly, uncovered. Once browned, cover the skillet and keeping frying on a very gentle heat until the chicken is fully cooked. Place on paper towels to drain out the excess 

Credits:
http://woorldcooking.blogspot.com/2016/01/kfc-original-secret-chicken-recipe.html?m=1
[9:51PM, 4/26/2017] ‪+234 906 097 2894‬: GIRKE GIRKEN 

    GIRKEN MU🍲

WAINAR SHINKAFA 
 Yest
Sugar
Farra shinkafa
Powder
Ungurnu
Da farko ki debi shinkafar tuwu a wanketa tas bawai sai tajikoba ana wanketa akai markade idan ankawo axuba yeast da powder kadan da sugar sai a rufe akai rana idan ya tashi sai a dauko a xuba dafafiyar shinkafa da nunu sai axuba ruwan kanwa kadan a juya sai a fara soyawa 
  🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚

    ALKUBUS 

Alkama
Fulawa
Yist
Ungurnu
Gishiri
Mai 
Da farko ki tankade garin alkama da fulawa ki hadesu waje guda kixuba yest da sugar da gishiri ki kwaba yafi kwabin fanke tauri sai a rufe a kaishi rana idan yatashi sai axuba mai kadan a xuba kanwa kadan a buga sai ki dauko gwangwani ki shafa masa mai ko ki xuba a ledar kamar alala sai ki turara 🍚

    🍘🍘🍘🍘
     FUNKASO 

Dafarko a tankade fulawa tareda alkama sai a kawo yest da sugar da dan gishiri da mai kadan sai a kwaba akaishi rana idan yatashi sai a dauko a juya sosai sai aringa gutsora ana fafadashi ana huda tsakiyarsa sai aringa sawa acikin mai mai xafi ana soyawa kada yayi baki anfisan jan soya🍘
   
 
🍪🍪🍪🍪🍪
    SUNASUR 

Shinkafar tuwu ajikata a wanke akai markade idan ankawo markade sai a xuba yeast kadan axuba powder da sugar kadan a rufe akai rana yatashi idan yatashi sai a kawo ruwan kanwa kadan azuba sai a dura kaskon suyar sunasir a wuta idan yayi xafi sai a shafa mai kadan a kaskon sai a ringa diban kullin a na xubawa kamar wainar fulawa sai a rufe idan yayi sai ki samo takada ki ringa tarawa akai🍪
  
🍮🍮🍮🍮🍮
      ALALA 

Attaruhu
Albasa
Tattasai
Manja 
Man gyada 
Gishiri maggi
Corry
Kwai
Alayyahu
Dafarko xaki wanke wake ki xoba albasa attaruhu tatasai akai markade idan ankawo saiki jajaga attaruhu ki sake xubawa ki yanka albasa kanana ki xoba ki dafa kwai ki yankashi kanana kixuba kisa maggi gishiri corry manja da man gyada idan kinasan alayyahu ki yankashi kanana ki xuba sai a kulla a dafa🍮 

  🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤
     KOSAI 

Dafarko a wanke wake a xuba attaruhu albasa tatasai akai markade idan ankawo sai kisa farin maggi da gishiri da fulawa da kwai sai a buga sosai sai a dura mai a wuta a fara soya🍤

        FANKE
Fulawa yeast  sugar atankade fulawa sai axuba yeast da sugar da dan gishiri sai a kaishi rana adan yatashi sai a dura mai a wuta a ringa cira a na soyawa
[9:52PM, 4/26/2017] ‪+234 906 097 2894‬: Peppered sweet potatoes

Ingredients:
Sweet potatoes(peeled and cut into wedges)
4 chillies
2 tomatoes
1 onion
1 teaspoon paprika/curry
1 teaspoon cayenne paper
1 tblespoon soysauce
5 tblspoons oil
Chopped parsley
Salt

Method
Boil sweet potato wedges and set aside.Mix all the other ingredients together and toss with the potatoes.Transfer to an oven dish and bake for 20mins.

Note:
As we all knw cooking is very flexible👌🏻i baked mine without microwave without per boiling😋,u can try ur own trick too😎.
[9:53PM, 4/26/2017] ‪+234 906 097 2894‬: 🍛🍹MUKOYI GIRKI MATA GROUP 🍲🍛🍹

🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜🍲🍲🍲🍲🍲🍲🍲🍲🍲🍲🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚

         SHAPORD PIE

KAYAN HADI :

🍚 Dankalin turawa
🍚Madarar ruwa
🍚Dakakken nama
🍚Kabeji
🍚Bota
🍚Kwai
🍚Curry
🍚Maggi da gishiri

🍚Albasa 

YANDA AKE HADAWA :

   Ki samu nama mai kyau ki wanke ki dafa shi da kayan kamshi kada ki saka ruwa da yawa ki barshi ya tsotse ruwan sai ki kwashe ki nike ko ki daka naman ki ajiye a gefa sannan ki fere dankali ki tafasa shi idan ya dahu sosai, sai ki daka shi, amman kada yayi gudaji, sai ki zuba butter a cikin wannan dankalin sai kuma a zuba danyen kwai amman kada a gauraye shi, sai a dauko abin gashi, a shafa masa butter a jiki kadan, sai ki dinga debo, wannan dakakken dankalin kina zubawa a cikin gwangwani, sai ki dauko wannan madarar ruwan ki dinga zubawa akan kowane gwangwani, sai a sashi a cikin (oven) sai a koma dauko kabeji ki yanka shi ki wanke ki dada shi kisa gishiri, idan ya dahu, sai ki kwashe. 
  Sannan kuma ki dauko wannan dankalin na (oven) idan ya gasu, sai ki zuba a wani guri ki hada shi da wannan hadin kabeji da naman da kika daka ki hauye naman da kabeji ki dinga diban dankalin kina hadawa da wannan hadin nama mai kabeji kina ci 😋

💞GYARA FARJI 💞
Ki nemi man tafarnuwa
Man habba
Miski farin 

Ki kwaba su wajen daya kina inserting a FARJINKI yana Kore infection yasa wajen kamshi, yayi tighting dinki ya kuma sa wajen yayi laushi da taushi😃

💖MAGANIN KAIKAYIN GABA💖
A nemi hulba a dafa snn idan ya dan huce a xauna acIkI at least 30 mint,snn a Debi Wanda aka dafa a sa tsamiya a sha.

💞GYARAN NONO💞
Gero 
Alkama
Jar masara 
Farar shinkafa

💖sai ki gyara ki hadasu ,ki wanke ki shanyasu a rana su bushe,sai ki soya sama sama,sai ki juye  ki kai nika gaba daya,sai ki dinga diban cokali daya da Rabi kina sha da nono ko yoghurt mai kyauta,zaki yi mmk ydd zai canxa.

2💞 ko kuma kisami garin garin hulba ki tafasa sai ki rinka gasa su,idan kin gama sai ki sami man hulban ki shafa musu, wacce xatai yaye  xata rinka sha two weeks bf n after tayi yayen.

💖SANYI MAI SANYA FITAR RUWA DA KAIKAYI KO KURAJE💞

A nemi hulba ,man tafarnuwa, man Shanu,yayankabewa,a daka a hada a Kwana a wajen daya a dinga sakawa acikin shayi ana sha ko a abinci.

💖KA'ARI NI'IMA💞
Ki nemi ridin ki daka ki tankade ki nemi madara ta ruwa ki hada ki gauraya kisha👍

👍💖SAKA ME GIDA SUMBTU💞

Kisamu totuwar rake me tsafta ki busar da iya sauki hada da miski da kanunfari sauki hadasu waje daya ki dakasu ki samu garwashin wuta kina xuba garin kadan  kina tsuguno kibar hayaki ya ratsa gabanki sosai kisamu kamar 5minutes wannan hadin yana karawa mace dandanon jima'i sosai musamman idan kin kasance me ni'ima.

💞YANDA ZAKI ZAMA MAI NI'IMA KAMAR KORAWA💖

Ki samu sassaken baure ki dafa shi sai bayan ya dafu sai ki juye ruwan sai ki samu mazarkwaila da xuma da kanunfari da citta ki xuba acikin ki tafasa ki rinka sha safe da yamma hmmmmm sai angwada akan San na qwarai😃👍

  ✨YADDA XAKI HADA✨
Dabino kicireman kwallonshi saiki jika ki fereye dankali kiyanka kanan kixuba kijika maxarkwaila tajiku kixuba kiyanka kwakwa kanana kixuba saikiyi blending dinshi duka saiki tace kisaka a friadge yayi sanyi kiwuni kina sha..😃😃hhhhhhh rannan saikin bani lbr yanda zakiji sumbatu agurin oga😜. Idan kika jika dabino sai kiyi blending sai ki dafa zobo da bawon abarba da citta danye kadan da kanunfari sai ki tafasa ki tace ki sa mazarkwaila da zuma da nikakken dabino .ki yini kina sha yana da kyau Kisami kankana🍉🍉aya dabino da kokumba kihada akaimiki markade kitace kisanya a Frisch yayi Santo
Kisami Zuma da Madara peak kirinka shan Kofi daya dasafe daya darana daya da daddare zakisha mamaki zubar ni IMA zesaki dadi👍
Kisami kanumfari da man zaitun da miski kanumfarin zaki tisashi ki tankade kihada kikwaba kirinka matsi (Sa megida ihu)Kenyan
Kisami LALLE mekyau kitankade sosai kirinka matsi da Zuma akehadawa zaki matse GAM
Kidaka bagaruwa kitankade sosai kikwabata da Zuma mekyau zakijiki kamar ba ataba shiga jikinkiba GAM
Kirinkashan Zuma mekyau cokali ✌dasafe ✌dayamma idan zakikwamta kisha uku zata sauka mararki yarinka jinki zam zam dadi 
Sauran lakanin shine kirsa da styles wurin kwanciya shine cikon mallakar namiji shan magani ba kissa da styles yanajanyo bakinjini akiyaye. ABINDA  KESA  UWARGIDA NI'IMA  DAKU  KUMA  GAMSAR DA  MAIGIDA. RAKE KAYAN DADI😀
 hmmmmmm wani dadi sai a turaka ba sanya wannan hadin na manyan mata ne zallah😜
yar uwa ki nemi rake ki yanka shi kanana kanana kamar alawar yara😋😋😋 sai ki sashi a tukunya da ruwa ki jefa kanumfari bada yawa ba fa da yar cittar ki itama ba mai yawa ba sannan ki bare dabinon ki ki wanke ki zuba aciki sai ki dora kan wuta ya dahu sosai sai ki sauke ki kwashe raken nan da dabino di shanye ruwa kuma ki maida kan wuta ki cilla mazalkwaila a ciki sai ta narke sai ki sauke kisa a fridge ki wuni kina sha hmmmmmmm ba'a magana nidai nayi 😷 sai kun gwada kazu ba wata sirrin amma banda sokuwar mace fa👋👋👋. fiddo kenan😉 ***DAGA TASKAR KI GYARA DA KANKI** DABINO........1 Dabino da zuma da minannas da ganyen idon zakara,da garin asuwakin mata dana yayan zogale da mazarkwaila,sai ki zubasu a tukunya a tare da dabinon ki dafasu su dahu sosai,sai ki ajiye kullum kina cin dabino guda 7,yana ciko mace da kara mata ni,ima.2-Busashshen Dabino a dakeshi ya zama gari a tankade sai a daka bagaruwa ita ma tayi laushi a tankade a hadasu da garin dabinon asaka zuma da miski a curesu guri daya ki ajiye,duk lokacin da kike da bukata sai ki debi kadan ki manna a gabanki kamar da magrib don ya kama jikinki sosai,zaki matse kiyi dadi a gurin oga. 4-Dabino ki samu me laushi ki markadashi tare da kaninfari da danyar citta da kwakwa idan yayi laushi sai ki tace ki sha,dadinki dabanne a gurin oga,haka idan oga ne yasha dadinsa na musamman ne,don karin bayani  kinemi  group dina me suna 💙sirrin rike miji💚 ko kuma 📱0703907039649264📲5 SALAMTA KISHIYA
Yar uwa kada kiji an ce SALAMTA kishiya ki kama murna kin sami abin korar abokiyar zamanki, kiji tsoron Allah sanda zakiyi wannan hadin, ki sanya aranki zakiyi ne domin ki samo martaba daga gurin mijinki ba cutar da yar uwarki ba!
KAYAN HADI :
Garin icen Garafuni (kadan)
Garin Teduwa
Garin Bagaruwa
Nonon kurciya
Farin Miski
Man kadanya
Ki sami wadannan kayan ki hadesu guri guda ki kwabasu da dan kauri kiyi matsi da shi agabanki.
Tabbas yar uwa gabanki zai tsuke ya koma karami tamkar wata yar budurwa amma fa ki tanadi ruwan  -Yadda xaki gane a matse kike tsam kuma kina da ni'ima, tun daga yanayin yadda kike tafiya xaki ji a jikinki, sannan kuma baxa ki rika jin iska na fita a gabanki ba, idan kuma kina da ni'ima kullum xa kiji farjinki da danshi  ba a bushe kamas ba. 

2- dangane da ruwan da yake fitar miki a farji, idan ya kasance ruwa ne mai yauki mara wari to wannan ruwa ne na ni'ima idan kuma yana wari kuma yana fitowa kamar majina infection ne. 

3- idan kika fuskanci farjin ki yayi lakwaf kamar lalataccen tumaturi, abu na farko da xaki fara yi shi ne ki daina tsarki da ruwan sanyi sai na dumi, sannan kuma ki dafa bagaruwa da ganyen magarya ya xamana sune abin tsarkinki insha Allah xai gyaru ya dawo daidai. 

4- dangane da yawan saurin fushi, ki xamo mai juriya ba daga miji ya fada miki magana ki mayar masa ba, ki rika kokari kina danne xuciyarki, kuma ko a sallah ki rika rokar Allah ya kara miki hakuri da juriya ya hanaki sabawa mijinki, sannan a duk lokacin da kika ji fushin ya taso miki kije kiyi alwala kamar yadda manxon Allah ya fada mana a hadisi. 

5- maganin tumbi ki nemi sassaken gamji da jar kanwa ki dafa ki rika sha, insha Allah xai ragu, maganin nankarwa kuma ki samu man kadanya ki matsa masa lemon tsami da man xaitun ki rika shafawa xai bace 

6-  abinda yake kawo tusar gaba sune, yawo ba takalmi xama a kasa lokacin al'ada, shan ruwan sanyi, tsarki da ruwan sanyi, da kuma bude kama a lokacin sex da maigida da barin fanka a ko Ac a lokacin da ake yi su suke kawo haka maganin wannan matsalar shi ne a kiyaye abinda yake kawota, sannan a laxamci tsarki da ruwan dumi. 

7- inserting idan na turaren miski ne ana so ya shiga can ciki, amma indai na sauran abubuwa ne a barshi daga waje, sannan idan budurwace ba a so ta rika cusa abu cikin jikinta, yana bude farji har ma ga matan aure. 
wallahu a'alam ❤❤ TURARAN FARJI❤❤
Wannan hadin shi xaisa farji ya dunga kamshi a duk lokacin gabatar da jima'i    KAYAN HADI
- ANBUR
- MISKI
- GANYAN MAGARYA
- RIHATUL HUBBI
- MA'U MA'I ( MA'UL MIYAMI )
- Sai ki hada su waje daya ki tafasa su ki juye roba  ki kara ruwa ki xauna a ciki kamar 30 minute. Lokacin da xaki kwanta ki kama ruwa dashi ki shafa ruwan a gefen gabanki( FARJIN KI)  wannan shi xai hana mijin ki ya guje ki, ki xama tauraruwa a wajan sa kuma kamshi xai dunga tashi lokacin da kuke gabatar da ibadan aure "YAN UWA MU GWADA WANNAN SIRRIN YANA DA AMFANI. DAGA DAN UWANKU MUBARAKMJ 💙SIRRIN RIKE MIJI💚              << SIRRIN WANKA DA MIJI >>> wanka  tare da miji yana kara dankon soyayya tsakanin ma'aurata. Yawanci abin ga mata yake, saboda sun fi maza kunya. Uwargida ba maganar kunya a nan. Da kin lura da maigida zai shiga wanka, ki zauna kina kallon sa yayin  da yake shiri. Kar ki nuna masa tare za ku yi wankan, sai lokacin da zai Shiga ban daki kawai ki bi shi ku shiga tare, ki ce masa yau ni zan yi maka wanka. Da kun Shiga sai ki cire kayan ki duka za ki ga ya saki baki Yana kallon ki. Sannan ki juyo ki cire masa nasa kaya ko towel din. Toh yanzu fa aikin yake uwargida. Kama hannun sa za ki yi ki nufi guri wankan za ki ga ya biyo ki kamar rakumi. Abin zai fi ba da armashi idan shower ce, ki bude ta sannan ki tura shi ciki ya fara jika, tun a lokacin za ki ga bananar sa ta fara mikewa. Bayan ya jika ke ma sai ki jika jikin ki daga nan sai ki dauko sabulu ki fara murzawa a jikin sa ko'ina gaba da baya. Sannan ke ma ki ba   shi sabulu ki ce ya murza a jikin ki   ko'ina. Idan sabulu ya game jiki, a lokacin za ki ga bananar sa ta yi tsaye tana sama tana kasa kamar liman na tahiyar sallah. Shawarar da zan ba ki a nan uwargida ita ki yi wuf ki cafki maigida ki rungume shi ki hada jikin ki da nashi kuna cuda juna. Ki cuda bayan sa da hannun ki har zuwa duwawun sa kina kara matsa shi a jikin ki. Ki juya kisa bananar sa a jikin duwawun ki kina mulmula ta ki kama hannuwan sa ki dora a kan nonon ki ya cigaba da shafa maki su, yana cuda jikin ki. Sannan ki juyo ki kama bananar sa ki cigaba mulmula ta kina zura hannun ki wajen yan kwallayen sa kina cuda su har tsakankanin cinyoyinsa. Uwargida daga nan ya rage naki idan kina bukata ku wanke jiki ku fita, ida kuma shaawa ki duka ki kama bananar nan ki tura ta cikin rubin dadinki maigida ya cigaba da sukuwa. Uwargida ke za ki ban labari. Don wannan aikin sunansa manta uwa.NOTE 👉�👀 bawai nayi  wannan bayanin bane domin rashin kunya a  a nayine dominku acikinku akwai wadanda suke cewa idan anzo irin wannan bayanin ake faiyacemusu komai yanda zasu gane, ina  neman afuwa agurin duk wanda wannan bayanin ya batawa rai👌�  BA BOKA BA MALLAM GA WANI DAN SIRRI DAZAKI HADA DA KANKIKi dafa kanunfari idan ya dauko nuna saikizuba zumaa ciki, bayan kin sauke ki sami garin ridi kizuba kihada nonon shanu mara tsami ki gaurayaidan yayisanyi ki sha......sai naji daga gare ku............ki sami kanunfari da dabino ki jika sai suntsima saikirinka diban ruwan kinasa zuma da madarakina sha,duk abinda aka ji na yafe kar a fada min.........GYARA 3ta sami sassaken baure ta dafashi dakanumfari cittada lipton ta hada ta tafada sai ta tace ta sa afridgetarim ga sha tsimine wlhy yana da kyausosai GYARA 1,zaki samu garin zogale ne ki jika ki ringa shasau biyua rana. Kina tashi daga bacci kafin kici komaiki sharuwan zogale,sai kuma in zaki kwanta Yazamo nakarshe.Sai kuma in Kina infection ki ringa seat bathdashi GYARA 4Ki daka aya ki tankade sai ki samubushasshen dabinoshima ki dake shi, hade da mazarkwaila kihade su dagarin ayar. Ki sami nono ki rinka damawakina sha.AMFANIN TAFARNUWA GA MATA PART 1::::::*************************Idan mace tana ciwon mara ko ciwon ciki alokacin al'ada ko jinin yarikayi mata wasa, tasamu zuma cokali 5 tahada da man tafarnuwa cokali 2, in an hada sai tarika sha cokali 1 dasafe 1 da yamma,MATAR DA JINI YAKI DAUKE MATA tarika shan man tafarnuwa rabin karamin cokali sau 4 arana.RIGA KAFIN CIWON NONO GA WACCE TA HAIHU; Anacindabino guda 7 asha man tafarnuwa karamin cokali sau 1 arana kwana uku.DAUREWAR CIKIKO MARA BAYAN HAIHUWA; Asamu ruwa mai zafi kofi 1 azuba man tafarnuwa karamin cokali asha sau 1 kwana 3.YAWAN LALACEWAR CIKI KOYAWAN BARI; asamu kwan agwagwa asoya da man tafarnuwa abaiwa matar taci sau 2 arana kwana 7.TSAWON GASHI DA HANASHIKAKKARYEWA; Asamu man kwakwa ahada da man zaitun da man tafarnuwa arinka shafawa akai, amma man tafarnuwa 50% za,asa saurankuma 100&... Allah yasa mudace...zan kawo wasu da yarda Allah.Muhammadurrasulillah (saw) yace: lelle mace tana fuskantowa da fuskan sheitan (kirjin ta) kuma tana juya baya daga sheitan (duwawukan ta).... Saboda haka aka umarce ku da ku sa hijibi domin ku rufe wadannan ababe guda biyu.    Yaci gaba da cewa (maza) idan dayan ku yaga mace ta burge shi to ya koma ga iyalan sa haka ze cire masa abinda ke cikin ransa. To yan'uwa mata kuji tsoron  Allah ku dinga shigan mutunci domin wasu basu da matan  wasu kuwa matansu ba su da irin sirrin da Allah ya ba ki, wasu masu hakuri wasu marasa hakuri. Kinga idan kuka fiddo da wadannan abubuwa kuna yawo bisa titi ba karamin fitana kuke sanyawa yan'uwammu musulmi (maza) koma na yayan mu. Dibi yar'uwa yanda kuke yafa gyale azamanin nan  nonuwa waje duwawuka waje. Kuji tsoron Allah ku gyara. Yar'uwa idan kin samu wannan sako ki turawa masoyanki  mata don Allah dan darajar annabi (saw). Cikakkiyar masoyiyar  manzo Allah (saw) zata iya turawa karanci mata 5 idan ko ta kasa to ta sawa kanta alamar tambaya? Shin ta cika masoyiyar baban fadimatu (saw)‬: KARIN NI'IMA A AL'ADANCE A SAWWAKE KUMA A GARGAJIYANCE. BYsirrin riqe miji . GROUP ADMIN MUBARAKMJB. 1.Anaso mace tarinka gyara kanta tun tana gIdan iyayenta basai tayi aure ko kuma tazo yin aure kafin ta fara gyara kanta ba. Wasu da yawan yan mata idan sukaji ance su gyara kansu sai kaga sunayin abin har yana wuce gona da iri. Abun da ya kamata kina yi tun kafin kiyi aure aure shine. 1. TSARKI DA RUWAN ZAFI. Tsarki da ruwan dumi ba karamin taimakawa yakeyi ba wajen gyaran farji. Mata ku kiyaye tsarki da ruwan sanyi sabida ba karamin illa yakeyi ma mace ba. 2. GANYEN MAGARYA. Anaso mace ta dingayin tsarki da ganyen magarya idan da so samune ya zama shine permanent ruwan tsarkin ki shima ba karamin gyara farji yakeyi ba. 3. ZUMA. Anaso mace ta ringa shan zuma chokali daya d safe daya da daddare. Wannan yan taimakawa wajen dawo miki da ni'iman ki da ya fita yayin da kike jinin al'ada. 4. Anaso mace a sa'ilin da take cikin jinin al'adan ta ta rinka shan zuma chokali uku kullum da safe har tsawon kwanakin da zata gama al'adan ta. 5. A sa'ilin  da kika gama al'ada bayan kinyi wanka sai ki dan debi zuma kadan da hannun ki ki saka a bakin farjinki anaso kiyi hakan har na tsawon kwana uku. 6. MAN HABBATUS SAUDA. Zaki samu man habbatus sauda shima kirinka sha kina shafa a farjinki. 7 KANKANA DA MADARA. Anaso mace ta rinka shan kankana da madara a ko wani lokacin da ta gama al'adan ta. 8. KANKANA DA CUCUMBER. zaki yanka kankana da cucumber a sai ki hadasu kiyi blending kirinka a duk lokacin da kika samu halin yi. 9. MISKIL A'ISHA. Anaso mace ta samu miskil Aisha ki rinka sa kadan a  farjinki. Zaki koda kin wanke pants dinki wannan kamshin yanan a jikin shi. Yadan nan abubuwan dana lissafa suna da yawa irin wanda ya kama mace ta rinka yi kenan tun tana gaban iyayen ta. Da Allah mata a daina yawa chushe chushe ma farji yawan yin hakan ba karamin matsala yake jawo wa ba. AKWAI IRIN gyaran da akeyiwa amare wanda abun da akeyi musu bai kamata ayimusu. 💟💟💟 ELEVEN WAYS DA SISTER ZATABI DON SAMIN INGANTACCEN NI'IMA A JIKINTA💟💟💟
1.kunun zaqin dabino; xaki sami dabino mai kyau ki cire kwallayen ki tsabtace shi, sai ki jiqa har saiyayi taushi sossai saiki markada a blander,ki saka zuma ko shuga kadan da madarar ruwa,asa yayi sanyi sai ki sha
2. Yawan cin kwadon zogale da tumatir tare da dafaffen kwai
3. Yawan cin dabinon da bai bushe ba tare da shan ruwa yana taimakawa sossai
4. Ganyen idon zakara adakashi ana hadawa da man tafanuwa kadan da nono ko yogurt 
5. Yawan shan Lipton wanda yaji kanunfari,citta da na'ana'a(wannan bake ba har mai gida) yana kawo dumin jiki wa mace kuma ya kara ni'ima
6. Sister ki sami 'yayan zogale busheshe ki daka da dabino da cikwi ki dinga sha da nono zakiyi mamaki sossai
7. Ki dake ayar ki tare da dabino,kanunfari kina sha da nono hmmn.....
8. Ki samu alkamanki a niqo miki ita ki soya sama sama haryayi ja idan ki ka kusan gama period naki sai ki dama kaman salala da nono kisha sau uku(domin jinin na tafia da abubuwa dayawa)
9. Cucumber ki fere ki yanka tumatir dayawa albasa kadan dafaffen kwai da garin kuli zai baki ni'ima sossai sossai mussaman kici daf magrib
10. Zuma da garin habbatussauda mai kyau da man xaitun zatana sha table spoon biyu safe biyu yamma for 2wks 
11. Madarar ruwa gwangwani daya da kwai ki buga har sai ya daina kumfu asa 
MACE MAI NEMAN HAIHUWA 
Idan kina neman haihuwa ko kindade baki haihuba to Dr Mubarakmjb yace ki jarraba wayan nan magungunan da allah yy masa baiwarsu SIRRI NA DAYA 
Kisami garin hurmul ki dafa da ruwa kafin ya tafasa saiki sauke kisirka da ruwa daidai yanda zaki iya shiga ciki ki zauna har saiya huce kiyi kamar sau uku acikin wannan satin insha allah zaki samu ciki idan har lafiyarki qalau saboda abinda yake kawo matsalar mace bata samun ciki shine wani lokaci maniyyin namijin ne baya samun damar shiga mahaifarta saboda wasu matsaloli misali in azzakari yy kankanta baya shiga cenciki ko kuma kofar mahaifa bata buduwa lokacin saduwarku ko karancin maniyyin namiji ajikinsa in baya fitarda shi dayawa to wayan nan abubuwan suna hana mace samun ciki to in kina amfani wayan nan magungunan mahaifa zai ringa kasan cewa koda yaushe abude kuma zaki samu ciki da yarda allah 
SIRRI NA BIYU 
Kisami danyar gyada ki dakata kina shanta da ruwan zafi sau uku a rana in har kin sadu da mijinki saikinyi ciki da yardar allah 
SIRRI NA UKU 
Idan kikayi wankan haila aranar ki sadu da mijinki karki bari sai washegari don a ranar mahaifa tana kangaba nasa mun ciki 
SIRRI NA HUDU 
Kisami man ridi duk lokacin da zaki sadu da mijinki sai kishafa a mararki indai kikayi wannan in kinada rabon haihuwa aduniya to zaki sami ciki
SIRRI NA BIYAR
Ki sayi 🐇zomo a yanka ki gyara naman ki soya kici da mismillah ki kwanta da mijinki a ranarda kikaci naman insha allah zakiyi ciki 
SIRRI NA SHIDA
Kisami habbatus sauda kidakeshi kihada da manshanu ki kwaba idan zaki sadu da mijinki saiki lasa da yatsanki sau uku shima kofofi zasu bude
SIRRI NA BAKWAI
Yawan cikin danyen dankali na hausa kijuri cinsa shima
SIRRI NA TAKWAS
In zaki sadu da mijinki kiringa karanta astagafirillahil lazimil lazi la'ilaha illallahu wa atubu ilaihi zaki sami ciki kuma zaki haifi da mai albarka
SIRRI NA TARA
Kisami kwan agwagwa guda biyu ki soya shida man tafarnuwa dasafe zakici kafin kikarya shizaki fara sawa acikinki kiyi kwana biyar kinaci insha allah allah zai warware miki komeye zaki samu ciki 
Dan allah yar uwa kigwada wanda kikaga zaki iyayi san nan akula aringa yawaita kusantar maigida bawai adinga shan magani Kuma ana gudun miji ba to ta ina zaki sami cikin kuma kidinga kula idan azzakarinsa yana shiga a karkace inyashiga baya bin inda yakamata to zairinga zubarda maniyyinsa ne awani gurin ba a bakin mahaifaba wanda hakan
Na iyasawa adau tsawon lokaci ba a samu cikiba harma kiringa tinanin ko kinada matsala ne ALLAH YASA A DACE AMEEN YA TAIMAKEMU .
SABULUN WANKA GA MATA
****************************
Kasancewar da yawa an bukaci sake yin post akan wannan sabulun In shaa Allahu ga shi na sake post akai.

yin tsarki da sabulun wanka yana kawo wa mata matsala sosai, saboda irin sinadaran Chemicals din da ake hada sabulun yana da hatsari ne ga dan Adam, musamman ma mata (domin yakan kawo musu cancer of vagina).

Amma ga wata FA'IDA da zaku hada sabulu da kan ku domin yin wanka ko tsarki, kuma ba tare da ya kawo wata matsala ba kuma za'a iya amfani da shi cikin kwanciyar hankali, ba tare da wata damuwa ba, kuma bayan haka yana maganin yawancin cutukka na mata musamman na kaikaiyin gaba, da sauransu. Zaa iya samun  hadden sabulun a wajen mu 07039649264

Abubuwan da zaku nema.
• SABULUN ZAITUN
• MISKI
• BAGARUWA.
• MAN HULBA.

Da farko, za'a nemi sabulun Zaitun, amma fa wanda aka rubuta Zaplan a jikin kwalin (DOMIN YAFI KYAU), kada a ba ku marar kyau. idan kuma ba'a sameta ba ayi da ta kamfanin Hemani.

Sai a nemi Bagaruwa, a daka ta ta
daku, a zuba a roba sai a yanyanka sabulun zaitun din kanana-kanana a kan garin bagaruwan, a zuba Miskin a ciki a Kwaba shi da ruwan Hulba, a kwaba su sosai har sai ya yi kauri.

Sai a zuba a roba mai kyau a rufe, Sai a rika wanka da shi, kuma ana yin tsarki da shi.

Kwararru a fannin kiwon lafiya sun bayyana cewa irin wannan Sabulun ba shi da wani hadari ko ‘Side effect’ g  a mace, kuma zai kara tsuke mace, sannan ta rika kamshi da kuma karuwar ni’ima.

Sannan mazama zasu iya hada wannan sabulun su rika wanka da shi.

*ILLAR* *TSARKI* *DA* *RUWAN* *SANYI*😭😭😭😭🙆🏼
Ruwan sanyi yana sanyaya gaban mace, kuma yana kashe kwayoyin  halittar jikinta sannan ya kan daskarar da ni'imar mace kuma ya sanyata jikin ya kasance kullum a sanyaye🙍🏻🙍🏻🙍🏻
🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍


 *RUWAN* *ZAFI*
Yana sa mace ta kasance  da dumi a ko da yaushe kullum, yana amfani wajan kashe kwayoyin cututuka gaban mace, yana kuma amfani wajen narkar da ni'imar mace don haka mace dole sai ta Dave,
Wajen tsarki da ruwan zafi muddin kika rika kama ruwan da ruwan zafi, ina mai tabbatar miki baki da da matsala wajen gyaran gabanki kuma ni'imar ki kullum tana narkewa, 
Misali kamar kitse a baki danye ba'a narka shi ba, sannan da wanda aka narka nasan idan aka baki zabi, zaki dauki?? Wanda aka narkane zaki dauka,
🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍

*KOKUN* *SAN* *MACEN* *DA* *TAFI* *WACE* *MACE* *A* *KIN* *MATA*?
Macen mai amafani da ruwan zafi gurin tsarki daban take da mace mai amfani da ruwan sanyi

*Zuma

[8:52PM, 4/29/2017] ‪+234 906 097 2894‬: MUTEMAKI JUNA MATA ZALLAH🌹


Karin ni'ima da kashe kwayoyin cuta.


Kayan hadi:

👉🏽citta
👉🏽kanumfari
👉🏽sassaken baure
👉🏽zuma

Kizuba sassaqen baurenki cikin tukunyarki da ruwa da yawa har sae ruwan yakusa shanyewa sae ki sauke.
   Ki cire sassaken bauren sai kizuba Zuma da kanumfari da citta a cikin wannan ruwan na bauren.

Kuma anaso kanumfarin ya kasance mai yawa sannan sai ki sake mayar da tukunyar kan wuta har sai ya sake tafasa sannan ki sauke kitace✅


Sai ki dunga shan kofi 🍷🍷2 
Safe
Da 
Yamma
