[11:02PM, 5/14/2017] ‪+234 806 251 6471‬: 💄ADO DA KWALLIYA ONLINE💄
            *Part 1*
             *Topic*
💄 *Kayan kwalliya da bayanansu*💄
     Ayau zamu fara da lissafo kayan kwalliyar da ake buqata kafin asami kwalliya ta fiska mekyau da tsari kubiyoni Dan jin sunayensu da amfaninsu:
1) jagira
2) concealer
3)eye shadow
4)eye liner, gel liner
5)mascara
6)foundation
7)highlighter
8)contour
9)setting powder
10)finishing powder
11)lipstick, jambaki or lip glows
12)moisturizer, primer da kuma makeup setting spray
13)blush
14)Brushes set
15) Eye lashes
16)Brow gel
17)shimmer
18)Beauty blender sponge(BBS)
              Kubiyoni domin jin bayaninsu daya bayan daya.

       1) jagira wani nau'ine NA kayan kawalliya datake xuwa a maxubi kamar haka :
*tanaxuwa a yanayi na pencil da kaloli dabandaban ja, baqa, brown dadai sauransu
* tanazuwa amatsayin gari da ake dangwala da brush wajen zanata wato( gel liner)
        Ana amfanida it's wajen zana gira ma' ana bin  layin sama da qasa nagira dakuma cikeshi, sannan ana iya sawa asaman ido amatsayin eye liner sannan anasawa aqasan ido💄 amatsayin kwalli.

2)concealer: ana amfanida itane wajen gyara gira bayan anxanata da jagira kowani nau'i na jagirar Dan daidaita giran yabada shape me kyau, kuma ana amfanida ita  wajen boye tabo ko qurajena fuska, sannan ana gyara karkacewar eye liner da ita  asamn ido da ita, ana gyaran baki da ita in ansa jambaki yakarkace koyahaura saman bakin ko qasansa, sannan ana highlighting da ita. Tanaxuwa a nau'i kala kala 
* tanaxuwa nau'i kamr pencil
* tanazuwa a nau'i tube da kuma mazubi kamar na kwano ko faranti.💄

3)eye shadow wani nau'in kayan kwalliyane da ake amfanidashi wajan qawata kwalliya, anasashine a saman ido wani lokacin ma harqasan ido, kuma ana iya sashi a saman lebe (tsakiya) bayan anshafa kalar jambakin da akeso. Yanazuwa a masubi kala kala kamr haka:
* yanayi na pencil
*yanayi plate dayakexuwa kala kala dasauransu💄

4)eye liner da gel liner: suma sunaqawata kwalluyane taqara armashi, anasasune asamn ido bayan anshafa eye shadow, anakuma iya shafasu asaman ido koqasan ido sukadai. Sunaxuwa ayanayi kamr haka:
*maxubi kamr na tube 
* tanazuwa a nau'in gari da ake iya kawabawa.💄

5)mascara: ana amfani da itane wajen taxa gashin ido yatashi yai kyau, Rana xuwa a maxubi kamar na tube💄

6)foundation: wata hodace taruwa da akeshafawa a fuska tai kyau, tana xuwa amaxubi kala kala, wata meruwa, wata memaiqo.💄

7)highlighter: shima nau'ine na kayn kwalliya da make shafawa byn anshafa foundation, ana shafatane a Inda akeso abayyana a kwalliya kamr su goshi, qasn gira, qasn ido, gefen kunci, qasan hanci daqasan baki. Kuma tana xuwa a maxubi kala kala meruwa da megari, tana kamanceceniya da concealer.💄

8)contour/ bronzer: amfani da contour wajnen boye Inda ba aso yafito sosai akwalliy, amfani da contour tana qawata kwalliya sosai. Yanaxuwa amaxubi kala kala kamrna highlighter amatsayi cream ko gari.💄

9)setting powder: itace hodar da ake shafawa bayan dk kinshaf hoda me ruwa afuskarki  wato foundation. Amfaninta yanasa fuska tai kyau tai luwai luwai sannan tags and Duke wani gumi da maiqo na hodar foundation. Tanaxuwa amatsayin daskararriya kuma busashshiya( cake Powder), kokuma tagari. Akwai setting powder da make setting highlight da ita dakuma contour💄

10)finishing powder: hodace da ake amfanida da ita bayan angama shafa kowane nau in powder a fuska.💄

11) lipstick, jambaki and lip glows, anaahafasune abaki Dan shima yaqarawa kwalliya armashi. Kuma suna xuwa amaxubi kala kala

12) moisturizer, primer , makeup setting spray: anasahfasune afuska Karin ashafa komai daya danganci powder.💄
        
           💄 Kuma anafara anafara shafa moisturizer amafaninta shine hana tsattsafowar gumi  bayan anshafa  foundation, kuma tana hana zazzagowr foundation dawani sauran shade shade nakwalliyar.💄

           💄 primer kuma ana shafatane bayan anshafa moisturizer amfaninta tana Sa kwalliya ta Dade bata baciba, kuma takan hana chabewar kwalliya tahanyr yin gummi,sannan kuma primer nataimakawa wajen blending din foundation( dandabuwa) afuska.

       💄 shima makeup setting spray amfaninsu daya da primer.  

13)blusher: anashafashine a kunci bayan angama shafa dukwata hoda me ruwa da kuma bushashiya, ana shafashine a kunci, kuma yanaqara fito da kwalliya tai kyau sosai. Yana xuwa a launi kala kala pink, light brown dadai sauransu.💄

14)brushes : sudai brushes dinnan suna xuwa a set kuma suna xuwa a piece, kowane brush acikn set dinsa amfaninsa dabnne, ana amfani da brushes wajen shafa concealer, foundation, eye shadow, eye liner, blush dadaisauransu. Susuke taka mahimmiyar rawa wajnyin kwalliya tagani tafada. 💄

15) eye lashes (gameso): shidai eye lashes wani gashine da akeyinsa na ido da ake sawa akan ainihin gashin idon mutum, yana qarawa ido kyau acikin kwalliya.💄

16)Brow gel: wani Maine dayake zuwa awani Dan mazubi qarami da ake shafawa akan gashin gira takwanta tai luf luf musamman inkinada yawan gashin gira yanada kyau kidinga amfanidashi.💄

17)shimmer: Wata powder CE meqyalli da make shafawa akan karan hanci bayan angama highlighting nakan hancin. Tana qarawa kwalliya kyau💄   

18) Beauty blender sponge ( BBS) shine yake taimakawa wajen shafa foundation taiblending sosai tabi fata
   
        💄Wadannan sune kayan kwalliya ataqaice da mata Ke amfanidasu wajen yin kwalliya irin tazamani datahadada kwalliyar amare dakuma kwalliya ta zaman gida datazuwa gidan biki.💄

          💄kubiyini domin jin yadda ake amfanidasu daya bayan daya domin ado da kwalliya, muhadu a part 3.
               Authorised by MAMAN IMAN
09039622766
[12:02PM, 5/18/2017] ‪+234 906 097 2894‬: 🍔GIRKI ADON UWARGIDA🍔 

🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚🍚

🍛SHINKAFA DA WAKE DA SOURCE KO YAJI🍛

KAYAN HADI:

🍚SHINKAFA
🥓WAKE
🌶TATTASAI TARUGU DA ALBASA
🌶TONKAN HAUSA
⚪MAGGI DA GISHIRI
🎋CITTA DA TAFARNUWA


YADDA ZAKI HADA:


Zan Dora tukunya a wuta in zuba ruwa sai inrufe in gyara wakena idan ruwan yayi zafi in wanke wanken in zuba in sa kanwa kadan in rufe, sai in bashi lokaci idan yafara nuna in zuba maggi da gishiri in wanke shinkafa in zuba in juya su hade sai in basu lokaci  su nuna tare shi kenan nagama. Saiki daka yaji da citta da maggi ki soya mai da albasa shikenan sai ci, idan kuma da source ne zaki jajjaga tattasai tarugu albasa da citta kisoyasu kisa maggi aciki shi kenan an gama.

Admin

Girki adon uwargida
[12:02PM, 5/18/2017] ‪+234 906 097 2894‬: 🍔GIRKI ADON UWARGIDA🍔 123

🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕

🍝AWARAN INDOMIE🍝


KAYAN HADI:


🍝INDOMIE
🥚KWAI
🍣NAMA
🍙MAGGI GISHIRI
🌶TARUGU ALBASA
🍾MANGYADA
🌿CURRY

YADDA KAZI HADA:

zaki karya indominki  ki jikata da ruwan zafi, ki tafasa nama ki daka koyi blending dinsa, ki jajjaga tarugu da albasa, saki tsane indomin ki kizuba a roba ki zuba dakakken namanki ki zuba tarugu kisa maggi da gishiri harda curry, saiki fasa kwai aciki ki juya su hade ki kulla a Leda, saiki Dora tukunya a wuta ki sa daurin ledojin ki bashi lokaci. Idan ya nuna ki kwance a ledoji ki yayyanka kifasa kwai kisamasa curry da maggi kadan, saiki Dora kwanon suya ki zuba mangyada idan yayi zafi ki dinga dauko yankan indomie kina sakawa cikin kwai kina debowa kina sakawa a man suya har ki gama soyawa. 😋😋

🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕

        Admin
Hauwau y kangiwa

[12:02PM, 5/18/2017] ‪+234 906 097 2894‬: 🍔🍔🍔🍔🍔🍔🍔🍔🍔🍔

🍲GIRKI ADON UWARGIDA🍲

🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜

🥚MIYAR KWAI🥚

KAYAN HADI:

🌶TATTASAI TARUGU
🍣NAMA
🥚KWAI
🥓TAFARNUWA ALBASA
🌿CURRY CITTA
⚪GISHIRI MAGGI


YADDA ZAKI HADA:

Ki tafasa namanki ji daka, ki jajjaga tattasai tarugu albasa, ki zuba mangyada ki yanka albasa idan ya soyu ki zuba jajjagenki cikin mai, saiki fasa kwai ki sa curry ki daka tafarnuwa kidiba kisa a kwai, saiki zuba dakaken namanki cikin suya kayan miyan, idan ya soyu kisa maggi gishiri da citta ki sa ruwan kadan kamar cikin ludayin miya ki rufe zuwa 3 minutes, ki bude ki juya saiki zuba kwai kiyita juyawa harsu hade ki zuba curry da tafarnuwa ki kara  juya wa har yayi shikenan an gama. Anaci da shinkafa anaci da doya anaci da komi kikeso.

🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜🍜

      Admin 
Hauwau Yusuf k

07034321339
[12:02PM, 5/18/2017] ‪+234 906 097 2894‬: 🍔🍔🍔🍔🍔🍔🍔🍔🍔

🌯GIRKI ADON UWARGIDA🌯

🍘FANKE MAI NAMA DA SOURCE🍘


FILAWA
YEAST
GISHIRI
NAMA
MANGYADA

zaki tafasa namanki ki dakashi ki aje gefe, ki tankade filawar ki kisa gishiri kadan ki zuba dakaken namanki cikin filawa, saiki jika yeast ki zuba cikin filawa ki kwaba saiki kai arana ko wuri mai zafi, idan ya tashi ki Dora kwanon suya a wuta saiki dinga debowa kina sa a ruwan mai har ya soyu.


       🥘SOURCE🥘

TATTASAI
TARUGU
ALBASA
TAFARNUWA
MAGGI
GISHIRI
MANGYADA



Zaki jajjaga tattasai tarugu da albasa, ki Dora tukunya a wuta kisa mangyada ki yanka albasa idan ya soyu ki zuba jajjage, saiki jira ya soyu amma ki juya su saiki zuba maggi da GISHIRI, ki jajjaga tafarnuwa ki zuba ki bada lokaci kadan ki  sauki, saikici da fanken da aka soya mai nama.

       Admin
Hauwau Yusuf Kgw

     07034321339

🥓🥓🥓🥓🥓🥓🥓🥓🥓🥓

🥃LEMON TSAMIYA DA CUCUMBER🥃

KAYAN HADI:

🥓tsamiya
🥒cucumber
🍥Cotta
🍢kanun fari
◽sugar


YADDA ZAKI HADA:

Ki jiqa Tsamiya da kanun fari su jiga ki kwashe kunun fari, ki yayyanka cucumbers ki yanka citta ki zuba kanun farinda kika jiqa ki markada su wuri 1, saiki tace su ki murje Tsamiya ki tace ki hada wuri 1 ki sa sugar sai asaka a freezer yayi sanyi.

🥓🥓🥓🥓🥓🥓🥓🥓🥓🥓

APPTIZER COCONUT
Ingredients
Inibi
Abarba
Dabino
Madara
Kwakwa
🔹Za'ayi blending abarba da inibi, agyara dabinon ajika sai ayi blending nashi ahadasu waje daya, sai agoge kwakwar kanana asaka akai sai'asa madarar ruwa aciki anasha da cup nashan fruit salad.🍧🍧🍧

KOSAN PLANTAIN
Ingredients

Madara
Plantain ripe
🔹Xa'abare ayabar sai asaka ludayi adameta, sannan axuba madara cokali uku da flour cokali uku asaka ruwa kadan adamesu sosai ajuyeshi acikin ayabar, afasa kwai guda uku akada da dan gishiri axuba akai sai amotsa sosai gabadaya suhade, anaso yayi kauri kamar kullun kosai, xa'asoyashi da mai kamar yanda ake soya kosai, idan ya soyu xaiyi ja, anacinshi da kunu🍺 ko tea.☕ 😋😋😋😋


@admin
Shagalinku
Man'yan Mata


ORANGE JUICE🍋
🔹Lemon tsami dana xaki, amatsesu gaba daya, sai'atace, asaka garin strawberry da garin apple sai'asaka flavour na ruwa, sai'asa sugar dai dai yana bukatar sanyi kafin abawa mai gida.🍹🍹
Asha ruwa lafiya🍸🍸
@admin
Shagalinku
Man'yan Mata



RAMADAN MUBARAK🌙
[4:41PM, 26/06/2015] ‪+234 816 573 1614‬: SAVOURY SNACKS: by Teemah Abakwa.

CONTENT:
potato balls
Yam balls 
Meat balls
Flour balls 
Plantain balls
Chicken balls 
Rice balls
Indian balls
Spring rolls
Fish rolls
Meat rolls
Cabbage rolls
Sausage rolls
Casse role 

POTATO BALLS:
kayan hadi:
Dankali10
Nikakken nama
Albasa 1
Attarugu 2 
Kwai 2
Tafarnuwa 
Curry
Maggi 
Gishiri
Yadda ake yi:
A tafasa dankali a bubbuga shi yayi laushi tubus. Sai a yanka albasa da attarugu a ciki. A zuba nikakken nama da maggi da gishiri da  curry da tafarnuwa (idan ana bukatarta) a cakuda a hankali sai a dundunkula kamar kwallo (dai-dai girman da ake bukata.) 
A fasa kwai a kada, sai a rika tsoma cure-curen dankalin a ciki sannan a soya a ruwan mai.

YAM BALLS:
Kayan yadi:
Doya 1
Nikakken nama 
Kwai 4
Albasa 4
Attarugu 4
Mai 
Maggi 
Gishiri 
Curry 
Yadda ake yi : 
A dafa doya sannan a bubbuga ta tayi laushi sai a hada ta da nikakken nama, a yanka albasa da attarugu, a zuba maggi, curry da gishiri. A motsa sosai sannan a rika curawa kamar kwallo, sai a tsoma a cikin ruwan kwai sannan a soya a mai.
Idan ana bukata, ana iya saka kifi a maimakon nama. 

MEAT BALLS
Kayan hadi: 
Nikakken nama 
Albasa 
Attarugu
Kwai
Mai 
Tafarnuwa
Garin busasshen buredi yadda ake yi : 
A hada nikakken nama ko dakakken nama da yankarkiyar albasa a kuma yanka attarugu, tafarnuwa, maggi, gishiri, a cakuda sosai. Sai a fasa kwai daya a ciki,  a sake cakudawa sai a cura kamar kwallo a saka a ruwan kwai, sannan a barbade da garin busasshen burodi sai a soya a mai.

FLOUR BALLS
kayan hadi: 
Filawa kofi 2
Kifin gwangwani 1 
Albasa1
Attarugu 2
Yeast karamin cokali 1
Mai
Kayan kanshi
Gishiri 
Maggi 
Yadda ake yi : 
A zuba yeast cikin ruwan dumi, sannan a hankali a  rika zuba filawa ana motsawa, sai a rufe a sa a rana kamar awa 4.
Idan ta kumbura sosai, sai a zuba kifi gwangwani 1,  a yanka albasa da attarugu, a zuba maggi, gishiri da kayan kanshi a motsa sosai,  sai a rika zubawa a cikin ruwan mai ana soyawa, ana iya zubawa da cokali ko da hannu yadda dai zai zama kamar kwallo. 

PLANTAIN BALLS
Kayan hadi: 
Filawa kofi 1 da rabi
Sikari kofi 1 da kwata 
Bakar hoda cokali biyu
Madara kofi daya da rabi
Kwai 1
Plaintain nunanne 1
Mai
Yadda ake yi: 
A bare a yan-yanka plantain kanana, a hada da kwai da sikari, da filawa, da bakar hoda da madara, a juya a hankali su hadu, kada a kada. Sai a rika diba da cokali ana soyawa a ruwan mai. Idan bari daya ya soyu, sai a juya daya barin. 

CHICKEN BALLS 
Kayan hadi : 
Kaza1
Dankali 1
Albasa 2
Tumatur 1
Tattasai 1
Attarugu 2
Kwai 2
Mai
Maggi
Gishiri 
Curry 
Yadda ake yi:
 A tafasa kaza, a cire kashin a zuba tsokar a kwano, a hada da dakakken dankali(tafasasshe) a yanka albasa, tumatur, attarugu da tattasai a hada da maggi, gishiri da kayan kanshi duk a motsa tare da kwai, sai a cuccura a soya a ruwan mai. 

RICE BALLS
Kayan hadi:
Shinkafa                       
Nama 
Kwai 
Kayan miya 
KO 
shinkafa
Sikari 
Kwa- kwa 
Kwai 
Yadda ake yi:
A tafasa shinkafa da ruwa ta dahu sosai, a bari ta huce sai a juye a babban kwano, a fasa kwai a zuba a motsa, idan tayi ruwa-ruwa, sai a zuba filawa kadan domin yayi kauri, a yanka kayan miya kadan a zuba maggi da gishiri a cuccura a soya a ruwan mai. 
Idan kuma mai zaki ake so, sai a zubawa shinkafa sikari da kwakwa (gurzarza) a cuccura a soya a mai.

INDIAN BALLS
Kayan hadi: 
Dankali 10
Nama 
Na'a-na'a 
Garin biredi
Mai
Albasa 1
Tattasai 1
Attarugu 1
Gishiri
Maggi
Kayan kanshi 
Yadda ake yi :
A hada tafasasshen nama da tafasasshen dankali a markada a blender, a zuba na'a-na'a, maggi, gishiri da kayan kanshi, a kuma yanka kayan miya a hada su sosai sai a rika dunkulawa ana sawa a cikin garin biredi kafin a soya a ruwan mai. 

SPRING ROOLS
Kayan hadi :
Kabeji 1/6
Karas 2
Albasa 1 
Filawa kofi 2
Kwai 2
Nikakken nama 
Mai
Maggi
Gishiri 
Curry 
Buroshi( irin na cikin kayan girki)
Yadda ake yi:
A yanyanka kabeji da albasa da karas a soya sama-sama tare da mai cokali daya, a zuba nikakken ko dakakken nama, maggi, gishiri da curry sai a sauke daga kan wuta.
A hada filawa, kwai, maggi, gishiri da ruwa a kwaba,yayi kamar kaurin koko. A shafa mai a cikin kwanon tuya sai a shafa filawa da brushin fenti, bayan minti 1 sai a cire daga kan wuta, a zuba hadin kabeji rabin cokali sai a nade (kamar nadin tabarma) a soya a mai.

FISH ROLLS 
kayan hadi: 
Kifi 3
Filawa kofi 2
Sukari 1/3
Kwai 2 
Hoda karamin cokali 1
Albasa 2
Butter cokali 1
Maggi
Gishiri 
Yadda ake yi:
A gyara kifi, a cire kayar sosai sai a soya sama-sama , a zuba albasa, gishiri da maggi.
A kwaba filawa, sikari, hoda, butter, kwai da ruwa. Idan ta kwabu sosai, sai a mirza a bayan faranti ko da injin taliya, sai a zuba cokali guda na kifi a cikin kowanne yankan filawa a nannade (kamar nadin tabarma) a soya a ruwan mai .

MEAT ROLLS
Kayan hadi : 
Filawa kofi 2
Hoda karamin cokali 1
Madara cokali 1
Nikakken nama
Kwai 2
Albasa 2
Tumatur 1
Attarugu 2
Maggi
Gishiri 
Mai 
Kayan kanshi
Yadda ake yi: 
A yanka tumatur, attarugu da albasa a soya su sama-sama, a zuba maggi,gishiri da kayan kanshi. Bayan minti biyar sai a hade da dakakken ko nikakken nama su kara minti biyu.
A kwaba filawa, hoda, madara, kwai, gishiri kadan da ruwan (kamar meat pie) a mirza filawa, a zuba cokali biyu na hadin nama sai a nade kamar nadin tabarma a soya da ruwan mai.

CABBAGE ROOLS 
Kayan hadi:
Kabeji 1
Albasa 2
Attarugu 2
Kwai 2
Nikakken nama 
Tumatur 1
Tattasai 1
Maggi
Gishiri 
Kayan kanshi
Mai 
Yadda ake yi:
Ayi dai-dai da kabeji, a wanke, a tafasa shi da gishiri kamar minti biyar.
A soya albasa, attarugu, tattasai da tumatur tare da nikakken nama, a zuba maggi, gishiri da kayan kanshi. Bayan minti biyar sai a fasa kwai a zuba a ciki a juya sosai sai a sauke daga kan wuta. A nada nadin nama yayi kamar tsawon karas sai a nade kowanne daya a cikin ganyen kabeji. A zuba duka wadanda aka nade da kabejin a tukunya tare da ruwan nama, a barsu kan wuta kamar minti biyar zuwa goma.

SAUSAGE ROOLS
Kayan hadi : 
Nama kilo 1
Kwai 2
Garin busasshen biredi kofi 1
Albasa2
Attarugu 2
Maggi 
Gishiri
Kayan kanshi
Yadda ake yi 
A nika ko a markada danyen nama, a yanka albasa da attarugu, a zuba maggi, gishiri da kayan kanshi. A fasa kwai a zuba  a cakuda sosai sannan a nannada naman, a barbade shi da garin biredin. 
A shafa mai a farantin gashi (baking tray) a dora naman a saka a obin (oven) har se ya gasu.

CASSE ROLE
Kayan hadi :
Dankali 10 
Nikakken nama
Kwai 4
Albasa 2
Tattasai 2
Attarugu 2
Tumatur 2
Maggi
Gishiri
Yadda ake yi:
 A dafa dankali sai a yanyankashi siffar kwabo, a kuma yanka kayan miya suma irin siffar yankan dankalin.
A shafa mai a faratin gashi a zagaye shi da dankali, a sake zagaye dankali da tumatur, sai sauran kayan miyar, sannan kuma a rufe su da nikakken nama, sai a maimaita zagayen da kuma rufewa da nama har sau uku kuma naman ne a sama sannan a fasa kwai a zuba a saman naman a saka a obin (oven) a gasa.

Anan muka kawo karshen savoury snacks wanda yazo muku daga wajen yaruwarku , kawarku , kanwarku wato Aisha Ubandoma  da fatan za'a yi amfani dasu kuma a gwada .

YADDA AKE DAHUWAR ALALEN AZUMI

@Admin. Hisham
26/06/2015
#abu-ayyash
07035878684



Barkanmu da azumi uwargida tare da fatan alkairi. Yaya ibada? Allah ya yi mana jagora, ameen.
Akwai hanyoyi da dama wanda ake dafa alale amma ina so na tabbatar muku da cewa wannan irin salon dahuwar alalen daban yake da kowane irin alale. A yau na kawo muku yadda ake dahuwar alalen azumi. Kamar kullum nakan ba da shawara ga uwargida a kan cewa ya kamata ta san irin yadda ake nau'ukan girke-girke don haka ne na kawo muku irin wannan salon girkin. 

ABUBUWAN DA ZA A BUKATA
1- Tattasai 
2- Albasa
3- Kori da Magi
4- Hanta
5- Dafaffen kwai
6- Dankalin Turawa
7- Attaruhu
8- Bota 
9- Danyen kwai

           HADI
Bayan uwargida ta wanke wakenta ta cire kowa, ya fita tsaf, sai ta wanke tattasai da albasa da attaruhu ta zuba a kan wankakken waken sannan ta kai a markada mata. Ta zuba a cikin kullin. Sannan ta fasa danyen kwai kamar uku ta zuba ta kwaba sosai. Ta kuma narkar da bota leda daya ta zuba. A zuba magi da gishiri a ruwan zafi kadan a kwaba sosai su kwabu da kori. 
    Kafin nan ta riga ta tafasa dankalin turawa da kwai kuma ta yayyanka attaruhu attaruhu kanana. Bayan sun dahu, sai ta yayyankasu kanana.
     Ta fitar da farantin cikin 'oven' dinta. Sannan ta shimfida 'foil paper' a kan farantin sannan ta zuba kullin akan. Bayan haka, sai ta yaryada yankakken dafaffen kwan nan da hanta da attaruhu a kan kullun. Sannan sai ta mayar da tiren a cikin 'oven' ta gasa na tsawon mintuna goma sha biyar. 
       Sai ta ciro shi sannan ta nade shi kamar yadda ake tabarma sannan ta yanka kanana.

Wayyo garin dadi na nesa 😋😋😋😋😋😋
Taken girkin nan shine. Sa maigida dalalar yawu😤😂



@ADM. Hisham

🍺🍺kunun gyada na farar shinkafa🍺🍡🍡
Shinkafa fara 
Gyada
Sugar
Tsami
Madara
                 Dafarko zaki tanadi gyadarki ta kunu saiki sa ruwa kidameta kitace kidora ruwan a wuta kibarshi ya tausa. Saiki samu shinkafarki wadda aka markadomiki itama kitace saiki aje idan gyadarki tayi saiki zuba kullun shinkafar kidama daidai kaurin da kikeso saiki sauke zakiga tayi faritas saikisa sugar,madara  da tsami inkinaso sai kisha🍺🍺🍺🍺

🍺🍺🍺kunun gyada na tamba🍺🍺🍺
Tamba
Gyada
Sugar
Tsami
Ki gyara tambarki kisa kayan kamshi a nukomiki ita saiki tankade ki aje,saiki dora damammiyar gyadarki awuta kirufe ta tafasa saiki dama tambarki daruwa saikisa tsami kadan saiki dauko gyadarki ta wuta ki juye a kan tambarki kidama saiki sa sugar

🍜🍜🍜🍜miyar cucumber🍜🍜
Kwai 
K/miya
Maggi
Carrot
Mai/bota
Hanta
Cucumber
Tafarnuwa
    Dafarko zaki yanka k/miya kiyanka albasa saikisa abun suya saikisa mai ko bota saikisa albasa kadan kisa yankakken hantarki aciki bayan kintafasa saki zuba k/miya kisa maggi,inya yi saiki sa carrot dinki da tafarnuwa kijuya saiki sa cucumber da kika yanka da albasa basai cucumber yayi luguf ba saiki sauke kiyanka dafaffen kwai a ciki. Anacinta da taliya,shinkafa,cuscus, ko bira bisko.
Kigwada kigani.

Kwai

Mai

*_RAMADAN KAREEM_*
_Asallamu alaikum barkamu da shiga cikin wannan watan Mai albarka da fatan duk kun cikin koshin lfy(Amin)._
_A wannan watan mai albarka zamu koya muku yanda ake amfani da madara wajen hada wau'ikan abinci ire-ire da Kuma wasu kallalin girkin ku dani domin a ko da yaushe domin Jin wadanan girke-girken._ 
🍹🍹🍹🍹🍹🍹
*_TENGIRIN AND PENAPPLE JUICE._*
_Tengirin._
_Abarba._
_Na'ana'a._
_Sugar._
*_PROCEDURES;_*
_Zaki bare tangirin da Abarba a blander ki markadasu har sai sunyi laushi sosai sannanki juye a jug ki saka sugar da na'ana'a ki rufe,Ana so na'ana'an ya jiku Kuma guda gudansa Zaki saka._
🍲🍲🍲🍲🍲🍲
*_POTATO SOUP_*
_INGREDIENTS;_
_Fish._
_Potatoes._
_Carrot._
_Salt._
_Maggi._
_Butter._
_Onion._
_Pepper._
*_PROCEDURES;_*
_Zaki wanke kifin saidin a saka a tukunya kisa Maggi,salt da albasa ki rufe sai a daura a wuta,a kankare  carrot a wanke,a feraye dankali a wanke sannan a yanka da carrots kanana a zuba a cikin kifin._
_Ki wanke pepper da onion Ki yanka a zuba a ciki su dahu suyi laushi sannan Ki sauke, Ki saka mixer Ki farfasa yayi laushi sosai ko Kuma Ki zuba a blender ki markadesu._
_Ki Sami mazubi mai zirfi ki zuba ki sa butter kadan sai a Sha ko Kuma a ci da biredi._
*_HEALTH TIPS._*
🤒🤒🤒🤒🤒🤒
_BENEFITS OF BANANA._
_1:Protect your heart._
_2:Strengthen bones._
_3:Control blood pressure._
_4:Block diarrhea._

   AMARYA KI SANI; kamar yadda mutane suke Kai mamaci cikin kabari su tafi su barshi cikin kabarinsa haka iyaye suke Mai amarya su tafi su barta cikin dakin aurenta.
  Amarya ki natsu, gabanki ya daina faduwa saboda mijinki ba Mai cutarwa bane, farin ciki yazo miki dashi, Wanda yake maida budurwa ta koma uwa bayan lokacin kadan.

     ◦WAYAYYAR MACE GIDAN MIJINKI ◦

wayayyun Mata kanana ko manya, kishi dasu yana da wahala. Idan mace ita ba wayya bace ko in ce idan bata dage ba, domin kwace Mata miji ba wuya zai yi ba, saboda wayayyar mace ba ta jij kunya ko girman kan yiwa mijinta duk Abu na farantawa saboda haka amarya ki zama wayayyar mace.
IDAN AKA SAMU WAYAYYAR YARINYA TUNI ZATA DANNE MANYA MATA A GURIN MIJI.
  haka ma babbar mace wayayya kishi da ita yana da wahala, Domin tana gyara jikinta tana kuma tattalin mijinta, abinda zai sawa abokiyar zamanta tunanin wai me wance takewa oga ne yake irin sannan rawar jikin ?
  Ko wata kasar zashi da ita yake tafiya, don Allah kema zama wayayya a gurin mijinki.

*_MATATA BATA DA NI'IMA, INA SHAN WAHALA DUK SANDA ZAN SADU DA ITA BAYAN BA BUDURWA BACE_*

babbar magana ance da makasau bawa, domin dai duk matar dake da wannan matsakar lallai auranta yana cikin lilo domin ni'imar mace itace ke baiwa maigida nishadin kusantarta amma in dai jiki baki da ni'ima to kuwa idan ya dosoki da bukata ki tabbatar matsuwa ce, irin haka ne ke sanyawa kina ji kina
gani namiji ya dinga miki satar kwana, mai tsananin kaunar ki ne zai furta miki wanda yaga kuwa ba zai iya ba yayi ta kyara da hantararki karshe ma ki ga ya sake ki babu laifin tsaye babu na zaune.

*_YA KAMATA MA'AURATA INDA KUNA DA MATSALA SAI KU NEMA SHAWARA GA MASANA RASHIN NI'IMA_*

*_shike sanya mace duk sanda mijinta zai kusance ta sai ya sha wahala kafin mazakutarsa ta shiga farjinta ba wai matsuwa ba ce, a'a akwai masu irin wannan halittar ta matsuwar amman kuma ai da ni'ima ba a shan wahala duk sanda za'a kusance su, don haka yar'uwa da kin jiki kandas sai ki sani da akwai damuwa ga maigida._*

Amman akwai wacce zaki ji tana cewa, ai ni idan ina tafiya ma ruwa har bi na
yake yi, to ki tambaye ta wane irin ne ruwan, don wasu fa ruwan karancin
wasu sindarai ne a jikinsu wanda fa ruwan karancin wasu sinadarai ne a jikinsu wanda bature ke kira da minerals kamar vitamin C , vitamin E , zine arginene, fotic acid, vitamin B1, 2 , 3 and B3 da dai sauransu ne, wasu kuma ruwa mai wari na ciwon sanyi gonorrhea- sai ace wai ni'ima akwai cikakken bayaninsu a shafin mata don haka ga macen dake da wannan matsalar ga abubuwan da zata dinga yi domin samun wadatuwar ni'ima a jikinta kamar haka.

                *_❀ HADIN NI'IMA ❀_*

_aya_
_dabino_
_mazarkwaila_
_hakin daka_
_madara ko nono mai kyau_

*YANDA AKE YI ZAKI*

sami ayarki ki tsinceta tas sannan ki wanke ki shanya, idan ta bushe sai
ki zuba a turmi ki dakata lukwi, ki na dakawa kina tankadewa da rariya mai
laushi, sanya amarya kuka sai ki daka dabinonki da cukwi da mazar kwaila da
hakin daka lukwi ki hada da dakakkiyar ayarki guri guda, ki sami mazubi na
roba mai kyau mai murfi ki zuba, duk sanda zaki dinga sha sai kisa madara
peak ko kuma fresh milk danyen nono ko yoghurt me kyau, ba a bawa yaro
mai kiwa.
*▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒*

             *_■ HADIN NI'IMA 2 ■_*

❍ aya
❍ dabino
❍ tafarnuwa
❍ sugar da madara

YADDA AKEYI

zaki sami ayarki ki jika ta ta jiku sannan ki surfata, ki jika dabinon ki shi ma
ya jiku sosai sai a markada da dan blander ko kuma a markado a inji amman kice sai an gama nikan gero sannan za'a nika miki don kada a nika a kan kayan miya don kada yayi yaji, sai ki zuba garin tafarnuwa a kai sai ki hada
da madara ko nono idan da hali a saka a firji yayi sanyi ko kuma a sanya kankara a kai a sha ba a bawa yaro.

YANDA AKEYI

zaki sami gwandarki da kankanarki da abarba da ayaba ki yayyanka gwitsi
-gwitsi kamar kan kuda ' inji yara- sai ki bare bayan lemon zaki ki shima har
da wannan farar fatar ki cire kwallayen suma sauran ki ciccire kwallayen sai ki
hada su guri daya ki kara ruwan kadan kisa sukari kadan idan kina da firji kisa
a ciki idan kuma babu ki sak kankara akai ki ajiye shi narke sai ki tsiyaya
ruwan zaki ga ya zama mai kauri kitib ki dinga sha zaki iya hadawa da
yangudaddajin ma.

YADDA AKEYI

za'a sami dabino a shanya shi ya bushe sai a cire kwallon a dakashi lukwi,
sannan a saka dakakkan garin janunfari a hada a kurfa guri daya sai a dinga
zuba cokali uku ana hadawa da madara shanu ana sha safe da yamma cokali
uku uku kullum tsahon sato guda.

YANDA AKE HADAWA

a sami rake a nikashi a blander ko kuma a saka cikin tirmi mai kyau a daka a
fitar da ruwan jiki, a zuba zuma mai kyau a kan ruwan raken a saka garin
tafarnuwa kadan a zuba garin kanunfari rabin cokali a hada a dinga sha akwai
saukar da ni'ima.

RABE RABEN MATA 3

 21. Excessive secretions na Oestrogen and progestreron
Wannan mace dadi kan dadi ce domin Allah yayi halitta anan ita niimarta har da ta rabawa domin wannan homonea din da suke kula da ciki ita nata masha Allah aiki suke ba dare ba rana kamar mai ciki take saboda haka miji na matukar sonta don ta hada sifofi da daman gaske har da na warm blooded domin tana da dumi har kasan ta
Sai dai da wuya take daukan ciki domin hormonse din yayi yawa yana sakar mata da ruwan nono wannan kuma ruwan nonon yana hanata haihuwa
Ya kukaga macen da take da karamin ciki wajen niima da kuma zanzan

 22 Biconute Uterus
Wato mahaifa biyu
Ita ma tana da matukar dadi domin very sexy take don mahaifa biyu gareta so cells din da ke sakar mata da niima aiki sukyi ba dare ba rana 
Abu biyu ne ya hadu wajen daya tana da dadi matuka komai masha Allah 
Amma itama bata haihuwa saboda ya sabama nature

 24. Biconuate Cervix 
Mai cervix biyu sarkin dadi kenan domin maza suna son suji sun taba cex idan suna harka 
To nata biyu ne ya taba nan ya taba chan tana kartar shi yana dada shiga duniyar dadi har kwakwalwarsa yake ji domin ta sosa masa gaba amma kash ita idan ma ta haihu sai dai ayi mata cs don fito da yaron domin duk cervix zasu bude wannane yaro zai fito a ciki

 23. SEXY EYE
Mai ido dishi dishi
Ita wannnan kullum a tsananin shaaawa take idan namiji ya kalli idonta takan zama fitinace ga alumma
Tana hada idon da namiji take jikashi kuma tajika kanta
Ba wuya miji ya kaisu kasa harka kan masha Allah 
Amma dole ta rufe ido da niqabi domin suna hada ido da namijin da ba nata ba ko waye hmmm yasan sauran

 25. Absence of Sensational chemoreceptors

Ita wannan Allah ya mata Halitta ta ko ina tana da gata macece ta sosai
Amma abin tausayi sai anyo da gaske tukunnan zaa iya taimakonta don ita bata san meye dadin sex ba komai zaki mata 
Baza taji dadin sex ba
Amma fa shi gogan naka yana matukar ji kamar ya suma don dadi amma ita sai dai ya bata wahala balle tasan wani abu releasing saboda dan sako da yake mata dadi zuwa kwakwalwa babu irinsu sai dai su dinga yaudarar maza akan suna ji amma basu ji

 26. Adulterated Vaginal fliud
Mai tsarki da sabulu
Ita wannan duk sai ta wanke dadi take zuwa mishi baya samun komai idan taje 
Ya zama kin cikawa miya ruwa yayi salam babu tastse shi yasa baza mu taba rabuwa da infection domin sabulu yana kashe normal floran mu yasa mu zama salam sai maneji kawai
Bai kamata mu cire wannan sweat smell din da yake sa wasu jin dadi ba
Wani namijin shi yasa yake tsotsan wajen domin jin wannan warin wajen ne ke tada musu da hankali don kuwa ba zuma bane a wajen amma meyasa suke rudewa suke shan wajen a rikice kamar zuma?
Wani kuma idan yasa yatsa sai ya shinshina kafin ya dada hau kacewa

 27. Mai wanka da Ruwan zafi sosai lokacin Barci shi ruwan zafi yana kone ruwan jikin mace lokacin bacci
Idan kikayi wanka da irin wannan ruwan ko kinje babu wata harkar dadi da zaayi sai dai maneji
Saboda kin kone duk wani niima da danshin na jikinki
A yi hattara wankan dar ba ruwa mai zafi sosai ba

 28. Minute Vagina
Ita wannan farjin nata ne karami sosai wanda da kyar take daukar miji
Baya shiga sosai domin Pns din tashi tayiwa Wajen girma
Yana shi abar tana fita
Tsawon vaginal orifice 3to 5 cm depth ne kowacce da tsawonta
Mara tsawo ta dinga bawa mijin wahala kenan idan akanyi rashin saa aka samu namiji mai tsawon 6inc ya kuke gani
Wannan macen Allah yayi mata baiwa domin rings dinta barobaro auke sun zanu sosai tana rikeshi gam amma yana yi yana dan fita lokaci lokaci
Ana matukar so ayi amma sai dai ayi a hankali domin ya fi karfinta
Sai a slow

 29. Wide Vaginal Orifice ce Wato abude take kamar kofar gari
Ita wannan halitta ce ko da bata san namiji ba Miji yana Fasa wannan tantanin budurcin shikenan ta bude wagaga ko da kuwa bata haihu ba zakuga cikinta a sake
Amma wani ikon Allah shine tana da dadi sosai
Idan ta samu miji mai 6ince shi kenan ta dace da daidai ita 
Idan kuma bata samu daidai ita ba still tana da dadi don wani irin shocking take masa wani baya damuwa amma wani kan yana damuwa lalle irinsu suna samun maca da izinkn Allah zai saita su
Maca for Sexual Health ne so duk wacce take da damuwa na Sex wise ko wani iri je yana taimaka mata sosai sosai saboda haka ku nemi maca ya baku mamaki

 30. Clitorial Penile
Ita wannnan clitoris dinta katone sosai
Miji bata bukatar wasa samsamsam daga wajenshi tana hada ido da shi nanan da nan ta narke har kasa Ita wannan takan makalemasa kamar kasca idan suka hadu kartar juna sukeyi domin Clitoris dinta Kato ne yanan kamar girman karanin yatsa idan ya taba gabansa haka zasu sake haukacewa tare
Shi wannan clitiris din dama anyisu da tissue iri daya ne da pns na maza da kuma nipple na mata duk da tissue daya akayi su ukun nan
Clitoris
Pns
Nipple Dukkansu suna da connective tissue da kuma Erictile funtion shiyasa dukkansu kana tabawa suke yin tauri su mike
Wacce take da wannan Allah y mata baiwa sukan dade basu rabu ba ita da mijin 
Kishi da ita tashin hankaline musamman idan an cirewa kishiyartata lalle kam sai hakuri d difference is clear irintace yan uwansa suke sakashi a gaba Suce ta mishi asiri

 31. Compatability dacewa
Wadannan Allah ne yake yake hada su yakuma datar da su
Wata kila ita 6depth shi kuma 6inces irin wadannan idan suka hadu babu sassauci duk wani motsinshi ruwane kawai irrigation chanels ne
Irinsu sune idan suka rabu ko zasu mutu sai sun sake dawowa kuma idan zai auri mace 10 bai samu irinta ba dole sai ya sun sake aure
Balle ita kuma ace tayi rashin saa 6 depth ta auri mai 4inc pns ya kuke gani ai akwai incompatabilty
Dole sai sun rayu tare sam irinta idan an dafe tun bayan isha sai assalatu tsabar zama compatible

 32. Aged Woman
Tsohuwa babu wani abunda yake hanata jin dadin mijinta
Tana da shaawarta sosai sosai sai dai rashin karfi
Tun ba ma idan mijinta tun na tale tale bane
Sam kullum nema sukeyi suma su huta kamar yadda jikokinsu sukeyi
Sam basu jin kunyar junansu bilhasali suna matukar jin shaawa kamar yara kanana
Sai dai mukan taimaka musu irin kana nasu maganin matan don su samu su wataya

Amma bazan fada muku ba kar ku musu tsiya😉

33. Partial Absence of Orgasm
Wacce bata taba releasing ba
( Wato kamar ace Namiji ne ya kwanta da mace amma baya releasing zai yiwu)
Ita wannan bata ma san wani abu haka ba
Sai dai kawai a yi abinda zaayi amma zataji dadi kamar na kowa bata dai san wanchen bane
Amma duk ranar da ta dandana hmmm babu dama fa
Wata Idan ta samu miji mai juriya zai iya saka ta dinga yi lokaci lokaci
Wata kuma sai da taimakon magunguna irin su MACa idan ta fara sha zataiya releasing sau 2 ko 3 ma a lokacin saduwa 
Ana matukar iya correcting sai dai kuma wacce bata samu mijin da zai iya kaiwa chan ba
Shima zaki iya bashi
Maca Zai taimaka mishi don ya kaiki inda ya kamata kije

Mata a bincika kowa ta gano kanta don ta gyara tun ma ba mai matsalaba
Allah y datad damu

Ina barar Addua

Doctor mata medinice


🉐 *NI"IMARKI AMARYA GOBE*
🇪🇬

🇪🇬 kiyi kyakkawan sauraro da biyayya agareshi domin Allah zai yi farin ciki dake mijinki zaiyi farin ciki dake.

🇪🇬 ki zama cikin tsafta da kanshi a koda wane lokaci,kada ki bari yaga abinda baya son gani agareki ko ya shaki wari agareki.

🇪🇬 kwalliya shine mafi komai acikin kayan kwalliya,kuma ruwa yafi ko wane turare kanshi watau komai kanshin turare in ba wanki aikin banza ne.

🇪🇬 ki shirya abincin shi a cikin lokaci domin zafin jinyinwa yana kawo tafasa zuciya.

🇪🇬 ki zama mai nutsuwa,mai aiki a hankali lokacin da mijinki yake barci domin rashin barci yana sa bacin rai.

🇪🇬 ki kula da dukiyarshi ya'yanshi 'yan uwanshi da barorinshi,domin ki sami amintuwar shi.

🇪🇬 karki saki ki tona masa asiri,domin idan kika tona mashi asiri bazaki tsira daga ramuwarsa gayyarsa ba.

🇪🇬 kada ki nuna farin ciki lokacin da yake cikin bacin rai,kada ki nuna bacin rai lokacin da yake cikin farin ciki, saboda haka zai nuna rashin kula,kuma zai bata masa rai.

🇪🇬 ki girmamashi kiyi masa da a matukar ikonki domin yaji dadin zama dake kuma ya darajaki.

🇪🇬 kiyi sani yar'uwa ba za ki ga abinda kike nema ba har sai kin fifita yardarsa akan yardarki,cikin abinda kike so da wanda kike ki.

   🉐 *DARAJAR AMARYA*
dukkan mace mai daraja tana samun matsayi a wajen maigidan ta mai zai hana ki zamo mace wacce ake kwadayin kusan tarki! Zamowarki wacce ake yayi agidan miji.shi ne alfaharinki ka dai.

🉐 *KAYAN DA ZAKI NEMA*
🇪🇬 DABINO
🇪🇬ZUMA
yin amfani da wa"yan nan kaya yana saka mace samun ni'ima ajikinta samun dabino mai kyau wanda ya nuna har yaso ma ruwa kina saka shi acikin zuma ya dau kamar kwana uku aciki sannan kina dauko wa kina ci tsawon wata biyu zai samar da ruwan ni'ima ga mace.

 Domin ita mace sai da ni'ima take rayuwa.
idan har dai kina san kiyi ruwan ni'ima to kiyi wanna hadi kwai.

 🉐 *GYARAN TUMBI GA MATA & MAZA*
macen da bata son a ganta da tumbi kinfi son kiza ma yar dagwas dagwas ki zama dai-dai wa daida.

Ki samu kai tufa ki rinka zubawa cikin ruwan dimi kina sha sau biyu a rana safe da daddare kuma kina shafawa a tumbi,musamman idan zaki kwanta yar'uwa zaki sha mamaki da yardar Allah sai dai sai anyi hakuri don abin bana gareje bane.

 🉐 *RAGE KIBA DA TUMBI*
ga masu fama da kiba ko tumbi wanna hadin na musamman ne wanda idan har kika hada shi to koda kina da kibarki zafa aganki kina ta aikace aikace sai kace yarinya yar' shekara sha biyu(12).

🇪🇬 man 'na'a-na'a
ki hade wadannan ganye guri guda ki tafasa ki sami farin kwalli dunkulen zaki saka a ciki,idan ya kai kamar minti biyar sai ki cire, sannan ki saka zuma a cikin ruwan sha,ki samu man na'a-na'a ki rinka shafawa tumbi zai ragu insha Allah idan kuma ana son rage kiba ne za a rinka zuba lemon tsami a ciki.

       🉐 *MATAR DADI*
kece wacce ake so ake mararin kusanta ake begen zuwa gunta domin dadinta ki daure kiyi wannan hadi domin zamowa mace mai farin jini awajan maigidanta idan dai har kina san wannan matsayi to yi wannan da baru.

🉐 *KAYAN DA AKE HADA WA*
🇪🇬 Kankana
🇪🇬 zuma
🇪🇬 garin dabino
🇪🇬 ruwan inubi
wannan hadi yana bukatar nutsuwa wajan yin sa domin hadin yana da amfani sosai, ana bukatar kisami kankana mai kyau ki bareta ki zauna ki cire kwallayan ta! Ki sami blander mai kyau ki markade ta bayan kin gama sai ki sami kofi mai kyau ki kawo garin dabino da zuma da ruwan inubi ki hade su ki dame su kina sha zakiga yadda ruwan ni'ima zai yi miki.

🉐 *KUZARI MAZA DA MAZA*
ina mata da maza wa 'yan da kuzari bai ishe suba sannan kuma ba sajin karfin jikin su to wannan wata damace ta samu idan kuna san samun kwari da kuzari sai kuyi wannan hadi ku gani.

               💻 *whatsapp*
             *08080468731*

🉐 *KAYAN DA ZA A NEMA*
🇪🇬DABINO
🇪🇬NONON AKUYA
🇪🇬ZUMA
🇪🇬CITTA
asami dabino mai kyau a amma ku gyara
sai nonon akuya ana so dole sai kin samo na akuya so samu a gabanki ko a gabanka za a tatsa idan an samu nonan sai ki zuba dabinon da kika gyara acikin nonan akuyar ana bukatar ya samu kamar awa goma idan da hali kiyi hadin ki cikin dare da safe dabinon ya jika acikin nonan akuyar ana so kikai ayi miki markade idan da hali kisami bulanda mai kyau kiyi markadanki domin tafi sauki bayan ki markada amma karki zuba ruwa acikin markadan idan kin gama sai ki dauko zumarki amma anfisan farar saka sai dai in baki samu ba sai kiyi da ko wacce kizuba zumar acikin ko ki daka abinki yafi san babu wani mis aciki ko ki daka abinki yafi sauki yar'uwa kina shan wannan hadi ko kana shan wannan hadi zaku ga yadda kuzari zai samu da yardar Allah kuna sha kullun da safe.

🉐 *KI ZAMO MACE MAI DARAJA*
ina mace mai san zama gwana awajan maigida ko mininta dolenki idan kina san wannan matsayi kikasance da wannan hadin domin maigida yaji dadin awajan kwanciya.
 "yar uwa wannan hadin yana mutukar amfani ajikin mace lallai kiyi wannan hadi domin yin fice acikin sa'anninki nemi wa "yan
nan kayan kiyi wannan hadi zakiga yadda zaki koma awajan maigidanki.

🉐 *KAYAN DA ZAKI NEMAN*
🇪🇬DABINO
🇪🇬ZUMA
🇪🇬INUBI
da farko ana bukatar kisami dabino mai kyau garin dabino ake so kisamu ba yadda ake yin garin dabino ake samu wanda ya bushe so sai domin ya wancin dabino bai bushe ba. Idan kika samu sai ki bare dabino kitabbatar kin cire tsutsa ki tabbatar kin zuba garin ki cikin abu mai kyau daga nan saiki kawo ruwan zuma kizuba amma ana bukatar zuma sabuwar saka domin da ita ake yin wannan hadin shikuma inibi ruwan sa ake so kisamu ana samun wajan duk wani mai sai da inibi,ki tabbata ruwan aka baki sabo da gudun samun
matsala ana dama garin dabino da ruwan zuma mai kyau sabuwar saka amfanin zuwan inibi a cikin wannan hadi shine kafin ki sha wannan hadi ake so kisha ruwan inibi ko da makwarwa daya amma shi wannan hadin garin dabino da zuma cokali biyar ake sha dan biyan bukata.

HADIN DAKIN UWARGIDA

wannan wani hadine mai daraja awajan mata da mazajen su mutukar matayen sunyi mazajan su zasu ji dadi wajen kusan tarsu wajan saduwa ki daure kiyi wannan hadi domin faranta ran maigida dan yaji dadi idan kuwa kina san ganin murmurshin maigida da farin cikin sa lallai kiyi wannan hadi domin maigida ki yaji dadi.

🇪🇬DABINO
🇪🇬ALKAMA
🇪🇬ZUMA
DA farko ana bukatar garin mai dan yawa ita kuwa alkama mai kyau ake so kisamu itama ana bukatarki garinta ko ma kisami alkamar ki ke wanke ki surfa ki tabbatar babu datti sai ki kai ayo miki nika mai laushi kisaka rariya ki tankade shi yayi laushi ki sami ruwa maikyau ki dora akan tukunya idan yayi zafi sai kiyi tuwo da garin dabino da kuma garin alkama ki tuka kamar zaki yi tuwo amma ban ci kamar tuwo da miya zaki ga yadda zaki koma indai ni'ima ce zaki bada labari da yarda Allah.

🉐 *MACE TA ZAMO MAI RUWA*
KINO SO kizamo mace mai ni'ima da ruwa to kiyi wannan hadi zakigane cewa mata masu ruwa suna marewa amarcin su awajen mazajensu idan kina san samun wanna matsayi to kiyi.

🇪🇬alkama
🇪🇬maiwa
🇪🇬nono mai kyau
da farko kisami alkama mai kyau ki tsince ta ki gyara ta tayi kyau ki tabbatar babu wani datti aciki sai ki wanke ta ta futa fes sai ki kai a barza miki ko ayi miki nika ba mai laushi ba.

Ita kuma maiwa ana bukatar ta yi laushi amma ki tabbatar kin gyarata ita ana bukatar kina hade alkama da maiwa kina damawa da nono kina sha idan kuma bakya amfani da nono to kisamu madara mai kyau kina sha da ita zaki bama kawarki  labari.

   🉐  *ZINARIYAR MACE WAJEN MIJINTA*

   🉐 *MAGANIN BUSHEWAR GABAN MACE*
gamai samun daukewar ni'ima da rashin sanin dadin aure ko rashin nishadi to amarya ko uwar gida ga yanda zaki magance wadannan matsaloli cikin sauki, sai ki samu

               💻 *Whatspp*
     🇪🇬 *08080468731* 🇪🇬

🇪🇬 aya
🇪🇬 zuma
🇪🇬dabino
🇪🇬garin sallaja
sai ki markadesu ki tacesu sai ki rinka diba kadan-kadan kina hadawa da zuma da garin habba kadan kina sha safe da yamma, wadda batayi aure ba kada tasha.mijinki zai ji kin canza sosai.

 🉐 *SINADARIN MA'AURATA*
shi wannan wani sinadarine mai albarka wanda ake yi masa lakabi da sinadarin ma'aurata, kuma yana jimawa a jiki, sannan yana kara kuzari kuma yana karawa mace martaba ga mijinta, zaki samu:

🇪🇬furen zogale
🇪🇬zanjabil
🇪🇬habba
🇪🇬garin raihan

sai ki dakesu guri daya sudaku dakyau sai rinka diban karamin cokali kina hadawa da zuma kina safe da yamma shima wannan sai mai aure amma idan kin kusa yin aure zaki iya yin wannan hadin.

🉐 *HADIN MATAN MASAR DA MATAN SUDAN*
ko shakka babu shi wannan hadin matan masar da matan,sudan,da matan jordan suna yinshi yana kara ni'ima musamman yana gyara aure, kuma yana kara,dadi wurin saduwa yana kuma sa nishadin masoya, sannan kuma zaki zama yar gaban goshi.

🇪🇬kankana mai kyau
🇪🇬zuma
🇪🇬raihan
sai ki yayyanka kankanar ki zuba a kofi, ki saka zuma da madarar ruwa da garin raihan sai ki rinka sha safe da yamma.

  🉐 *RASHIN SHA'AWA*
akwai matanda basayin sha'awa ko basa jin dadin saduwa ko ni'imarsu ta dauke, to yanda za'a magance wannan matsala shine sai kisamu.

🇪🇬zangarniyar zogale,da ya'yanta gadaya
🇪🇬karanfani
🇪🇬citta
🇪🇬masoro
🇪🇬da kinba
sai ki dakesu guri daya su zama gari,sai ki rinka shan wannan hadi a shayi safe da yamma,ki gwada ki gani, yana kara dadin da mai gida zai gamsu sannan kuma zaki rinka cin dabino(ajuwa) mai kyau tare da kwakwa zaki sha mamaki.

    🉐 *NI'IMA SINADARI MAI DADI*
ga wani hadi na musamman dan karin ni'ima da nishadi da dadi.

🇪🇬ya'yan zogale
🇪🇬kankana
sai ki dakesu guri daya suyi laushi sai ki rinka sha da nono safe da yamma.

    🉐 *DON FARIN CIKIN MA'AURATA*
shi wannan wani hadi ne da akeyinshi dan farin cikin ma'aurata, kuma yana sa asamu nishadi da kuma karin ni'ima da dadi, yanda akeyi shine za'a samu.

🇪🇬kankana mai kyau sosai( a yayyankata)
🇪🇬ya'yan zogale
🇪🇬kumasoriyya ta asali
🇪🇬ayaba mai kyau sosai
ya'yan zogale da kumasoriyya za a dakesu da kyau suyi laushi, sai ki rinka diban karamin cokali na garin maganin kina hadawa da wancen kankanar da ayaba da madara ta ruwa, sai ki yamutsasu ki rinka sha, sau biyu a rana safe da yamma.

sannan kuma in zaki kwanta da daddare sai ki hada farin miski da zuma farar saka da man zaitun mai kyau ki rinka shafawa a gabanki,zai kashe kwayoyin cututtuka da gamsar da maigida da nishadi.

   🉐 *DON MAGANCE ZAFIN SADUWA*
wannan wani hadi ne da akeyi don magance zafin saduwa ko rashin sha'awa ko daukewar ni'ima.

🇪🇬dabino
🇪🇬garin ridi
🇪🇬garin habba
🇪🇬da garin raihan

sai a samu zuma lita daya a hadasu wuri daya a rinka sha cokali daya a ruwan shayi safe da yamma.

🚑 *DOCTOR MATA ISLAMIC MEDICINE CENTER YOLA* 🚑

*ʄaċɛɮօօҡ քaɢɛ*
Doctor mata medinice


🉐 *NI"IMARKI AMARYA GOBE*
🇪🇬

🇪🇬 kiyi kyakkawan sauraro da biyayya agareshi domin Allah zai yi farin ciki dake mijinki zaiyi farin ciki dake.

🇪🇬 ki zama cikin tsafta da kanshi a koda wane lokaci,kada ki bari yaga abinda baya son gani agareki ko ya shaki wari agareki.

🇪🇬 kwalliya shine mafi komai acikin kayan kwalliya,kuma ruwa yafi ko wane turare kanshi watau komai kanshin turare in ba wanki aikin banza ne.

🇪🇬 ki shirya abincin shi a cikin lokaci domin zafin jinyinwa yana kawo tafasa zuciya.

🇪🇬 ki zama mai nutsuwa,mai aiki a hankali lokacin da mijinki yake barci domin rashin barci yana sa bacin rai.

🇪🇬 ki kula da dukiyarshi ya'yanshi 'yan uwanshi da barorinshi,domin ki sami amintuwar shi.

🇪🇬 karki saki ki tona masa asiri,domin idan kika tona mashi asiri bazaki tsira daga ramuwarsa gayyarsa ba.

🇪🇬 kada ki nuna farin ciki lokacin da yake cikin bacin rai,kada ki nuna bacin rai lokacin da yake cikin farin ciki, saboda haka zai nuna rashin kula,kuma zai bata masa rai.

🇪🇬 ki girmamashi kiyi masa da a matukar ikonki domin yaji dadin zama dake kuma ya darajaki.

🇪🇬 kiyi sani yar'uwa ba za ki ga abinda kike nema ba har sai kin fifita yardarsa akan yardarki,cikin abinda kike so da wanda kike ki.

   🉐 *DARAJAR AMARYA*
dukkan mace mai daraja tana samun matsayi a wajen maigidan ta mai zai hana ki zamo mace wacce ake kwadayin kusan tarki! Zamowarki wacce ake yayi agidan miji.shi ne alfaharinki ka dai.

🉐 *KAYAN DA ZAKI NEMA*
🇪🇬 DABINO
🇪🇬ZUMA
yin amfani da wa"yan nan kaya yana saka mace samun ni'ima ajikinta samun dabino mai kyau wanda ya nuna har yaso ma ruwa kina saka shi acikin zuma ya dau kamar kwana uku aciki sannan kina dauko wa kina ci tsawon wata biyu zai samar da ruwan ni'ima ga mace.

 Domin ita mace sai da ni'ima take rayuwa.
idan har dai kina san kiyi ruwan ni'ima to kiyi wanna hadi kwai.

 🉐 *GYARAN TUMBI GA MATA & MAZA*
macen da bata son a ganta da tumbi kinfi son kiza ma yar dagwas dagwas ki zama dai-dai wa daida.

Ki samu kai tufa ki rinka zubawa cikin ruwan dimi kina sha sau biyu a rana safe da daddare kuma kina shafawa a tumbi,musamman idan zaki kwanta yar'uwa zaki sha mamaki da yardar Allah sai dai sai anyi hakuri don abin bana gareje bane.

 🉐 *RAGE KIBA DA TUMBI*
ga masu fama da kiba ko tumbi wanna hadin na musamman ne wanda idan har kika hada shi to koda kina da kibarki zafa aganki kina ta aikace aikace sai kace yarinya yar' shekara sha biyu(12).

🇪🇬 garin hulba
🇪🇬 ganyen na'a-na'a
🇪🇬 gari kanunfari
🇪🇬 zuma
🇪🇬 lemon tsami
🇪🇬 farin kwalli
🇪🇬 man 'na'a-na'a
ki hade wadannan ganye guri guda ki tafasa ki sami farin kwalli dunkulen zaki saka a ciki,idan ya kai kamar minti biyar sai ki cire, sannan ki saka zuma a cikin ruwan sha,ki samu man na'a-na'a ki rinka shafawa tumbi zai ragu insha Allah idan kuma ana son rage kiba ne za a rinka zuba lemon tsami a ciki.

       🉐 *MATAR DADI*
kece wacce ake so ake mararin kusanta ake begen zuwa gunta domin dadinta ki daure kiyi wannan hadi domin zamowa mace mai farin jini awajan maigidanta idan dai har kina san wannan matsayi to yi wannan da baru.

🉐 *KAYAN DA AKE HADA WA*
🇪🇬 Kankana
🇪🇬 zuma
🇪🇬 garin dabino
🇪🇬 ruwan inubi
wannan hadi yana bukatar nutsuwa wajan yin sa domin hadin yana da amfani sosai, ana bukatar kisami kankana mai kyau ki bareta ki zauna ki cire kwallayan ta! Ki sami blander mai kyau ki markade ta bayan kin gama sai ki sami kofi mai kyau ki kawo garin dabino da zuma da ruwan inubi ki hade su ki dame su kina sha zakiga yadda ruwan ni'ima zai yi miki.

🉐 *BA BOKA BA MALAM KO SIHIRI*

sai ki yayyanka kankanar ki zuba a kofi, ki saka zuma da madarar ruwa da garin raihan sai ki rinka sha safe da yamma.

  🉐 *RASHIN SHA'AWA*
akwai matanda basayin sha'awa ko basa jin dadin saduwa ko ni'imarsu ta dauke, to yanda za'a magance wannan matsala shine sai kisamu.

🇪🇬zangarniyar zogale,da ya'yanta gadaya
🇪🇬karanfani
🇪🇬citta
🇪🇬masoro
🇪🇬da kinba
sai ki dakesu guri daya su zama gari,sai ki rinka shan wannan hadi a shayi safe da yamma,ki gwada ki gani, yana kara dadin da mai gida zai gamsu sannan kuma zaki rinka cin dabino(ajuwa) mai kyau tare da kwakwa zaki sha mamaki.

    🉐 *NI'IMA SINADARI MAI DADI*
ga wani hadi na musamman dan karin ni'ima da nishadi da dadi.

🇪🇬ya'yan zogale
🇪🇬kankana
sai ki dakesu guri daya suyi laushi sai ki rinka sha da nono safe da yamma.

    🉐 *DON FARIN CIKIN MA'AURATA*
shi wannan wani hadi ne da akeyinshi dan farin cikin ma'aurata, kuma yana sa asamu nishadi da kuma karin ni'ima da dadi, yanda akeyi shine za'a samu.

🇪🇬kankana mai kyau sosai( a yayyankata)
🇪🇬ya'yan zogale
🇪🇬kumasoriyya ta asali
🇪🇬ayaba mai kyau sosai
ya'yan zogale da kumasoriyya za a dakesu da kyau suyi laushi, sai ki rinka diban karamin cokali na garin maganin kina hadawa da wancen kankanar da ayaba da madara ta ruwa, sai ki yamutsasu ki rinka sha, sau biyu a rana safe da yamma.

sannan kuma in zaki kwanta da daddare sai ki hada farin miski da zuma farar saka da man zaitun mai kyau ki rinka shafawa a gabanki,zai kashe kwayoyin cututtuka da gamsar da maigida da nishadi.

   🉐 *DON MAGANCE ZAFIN SADUWA*
wannan wani hadi ne da akeyi don magance zafin saduwa ko rashin sha'awa ko daukewar ni'ima.

🇪🇬dabino
🇪🇬garin ridi
🇪🇬garin habba
🇪🇬da garin raihan

sai a samu zuma lita daya a hadasu wuri daya a rinka sha cokali daya a ruwan shayi safe da yamma.

*TSUMI MAI KYAU DA MARA KYAU* Tsumi: akwai tsimi mai kyau da mara kyau mara kyau yana tsinka jikin mace wata har jini yake sata na ba gaira ba dalili. Ga hadin tsumi ki yi da hannun ki yafi kyau ki nemi sasaken baure, kananfari, zuma, citta, mazarkwaila. Za ki tafasa sasaken baure ya dahu sosai sai ki daka kanumfari me yawa da citta yar kadan ki zuba akai, ki saka mazarkwailan da zuma amma zaki cire icen kafin ki zuba hadin, sai ki sauke ki dinga sha daidai kima idan ya huce.
Ku samu zogale ku wanke shi ku nika shi tare da dabino da kuma kwakwa sai ku tace kusa zuma tare da madara sai ku saka ya yi sanyi bayan kungama sallar mangarib sai ku sha.
_Ana so mace ta kula da gabanta domin Allah ya sa namiji ya kwallafa ransa gare shi. Barinsa ya lalace kamar zubar da kimarki ne a wajen sa kada ki bar shi ya yi wari, kada ki bar shi ya yi fadi. Domin masana sun ce duk lokacin da aka yi jima’i farjin mace yana karafadi shi kuma nasa yana rage girma to kinga nasa na rage girma na ki na fadi zai kuma ba kya kula da shi, ba zai rika jin gamsuwa ba. Don haka sai ya fara tunanin kin tsufa ke ma ki fara ganin ya za ma rago shi ya sa yawanci ba a samun gamsuwa. Kuma ba kowane namiji ba ne zai iya fadawa matarsa gabanta ya kara girma ba.Don haka mu kula.
✍🏽 *_ADMIN MUSA MUSA_*

*MAN DAMO DA MAN AYU GYARAN MATAH DOMIN MAZA*
Kitsen damo da man ayu sundade suna taka muhimmiyar rawa a wajen ma aurata wato jin nishadi lokacin saduwa ma aurata suji kamar akwana anayi kuma gashi baya matsala agaban mace ko namiji musamman mata zakaga idan wannan kitsen ya karbi mace zata rikeshi shi kadai ya ishseta mallake mijinta kuma kamar yanda mukayi bayani abaya namiji shima yana aiki da kitsen damo wato idan namiji yanaso yaga matarsa tana biye dashi akowanne lokaci sakamakon saduwa da yakeyi da ita to lokacinda yazo jima i da ita ya dauko man damo ya hadashi da zuma ya gauraya saiya shafa akan azzakarinsa to awannan lokacin matukar ya sadu da matarsa zataji bata taba gamsuwa irin wannan lokacinba amma kuma namiji me ciwon sanyi da basir bazai masaba hasalima zaisa maniyinsa zuwane da wuri
to ammafa ita mace idan tasamu man damo itama ta hadashi da zuma lokacinda zata sadu da mijinta saita debo dan kadan tayi matsi to awannan lokacin mijinta zai jita daban domin wani kalar dandano zatayi
idan kuma so kike kike ki mallake mijinki a gado bayan kin saka zumar saiki samu lalle ki zuba ki saka ruwan alobera ki gauraya sosai saiki samu roba me kyau ki ajiye domin yakan dade be baciba sai kina matsi dashi
hallau amarya da take shirin karbar angonta daga lokacinda ta fara gyaran jiki to ta kasance da man damo akusa domin idan tazo dafa kazar amarya ta zubashi kadan aciki sannan lokacinda ta rage kwana uku tana hadashi da zuma tana matsi dashi sannan tana shafawa a saman farjinta gefe da gefe wallahi duk namijinda ya shiga jikinta saiya nuna alamar yaji canji kuma gabanta zai ciko dum dum
sannan mace idan tanason jin dadin mijinta taji tamkar bata duniya lokacin jima i to ta hada man damo da man hulba original dan Egypt ta shafa aganta kuma tayi matsi dashi 3 hours before sex lokacinda zata sadu da mijinta shi kuma saiya hada man damon da zuma ya shafa akan azzakarinsa ku jarraba wannan kuga aiki
bayan haka mace zata iya hada man damo da man ayu waje daya tayi matsi dashi yana kara mata dandano me gamsarwa
haka nan dai shima man Ayu yake cin karensa babu babbaka saboda kusan kowa yasani ma aurata idan sukayi aiki dashi nishadi cikin jin dadi tareda gamsuwa
Kuma manyan mata sun samo dabarar hada man damo da farin miski kamar dai yanda kuka kalli photon wannan matar to kema idan kin samu farin miski me kyau ki hadasu lokacinda kikaga oga ya hauro kin gama shiri dokinsa kawai zai hau to kishafa kadan kadan a gabanki yadan shiga kadan bawai kitura can cikiba kinayin wannan kibawa oga ya shiga kiga rudewa
To akwai abu biyu da yakamata mata su fara lura akan aiki da man ayu ko man damo

🉐 *NI"IMARKI AMARYA GOBE*
🇪🇬

🇪🇬 kiyi kyakkawan sauraro da biyayya agareshi domin Allah zai yi farin ciki dake mijinki zaiyi farin ciki dake.

🇪🇬 ki zama cikin tsafta da kanshi a koda wane lokaci,kada ki bari yaga abinda baya son gani agareki ko ya shaki wari agareki.

🇪🇬 kwalliya shine mafi komai acikin kayan kwalliya,kuma ruwa yafi ko wane turare kanshi watau komai kanshin turare in ba wanki aikin banza ne.

🇪🇬 ki shirya abincin shi a cikin lokaci domin zafin jinyinwa yana kawo tafasa zuciya.

🇪🇬 ki zama mai nutsuwa,mai aiki a hankali lokacin da mijinki yake barci domin rashin barci yana sa bacin rai.

🇪🇬 ki kula da dukiyarshi ya'yanshi 'yan uwanshi da barorinshi,domin ki sami amintuwar shi.

🇪🇬 karki saki ki tona masa asiri,domin idan kika tona mashi asiri bazaki tsira daga ramuwarsa gayyarsa ba.

🇪🇬 kada ki nuna farin ciki lokacin da yake cikin bacin rai,kada ki nuna bacin rai lokacin da yake cikin farin ciki, saboda haka zai nuna rashin kula,kuma zai bata masa rai.

🇪🇬 ki girmamashi kiyi masa da a matukar ikonki domin yaji dadin zama dake kuma ya darajaki.

🇪🇬 kiyi sani yar'uwa ba za ki ga abinda kike nema ba har sai kin fifita yardarsa akan yardarki,cikin abinda kike so da wanda kike ki.

   🉐 *DARAJAR AMARYA*
dukkan mace mai daraja tana samun matsayi a wajen maigidan ta mai zai hana ki zamo mace wacce ake kwadayin kusan tarki! Zamowarki wacce ake yayi agidan miji.shi ne alfaharinki ka dai.

🉐 *KAYAN DA ZAKI NEMA*
🇪🇬 DABINO
🇪🇬ZUMA
yin amfani da wa"yan nan kaya yana saka mace samun ni'ima ajikinta samun dabino mai kyau wanda ya nuna har yaso ma ruwa kina saka shi acikin zuma ya dau kamar kwana uku aciki sannan kina dauko wa kina ci tsawon wata biyu zai samar da ruwan ni'ima ga mace.

 Domin ita mace sai da ni'ima take rayuwa.
idan har dai kina san kiyi ruwan ni'ima to kiyi wanna hadi kwai.

 🉐 *GYARAN TUMBI GA MATA & MAZA*
macen da bata son a ganta da tumbi kinfi son kiza ma yar dagwas dagwas ki zama dai-dai wa daida.

Ki samu kai tufa ki rinka zubawa cikin ruwan dimi kina sha sau biyu a rana safe da daddare kuma kina shafawa a tumbi,musamman idan zaki kwanta yar'uwa zaki sha mamaki da yardar Allah sai dai sai anyi hakuri don abin bana gareje bane.

 🉐 *RAGE KIBA DA TUMBI*
ga masu fama da kiba ko tumbi wanna hadin na musamman ne wanda idan har kika hada shi to koda kina da kibarki zafa aganki kina ta aikace aikace sai kace yarinya yar' shekara sha biyu(12).

🇪🇬 garin hulba
🇪🇬 ganyen na'a-na'a
🇪🇬 gari kanunfari
🇪🇬 zuma
🇪🇬 lemon tsami
🇪🇬 farin kwalli
🇪🇬 man 'na'a-na'a
ki hade wadannan ganye guri guda ki tafasa ki sami farin kwalli dunkulen zaki saka a ciki,idan ya kai kamar minti biyar sai ki cire, sannan ki saka zuma a cikin ruwan sha,ki samu man na'a-na'a ki rinka shafawa tumbi zai ragu insha Allah idan kuma ana son rage kiba ne za a rinka zuba lemon tsami a ciki.

       🉐 *MATAR DADI*
kece wacce ake so ake mararin kusanta ake begen zuwa gunta domin dadinta ki daure kiyi wannan hadi domin zamowa mace mai farin jini awajan maigidanta idan dai har kina san wannan matsayi to yi wannan da baru.

🇪🇬 zuma

🇪🇬 ruwan inubi
wannan hadi yana bukatar nutsuwa wajan yin sa domin hadin yana da amfani sosai, ana bukatar kisami kankana mai kyau ki bareta ki zauna ki cire kwallayan ta! Ki sami blander mai kyau ki markade ta bayan kin gama sai ki sami kofi mai kyau ki kawo garin dabino da zuma da ruwan inubi ki hade su ki dame su kina sha zakiga yadda ruwan ni'ima zai yi miki.

🉐 *KAYAN DA ZA A NEMA*
🇪🇬DABINO
🇪🇬NONON AKUYA
🇪🇬ZUMA
🇪🇬CITTA
asami dabino mai kyau a amma ku gyara
sai nonon akuya ana so dole sai kin samo na akuya so samu a gabanki ko a gabanka za a tatsa idan an samu nonan sai ki zuba dabinon da kika gyara acikin nonan akuyar ana bukatar ya samu kamar awa goma idan da hali kiyi hadin ki cikin dare da safe dabinon ya jika acikin nonan akuyar ana so kikai ayi miki markade idan da hali kisami bulanda mai kyau kiyi markadanki domin tafi sauki bayan ki markada amma karki zuba ruwa acikin markadan idan kin gama sai ki dauko zumarki amma anfisan farar saka sai dai in baki samu ba sai kiyi da ko wacce kizuba zumar acikin ko ki daka abinki yafi san babu wani mis aciki ko ki daka abinki yafi sauki yar'uwa kina shan wannan hadi ko kana shan wannan hadi zaku ga yadda kuzari zai samu da yardar Allah kuna sha kullun da safe.

🉐 *KI ZAMO MACE MAI DARAJA*
ina mace mai san zama gwana awajan maigida ko mininta dolenki idan kina san wannan matsayi kikasance da wannan hadin domin maigida yaji dadin awajan kwanciya.
 "yar uwa wannan hadin yana mutukar amfani ajikin mace lallai kiyi wannan hadi domin yin fice acikin sa'anninki nemi wa "yan
nan kayan kiyi wannan hadi zakiga yadda zaki koma awajan maigidanki.

🉐 *KAYAN DA ZAKI NEMAN*
🇪🇬DABINO
🇪🇬ZUMA
🇪🇬INUBI
da farko ana bukatar kisami dabino mai kyau garin dabino ake so kisamu ba yadda ake yin garin dabino ake samu wanda ya bushe so sai domin ya wancin dabino bai bushe ba. Idan kika samu sai ki bare dabino kitabbatar kin cire tsutsa ki tabbatar kin zuba garin ki cikin abu mai kyau daga nan saiki kawo ruwan zuma kizuba amma ana bukatar zuma sabuwar saka domin da ita ake yin wannan hadin shikuma inibi ruwan sa ake so kisamu ana samun wajan duk wani mai sai da inibi,ki tabbata ruwan aka baki sabo da gudun samun
matsala ana dama garin dabino da ruwan zuma mai kyau sabuwar saka amfanin zuwan inibi a cikin wannan hadi shine kafin ki sha wannan hadi ake so kisha ruwan inibi ko da makwarwa daya amma shi wannan hadin garin dabino da zuma cokali biyar ake sha dan biyan bukata.

HADIN DAKIN UWARGIDA

wannan wani hadine mai daraja awajan mata da mazajen su mutukar matayen sunyi mazajan su zasu ji dadi wajen kusan tarsu wajan saduwa ki daure kiyi wannan hadi domin faranta ran maigida dan yaji dadi idan kuwa kina san ganin murmurshin maigida da farin cikin sa lallai kiyi wannan hadi domin maigida ki yaji dadi.

🇪🇬ALKAMA
🇪🇬ZUMA
DA farko ana bukatar garin mai dan yawa ita kuwa alkama mai kyau ake so kisamu itama ana bukatarki garinta ko ma kisami alkamar ki ke wanke ki surfa ki tabbatar babu datti sai ki kai ayo miki nika mai laushi kisaka rariya ki tankade shi yayi laushi ki sami ruwa maikyau ki dora akan tukunya idan yayi zafi sai kiyi tuwo da garin dabino da kuma garin alkama ki tuka kamar zaki yi tuwo amma ban ci kamar tuwo da miya zaki ga yadda zaki koma indai ni'ima ce zaki bada labari da yarda Allah.

🉐 *MACE TA ZAMO MAI RUWA*
KINO SO kizamo mace mai ni'ima da ruwa to kiyi wannan hadi zakigane cewa mata masu ruwa suna marewa amarcin su awajen mazajensu idan kina san samun wanna matsayi to kiyi.

🇪🇬alkama
🇪🇬maiwa
🇪🇬nono mai kyau
da farko kisami alkama mai kyau ki tsince ta ki gyara ta tayi kyau ki tabbatar babu wani datti aciki sai ki wanke ta ta futa fes sai ki kai a barza miki ko ayi miki nika ba mai laushi ba.

Ita kuma maiwa ana bukatar ta yi laushi amma ki tabbatar kin gyarata ita ana bukatar kina hade alkama da maiwa kina damawa da nono kina sha idan kuma bakya amfani da nono to kisamu madara mai kyau kina sha da ita zaki bama kawarki  labari.

   🉐  *ZINARIYAR MACE WAJEN MIJINTA*

   🉐 *MAGANIN BUSHEWAR GABAN MACE*
gamai samun daukewar ni'ima da rashin sanin dadin aure ko rashin nishadi to amarya ko uwar gida ga yanda zaki magance wadannan matsaloli cikin sauki, sai ki samu

     🇪🇬 *08080468731* 🇪🇬

🇪🇬 aya
🇪🇬 zuma
🇪🇬dabino
🇪🇬garin sallaja
sai ki markadesu ki tacesu sai ki rinka diba kadan-kadan kina hadawa da zuma da garin habba kadan kina sha safe da yamma, wadda batayi aure ba kada tasha.mijinki zai ji kin canza sosai.

 🉐 *SINADARIN MA'AURATA*
shi wannan wani sinadarine mai albarka wanda ake yi masa lakabi da sinadarin ma'aurata, kuma yana jimawa a jiki, sannan yana kara kuzari kuma yana karawa mace martaba ga mijinta, zaki samu:

🇪🇬furen zogale
🇪🇬zanjabil
🇪🇬habba
🇪🇬garin raihan

sai ki dakesu guri daya sudaku dakyau sai rinka diban karamin cokali kina hadawa da zuma kina safe da yamma shima wannan sai mai aure amma idan kin kusa yin aure zaki iya yin wannan hadin.

🉐 *HADIN MATAN MASAR DA MATAN SUDAN*
ko shakka babu shi wannan hadin matan masar da matan,sudan,da matan jordan suna yinshi yana kara ni'ima musamman yana gyara aure, kuma yana kara,dadi wurin saduwa yana kuma sa nishadin masoya, sannan kuma zaki zama yar gaban goshi.

🇪🇬kankana mai kyau
🇪🇬zuma
🇪🇬raihan
sai ki yayyanka kankanar ki zuba a kofi, ki saka zuma da madarar ruwa da garin raihan sai ki rinka sha safe da yamma.

  🉐 *RASHIN SHA'AWA*
akwai matanda basayin sha'awa ko basa jin dadin saduwa ko ni'imarsu ta dauke, to yanda za'a magance wannan matsala shine sai kisamu.

🇪🇬zangarniyar zogale,da ya'yanta gadaya
🇪🇬karanfani
🇪🇬citta
🇪🇬masoro
🇪🇬da kinba
sai ki dakesu guri daya su zama gari,sai ki rinka shan wannan hadi a shayi safe da yamma,ki gwada ki gani, yana kara dadin da mai gida zai gamsu sannan kuma zaki rinka cin dabino(ajuwa) mai kyau tare da kwakwa zaki sha mamaki.

    🉐 *NI'IMA SINADARI MAI DADI*
ga wani hadi na musamman dan karin ni'ima da nishadi da dadi.

🇪🇬ya'yan zogale
🇪🇬kankana
sai ki dakesu guri daya suyi laushi sai ki rinka sha da nono safe da yamma.

    🉐 *DON FARIN CIKIN MA'AURATA*
shi wannan wani hadi ne da akeyinshi dan farin cikin ma'aurata, kuma yana sa asamu nishadi da kuma karin ni'ima da dadi, yanda akeyi shine za'a samu.

🇪🇬kankana mai kyau sosai( a yayyankata)
🇪🇬ya'yan zogale
🇪🇬kumasoriyya ta asali
🇪🇬ayaba mai kyau sosai
ya'yan zogale da kumasoriyya za a dakesu da kyau suyi laushi, sai ki rinka diban karamin cokali na garin maganin kina hadawa da wancen kankanar da ayaba da madara ta ruwa, sai ki yamutsasu ki rinka sha, sau biyu a rana safe da yamma.

sannan kuma in zaki kwanta da daddare sai ki hada farin miski da zuma farar saka da man zaitun mai kyau ki rinka shafawa a gabanki,zai kashe kwayoyin cututtuka da gamsar da maigida da nishadi.

   🉐 *DON MAGANCE ZAFIN SADUWA*
wannan wani hadi ne da akeyi don magance zafin saduwa ko rashin sha'awa ko daukewar ni'ima.

🇪🇬dabino
🇪🇬garin ridi
🇪🇬garin habba
🇪🇬da garin raihan

sai a samu zuma lita daya a hadasu wuri daya a rinka sha cokali daya a ruwan shayi safe da yamma.

[10/15, 10:46 PM] ‪+234 903 456 4500‬: ・✿✿ *BAYAN SATI BIYU DA HAIHUWARKI* ❀❀・

☏+2348037538596

♜ *SIRRIN Rike  MIJI ⇔ RAYUWAR AURE ⇔ SIRRIN DUNIYAR MA'AURATA* ♜

➽ *IDAN KIN HAIHU*

➽ *( RAINON JARIRI DA TARBIYYA YA'YANMU )*

sai ki Fara shirya jikinki don tarbar maigida, don in dai lafiya kika haihu Daga lokacin Zaki tsinci kanki cikin kuzari.

Duk wanda ya ganki zai ganki tas kamar ba ki haihu ba.

Don haka tunda tafiyar ta samu sai a Fara shirya jiki, Kiyi kokarin a dafa miki kaza irin ta masu jego ki Fara ci, ( Inda babu kada ki matsawa mijinki ) cin kazar yana Kara gyaran kasan mace maigida yaji ta zam-zam kamar bata haihu ba.

❮❯ *shan ya'yan itatuwa akai-akai baren ma ( kankana, abarba, gwada, lemon Zaki.*

❮❯ *ki dinga yin Kunun aya kina sha. In zai samu Kiyi kullum, Amma karki dinga zuba sukari Dan kadan Zaki dinga sawa ko ki sha haka.*

❮❯ *shan maganin Mata mai kyau ( habbatus-sauda, Zuma , dabino, aya ,madara , nono Amma me kyau.*

❮❯ *shan Zuma madi, tsimi da saurabsu.*

❮❯ *Tun Daga ranar da kika haihu har zuwa lokacin da Zaki yi arba'in ki zama cikin tsaftace jiki da gyaran jiki, gyaran jariri ,gyaran gida.*

❝ _KUMA KARKI YI SAKE DA YIN TURARRN WUTA DANA JIKI DA GIDANKI DA JIKINKI_❞

don wasu matan idan suka haihu sai kaganta ( ragajab ba tsaftace jiki ) ko ina su a ganin su idan Ana jego ba a gyaran jiki tunda mijinta Baya tare da su a shimfida, kana zuwa kusa dasu sai kaji wari da karni, wanda a musulinci ko yau mace ta haihu jini ya dauke Mata a ranar data haihu, mijinta yana da ikon zuwa ya sadu da ita a Rana.

▃▃▃▃▃▃▃▃▃▃▃
□ *RAINON JARIRI DA TARBIYYAR YA'YANMU* □


*...yar'uwa ki kasance cikin kula da tsaftace jaririnki ki Fara bashi tarbiyya Tun Daga ranar da kika haife shi kamar haka.*

⇨ idan Zaki bashi ( nono ) ki Dora shi a kan cinyarki ki tallafe keyarsa da hannu daya, daya hannu kuma ki rike nonon naki dashi, wannan rike nonon da kika yi shine kamar kin Fara koya masa rike kwanon cin abinci sa, kuma idan baki rike nonon ba kina iya toshewa jaririnki hancinsa.

( *sai a kiyaye sannan kada ki yarda da ( nani ) ke da kanki Zaki tarbiyya Yara ki* )

⇨ Dora shi a fo a rumgume shi da fo din yayin da ya tashi Daga bacci, ko ya dade bai yi fitsari ba, idan kika Saba Dora jaririnki a kan fo yana fitsari ko kashi a Kai, to da wuya kiga idan ya Fara wayo yana yi miki fitsari a kwance koya Saki a ko ina, dole sai kin Dora shi a fo din, kinga a nan kin ba Yaro tarbiyya kuma ke kanki Zaki kasance cikin tsaftar jiki don da wuya aji zarnin fitsari a jikinki ko a gidanki.

➜ kulawa da canja masa ( nafkin ko famfas ) akai-akai don gudun cin jikin Yaro, don wasu matan basa Dora yaransu a fo ko yaushe sai kinga Yaro cikin famfas don haka sai a dinga kula da ita idan an musu.

➜ duk sanda Zaki bawa Yaro nono ko abinci Kiyi bismillah, sannan ki Dora shi a kafadarki don yayi gyatsa, abinci ya fada masa , amfanin haka Yaro idan ya Fara iya magana duk sanda zaici abinci sai yayi bismillah idan ya gama ya yi hamdala, don ganin kina yi, don ba abinda yafi karami Yaro rike Abu da rashin mantuwa.

➜ Yaro yana Fara budar baki da kiran sunan iyayensa kamar
 ( @bba, baba, mama, Umma ) to da zarar kin ji yaronki ya Fara iya magana sai ki yi kokarin daina yin duk Wata magana marar kyau kamar *( ZAGI DA BATSA )* domin a lokaci duk abinda kika fada burinsa yaga ya kwaikwayin magana, kuma xakiji yana maimaita abinda kika fada, don haka Tun Daga lokacin Zaki kokarin koyawa yaronki *( fatiha da karatu da salatin annabi ( s.a.w )*
➜ koyawa Yaro yin tsarki duk sanda yayi fitsari , to da yake yawan yiwa Yaro tsarki Tun yana jariri idan kina kula dasa masa ruwa, idan ya Dan yi wayyo ya Fara tafiya, duk Inda ya Saki fitsari zaki ga yaje, ya kintimo buta, ko Kofi ya kwara a jikinsa, wai shi ma zaiyi tsarki, don baki kula da tsarki Yaro Tun yana jariri haka zai tashi.
➜ da zarar yaronki yayi shekara biyu zai Fara fita kofar gida ko duk inda yayyensa zasu yasa kuka yace zai bisu don haka sai kin kula da irin gyaran da zai dinga gwamutsuwa dasu, don kar ya Je ya hadu da yara marasa tarbiyya su koya masa rashin kunya da zagi da batsa.
➜ karki yarda yaronki ya dinga fita waje ba wando ko da a cikin gida ne ki dinga barinki yaranki suna yawo tsirara, baran ma ga yarinya mace, ki kula da ita sosai, ko kafar gidanki karki Bari ta dinga fita ita kadai.

*( KINGA YADDA FYADE YAYI YAWA CIKIN AL'UMMA DOLE KI DINGA SA IDO DOMIN TSARE MUTUNCI YARA KI )*

➜ yaronki yana Fara koyon tafiya karki dinga yadda ya dinga yawo ba takalmi ko da a tsakar gida ne bare ma mace.
➜ idan yaronki yayi shekara uku Kiyi kokarin Fara koya masa yin alwala da yin sallah, tare da Fara koya masa karatun al'quran.
➜ Tun Daga lokacin da Yaro ya Fara saka hannusa cikin abinci yaci da kansa Zaki koya masa wanke hannu kafin yaci abinci ki dinga kokarin jaddada masa yin bismillah kafin yaci ki koya masa tankwashe kafafuwa in zai Fara ci, sannan ki koya masa cin abicin a nutsuwa ba hannu Baka hannu kwarya back, da rike kwanon abinci a yayin da yake cin abinci.
➜ ki koyawa yaronki gaisar dake da Abba sa da sauran yayyensa da matan gida yayin da yayi sallar asuba ko da safe, sannan ki koya masa gaisa da bakiin kun yi in kunje wani garin tare.
➜ ki Hana shi sa baki idan juna magana, in Kiyi baki yasa Ku a gaba yana kallon bakinku da jin ko me kuka fada duk ki Hana shi.
➜ ki Hana shi kurawa mutane Ido lokacin da suke cin abinci ko wani Abu.
➽ ki koyawa yaronki durkusawa yayin da zai ba babba wani Abu ko zai karba wani Abu gurin babba konzai yi masa Wata magana.
➽ ki koya masa godiya tare da sa hannu biyu ya karba tayin da aka bashi wani Abu.
➽ ki koyawa yaronki zuwa ya nuna miki Duk wani Abu da aka bashi kafin yaci.
➽ kar ki koyawa yaronki batar da kudi, kuka ko kyautar kudi aka bashi ki koya masa yadda ba zai gaban kasa ya kashe ba sai dai ya kawo miki.
➽ ki koyawa yaronki ko kisa shi a makarantar islamiyya da za'a Fara koya masa karatun addini kamar su ( fatiha-alwala-farilla sallah da sauransu.
➽ lokacin da yaronki ya Kai shekara biyar ki maida hankalin yaronki wajen bashi ilimi ta ko'ina ki Kai shi school.
➽ ki koyawa Yaro tsaftace jikinsa, yadda DUI sanda wani uzurin ya debe ki ba Kiyi masa wanka ba zai Saki a gaba yayi ta kuka yana dadin sai kin yi masa wanka.
*⇛ TARBIYYA MACE DA HANYAR MAGANCE MATSALOLIN ⇚*
☟ lokacin da yarinyarki mace tayi shekara Tara Kiyi kokarin sanar da ita, menene jinin haila da hukunci sa , ki koya Mata yadda ake wanka haila, don Daga shekara Tara zuwa ko wane lokacin zata iya tsintar kanta a ta Fara jinin haila.
☟ ki koyawa Mata kin sakin jiki da maza, sannan ki Hana ta zuwa gurin duk wani namiji da ya kirawo ta yayin da zata makaranta ko kika aiketa indai ba ta sashi ba koda ta Sani tunda Yanzu babu yarda.
☟ ki gaya Mata haram ne wani namiji ya rike ko da hannuta kuma ki bata tsoron da cewar duk namiji daya kirawo ta taje ko ta yadda ya taba ta sai kin yanka ta.
☟ Inda ta shekara sha uku (13) ki koya Mata yadda zata dinga aske gashin hammata da na gaba ( farji )
☟ sannan ki koya Mata yadda zata dinga suturce jikinta da sutura me kyau kar ki bar ta ta dinga saka irin damammiya kayan nan wanda Zaki ga idan an sa da kyar ake numfashi.
☟ ki Hana ta yawan tsalle-tsalle da guje-guje daukar Abu ne mai nauyi ko tsalaka babba kwata.
⇘ lokacin da yarinyarki ta Isa zance da samari wato juna shiri aurar da ita Ku kula da wadanda suke zuwa zancen gurinta, da Inda suke zama suyi zancen, kuma Kiyi tayi Mata nasiha karya yadda ko hannu saurayi ya rike Mata, sannan karku Bari ta dinga dadewa a gurinta yin zancen.
⇒ da zarar yarinya ta tsayar da wanda take so, sai Ku dakatar da samarin da suke zuwa gurinta.
⇒ Ku nusar da yarinya cewar duk saurayin daya zo gurinta yayi Mata magana batsa Dan iska ne, karya tsaya ta shigo gida ta rabu dashi, sannan ta sanar da ke.
☛ da lokacin aurar da yarinyarki yayi babba gudumuwa da Zaki bata, din taimakon rayuwarta da Neman aljanna da fadakar da ita duk wani Abu da ya kamata uwa ta ga yawa Yarta yayin dazata aurar da ita shine.

🉐 *NI"IMARKI AMARYA GOBE*
🇪🇬

🇪🇬 kiyi kyakkawan sauraro da biyayya agareshi domin Allah zai yi farin ciki dake mijinki zaiyi farin ciki dake.

🇪🇬 ki zama cikin tsafta da kanshi a koda wane lokaci,kada ki bari yaga abinda baya son gani agareki ko ya shaki wari agareki.

🇪🇬 kwalliya shine mafi komai acikin kayan kwalliya,kuma ruwa yafi ko wane turare kanshi watau komai kanshin turare in ba wanki aikin banza ne.

🇪🇬 ki shirya abincin shi a cikin lokaci domin zafin jinyinwa yana kawo tafasa zuciya.

🇪🇬 ki zama mai nutsuwa,mai aiki a hankali lokacin da mijinki yake barci domin rashin barci yana sa bacin rai.

🇪🇬 ki kula da dukiyarshi ya'yanshi 'yan uwanshi da barorinshi,domin ki sami amintuwar shi.

🇪🇬 karki saki ki tona masa asiri,domin idan kika tona mashi asiri bazaki tsira daga ramuwarsa gayyarsa ba.

🇪🇬 kada ki nuna farin ciki lokacin da yake cikin bacin rai,kada ki nuna bacin rai lokacin da yake cikin farin ciki, saboda haka zai nuna rashin kula,kuma zai bata masa rai.

🇪🇬 ki girmamashi kiyi masa da a matukar ikonki domin yaji dadin zama dake kuma ya darajaki.

🇪🇬 kiyi sani yar'uwa ba za ki ga abinda kike nema ba har sai kin fifita yardarsa akan yardarki,cikin abinda kike so da wanda kike ki.

 *TSUMI* wajen karawa mace ni'ima.
xaki samu
sassaken baure ki xuba masa  *ruwa*sai ki dora
akan wuta idan ya tafasa xa kiga ruwan ya canja
kala sai ki sauki ki tace ruwan dama kin daka
kanumfari sai ki xuba garin sannan ki xuba xuma  
kadan sai ki saka maxarkwaila sannan ki mayar
dashi kan wuta idan ya tafasa xa kiji yana kamshi
sai ki sauke shi sannan ki ajiye shi kina shansa sau
biyu a rana.

            *TSUMI NA2⃣*
 shi kuma wannan da rake ake
yinsa wato xaki yanka rake kanana kamar alewar
yara sai ki saka a tukunya da ruwa ki jefa
kanumfari ba da yawa ba da yar citta ita ma ba
mai yawa ba sannan ki bare dabinonki ki cire
kwallon ki jefar sai ki daka shi ya xama gari sai ki
xuba a ciki sai ki dora akan wuta ya dahu sosai
sai ki sauke ki matse raken ki cire sannan ki tace
ruwan sai kuma ki mayar dashi kan wuta ki saka
maxarkwaila a ciki sai ta narke sai ki sauke kisa a
fridge yayi sanyi ki wuni kina sha.

       *TSUMI NA3⃣*

ruwan sannan ki dakko nonon rakumi ki xuba ki
gauraya ki wuni kina sha xa kiga abin mamaki.

a ciki ki xuba aya da farin goro ki markadasu

madara peaq ko luna kisha sai dai kamar irin
wannan yana saka wasu matan gudawa sbd
wannan ruwan xogalen amma idan kina shan
ruwan xogale to kada ki bar wannan hadin.

*SIRRIN MATSEWAR GABA*
_kisami ganyen *GAMJI* ki rika kama ruwa da shi har tsawon wani lokaci,k da kanki xakiji kin canja,kin hade,wand nasan dole yasaki dogon tunani.

*MUKOYI HADA MAGANI MATSI DA GANYEN ALOVERA*
idan kinaso ki matse gabanki ciki da waje ta yanda mijinki zaijiki kamar budurwa to ki rike wannan ganyen ki sarrafashi kamar haka
_Ki sami aloevera da karo da kanumfari saiki zuba ruwa ki tafasa bayan kin tace anso ki ajiyeshi har yayi sanyi kina tsarki dashi.

Kayan hadi:-
• Nikakken nama
• Gurasar larabawa
• Koran tattasai
• Cream salad
• Cucumber
• Maggi/Gishiri
• Spices(Kayan kamshi)
YADDA AKE HADAWA
zuba nama a kasko da Maggi/Gishiri kayan kamshi
juya sosai har ruwan ya kafe naman ya soyu
sauke.shinfida gurasar akan faranti sai a zuba
naman a ciki da Koran tattasai da cucumber
wanda aka yanka kanana.yaryada cream salad
akai.sai a nannade gurasar a tsaye.saka cikin
microwave ko oven zuwa minti 5.
