Hanyar magance irin wannan matsalar ita ce, uwargida ta daure ta kawar da duk wata kyama, wani tsoro da duk wani karkatacce da birkitaccen tunanin da ta rike a zuciyarta game da ibadar aure, game da mijinta ko game da yanayin dangantakar da ke tsakaninsu.Sannan ta daure ta rika sakin jikinta lokacin ibadar aure; ta natsu ta kwantar da hankalinta, ta saita dukkan na’urorin kwakwalwarta a kan ibadar auren. Yau da gobe, in Allah ya yarda za ta ga ta yi nasara; ta daina jin irin wannan zafin.
Haka kuma wani babban maganin wannan matsalar shi ne, a dage, a rika motsa su wadannan jijiyoyin da samfurin motsa su na ‘kegel’, sai a nemi ‘yar karamar na’urar ‘kegel-master’ a rika yi a-kai-a-kai. Da fatan Allah ya sa a dace, amin.
5. Kumburi da salewar kwada na iya zama sanadin jin zafin ibadar aure ga uwargida, kuma da an warkar da wannan ciwo in sha Allahu za a daina jin zafin.
6. Fitowar yadin shimfidar mahaifa: Wannan shi ma yana haifar da jin zafin ibadar aure, kuma da an magance shi a asibiti, jin zafin zai tafi in sha Allah.
7. Salewar da kumburin labban ‘yan matanci na haifar da tsananin jin zafi lokacin ibadar aure.Wani lokacin har yakan zama ciwo mai tsanani sosai.Gwajin likita ne kadai zai tabbatar da irin kwayar cutar da ta haifar da ciwon, don magance ta da irin maganin da ya dace. Sannan rashin isasshiya da kuma cikakkiyar tsabtar wajen na daga cikin abubuwan da ke haifar da irin wannan ciwo. Haka wasu kayan zamanin da ake amfani da su kamar su sinadarin musamman don wanke ‘yan matanci ‘baginal douche’ yana iya haifar da wannan ciwo, domin yanayin halittar ‘yan matanci iri daya ne dana kwayar idon dan Adam, an halicce su da ruwan da ke wanke su ya fitar da datti ya turo waje.Kamar yadda muka san ba a sanya sabulu a wanko cikin kwayar ido, to haka ma bai dace ba wanko cikin ‘yammatanci da ‘baginal douche’ da ire-irensa.
8. Mannewar yadin cikin kugu guda biyu waje daya:Shi ma na iya haifar da jin zafin ibadar aure, amma da an yi tiyata an raba su shi ke nan ciwon zai warke in sha Allah.
9. Haka ma wasu cututtuka masu dangane da mahaifa; irin su ciwon kaba na mahaifa, watau ‘fibroid’ da kaluluwar cikin mahaifa ‘cysts’ duk suna iya sa jin zafi lokacin ibadar aure.Hanya mafi dacewa sai a je asibiti don a tabbatar da ainihin abin da ke haifar da hakan, da fatan Allah ya sa a dace, amin.
Allah ya sa mu kasance cikin kulawarsa a koda yaushe, amin.                               DAGA DANDALIN AMINU YAHUZA 08080678100

INGANTACCEN SINADARIN KARYA SIHIRI                              📚📚📚📚📚📚📚📚📚    inamasu famadamatsalar sihiri? ina ma'auratanda akashiga tsakaninsu?du ma'auratanda zamansu yaki dadi yazama kullum rigima darashin jindadin zama miji yagujeki bayason zamadake a gda yagujeki yaguji yaranki bayaganin darajarki kullum kuna cikin kunci to kisami wannan sinadari kidinga tirara gdanki ko dakinki kwana 6 kawai to koda tsafi akaimuku mijinki xaidawo gareki

 ina y'an matanda suka rasa samari yazama duk saurayinda yaxo sai yagudu kindade bakiy aureba sam samari basa zuwa kokuma ko sunzo dazarar anfara maganar aure sai magana tawarware samarin sudena zuwa batareda daliliba

Wanda yaransa ke firgita ko fama da matsalolinda suka shafi jinnu to kunemi wannan sinadari dayardar mahalicci zakuga amfaninsa cikin kankanin lokaci.
*yana kawarda cututtukanda ba'asan asalinsuba.
*yawan damuwa kunci ciwon jiki
*yana tasiri wajen kariya daga cutarwar masu hasada da kulla makirci
*yanahana yawan tsoro da fargaba ko faduwa
*yana hana miyagun mafarkai ko firgita acikin bacci
Sunan wann magani ZAWALUL UKUS

PAMEGRANATE OIL
📖📖📖📖📖📖📖📖📖📖📖📖📖📖📖📖📖📖
wannan oil me suna asama sinadarine me matukar amfani arayuwar mata musamman way'anda suka haihu kafin sukoma dakin mijinsu ,dakuma zawarawa dasukakusa yin aure,oil ne dayake hade jikin mace duk irin budewardatayi zaimatsemata gabanta ,masu fama da matsalar bushewar gaba korashinjindadin jima'i ko nemeshi zaishare hawayenku,hakika y'ar uwa gyaranki shine darajarki agurin mijinki.

MATSALOLIN MATA GAMEDA IBADAR AURE           🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆                                                Jin Zafin Ibadar Aure: Idan ya kasance uwargida tana jin zafi lokacin ibadar aure, musamman idan zafin mai tsanani ne, to fargaba da tsoron wannan zafin zai dakusar mata da sha’awarta har ya kasance ta daina jin motsuwarta gaba daya, ballantana har ta iya kai wa ga biyan bukatar sha’awarta. Abubuwan da ke haifar da jin zafi lokacin ibadar aure sun hada da:
1. Rashin isasshiyar lema a ‘yan matanci: Idan ya kasance babu isasshiyar lema a ‘yan matanci, to uwargida za ta rika jin zafi lokacin ibadar aure.Ruwan maziyyin da kan zubo lokacin da aka fara jin motsuwar sha’awa, amfaninsa kamar amfanin man ‘grease’ ne a injina. Wasu cututtuka masu addabar jikin dan Adam, kamar su bushewar jiki, rashin isasshiyar lema a jiki, wani ciwo da ya shafi kod

 ▩・ *ILLAR TSARKI DA RUWAN SANYI* ・▩

Ruwan sanyi yana sanyaya gaban mace, kuma yana kashe kwayoyin  halittar jikinta sannan ya kan daskarar da ni'imar mace kuma ya sanyata jikin ya kasance kullum a sanyaye.


         ■・ *RUWAN* *ZAFI*・■

Yana sa mace ta kasance  da dumi a ko da yaushe kullum, yana amfani wajan kashe kwayoyin cututuka gaban mace, yana kuma amfani wajen narkar da ni'imar mace don haka mace dole sai ta Dave Wajen tsarki da ruwan zafi muddin kika rika kama ruwan da ruwan zafi, ina mai tabbatar miki baki da da matsala wajen gyaran gabanki kuma ni'imar ki kullum tana narkewa, 

Misali kamar kitse a baki danye ba'a narka shi ba, sannan da wanda aka narka nasan idan aka baki zabi, zaki dauki?? Wanda aka narkane zaki dauka,

*KOKUN SAN ℳACEN DA TAFI WACE ℳACE A KIN ℳATA*

Macen mai amafani da ruwan zafi gurin tsarki daban take da mace mai amfani da ruwan sanyi.

💖MAGANIN KAIKAYIN GABA💖
A nemi hulba a dafa snn idan ya dan huce a xauna acIkI at least 30 mint,snn a Debi Wanda aka dafa a sa tsamiya a sha.

💞GYARAN NONO💞
Gero 
Alkama
Jar masara 
Farar shinkafa

💖sai ki gyara ki hadasu ,ki wanke ki shanyasu a rana su bushe,sai ki soya sama sama,sai ki juye  ki kai nika gaba daya,sai ki dinga diban cokali daya da Rabi kina sha da nono ko yoghurt mai kyauta,zaki yi mmk ydd zai canxa.

2💞 ko kuma kisami garin garin hulba ki tafasa sai ki rinka gasa su,idan kin gama sai ki sami man hulban ki shafa musu, wacce xatai yaye  xata rinka sha two weeks bf n after tayi yayen.


💖SANYI MAI SANYA FITAR RUWA DA KAIKAYI KO KURAJE💞

A nemi hulba ,man tafarnuwa, man Shanu,yayankabewa,a daka a hada a Kwana a wajen daya a dinga sakawa acikin shayi ana sha ko a abinci.


💖KA'ARI NI'IMA💞
Ki nemi ridin ki daka ki tankade ki nemi madara ta ruwa ki hada ki gauraya kisha👍

👍💖SAKA ME GIDA SUMBTU💞

Kisamu totuwar rake me tsafta ki busar da iya sauki hada da miski da kanunfari sauki hadasu waje daya ki dakasu ki samu garwashin wuta kina xuba garin kadan  kina tsuguno kibar hayaki ya ratsa gabanki sosai kisamu kamar 5minutes wannan hadin yana karawa mace dandanon jima'i sosai musamman idan kin kasance me ni'ima.


💞YANDA ZAKI ZAMA MAI NI'IMA KAMAR KORAWA💖

  ✨YADDA XAKI HADA✨
Dabino kicireman kwallonshi saiki jika ki fereye dankali kiyanka kanan kixuba kijika maxarkwaila tajiku kixuba kiyanka kwakwa kanana kixuba saikiyi blending dinshi duka saiki tace kisaka a friadge yayi sanyi kiwuni kina sha..😃😃hhhhhhh rannan saikin bani lbr yanda zakiji sumbatu agurin oga😜. yar uwa ki nemi rake ki yanka shi kanana kanana kamar alawar yara😋😋😋 sai ki sashi a tukunya da ruwa ki jefa kanumfari bada yawa ba fa da yar cittar ki itama ba mai yawa ba sannan ki bare dabinon ki ki wanke ki zuba aciki sai ki dora kan wuta ya dahu sosai sai ki sauke ki kwashe raken nan da dabino di shanye ruwa kuma ki maida kan wuta ki cilla mazalkwaila a ciki sai ta narke sai ki sauke kisa a fridge ki wuni kina sha hmmmmmmm ba'a magana nidai nayi 😷 sai kun gwada kazu ba wata sirrin amma banda sokuwar mace fa👋👋👋. fiddo kenan😉 ***DAGA TASKAR KI GYARA DA KANKI** DABINO........1 Dabino da zuma da minannas da ganyen idon zakara,da garin asuwakin mata dana yayan zogale da mazarkwaila,sai ki zubasu a tukunya a tare da dabinon ki dafasu su dahu sosai,sai ki ajiye kullum kina cin dabino guda 7,yana ciko mace da kara mata ni,ima.2-Busashshen Dabino a dakeshi ya zama gari a tankade sai a daka bagaruwa ita ma tayi laushi a tankade a hadasu da garin dabinon asaka zuma da miski a curesu guri daya ki ajiye,duk lokacin da kike da bukata sai ki debi kadan ki manna a gabanki kamar da magrib don ya kama jikinki sosai,zaki matse kiyi dadi a gurin oga. 4-Dabino ki samu me laushi ki markadashi tare da kaninfari da danyar citta da kwakwa idan yayi laushi sai ki tace ki sha,dadinki dabanne a gurin oga,haka idan oga ne yasha dadinsa na musamman ne,don karin bayani  kinemi  group dina me suna 💙sirrin rike miji💚 ko kuma 

5 SALAMTA KISHIYA
Yar uwa kada kiji an ce SALAMTA kishiya ki kama murna kin sami abin korar abokiyar zamanki, kiji tsoron Allah sanda zakiyi wannan hadin, ki sanya aranki zakiyi ne domin ki samo martaba daga gurin mijinki ba cutar da yar uwarki ba!
KAYAN HADI :
Garin icen Garafuni (kadan)
Garin Teduwa
Garin Bagaruwa
Nonon kurciya
Farin Miski
Man kadanya
Ki sami wadannan kayan ki hadesu guri guda ki kwabasu da dan kauri kiyi matsi da shi agabanki.
Tabbas yar uwa gabanki zai tsuke ya koma karami tamkar wata yar budurwa amma fa ki tanadi ruwan  -Yadda xaki gane a matse kike tsam kuma kina da ni'ima, tun daga yanayin yadda kike tafiya xaki ji a jikinki, sannan kuma baxa ki rika jin iska na fita a gabanki ba, idan kuma kina da ni'ima kullum xa kiji farjinki da danshi  ba a bushe kamas ba. 

2- dangane da ruwan da yake fitar miki a farji, idan ya kasance ruwa ne mai yauki mara wari to wannan ruwa ne na ni'ima idan kuma yana wari kuma yana fitowa kamar majina infection ne. 

3- idan kika fuskanci farjin ki yayi lakwaf kamar lalataccen tumaturi, abu na farko da xaki fara yi shi ne ki daina tsarki da ruwan sanyi sai na dumi, sannan kuma ki dafa bagaruwa da ganyen magarya ya xamana sune abin tsarkinki insha Allah xai gyaru ya dawo daidai. 

4- dangane da yawan saurin fushi, ki xamo mai juriya ba daga miji ya fada miki magana ki mayar masa ba, ki rika kokari kina danne xuciyarki, kuma ko a sallah ki rika rokar Allah ya kara miki hakuri da juriya ya hanaki sabawa mijinki, sannan a duk lokacin da kika ji fushin ya taso miki kije kiyi alwala kamar yadda manxon Allah ya fada mana a hadisi. 

5- maganin tumbi ki nemi sassaken gamji da jar kanwa ki dafa ki rika sha, insha Allah xai ragu, maganin nankarwa kuma ki samu man kadanya ki matsa masa lemon tsami da man xaitun ki rika shafawa xai bace 

6-  abinda yake kawo tusar gaba sune, yawo ba takalmi xama a kasa lokacin al'ada, shan ruwan sanyi, tsarki da ruwan sanyi, da kuma bude kama a lokacin sex da maigida da barin fanka a ko Ac a lokacin da ake yi su suke kawo haka maganin wannan matsalar shi ne a kiyaye abinda yake kawota, sannan a laxamci tsarki da ruwan dumi. 

7- inserting idan na turaren miski ne ana so ya shiga can ciki, amma indai na sauran abubuwa ne a barshi daga waje, sannan idan budurwace ba a so ta rika cusa abu cikin jikinta, yana bude farji har ma ga matan aure. 
wallahu a'alam ❤❤ TURARAN FARJI❤❤
Wannan hadin shi xaisa farji ya dunga kamshi a duk lokacin gabatar da jima'i    KAYAN HADI
- ANBUR
- MISKI
- GANYAN MAGARYA
- RIHATUL HUBBI
- MA'U MA'I ( MA'UL MIYAMI )
- Sai ki hada su waje daya ki tafasa su ki juye roba  ki kara ruwa ki xauna a ciki kamar 30 minute. Lokacin da xaki kwanta ki kama ruwa dashi ki shafa ruwan a gefen gabanki( FARJIN KI)  wannan shi xai hana mijin ki ya guje ki, ki xama tauraruwa a wajan sa kuma kamshi xai dunga tashi lokacin da kuke gabatar da ibadan aure "YAN UWA MU GWADA WANNAN SIRRIN YANA DA AMFANI. DAGA DAN UWANKU MUBARAKMJ 💙SIRRIN RIKE MIJI💚              << SIRRIN WANKA DA MIJI >>> wanka  tare da miji yana kara dankon soyayya tsakanin ma'aurata. Yawanci abin ga mata yake, saboda sun fi maza kunya. Uwargida ba maganar kunya a nan. Da kin lura da maigida zai shiga wanka, ki zauna kina kallon sa yayin  da yake shiri. Kar ki nuna masa tare za ku yi wankan, sai lokacin da zai Shiga ban daki kawai ki bi shi ku shiga tare, ki ce masa yau ni zan yi maka wanka. Da kun Shiga sai ki cire kayan ki duka za ki ga ya saki baki Yana kallon ki. Sannan ki juyo ki cire masa nasa kaya ko towel din. Toh yanzu fa aikin yake uwargida. Kama hannun sa za ki yi ki nufi guri wankan za ki ga ya biyo ki kamar rakumi. Abin zai fi ba da armashi idan shower ce, ki bude ta sannan ki tura shi ciki ya fara jika, tun a lokacin za ki ga bananar sa ta fara mikewa. Bayan ya jika ke ma sai ki jika jikin ki daga nan sai ki dauko sabulu ki fara murzawa a jikin sa ko'ina gaba da baya. Sannan ke ma ki ba   shi sabulu ki ce ya murza a jikin ki   ko'ina. Idan sabulu ya game jiki, a lokacin za ki ga bananar sa ta yi tsaye tana sama tana kasa kamar liman na tahiyar sallah. Shawarar da zan ba ki a nan uwargida ita ki yi wuf ki cafki maigida ki rungume shi ki hada jikin ki da nashi kuna cuda juna. Ki cuda bayan sa da hannun ki har zuwa duwawun sa kina kara matsa shi a jikin ki. Ki juya kisa bananar sa a jikin duwawun ki kina mulmula ta ki kama hannuwan sa ki dora a kan nonon ki ya cigaba da shafa maki su, yana cuda jikin ki. Sannan ki juyo ki kama bananar sa ki cigaba mulmula ta kina zura hannun ki wajen yan kwallayen sa kina cuda su har tsakankanin cinyoyinsa. Uwargida daga nan ya rage naki idan kina bukata ku wanke jiki ku fita, ida kuma shaawa ki duka ki kama bananar nan ki tura ta cikin rubin dadinki maigida ya cigaba da sukuwa. Uwargida ke za ki ban labari. Don wannan aikin sunansa manta uwa.NOTE 👉👀 bawai nayi  wannan bayanin bane domin rashin kunya a  a nayine dominku acikinku akwai wadanda suke cewa idan anzo irin wannan bayanin ake faiyacemusu komai yanda zasu gane, ina  neman afuwa agurin duk wanda wannan bayanin ya batawa rai👌  BA BOKA BA MALLAM GA WANI DAN SIRRI DAZAKI HADA DA KANKIKi dafa kanunfari idan ya dauko nuna saikizuba zumaa ciki, bayan kin sauke ki sami garin ridi kizuba kihada nonon shanu mara tsami ki gaurayaidan yayisanyi ki sha......sai naji daga gare ku............ki sami kanunfari da dabino ki jika sai suntsima saikirinka diban ruwan kinasa zuma da madarakina sha,duk abinda aka ji na yafe kar a fada min.........GYARA 3ta sami sassaken baure ta dafashi dakanumfari cittada lipton ta hada ta tafada sai ta tace ta sa afridgetarim ga sha tsimine wlhy yana da kyausosai GYARA 1,zaki samu garin zogale ne ki jika ki ringa shasau biyua rana. Kina tashi daga bacci kafin kici komaiki sharuwan zogale,sai kuma in zaki kwanta Yazamo nakarshe.Sai kuma in Kina infection ki ringa seat bathdashi GYARA 4Ki daka aya ki tankade sai ki samubushasshen dabinoshima ki dake shi, hade da mazarkwaila kihade su dagarin ayar. Ki sami nono ki rinka damawakina sha.AMFANIN TAFARNUWA GA MATA PART 1::::::*************************Idan mace tana ciwon mara ko ciwon ciki alokacin al'ada ko jinin yarikayi mata wasa, tasamu zuma cokali 5 tahada da man tafarnuwa cokali 2, in an hada sai tarika sha cokali 1 dasafe 1 da yamma,MATAR DA JINI YAKI DAUKE MATA tarika shan man tafarnuwa rabin karamin cokali sau 4 arana.RIGA KAFIN CIWON NONO GA WACCE TA HAIHU; Anacindabino guda 7 asha man tafarnuwa karamin cokali sau 1 arana kwana uku.DAUREWAR CIKIKO MARA BAYAN HAIHUWA; Asamu ruwa mai zafi kofi 1 azuba man tafarnuwa karamin cokali asha sau 1 kwana 3.YAWAN LALACEWAR CIKI KOYAWAN BARI; asamu kwan agwagwa asoya da man tafarnuwa abaiwa matar taci sau 2 arana kwana 7.TSAWON GASHI DA HANASHIKAKKARYEWA; Asamu man kwakwa ahada da man zaitun da man tafarnuwa arinka shafawa akai, amma man tafarnuwa 50% za,asa saurankuma 100&... Allah yasa mudace...zan kawo wasu da yarda Allah.Muhammadurrasulillah (saw) yace: lelle mace tana fuskantowa da fuskan sheitan (kirjin ta) kuma tana juya baya daga sheitan (duwawukan ta).... Saboda haka aka umarce ku da ku sa hijibi domin ku rufe wadannan ababe guda biyu.    Yaci gaba da cewa (maza) idan dayan ku yaga mace ta burge shi to ya koma ga iyalan sa haka ze cire masa abinda ke cikin ransa. To yan'uwa mata kuji tsoron  Allah ku dinga shigan mutunci domin wasu basu da matan  wasu kuwa matansu ba su da irin sirrin da Allah ya ba ki, wasu masu hakuri wasu marasa hakuri. Kinga idan kuka fiddo da wadannan abubuwa kuna yawo bisa titi ba karamin fitana kuke sanyawa yan'uwammu musulmi (maza) koma na yayan mu. Dibi yar'uwa yanda kuke yafa gyale azamanin nan  nonuwa waje duwawuka waje. Kuji tsoron Allah ku gyara. Yar'uwa idan kin samu wannan sako ki turawa masoyanki  mata don Allah dan darajar annabi (saw). Cikakkiyar masoyiyar  manzo Allah (saw) zata iya turawa karanci mata 5 idan ko ta kasa to ta sawa kanta alamar tambaya? Shin ta cika masoyiyar baban fadimatu (saw)‬: KARIN NI'IMA A AL'ADANCE A SAWWAKE KUMA A GARGAJIYANCE. BYsirrin riqe miji . GROUP ADMIN MUBARAKMJB. 1.Anaso mace tarinka gyara kanta tun tana gIdan iyayenta basai tayi aure ko kuma tazo yin aure kafin ta fara gyara kanta ba. Wasu da yawan yan mata idan sukaji ance su gyara kansu sai kaga sunayin abin har yana wuce gona da iri. Abun da ya kamata kina yi tun kafin kiyi aure aure shine. 1. TSARKI DA RUWAN ZAFI. Tsarki da ruwan dumi ba karamin taimakawa yakeyi ba wajen gyaran farji. Mata ku kiyaye tsarki da ruwan sanyi sabida ba karamin illa yakeyi ma mace ba. 2. GANYEN MAGARYA. Anaso mace ta dingayin tsarki da ganyen magarya idan da so samune ya zama shine permanent ruwan tsarkin ki shima ba karamin gyara farji yakeyi ba. 3. ZUMA. Anaso mace ta ringa shan zuma chokali daya d safe daya da daddare. Wannan yan taimakawa wajen dawo miki da ni'iman ki da ya fita yayin da kike jinin al'ada. 4. Anaso mace a sa'ilin da take cikin jinin al'adan ta ta rinka shan zuma chokali uku kullum da safe har tsawon kwanakin da zata gama al'adan ta. 5. A sa'ilin  da kika gama al'ada bayan kinyi wanka sai ki dan debi zuma kadan da hannun ki ki saka a bakin farjinki anaso kiyi hakan har na tsawon kwana uku. 6. MAN HABBATUS SAUDA. Zaki samu man habbatus sauda shima kirinka sha kina shafa a farjinki. 7 KANKANA DA MADARA. Anaso mace ta rinka shan kankana da madara a ko wani lokacin da ta gama al'adan ta. 8. KANKANA DA CUCUMBER. zaki yanka kankana da cucumber a sai ki hadasu kiyi blending kirinka a duk lokacin da kika samu halin yi. 9. MISKIL A'ISHA. Anaso mace ta samu miskil Aisha ki rinka sa kadan a  farjinki. Zaki koda kin wanke pants dinki wannan kamshin yanan a jikin shi. Yadan nan abubuwan dana lissafa suna da yawa irin wanda ya kama mace ta rinka yi kenan tun tana gaban iyayen ta. Da Allah mata a daina yawa chushe chushe ma farji yawan yin hakan ba karamin matsala yake jawo wa ba. AKWAI IRIN gyaran da akeyiwa amare wanda abun da akeyi musu bai kamata ayimusu. 💟💟💟 ELEVEN WAYS DA SISTER ZATABI DON SAMIN INGANTACCEN NI'IMA A JIKINTA💟💟💟
1.kunun zaqin dabino; xaki sami dabino mai kyau ki cire kwallayen ki tsabtace shi, sai ki jiqa har saiyayi taushi sossai saiki markada a blander,ki saka zuma ko shuga kadan da madarar ruwa,asa yayi sanyi sai ki sha
2. Yawan cin kwadon zogale da tumatir tare da dafaffen kwai
3. Yawan cin dabinon da bai bushe ba tare da shan ruwa yana taimakawa sossai
4. Ganyen idon zakara adakashi ana hadawa da man tafanuwa kadan da nono ko yogurt 
5. Yawan shan Lipton wanda yaji kanunfari,citta da na'ana'a(wannan bake ba har mai gida) yana kawo dumin jiki wa mace kuma ya kara ni'ima
6. Sister ki sami 'yayan zogale busheshe ki daka da dabino da cikwi ki dinga sha da nono zakiyi mamaki sossai
7. Ki dake ayar ki tare da dabino,kanunfari kina sha da nono hmmn.....
8. Ki samu alkamanki a niqo miki ita ki soya sama sama haryayi ja idan ki ka kusan gama period naki sai ki dama kaman salala da nono kisha sau uku(domin jinin na tafia da abubuwa dayawa)
9. Cucumber ki fere ki yanka tumatir dayawa albasa kadan dafaffen kwai da garin kuli zai baki ni'ima sossai sossai mussaman kici daf magrib
10. Zuma da garin habbatussauda mai kyau da man xaitun zatana sha table spoon biyu safe biyu yamma for 2wks 
11. Madarar ruwa gwangwani daya da kwai ki buga har sai ya daina kumfu asa 
MACE MAI NEMAN HAIHUWA 
Idan kina neman haihuwa ko kindade baki haihuba to Dr Mubarakmjb yace ki jarraba wayan nan magungunan da allah yy masa baiwarsu SIRRI NA DAYA 
Kisami garin hurmul ki dafa da ruwa kafin ya tafasa saiki sauke kisirka da ruwa daidai yanda zaki iya shiga ciki ki zauna har saiya huce kiyi kamar sau uku acikin wannan satin insha allah zaki samu ciki idan har lafiyarki qalau saboda abinda yake kawo matsalar mace bata samun ciki shine wani lokaci maniyyin namijin ne baya samun damar shiga mahaifarta saboda wasu matsaloli misali in azzakari yy kankanta baya shiga cenciki ko kuma kofar mahaifa bata buduwa lokacin saduwarku ko karancin maniyyin namiji ajikinsa in baya fitarda shi dayawa to wayan nan abubuwan suna hana mace samun ciki to in kina amfani wayan nan magungunan mahaifa zai ringa kasan cewa koda yaushe abude kuma zaki samu ciki da yarda allah 
SIRRI NA BIYU 
Kisami danyar gyada ki dakata kina shanta da ruwan zafi sau uku a rana in har kin sadu da mijinki saikinyi ciki da yardar allah 
SIRRI NA UKU 
Idan kikayi wankan haila aranar ki sadu da mijinki karki bari sai washegari don a ranar mahaifa tana kangaba nasa mun ciki 
SIRRI NA HUDU 
Kisami man ridi duk lokacin da zaki sadu da mijinki sai kishafa a mararki indai kikayi wannan in kinada rabon haihuwa aduniya to zaki sami ciki
SIRRI NA BIYAR
Ki sayi 🐇zomo a yanka ki gyara naman ki soya kici da mismillah ki kwanta da mijinki a ranarda kikaci naman insha allah zakiyi ciki 
SIRRI NA SHIDA
Kisami habbatus sauda kidakeshi kihada da manshanu ki kwaba idan zaki sadu da mijinki saiki lasa da yatsanki sau uku shima kofofi zasu bude
SIRRI NA BAKWAI
Yawan cikin danyen dankali na hausa kijuri cinsa shima
SIRRI NA TAKWAS
In zaki sadu da mijinki kiringa karanta astagafirillahil lazimil lazi la'ilaha illallahu wa atubu ilaihi zaki sami ciki kuma zaki haifi da mai albarka
SIRRI NA TARA
Kisami kwan agwagwa guda biyu ki soya shida man tafarnuwa dasafe zakici kafin kikarya shizaki fara sawa acikinki kiyi kwana biyar kinaci insha allah allah zai warware miki komeye zaki samu ciki 
Dan allah yar uwa kigwada wanda kikaga zaki iyayi san nan akula aringa yawaita kusantar maigida bawai adinga shan magani Kuma ana gudun miji ba to ta ina zaki sami cikin kuma kidinga kula idan azzakarinsa yana shiga a karkace inyashiga baya bin inda yakamata to zairinga zubarda maniyyinsa ne awani gurin ba a bakin mahaifaba wanda hakan
Na iyasawa adau tsawon lokaci ba a samu cikiba harma kiringa tinanin ko kinada matsala ne ALLAH YASA A DACE AMEEN YA TAIMAKEMU .
SABULUN WANKA GA MATA
****************************
Kasancewar da yawa an bukaci sake yin post akan wannan sabulun In shaa Allahu ga shi na sake post akai.

yin tsarki da sabulun wanka yana kawo wa mata matsala sosai, saboda irin sinadaran Chemicals din da ake hada sabulun yana da hatsari ne ga dan Adam, musamman ma mata (domin yakan kawo musu cancer of vagina).

Amma ga wata FA'IDA da zaku hada sabulu da kan ku domin yin wanka ko tsarki, kuma ba tare da ya kawo wata matsala ba kuma za'a iya amfani da shi cikin kwanciyar hankali, ba tare da wata damuwa ba, kuma bayan haka yana maganin yawancin cutukka na mata musamman na kaikaiyin gaba, da sauransu. Zaa iya samun  hadden sabulun a wajen ...

Abubuwan da zaku nema.
• SABULUN ZAITUN
• MISKI
• BAGARUWA.
• MAN HULBA.

Da farko, za'a nemi sabulun Zaitun, amma fa wanda aka rubuta Zaplan a jikin kwalin (DOMIN YAFI KYAU), kada a ba ku marar kyau. idan kuma ba'a sameta ba ayi da ta kamfanin Hemani.

Sai a nemi Bagaruwa, a daka ta ta
daku, a zuba a roba sai a yanyanka sabulun zaitun din kanana-kanana a kan garin bagaruwan, a zuba Miskin a ciki a Kwaba shi da ruwan Hulba, a kwaba su sosai har sai ya yi kauri.

Sai a zuba a roba mai kyau a rufe, Sai a rika wanka da shi, kuma ana yin tsarki da shi.

Kwararru a fannin kiwon lafiya sun bayyana cewa irin wannan Sabulun ba shi da wani hadari ko ‘Side effect’ ga mace, kuma zai kara tsuke mace, sannan ta rika kamshi da kuma karuwar ni’ima.

Sannan mazama zasu iya hada wannan sabulun su rika wanka da shi.

please ku turawa 'yan uwanku domin mu amfana

*GA MATA KAN DA ZAIBI DOMIN SAMUN WARAKA*
□ mai wannan matsalar yaringa yawan mosta jiki.
□ ya rage yawan amfani da kayan zaki da maiko.
□ ya ringa yawan amfani da kayan lambu da ganyen da kayan marmari masu kara kuzari.
• kankana
• ayaba
• gwada

• habbatusauda

✿ sanna ka ringa gabatar da wasanni kafin jima'i da iyali don rashin yin wasan yana kawo karancin sha'awa da kuma rashin gamsuwa misali kiss, shafa nono, da dai sauran su.
👙 *CIWON NONO* 👙
a na cin dabino guda 7 asha man tafarnuwa karamin cokali sau 1 a rana kwana uku.
👙 *CIWON NONO 2*👙
wacce ke fama da ciwon nono to ta samu za'atir ta daka shi a shafe nono da shi, daga yamma zuwa safiya sannan a wanke, a shafe shi da man zaitun da safe.
*MAGANIN SA GIRMAN NONO*
macen da bata da girman nono, kuma take so nononta ya ciko, amma ba gingimeme ba, irin na masu shayarwa ba, to sai tayi amfani da wadannan mahadan.
▣ hulba
▣ zuma
▣ lemon tsami
da farko ta samu zuma kamar rabin kofi sai ta zuba hulnba karamin cokali, sannan sai ta zuba ruwan lemon tsami cikin karamin cokali daya, sai ta rinka sha a kowace rana sau biyu, tare da samun man hulba tana shafawa a kirjinta.
HANYA TA BIYU zaki iya samun wadannan mahadan kamar haka
• gero
• alkama
• farar shinkafa
• madara -peak-
• dabino
da farko sai a samu dabino mai kyau sai a cire kwallon sai a hada shi tare da sauran mahadan sai ki bayar a niko miki idan an niko sai ki tankade sai ki samu madara peak sai ki dama ki rinka sha.
To in dai kina yin haka akai-akai zaki ga yadda nononki zai ciko ya mike kamar an busa balo sannan fatarki tayi laushi.
*DAUREWAR CIKI KO MARA BAYAN HAIHUWA.*
a samu ruwa mai zafi kofi "1 a zuba man tafarnuwa karamin cokali a sha sau 2 kwana 3.

idan aka samu mace mai zafin gaba ko namiji mai zafin sinadari.
_gwanda
_kwa-kwa
_dabino
sai a markada a dinga sha da daddare zai kara sinadarai za'a iya sawa a firji.

                🥑 GYARAN GASHI 🥝

gashi yana daya daga abinda yake karawa mata kyau , yana da kyau ki kasance gwana wajen iya gyaran gashinki.

✿ GARIN HULBA
➜ RUWAN LALLE
◈ SABULUN HABBATUSSAUDA

garin hulba ki zuba acikin ruwan lalle ki dafa ya dafu sosai sannan saiki saukeshi kibarshi yayi sanyi sannan ki samun sabulun habbatussauda ki wanke.

kayin dashi sannan saiki samu wadannan mayikan.

✔ man zaitun
✔ man kwakwa
✔ man alayyadi
✔man habbatussauda
✔ man Sim Sim
✔ zautun lauz
duk wadannan mayikan Zaki hadasu waje daya sannan kina shafawa akai kisamu kamar wata guda ko fiye da haka.....insha Allah gashinki zaiyi tsayi yayi laushi yayi baki.

♦ GYARA KANKI 
♦ RUWAN ABARBA 

yana da kyau mace ta rinka markadawa tana tacewa tana sha da sugar ko zuma, wannan hadin yana karawa mata ni'ima sosai da sosai.

                ♦⭐ RAKKE ⭐♦

ita ma tana karawa mace ni'ima kuma tana da amfani matuka a jiki, domin tana tcce ruwa.

                        ♦ AYA ♦

ita ma duk tafiyar su daya da rake, ayar anaso irin bula-bulanan tana da matukar muhimmanci gurin mace tana da ni'ima sosai , kuma za'a iya samun kunun aya a hada shi da madara ta ruwa.

                   ⭐ ZAITUN ⭐
man zaitun yana magunguna da yawa to anaso mace ta rinka shafashi ajikinta yana gyara fata da saka santsi jiki, hakama yana da kyau macce ta dinga shafawa a gabanta, yana saka laushi.

           ♦ BAWON BAGARUWA ♦

gaban 'ya mace yana tsukewa ya koma karamin.

                🍯 YADDA ZAKI HADA 🌿

da farko aya za a samu a wanketa a gyara sai ki shanya ta bushe ki sakata a turmi ki dake , amma kar tayi laushi ki sami bagaruwa ta makka wacce a ke ci ki dauko cukui dinki ki hada da gyadar mata ki dake su suyi laushi so sai idan da hali a Kai inji a nika.

ki wanke kantun ki yayi fes asuwakin mata nono kuruciya ki gyara dan kar su hada miki da wata abar dabino a cire kwallon ki hada da mazarkwaila ki dakesu.

cukui ki hada su da garin bagaruwa. Dana aya ki cakuda su sai ki sami nono, kindirmo kina sha da safe cokali shida wannan ma hadin yana karawa mace ni'ima.

YADDA AKEYI
da farko ki sami ayar ki ki jikata ki surfata ki rege ki fitar da kura kuma dusa da tsakuwa ki dauko dabinonki ki wanke shi, ki cere kwallayen ciki ki zuba akan ayarki, sai ki dauko kwakwarki ki fasata ki tsiyaye ruwan.
cikinta a cikin kofi ki ajiye ta daban.

ki dau kwakwar kiyi mata yanka kanana ki zubata akan ayar da dabino ki dauki hankalinki ki zauna ki bareshi ki yankashi kananan ki zuba akan kayan hadinki, bayan haka ki dauko gyadar mata itama ki bare ta ki gyarata ki zuba . 

sai ki bayar akai miki markade , amma kar a saka ruwa mai yawa, idan kin San za a saka ruwa sai ki sami blanda kiyi markadenki a ciki,bayan an kawo miki markaden ko kuma kin gama markada wa a blanda sai ki sami mayafi mai kyau ko rariya mai kyau ki tace ruwan ki ajiye dusar a gefe. bayan kin ajiye dusar a gefe sai ki dauko ruwan kwakwarki ki
zuba a cikin markadadden ruwan ayar sai ki dauko madararki ta ruwa mai kyau sai ki zuba a cikin hadin ki dan juya kadan sai ki dandana idan yayi Zaki shi kenan yayi idan kuma bai yiba sai ki dauko akewar mata ki zuba a ciki sannan ki kawo sukari kadan ki zuba sai ki juya kunu ya juyu.

Ana so ki saka kankara ko ki saka a cikin firji yayi sanyi.

yar uwa Ana so ki mai da shi ruwan sha kullum kina sha zakiga yadda jikinki zaiyi banza ki dai naba ko da ya kare Zaki sake yin wani hadin har sai kin ga ni'ima tayi miki yaddda kike so sannan Zaki Dena.

☛ Bagaruwan hausa. 

....ana dafa ta da ganyen magarya ko ita kadai a rika wanke gaba dashi ko ki zuba a baho ki zauna a ciki da dumin kaman 30mins a kalla sau biyu a sati.

.
☞ Kanunfari ana dafa shi a sha da zuma da zafi zafi ko ki jika ya kwana da safe ki tace kisha da madara da zuma.

Ana kuma dafa ta a zauna a ciki da dumin ta ko a rika tsarki da ruwan ko kuma a zuba kanun farin garwashi a tsugunna shi ma sau 2 a sati Kwallon mangwaro idan kika fasa zaki ga dan ciki
fari haka, ana busar dashi a daka a kwaba da zuma arika matsi da shi bayan isha'I idan zaki kwanta
bacci ki wanke ko kuma ki dafa dan cikin da bagaruwa ki wuni tsarki dashi ko ki zauna a ciki
n shima a kalla 3x a sati.


☞ Almiski fari ko ja ki daka kanunfari ki tankade yai laushi sai ki kwaba da miskin da man zaitun yawaita amfani dashi na matse mace sosai kuma kullum cikin kamshi....yana gyara macen da ta haihu sosai musamman da jinin haihuwa ya dauke ki fara amfani dashi har ki ar'bain...

Sai suka ce" kai Bala ka yi sa'a. Allah ya bada zaman lafiya."
Bayan yan watanni kadan sai su ka hadu da abokan na shi, sai suka ce "Bala ya muslimatin?". Sai yace "ai yanzu ta zama muguwatin, munafukatin, kazamiyatin, makiratin, shegiyatin, azzalumatin."kuma saura kiris tazama bazawaratin.....😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😊🙂😊😂😂😂😂😂

*DOMIN TSAFTACE MAHAIFA*
ga mai bukatar tsaftace mahaifarta da kuma karramata da
kashe duk cuta ko kwayar cuta dake zama bakin mahaifa, to wannan hadin da zamu yi bayani yanada muhimmanci
musamman ga
➽mai zafin mahaifa, ko kuma ➽yara suna mutuwa a ciki,
ko mai fama da
➽ toshewar bakin mahaifa ko kuma
matsalar ta farune sakamakon amfani da wadansu
➽magunguna na hana daukar ciki ba bisa ka'idaba, ko ➽
sha
wasu miyagun kwayoyi, ko kuma
➽ yawan zubar da ciki, kuma
hakan
➽ yana iya faruwa idan aka samu mace mai yawan bin
maza,hakan zai iya haifar da kamuwa da manyan cututtukan
da zasu iya lalata mahaifar.
~ ganyen gwaiba
~ ganyen lemun tsami
~ garin rumzali
~ nana shayi
~ kananfari rabin gwangwani

cuta da zata iya shiga cikin mahaifa ta kawo illa ga lafiyarki

*MAGANI WARIN GABA (FARJI)*
abubuwan dakesa gaban mace yana wari.
~tafiya babu wando pant
~rashin sanya takalmi koda kuwa a cikin gida ne
~dadewa akan (toilet) masai

~yawaita cin danyar albasa

~tsarki da ruwan sanyi
~rashin aske gaba dadai sauransu.
MAGINI WANNAN CUTA ◉
1=mace ta dinga tsarki da ruwan dumi.
2=ki dinga yawan canza wando a kullum kamar sau ³
3=ki rage cin danyar albasa
4=a duk lokacin da mace ta gama haila ta dinga wanke gabanta da ganyen magarya ko bagaruwa da almiski fari.
5=ki daina tsugunawa akan Masai kina dauka lokacin domin yin haka yana da matsala
6=ta yawaita aske gabanta duk sati ¹ ko ² idan mace zata bin wa'yannan dokokin zata samu waraka daga duk wata cutar farji

*ILLAR* *TSARKI* *DA* *RUWAN* *SANYI*😭😭😭😭🙆
Ruwan sanyi yana sanyaya gaban mace, kuma yana kashe kwayoyin  halittar jikinta sannan ya kan daskarar da ni'imar mace kuma ya sanyata jikin ya kasance kullum a sanyaye🙍🙍🙍

 *RUWAN* *ZAFI*
Yana sa mace ta kasance  da dumi a ko da yaushe kullum, yana amfani wajan kashe kwayoyin cututuka gaban mace, yana kuma amfani wajen narkar da ni'imar mace don haka mace dole sai ta Dave,
Wajen tsarki da ruwan zafi muddin kika rika kama ruwan da ruwan zafi, ina mai tabbatar miki baki da da matsala wajen gyaran gabanki kuma ni'imar ki kullum tana narkewa, 
Misali kamar kitse a baki danye ba'a narka shi ba, sannan da wanda aka narka nasan idan aka baki zabi, zaki dauki?? Wanda aka narkane zaki dauka,
🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍🍍

*KOKUN* *SAN* *MACEN* *DA* *TAFI* *WACE* *MACE* *A* *KIN* *MATA*?
Macen mai amafani da ruwan zafi gurin tsarki daban take da mace mai amfani da ruwan sanyi

💖SANYI MAI SANYA FITAR RUWA DA KAIKAYI KO KURAJE💞

Ki sami wadannan kayan ki hadesu guri guda ki kwabasu da dan kauri kiyi matsi da shi agabanki.
Tabbas yar uwa gabanki zai tsuke ya koma karami tamkar wata yar budurwa amma fa ki tanadi ruwan  -Yadda xaki gane a matse kike tsam kuma kina da ni'ima, tun daga yanayin yadda kike tafiya xaki ji a jikinki, sannan kuma baxa ki rika jin iska na fita a gabanki ba, idan kuma kina da ni'ima kullum xa kiji farjinki da danshi  ba a bushe kamas ba. 

2- dangane da ruwan da yake fitar miki a farji, idan ya kasance ruwa ne mai yauki mara wari to wannan ruwa ne na ni'ima idan kuma yana wari kuma yana fitowa kamar majina infection ne. 

3- idan kika fuskanci farjin ki yayi lakwaf kamar lalataccen tumaturi, abu na farko da xaki fara yi shi ne ki daina tsarki da ruwan sanyi sai na dumi, sannan kuma ki dafa bagaruwa da ganyen magarya ya xamana sune abin tsarkinki insha Allah xai gyaru ya dawo daidai. 

4- dangane da yawan saurin fushi, ki xamo mai juriya ba daga miji ya fada miki magana ki mayar masa ba, ki rika kokari kina danne xuciyarki, kuma ko a sallah ki rika rokar Allah ya kara miki hakuri da juriya ya hanaki sabawa mijinki, sannan a duk lokacin da kika ji fushin ya taso miki kije kiyi alwala kamar yadda manxon Allah ya fada mana a hadisi. 

5- maganin tumbi ki nemi sassaken gamji da jar kanwa ki dafa ki rika sha, insha Allah xai ragu, maganin nankarwa kuma ki samu man kadanya ki matsa masa lemon tsami da man xaitun ki rika shafawa xai bace 

6-  abinda yake kawo tusar gaba sune, yawo ba takalmi xama a kasa lokacin al'ada, shan ruwan sanyi, tsarki da ruwan sanyi, da kuma bude kama a lokacin sex da maigida da barin fanka a ko Ac a lokacin da ake yi su suke kawo haka maganin wannan matsalar shi ne a kiyaye abinda yake kawota, sannan a laxamci tsarki da ruwan dumi. 

7- inserting idan na turaren miski ne ana so ya shiga can ciki, amma indai na sauran abubuwa ne a barshi daga waje, sannan idan budurwace ba a so ta rika cusa abu cikin jikinta, yana bude farji har ma ga matan aure.

Lokacin da xaki kwanta ki kama ruwa dashi ki shafa ruwan a gefen gabanki( FARJIN KI)  wannan shi xai hana mijin ki ya guje ki, ki xama tauraruwa a wajan sa kuma kamshi xai dunga tashi lokacin da kuke gabatar da ibadan aure "YAN UWA MU GWADA WANNAN SIRRIN YANA DA AMFANI. DAGA DAN UWANKU MUBARAKMJ 💙SIRRIN RIKE MIJI💚              << SIRRIN WANKA DA MIJI >>> wanka  tare da miji yana kara dankon soyayya tsakanin ma'aurata. Yawanci abin ga mata yake, saboda sun fi maza kunya. Uwargida ba maganar kunya a nan. Da kin lura da maigida zai shiga wanka, ki zauna kina kallon sa yayin  da yake shiri. Kar ki nuna masa tare za ku yi wankan, sai lokacin da zai Shiga ban daki kawai ki bi shi ku shiga tare, ki ce masa yau ni zan yi maka wanka. Da kun Shiga sai ki cire kayan ki duka za ki ga ya saki baki Yana kallon ki. Sannan ki juyo ki cire masa nasa kaya ko towel din. Toh yanzu fa aikin yake uwargida. Kama hannun sa za ki yi ki nufi guri wankan za ki ga ya biyo ki kamar rakumi. Abin zai fi ba da armashi idan shower ce, ki bude ta sannan ki tura shi ciki ya fara jika, tun a lokacin za ki ga bananar sa ta fara mikewa. Bayan ya jika ke ma sai ki jika jikin ki daga nan sai ki dauko sabulu ki fara murzawa a jikin sa ko'ina gaba da baya. Sannan ke ma ki ba   shi sabulu ki ce ya murza a jikin ki   ko'ina. Idan sabulu ya game jiki, a lokacin za ki ga bananar sa ta yi tsaye tana sama tana kasa kamar liman na tahiyar sallah. Shawarar da zan ba ki a nan uwargida ita ki yi wuf ki cafki maigida ki rungume shi ki hada jikin ki da nashi kuna cuda juna. Ki cuda bayan sa da hannun ki har zuwa duwawun sa kina kara matsa shi a jikin ki. Ki juya kisa bananar sa a jikin duwawun ki kina mulmula ta ki kama hannuwan sa ki dora a kan nonon ki ya cigaba da shafa maki su, yana cuda jikin ki. Sannan ki juyo ki kama bananar sa ki cigaba mulmula ta kina zura hannun ki wajen yan kwallayen sa kina cuda su har tsakankanin cinyoyinsa. Uwargida daga nan ya rage naki idan kina bukata ku wanke jiki ku fita, ida kuma shaawa ki duka ki kama bananar nan ki tura ta cikin rubin dadinki maigida ya cigaba da sukuwa. Uwargida ke za ki ban labari. Don wannan aikin sunansa manta uwa.NOTE 👉👀 bawai nayi  wannan bayanin bane domin rashin kunya a  a nayine dominku acikinku akwai wadanda suke cewa idan anzo irin wannan bayanin ake faiyacemusu komai yanda zasu gane, ina  neman afuwa agurin duk wanda wannan bayanin ya batawa rai👌  BA BOKA BA MALLAM GA WANI DAN SIRRI DAZAKI HADA DA KANKIKi dafa kanunfari idan ya dauko nuna saikizuba zumaa ciki, bayan kin sauke ki sami garin ridi kizuba kihada nonon shanu mara tsami ki gaurayaidan yayisanyi ki sha......sai naji daga gare ku............ki sami kanunfari da dabino ki jika sai suntsima saikirinka diban ruwan kinasa zuma da madarakina sha,duk abinda aka ji na yafe kar a fada min.........GYARA 3ta sami sassaken baure ta dafashi dakanumfari cittada lipton ta hada ta tafada sai ta tace ta sa afridgetarim ga sha tsimine wlhy yana da kyausosai GYARA 1,zaki samu garin zogale ne ki jika ki ringa shasau biyua rana. Kina tashi daga bacci kafin kici komaiki sharuwan zogale,sai kuma in zaki kwanta Yazamo nakarshe.Sai kuma in Kina infection ki ringa seat bathdashi GYARA 4Ki daka aya ki tankade sai ki samubushasshen dabinoshima ki dake shi, hade da mazarkwaila kihade su dagarin ayar. Ki sami nono ki rinka damawakina sha.AMFANIN TAFARNUWA GA MATA PART 1::::::*************************Idan mace tana ciwon mara ko ciwon ciki alokacin al'ada ko jinin yarikayi mata wasa, tasamu zuma cokali 5 tahada da man tafarnuwa cokali 2, in an hada sai tarika sha cokali 1 dasafe 1 da yamma,MATAR DA JINI YAKI DAUKE MATA tarika shan man tafarnuwa rabin karamin cokali sau 4 arana.RIGA KAFIN CIWON NONO GA WACCE TA HAIHU; Anacindabino guda 7 asha man tafarnuwa karamin cokali sau 1 arana kwana uku.DAUREWAR CIKIKO MARA BAYAN HAIHUWA; Asamu ruwa mai zafi kofi 1 azuba man tafarnuwa karamin cokali asha sau 1 kwana 3.YAWAN LALACEWAR CIKI KOYAWAN BARI; asamu kwan agwagwa asoya da man tafarnuwa abaiwa matar taci sau 2 arana kwana 7.TSAWON GASHI DA HANASHIKAKKARYEWA; Asamu man kwakwa ahada da man zaitun da man tafarnuwa arinka shafawa akai, amma man tafarnuwa 50% za,asa saurankuma 100&... Allah yasa mudace...zan kawo wasu da yarda Allah.Muhammadurrasulillah (saw) yace: lelle mace tana fuskantowa da fuskan sheitan (kirjin ta) kuma tana juya baya daga sheitan (duwawukan ta).... Saboda haka aka umarce ku da ku sa hijibi domin ku rufe wadannan ababe guda biyu.    Yaci gaba da cewa (maza) idan dayan ku yaga mace ta burge shi to ya koma ga iyalan sa haka ze cire masa abinda ke cikin ransa. To yan'uwa mata kuji tsoron  Allah ku dinga shigan mutunci domin wasu basu da matan  wasu kuwa matansu ba su da irin sirrin da Allah ya ba ki, wasu masu hakuri wasu marasa hakuri. Kinga idan kuka fiddo da wadannan abubuwa kuna yawo bisa titi ba karamin fitana kuke sanyawa yan'uwammu musulmi (maza) koma na yayan mu. Dibi yar'uwa yanda kuke yafa gyale azamanin nan  nonuwa waje duwawuka waje. Kuji tsoron Allah ku gyara. Yar'uwa idan kin samu wannan sako ki turawa masoyanki  mata don Allah dan darajar annabi (saw). Cikakkiyar masoyiyar  manzo Allah (saw) zata iya turawa karanci mata 5 idan ko ta kasa to ta sawa kanta alamar tambaya? Shin ta cika masoyiyar baban fadimatu (saw)‬: KARIN NI'IMA A AL'ADANCE A SAWWAKE KUMA A GARGAJIYANCE. BYsirrin riqe miji . GROUP ADMIN MUBARAKMJB. 1.Anaso mace tarinka gyara kanta tun tana gIdan iyayenta basai tayi aure ko kuma tazo yin aure kafin ta fara gyara kanta ba. Wasu da yawan yan mata idan sukaji ance su gyara kansu sai kaga sunayin abin har yana wuce gona da iri. Abun da ya kamata kina yi tun kafin kiyi aure aure shine. 1. TSARKI DA RUWAN ZAFI. Tsarki da ruwan dumi ba karamin taimakawa yakeyi ba wajen gyaran farji. Mata ku kiyaye tsarki da ruwan sanyi sabida ba karamin illa yakeyi ma mace ba. 2. GANYEN MAGARYA. Anaso mace ta dingayin tsarki da ganyen magarya idan da so samune ya zama shine permanent ruwan tsarkin ki shima ba karamin gyara farji yakeyi ba. 3. ZUMA. Anaso mace ta ringa shan zuma chokali daya d safe daya da daddare. Wannan yan taimakawa wajen dawo miki da ni'iman ki da ya fita yayin da kike jinin al'ada. 4. Anaso mace a sa'ilin da take cikin jinin al'adan ta ta rinka shan zuma chokali uku kullum da safe har tsawon kwanakin da zata gama al'adan ta. 5. A sa'ilin  da kika gama al'ada bayan kinyi wanka sai ki dan debi zuma kadan da hannun ki ki saka a bakin farjinki anaso kiyi hakan har na tsawon kwana uku. 6. MAN HABBATUS SAUDA. Zaki samu man habbatus sauda shima kirinka sha kina shafa a farjinki. 7 KANKANA DA MADARA. Anaso mace ta rinka shan kankana da madara a ko wani lokacin da ta gama al'adan ta. 8. KANKANA DA CUCUMBER. zaki yanka kankana da cucumber a sai ki hadasu kiyi blending kirinka a duk lokacin da kika samu halin yi. 9. MISKIL A'ISHA. Anaso mace ta samu miskil Aisha ki rinka sa kadan a  farjinki. Zaki koda kin wanke pants dinki wannan kamshin yanan a jikin shi. Yadan nan abubuwan dana lissafa suna da yawa irin wanda ya kama mace ta rinka yi kenan tun tana gaban iyayen ta. Da Allah mata a daina yawa chushe chushe ma farji yawan yin hakan ba karamin matsala yake jawo wa ba. AKWAI IRIN gyaran da akeyiwa amare wanda abun da akeyi musu bai kamata ayimusu. 💟💟💟 ELEVEN WAYS DA SISTER ZATABI DON SAMIN INGANTACCEN NI'IMA A JIKINTA💟💟💟
1.kunun zaqin dabino; xaki sami dabino mai kyau ki cire kwallayen ki tsabtace shi, sai ki jiqa har saiyayi taushi sossai saiki markada a blander,ki saka zuma ko shuga kadan da madarar ruwa,asa yayi sanyi sai ki sha
2. Yawan cin kwadon zogale da tumatir tare da dafaffen kwai
3. Yawan cin dabinon da bai bushe ba tare da shan ruwa yana taimakawa sossai
4. Ganyen idon zakara adakashi ana hadawa da man tafanuwa kadan da nono ko yogurt 
5. Yawan shan Lipton wanda yaji kanunfari,citta da na'ana'a(wannan bake ba har mai gida) yana kawo dumin jiki wa mace kuma ya kara ni'ima
6. Sister ki sami 'yayan zogale busheshe ki daka da dabino da cikwi ki dinga sha da nono zakiyi mamaki sossai
7. Ki dake ayar ki tare da dabino,kanunfari kina sha da nono hmmn.....
8. Ki samu alkamanki a niqo miki ita ki soya sama sama haryayi ja idan ki ka kusan gama period naki sai ki dama kaman salala da nono kisha sau uku(domin jinin na tafia da abubuwa dayawa)
9. Cucumber ki fere ki yanka tumatir dayawa albasa kadan dafaffen kwai da garin kuli zai baki ni'ima sossai sossai mussaman kici daf magrib
10. Zuma da garin habbatussauda mai kyau da man xaitun zatana sha table spoon biyu safe biyu yamma for 2wks 
11. Madarar ruwa gwangwani daya da kwai ki buga har sai ya daina kumfu asa 
MACE MAI NEMAN HAIHUWA 
Idan kina neman haihuwa ko kindade baki haihuba to Dr Mubarakmjb yace ki jarraba wayan nan magungunan da allah yy masa baiwarsu SIRRI NA DAYA 
Kisami garin hurmul ki dafa da ruwa kafin ya tafasa saiki sauke kisirka da ruwa daidai yanda zaki iya shiga ciki ki zauna har saiya huce kiyi kamar sau uku acikin wannan satin insha allah zaki samu ciki idan har lafiyarki qalau saboda abinda yake kawo matsalar mace bata samun ciki shine wani lokaci maniyyin namijin ne baya samun damar shiga mahaifarta saboda wasu matsaloli misali in azzakari yy kankanta baya shiga cenciki ko kuma kofar mahaifa bata buduwa lokacin saduwarku ko karancin maniyyin namiji ajikinsa in baya fitarda shi dayawa to wayan nan abubuwan suna hana mace samun ciki to in kina amfani wayan nan magungunan mahaifa zai ringa kasan cewa koda yaushe abude kuma zaki samu ciki da yarda allah 
SIRRI NA BIYU 
Kisami danyar gyada ki dakata kina shanta da ruwan zafi sau uku a rana in har kin sadu da mijinki saikinyi ciki da yardar allah 
SIRRI NA UKU 
Idan kikayi wankan haila aranar ki sadu da mijinki karki bari sai washegari don a ranar mahaifa tana kangaba nasa mun ciki 
SIRRI NA HUDU 
Kisami man ridi duk lokacin da zaki sadu da mijinki sai kishafa a mararki indai kikayi wannan in kinada rabon haihuwa aduniya to zaki sami ciki
SIRRI NA BIYAR
Ki sayi 🐇zomo a yanka ki gyara naman ki soya kici da mismillah ki kwanta da mijinki a ranarda kikaci naman insha allah zakiyi ciki 
SIRRI NA SHIDA
Kisami habbatus sauda kidakeshi kihada da manshanu ki kwaba idan zaki sadu da mijinki saiki lasa da yatsanki sau uku shima kofofi zasu bude
SIRRI NA BAKWAI
Yawan cikin danyen dankali na hausa kijuri cinsa shima
SIRRI NA TAKWAS
In zaki sadu da mijinki kiringa karanta astagafirillahil lazimil lazi la'ilaha illallahu wa atubu ilaihi zaki sami ciki kuma zaki haifi da mai albarka
SIRRI NA TARA
Kisami kwan agwagwa guda biyu ki soya shida man tafarnuwa dasafe zakici kafin kikarya shizaki fara sawa acikinki kiyi kwana biyar kinaci insha allah allah zai warware miki komeye zaki samu ciki 
Dan allah yar uwa kigwada wanda kikaga zaki iyayi san nan akula aringa yawaita kusantar maigida bawai adinga shan magani Kuma ana gudun miji ba to ta ina zaki sami cikin kuma kidinga kula idan azzakarinsa yana shiga a karkace inyashiga baya bin inda yakamata to zairinga zubarda maniyyinsa ne awani gurin ba a bakin mahaifaba wanda hakan
Na iyasawa adau tsawon lokaci ba a samu cikiba harma kiringa tinanin ko kinada matsala ne ALLAH YASA A DACE AMEEN YA TAIMAKEMU .
SABULUN WANKA GA MATA
****************************
Kasancewar da yawa an bukaci sake yin post akan wannan sabulun In shaa Allahu ga shi na sake post akai.

yin tsarki da sabulun wanka yana kawo wa mata matsala sosai, saboda irin sinadaran Chemicals din da ake hada sabulun yana da hatsari ne ga dan Adam, musamman ma mata (domin yakan kawo musu cancer of vagina).

Amma ga wata FA'IDA da zaku hada sabulu da kan ku domin yin wanka ko tsarki, kuma ba tare da ya kawo wata matsala ba kuma za'a iya amfani da shi cikin kwanciyar hankali, ba tare da wata damuwa ba, kuma bayan haka yana maganin yawancin cutukka na mata musamman na kaikaiyin gaba, da sauransu. Zaa iya samun  hadden sabulun a wajen ...

Abubuwan da zaku nema.
• SABULUN ZAITUN
• MISKI
• BAGARUWA.
• MAN HULBA.

Da farko, za'a nemi sabulun Zaitun, amma fa wanda aka rubuta Zaplan a jikin kwalin (DOMIN YAFI KYAU), kada a ba ku marar kyau. idan kuma ba'a sameta ba ayi da ta kamfanin Hemani.

Sai a nemi Bagaruwa, a daka ta ta
daku, a zuba a roba sai a yanyanka sabulun zaitun din kanana-kanana a kan garin bagaruwan, a zuba Miskin a ciki a Kwaba shi da ruwan Hulba, a kwaba su sosai har sai ya yi kauri.

Sai a zuba a roba mai kyau a rufe, Sai a rika wanka da shi, kuma ana yin tsarki da shi.

Kwararru a fannin kiwon lafiya sun bayyana cewa irin wannan Sabulun ba shi da wani hadari ko ‘Side effect’ ga mace, kuma zai kara tsuke mace, sannan ta rika kamshi da kuma karuwar ni’ima.

Sannan mazama zasu iya hada wannan sabulun su rika wanka da shi.

please ku turawa 'yan uwanku domin mu amfana

mai saka mai gida kyauta bayan haka sai kisamu kankana ki markadata ki
hada da madara peak wannan shine zaki zama mai dadin jima i.

۞ *ZAFI LOKACIN JIMA I* ۞

madarar shanu zakiga yanda me gida zaiyi…

damanmu kaya kuma babu brz ko kirinka tsalle da sauransu kuma ki daina
kwanciya rub da ciki ko kirinka daga zani sama kina damesu kuma rashin shan
kayan marmari da rashin saka brz suma suna kawo saurin zubewar nono.

latas (salak) kabeji zannan kirinka zama kusa da mijinki sanna idan kuna jima
I yarinka shafawa ki.

[1/6, 4:42 PM] ‪+234 813 518 1160‬: *AMFANIN LEMON TSAMI*

Sirrin mijinki🐪
☎08082497886

 *1- GYARA FUSKA*: 
Ana Amfani da Lemun Tsami wajen kauda Kurajen Fuska, Fimfus, da Kyasfi, Yana sa fuska ta kara kyau. Yadda ake amfani da shi, Araba 1-2, rabin za'a goge Fuska dashi, za'ayi Haka na wasu lokuta, Amma a kiyaye Idanu, kuma kar a shafa a shiga rana se an wanke tukuna.

*2- DATTIN HAKORA DA WARIN BAKI*: Ayi amfani da Burushin wanke Baki da ruwan LEMON TSAMI a wanke Hakora Zasu fita kar, Baki zai bar wari, amma kar arika wankewa akai-akai sai lokaci-lokaci saboda zai iya raunana karfin hakora. ~

*3- WARIN QASHI (HAMMATA)*: 
Idan Ana fama da ciwon warin Qashi, ko rashin tsaftace Hammata yadda ya kamata, Idan an shafa LEMUN TSAMI a Hamata zai kauda wannan warin.

*4- RAGE KIBA DA TIMBI (TEBA)*: Wanda ke buqatar haka, ya samu LEMON TSAMI daya a ruwan sha da bai wuce kofi daya ba, lokaci-lokaci, kiba da tai6a zasu sa6e.

*5- RAUNI (CIWO)*:
 Sabon raunin da bai wuce Hankali ba, da zarar an matsa mai LEMON TSAMI zai kame ya warke.

Ana shan a Lipton dan rage sha'awa.

*7- MAQYAN-QYARO*: 
Ana goge maqanqaro da LEMON TSAMI akai-akai zai mutu.

*8- AMOSANI* 
Ana goga LEMUN TSAMI a kai bayan an aske gashin kan.

*9-QARNI*: 
Ana amfani da LEMUN TSAMI wajen kawar da karnin kifi. AMMA A KULA, idan mace ta yawaita amfani da Lemon tsami to zai rage matasha'awa. Haka mata masu ciki kada su yawaita amf a ni da Lemon tsami. Masu Gembon ciki wato Olsa, su ma su kula wajen shan lemon tsami. Amma dukkan wadannan zai musu illa ne in sun sha a ciki ba wai shafawa ba.

*_YADDA AKE AMFANI DA LEMON TSAMI WAJEN GYARAN FATA_*

☎08082497886☎

Lemon tsami da zuma; Ki debi rabin cokalin ruwan lemon tsami da kuma rabin cokalin zuma sai a kwaba su, daga nan ki shafa a fuskarki na tsawon minti 15, sannan ki wanke da ruwan sanyi. Idan kina da fata mai gautsi to za ki iya hadawa da man zaitun.

Lemon tsami da nono; Za ki hada rabin cokalin ruwan lemon tsami da rabin cokalin nono (amma an fi son kindirmo)saiki kwaba sosai. Bayan haka, sai ki shafa a fuska. 

Allah yasa Mu dace.

☎08082497886☎

Sirrin mijinki group
[1/6, 5:26 PM] ‪+234 813 806 7008‬: 💥💥💥MARYAMU✍🏻✍🏻✍🏻

Na Umm Asghar


Wannan shafin sadakarwa ne ga Ummu Yusra, nagode sosai da kauna. Allah ya bar zumunci.


15


Koda Baba Babba ya sanar da  Aliyu hukuncin da ya yanke na haďa shi aure da Maryam, godiya kawai yayi mishi ba tare da ya bayyanar da sirrin dake cikin zuciyarshi ba. A fuska dai ba za'a iya tantance halin da yake ciki ba wato farinciki ne ko kishiyarsa.


A lokacin da ya sanar da Ummie hauka ne kawai ba tayi ba don kuwa gaba ďaya ta birkice wa Aliyu tana sakin maganganu na batanci ga Maryam da iyayenta, har Baba Babba sai da ya samu nashi rabon.



Tsabar bala'i jikinta har rawa yake yi. Shi kam Aliyu aikin rarrashi kawai yake yi, sai dai ina Ummie bata san yanayi ba ma. Tsabar masifa muryarta har ta shake amma wannan bai sa ta hakura tayi shiru ba. 




Cewa take yi "wato saboda ansan munafincin da aka shirya shi yasa aka hana kowa aurenta, saboda ana bakin ciki da kwanciyar hankalin da nake dashi a cikin gidana shine za'a rasa da wanda za'a haďa ta sai kai, to wallahi zanga ta yadda za'ayi ka aureta idan kuwa har ka nace da batun auren nan kuwa sai dai ka zaba ko ni ko ita".



"Tun wuri ma gara kaje ka sanar musu cewa ba zaka aureta ba kaji na gaya maka, don wallahi banga ta yadda za'ayi ka auri wata mace ba bayan ni, kamar ni ace za'ayi mini kishiya, wallahi ba zata sabu ba don ba yadda zanyi ba, idan har kaga anyi auren nan to tabbatar bana numfashi amma da raina dai baka isa ba".



Har ta yi tijararta ta gama Aliyu bai tanka mata ba. Tashi tayi ta shiga ďaki ta ďauko mayafi ta fito. Kofa ta nufa ba tare da ta kalli inda Aliyu yake ba. Ganin da yayi tana niyyar fita ne yasa ya biyota yana cewa "Ummie ina zaki je yanzu da yamma nan, don Allah ki dawo gida muyi magana ta fahimta. Kin sani ina sonki bana son bacin ranki ko kaďan, kema kinsan ban isa na cewa Baba Babba bana son auren da ya bani ba. Daga ni har ke hak...", bai karasa maganar da zaiyi ba ta katseshi tana mai ďaga hannu ta ce "ai dama nasan babu mai shirya wannan munafikin auren sai Baba Babba , ni ban san me nayi wa tsohon nan ba da yake neman ganin bayan farin ciki na, koda yake ba abin mamaki bane don yayi hakan, ni dama na daďe da sanin cewa bai ďauke ni ďaya da sauran jikokinshi ba idan banda haka ya bawa Hafiz auren mana ko don ita Khadija jikarshi ce ba zai so ayi mata kishiya ba".



Da ace Ummie mai lura ce data fahimci cewa tun lokacin data kira Baba Babba munafuki yanayin fuskar Aliyu ya canja, bai taba tunanin Ummie bata da mutunci ba sai yau da ta iya buďe baki ta zagi Baba Babba. Zai iya ďaukan kowanne irin rashin mutunci daga gareta matsawar dai a kanshi kawai zai tsaya amma bazai ďauki tayi wa iyayenshi ba.



Wata irin razananniyar tsawa ya mata yace "ya ishe ki hakanan kuma kinji ko, duk abinda zaki ce kin daďe baki faďa ba, idan banda baki da mutunci har ki iya buďe baki ki zagi Baba Babba. Gara ma tun wuri ki sani zan iya ďaukar komai amma banda taba mutuncin Baba Babba, da zaki ce an gwada miki bambanci akwai wani abu da ya taba yiwa wata a cikin jikokinshi da baiyi miki ba ko kuwa dai rashin godiyar Allah da butulci. Kuma bari kiji na gaya miki ke ďinnan baki isa na sabawa iyayena akan ki ba don haka auren Maryam zanyi babu fashi sai dai duk abinda kikayi niyyar yi don Allah kada ki fasa. Dama ina lallaba ki ne ganin kamar anyi miki ba daidai ba amma tunda abin naki ya zama rashin mutunci to kije kiyi tayi kada ki fasa nima kuma nayi miki alkawarin cewa muna nan dake a cikin gidan nan aure ne kamar nayi na gama".



Daga haka ya koma cikin gidan ya barta anan a tsaye. Yau ita Aliyu yake yiwa rashin mutunci akan gaskiyarta, lallai abin mamaki baya karewa a cikin duniyar nan. Yau idan wani ya gaya mata cewa akwai wata rana da zata zo da Aliyu zai wulakanta ta zata karyata shi ne amma sai gashi ita da shi bawai wani ya sanar da ita ba ya iya buďe baki ya zazzaga mata rashin arziki, har yana gaya mata cewa kamar yayi auren da munafukin tsohon can ya bashi ya gama.



Ba zata hana shi aure ba tunda ya saka kanshi amma wallahi ba da ita ba, ai duk son da take yi mishi babu abinda zai hanata hakura dashi matukar dai bai janye wancan auren munafuncin da yake shirin yi ba.



Ganin da tayi magriba ta kawo jiki ne yasa ta nufi motarta ta shiga ta bar gidan. Ta isa gidansu dake unguwar Gadon Kaya a lokacin da aka shiga masallaci don yin sallar magriba. Bata tarar da kowa ba a cikin gidan ga alama duk sun shiga ciki do yin sallah, ďakin mahaifiyarta kawai ta wuce.



Ta tarar da ita akan sallaya tana sallah don haka ta wuce bathroom ta ďauro alwala. A nan kusa da Hajiya Badi ta tada sallah sai dai sam bata cikin nutsuwarta don bana jin tasan me take cewa a cikin sallar.



Mamaki ne ya kama Hajiya Badi data idar da Sallah taga ashe Ummie ce ta shigo tana sallah, Allah dai yasa lafiya banda haka me zai kawo Ummie da magriba kuma. Cigaba tayi da can carbinta tana jiran Ummie ta idar da sallah taji abin da ya fito da ita yanzu. Sosai ganin Ummie ya ďaga mata hankali don tasan ko yini tazo musu bata kaiwa magriba take komawa gidanta tabbas ba lafiya ba ce zata fito da Ummie daga gidanta a wannan lokacin.



Tana idar da sallar ta rushe da kuka tare da kwanciya a jikin mahaifiyarta. "Me ya faru ne Ummie, ganinki nan da nayi wallahi ya ďaga mini hankali don nasan cewa babu lafiya, don Allah gaya mini me ya faru. Ba dai wani abu ne ya samu Aliyun ba ko, ina yaran ne ma na ganki ke kaďai" Hajiya Badi tace tana mai shafa kan Ummie.



Cikin shashekar kuka tace "Mama wai aure Aliyu zaiyi kuma wai don munafunci a rasa da wacce za'a haďa shi sai da wanna shegiyar yarinyar Maryam. Ni dai na gaya mishi wallahi ban yarda ba din idan har ya nace da auren nan sai dai ya sakeni don bazan zauna da kishiya ba".



Hajiya Badi da maganar Ummie sosai ta daketa bata san lokacin da ta kaiwa bakin Ummie duka ba jin da tayi ta ce wai zata rabu da Aliyu. "Ashe ke shashasha ban sani ba, akan kishiya zaki rabu da mijinki. To dama ba abin da suke so ba kenan ki fita ki barwa 'yarsu gidan, ni dama na daďe da dawowa daga rakiyar waďannan mutanen Inna ce har yau ta kasa ganewa da halin 'yanuwanta har kiji tana yaba zumuncinsu amma son kansu yayi yawa. Ba ma dai wannan tsohon (Baba Babba) da doro ya na ja gaban zabbi, idan banda son kai da yai mishi yawa ace duk girman estate ďinnan Inna ko ďaya daga 'ya'yanshi sai na kaninshi sai anyi magana suce babu gadon Inna a ciki kasonsu ne su biyu suka haďa sukayi wannan ginin kuma Inna ta yadda da hakan. Ni duk abin da sukayi ai bazan yi mamaki ba don nasan dama ba son Allah da Annabi sukeyi mana ba don haka dole ne ki koma gidanki kiyi yakin kwatar mijinki idan ba haka ba hatta da 'ya'yanki sai an rabaki dasu kina ji kina gani zaki zama 'yar kallo".



"Yanzu a ina kika bar yaran?", "suna gida amma nasan watakila Aliyu ya kai su wurin Mummy". "To ai shikenan sai ki kwana anan zuwa gobe da safe don yanzu dare yayi bazan barki kiyi tuki ba a wannan lokacin, amma batun rabuwa da Aliyu babu ita kinji dai na gaya miki".



A daidai wannan lokacin Raudha ta shigo ďakin, "umm lallai, yau shagwabar ce ta motsa" shine abinda tace da taga Ummie kwance akan cinyar mahaifiyarsu. Tashi tayi zaune tana cewa "dama kina cikin gidan nan tunda nazo ban ganki ba, koda yake nan ďakin na wuto ba leka ďakinki ba". "Eh Aunty amma dai lafiya ko na ganki a daidai wannan lokacin ke da bakya fitar dare".



Tabe baki tayi tace "kawarki bata gaya miki ba ta kusa zama kishiya ta, ai kune amara kirjin biki koda yake tare za'a haďa da naku". Zaro ido Raudah tayi tace "Aunty kibar wasa don Allah wacce irin kishiya ana zaune kalau kuma da wacce kawar tawa, ni wallahi bani da labari".



Kamar bata so ta amsa mata da "Maryam mana, wai Baba Babba ya bawa Aliyu aurenta". "Kan ubancan ashe kuwa zanci ubanta, shine dama dalilin da yasa kowa ya fito yana sonta sai taki ashe ita Yaya Aliyu take hari, to kuwa wallahi sai ta raina kanta don bata isa ta ja damu ba, ita ďin banza ita ďin wofi. Don Allah Aunty ki daina bata ranki a banza kin dai san yadda Yaya Aliyu yake sonki babu yadda za'ayi ya karbi auren nan idan har ba an takura mishi bane kuma i'm sure Maryam ce tayi kutunguilar da aka haďata dashi"



"Gata nan ga gidan ta shigo ta gani idan akwai abinda zata tsinta" cewar Ummie. A wannan daren dai basu yi wani baccin kirki ba, idan banda tsinewa Baba Babba da Maryam babu abin da sukeyi.



Ita dama Hajiya Badi akwai haushin Baba Babba a ranta saboda a ganinta duk wani abu da yake yi na zumunci ba don Allah yake yi ba sai don a faďa. Ita duk a tunaninta bai kyautu ace duk girman Adamu Gaya Estate mallakin Baba Babba da Baba Karami ne ba, a ganinta ai ya kamata ace an fitar wa da Innarsu kasonta ko babu komai ya zamanto suma sun mallaki gida a cikin estate ďin.



Wani abu da Hajiya Badi bata sani ba shine kaf filin Adamu Gaya Estate mallakin Baba Babba ne kawai kuma bai faďo a cikin abin da iyayensu suka bar musu ba don ko Baba Karami sai bayan da aka sayi filin sannan Baba Babba ya sanar dashi da kuma kudurin da yake dashi akan filin wato gina estate ďin da zasu zauna su d zuri'arsu, kuma duk da haka Inna Hajara na da muhalli a cikin estate ďin haka nan wasu daga cikin 'ya'yanta .


UMMASGHAR.
[1/6, 5:26 PM] ‪+234 813 806 7008‬: 💥💥💥MARYAMU✍🏻✍🏻✍🏻


Na Umm Asghar

17


Kasancewar sun kusa fara jarabawarsu ta second semester a shekarar karatunsu na uku ne yasa aka yanke lokacin auren nasu da sati biyu bayan gama jarabawar tasu.


Shirye-shirye ake tayi tun daga bangaren amaren har angwayen. Aliyu ya gama gyaran gidanshi inda ya canja fasalin ginin zuwan bangare uku, nashi ne a tsakiya sai na Ummie daga hannun dama na Maryam kuma a hannun hagu sai dai ginin a haďe aka yi shi ba tare da an raba ba sannan kuma za'a shiga bangaren kowacce ne ta cikin main sitting room ďinsu da aka kara faďaďa girmanshi. 


Ya gina wa kowacce ďakuna uku masu haďe da bayi a ciki, sai sitting room babba da kitchen da store. Tuni Ummie ta koma gidanta wanda kafin ta koma sai da ta tabbatar da ta karbi kuďaďe masu yawa a wurin Aliyu tayi gyaran part ďin nata wai duk don kada a raina mata.


Sosai wurin nata yayi kyau, ita ma Maryam an shirya mata wurinta yayi kyau sosai bayan kayan da Baba Babba yayi musu ga kuma wanda iyayenta suka yi mata, sak dai ďakin amaryar da ta kasance 'yar gata.


Har wannan lokacin da auren nasu ya rage bai fi saura kwana talatin ba Aliyu bai nemi Maryam ba ko sau ďaya. Dukkanin su hidimar gabansu kawai suke yi ba tare da tunanin juna ba.



A ranar da suka gama exam suka yi rabon invitation cards wa kawayensu da abokan karatunsu, sunyi haka ne saboda gyaran jikin da za su fara ba zai bari su samu lokacin yin rabon katin ba.



Tana ďaki da yammacin ranar talata wanda yayi daidai da saura kwanaki uku a fara biki. Kayanta take shiryawa a cikin akwati tana kuma ware waďanda za'a bayar a gefe. Yaya Ruqaiya ce ta saka ta wannan aikin wai gara ta haďa kayan tun gidan bai cika da mutane ba.



Hilal ne ya shigo ďakin yaan sanar mata cewa taje sitting room ďin Abbah Yaya Aliyu na kiranta. Ajiye rigar dake hannunta tayi akan gado, tsaki tayi a cikin ranta tana cewa "ko me kuma zanyi mishi da zai zo ya dameni, da can bai tuna da ni ba sai yau".



Mayafi ta yafa akan doguwar rigar material ďin dake sanye a jikinta ta fita daga ďakin. Ciki-ciki tayi sallama ta shiga sitting room ďin ba tare da ta jira ya amsa ba. Shima a cikin ya amsa mata sallamar kamar dai yadda ta mishi.



Zama tayi akan kujera ta zaman mutum ďaya sannan tace mishi "ina yini" ba tare da kalli inda yake zaune ba. Bai amsa gaisuwar data mishi ba sai ma kallon da yake yi mata ganin yadda take ta faman shan kamshi, shi dariya ma ta bashi da har bai san lokacin da yayi murmushin da ya fitar da sauti ba.



Haushi ne ya kamata da jin 'yar siririyar dariyar data fito daga bakinshi, wato ma abar dariya ta koma mishi. Ďago idonta tayi da niyyar harararshi, babu shiri da sauke idanunta kasa don bata yi zaton yana kallonta ba, haďa idanun da suka yi ya saukar mata da wata iriyar kasala a jikinta.



Shiru ne ya ratsa sitting room ďin. Ita dai Maryam wasa kawai take yi da bezar dake jikin mayafinta, gaba ďaya ta kosa da zaman ta a parlour nan. Bata ga amfanin kiranta da yayi ba idan har ba zai buďe baki ya gaya mata dalilin zuwanshi ba, ko kuwa ya kirata ne don ya sakata a gaba yana kallonta.



Rashin sanin takamaimai abin da zai ce mata ne ya hana mishi zuwa wurinta tuntuni, yanzu ma ganin lokacin bikin ya karato ne gashi baya da masaniya akan shirinta ya saka shi yin kundubalar zuwa wurin nata. Yaso ace sunzo ko shi da Farouk ne sai yayi rashin sa'a Farouk baya gari, Nuruddeen kuwa da ya nemi rakiyarshi ma harararshi yayi yana ce mishi bashi da hankali da yake neman yayi mishi rakiya zance wurin kanwarshi, mtsw ko wa ya gaya mishi zance zai zo, daga kawai yazo ya ganta yaji tsare-tsarenta akan harkar bikin.



Sunyi zama na kusan mintuna talatin ba tare da cewa uffan ba. Tana son tace mishi idan bayada abin cewa zata koma ciki amma kuma tana kyashin tayi mishi magana.



Kamar daga sama taji muryar shi yana ce mata "ban san me kuke shiryawa ba a game da bikin, ina ganin wannan zai ishe ki duk wata hidima taki ai ko, idan basu isa ba kuma sai ki mini magana" yace yana mai ajiye mata bandir na dubu ďaya guda biyu.



Ďagowa tayi ta kalli kuďin da ya ajiye a kan center table sannan ta maida kallonta gareshi. Har yanzu idanunshi na kanta, ita ta rasa dalilin wannan kallon da yake yi mata. "Nagode Allah ya saka da alkhairi" tace mishi tana mai saka hannu ta ďauki kuďin.



Tashi yayi ya fita bayan yayi mata sallama, itama tashi tayi ta nufi cikin gida tana mamakin Yaya Aliyu ita kam. Yaya Ruqaiya ta damkawa kuďin sannan ta wuce ta cigaba da aikin da takeyi.



Ranar juma'a aka fara shagalin bikin Aliyu da Maryam. Kamu ne zasu yi haďe da Luncheon a the afficent. Bridal lace ne ta saka kalar fari mai adon zare kalar olive green anyi mishi ďinkin fitted gown, gwaggoron da tayi amfani dashi ma fari ne sai manyan stones kalar olive green da aka yi mishi ado dasu, hakanan sarka da ďankunne da takalmi da clutch bag da tayi amfani dasu duk olive green ďin ne. Laffaya ta nannaďa mai kalar ruwan kwai da layi-layi a jiki kalar olive green.




Daga gidan Baba Babba aka ďauke su zuwa venue ďin. Kasancewar ba zasuyi dinner ba yasa aka gaiyaci angwayen zuwa luncheon ďin. Shi dai Aliyu bai je ba don yace wai taron nasu na mata ne amma sauran angwayen kam dasu akayi komai.



Har aka tashi a taron Aunty Ummie tana bin Maryam da harara haka ma Raudha don dama tun da taji batun auren Maryam da Yaya Aliyu ta daina yiwa Maryam ďin magana, ko bikin ma sunso a ďaga na Raudha ďin wai anyi daga baya don basa son a haďa musu biki dana Maryam Inna Hajara tace basu isa ba.



A ranar asabar da misalin karfe sha ďaya aka yi ďaurin aure a filin gidan Baba Babba akan sadaki naira dubu hamsin kowacce. Bayan anyi ďaurin auren ba'ayi wani event ba sai da yamma da aka kai amare.



A parlour Baba Babba aka haďa su gaba ďayansu amaren tare da angwayensu sai kuma Baba Babba, Baba Karami, Inna Hajara da kuma Daddyn su Anisa. Nasiha sosai akayi musu akan zaman tare da hakuri da juna wanda ya kasance shine jigo a zaman aure don idan har babu hakuri a ciki auren ba zaiyi karko duk soyayyar da ma'auratan suke yiwa juna kuwa.





Nasihar tasu tafi yawa ga Yaya Aliyu kasancewar shi da nauyin mata biyu ne a kanshi, dole ne ya xama shugaba adali a cikin gidanshi.



An fito dasu suna ta rasgar kuka, kada ma dai Maryam taji labari don bata san wacce irin rayuwa zatayi ba a gidan Aliyu. Ita aka fara kaiwa, gidan shiru don uwargidan bata zauna ba tace sai ta raka kanwarta ďakinta.



A ďakin da aka sanya mata kayan da Baba Babba yayi musu anan aka ajiye ta. Tsirarun mutane ne sukabzauna a wurinta saura kuma suka wuce kai sauran amaren gidajensu.



UMMASGHAR.
[1/6, 5:26 PM] ‪+234 813 806 7008‬: 💥💥💥MARYAMU✍🏻✍🏻✍🏻


Na Umm Asghar



*⚜🇦rewa 🇼riters🇫orum⚜*

                     *A. W. F*

*I.G:Arewa writers forum fans*

*• Follow us on facebook*~ _
www.facebook.com/Arewa-Writers-Forum-294302397727161/




18

Kafin Magriba tayi kowa ya watse aka bar Maryam ita kaďai, ana yin kiran Sallah ta tashi tayi sannan ta cigaba da zama a wurin har aka kira isha'i ta tashi tayi. Tana idarwa kuwa ta hau kan gado ta kwanta tana tunanin yau dai gata a gidan Yaya Aliyu a matsayin matarshi, ko wane irin zama kuma zasu yi, Allah ne masani.


Tana kwance tana 'yan tunane-tunanenta har bata san lokacin da bacci ya ďauketa ba. Tana cikin baccin ne taji ana tashinta a hankali. Buďe idanunta da suka yi ja saboda baccin da ta fara tayi ta sauke su a cikin na Yaya Aliyu.


Yarrr yaji tsikar jikinshi ta tashi haďa idanun da suka yi. Kauda kanshi yayi sannan yace "wai har kin fara bacci a wannan lokacin da ko tara bata yi ba, ki fito ki sameni a main parlour ina so zanyi magana daku ke da Ummie" daga haka ya juya ya fice daga ďakin.


Tashi tayi ta shiga bathroon ta wanke fuskarta sannan ta fito ta gyara yafen mayafinta da dama bata cire shi ba don dashi tayi bacci a jikinta ta fita zuwa amsa kiran Yaya Aliyu.


Akan kujera mai zaman mutum biyu ta same su shida Aunty Ummie da taci kwalliya tamkar mai zuwa wurin party a cikin english wear skirt da riga sai wani yatsina take yi tana faman harare-harare. Kayan kuwa sunyi mata kyau sosai.


Wucewa tayi ta zauna akan kujerar mai zaman mutum ďaya sannan tace wa Aunty Ummie "ina yini", ďauke kanta tayi tamkar bata ji ta ba, ita ma Maryam tabe baki tayi cikin ranta tana cewa kinyi wa kanki don baki amsa gaisuwa ta ba sai me.


Gyaran muryar da Yaya Aliyu yayi ne ya sa Maryam maida nutsuwarta akan shi. "Ummie ga Maryam nan na aurota a matsayin matata, kin santa kin san halinta ba kishiyarki bace ita kanwarki ce ko babu aure a tsakaninmu ke yayarta ce don haka nake so ku zauna lafiya idan kinga tayi wani abu wanda ba daidai ba ne ki tsawatar mata a matsayinki na babba, don Allah Ummie kija girmanki ki kama mutuncinki don bazan so ace wata baraka ta fito daga wurinki ba, In Sha Allahu zaki sameni mai adalci a gareki".


"Ke kuma Maryam ga nan Ummie, matata ce uwar 'ya'yana, ban haďa son da nake yi mata da kowa ba, ban aure ki don na daina sonta ba ko kuma don ta gaza ta wanni fannin a'a na aureki ne don haka Allah ya kaddaro mana zama a inuwa guda karkashin igiyar aure dan haka nake so ki bita sau da kafa ki bata girmanta na uwar gida ki mutuntata ki darajta ta don idan kinyi hakan ni kika mutunta. Idan kin saba mata tamkar ni kika sabawa haka nan idan kika daďaďa mata tamkar ni kikayi wa. Ina fatan dukkanku zakuyi hakuri da juna ku zauna lafiya ni kuma In Sha Allahu zaku sameni mai kwatanta adalci a tsakaninku sannan kuma idan har akwai wacce taga nayi mata ba daidai ba a cikin ku zan so ku faďa mini ni kuma In Sha Allahu zanyi kokarin ganin ban tauyewa kowa hakki ba".


Nisawa yayi sannan yace "sai maganar girki kuma ni a ganina zaku na yin aikin kwana bibbiyu ne sai kuyi canji. Idan akwai mai magana a cikin ku sai ta faďa". Yace yana mai kallon Aunty Ummie sannan ya juyo ya kalli Maryam.


Cikin yatsina Aunty Ummie tace "eh ina da abin faďa, wai yanzu nan da kake rabon kwana kana nufin ďakinta zaka shiga ko me. Inace auren nan baso kake yi ba Baba Babba ne ya yi maka dole, to tunda anyi auren yadda yake so gashi har ta tare a gidan ba shikenan ba, miye naka na raba mana kanka ni da ita. Kenan ka karbeta a matsayin mata har kana da kudurin yin mu'amala irin ta aure da ita".


Wani kallo da ya watsa wa Ummie babu shiri ta haďiye sauran maganar dake bakinta. Kallon Maryam yayi yace mata "wuce ďakinki". Tashi tayi ta koma wurinta cikin ranta tana cewa can dai ga su gada inji zomo da yaji kiďan farauta.


Cikin masifaffiyar muryar data razanar da Ummie yace "wai ke wacce irin mata ce da kwata-kwata ba kya tauna magana kafin ki faďe ta. Yanzun kina nufin kin titsiye ni na faďa miki irin zaman dana shirya zanyi da matata ko me. Ki kula da wani abu guda ďaya fa Ummie nifa ba yaro bane da zan zauna ina yin abu irin na yara ko kuma irin waďanda kike karantawa a fictional books, babu dalilin da zai sa na auri mace na kawo ta gidana sannan na kawo ido ina kallonta a bisa wani dalili na shirme. So idan kin tambayeni ne don kina so ki tabbatar da abinda zuciyarki take zargi to bari na amsa miki, eh zanyi mu'amala da Maryam a matsayinta na matata irin wacce nake yi dake, ina fata kin gamsu".


Kuka kawai ta fashe dashi don tana ganin shine kawai abinda zatayi ya sanyayar mata zuciyarta daga bakin cikin da maganganun Aliyu suka sakata.


Ganin irin kukan da take yi kuma sai yaji tausayinta ya lullube shi. Ya san ba wani abu ke damun Ummie ba sai kishi, ta kasa yardar wa zuciyarta da cewa Aliyu yayi aure yanzu shi ďin ba nata bane ita kaďai.



Rungumota yayi a jikinshi yana lallashinta, sun daďe a haka don har sai da ta samu nutsuwa sosai sannan ya kaita ďakinta ya kwanatar da ita sannan ya kashe mata fitila ya nufi nashi ďakin.


Wanka yayi ya sanya jallabiya kalar cream sannan ya fesa turarenshi na gucci guilty ya ďebi wayoyinshi da ledojin da tun shigowarshi gidan ya zo dasu ya tasar wa ďakin Maryam.


A ciki-ciki tamkar mai raďa yayi sallama ya shiga ďakin. Tana kudundune a cikin mayafi don har wannan lokacin bata canja kayan jikinta ba. Ajiye ledar yayi akan dressing mirror sannan yace "kinyi sallah ne da kike ta faman kwanciya" tashi tayi zaune sannan ta gyaďa mishi kai alamun eh.



"To tashi ki dauro alwala muyi nafila" ya faďi cikin dakewa. Tashi tayi ta nufi toilet ďin a cikin ranta tana tsegumin canjin da ta gani a tare da Yaya Aliyu. Alwalar ta ďauro ta fito tace mishi "na gama". Sallaya ya shimfiďa ya ja su sallah nafila raka'a biyu.



Bayan sun idar ya daďe yana karanto addua'a tana amsa mishi da Ameen sannan suka shafa. Tashi tayi ta koma kan gadon ta zauna. Tashi yayi ya fita daga ďakin, babu jimawa ya dawo hannunshi ďauke da tray da ya ďoro plates da cups akai sai babbar robar ruwan Faro guda ďaya. "Sauko kici abinci" taji ya faďi cikin siririyar muryarshi.




"Na koshi" itama ta amsa mishi cikin 'yar karamar murya. Cikin ďaga murya kaďan yace "come on sauko kici abinci, me kika ci da zaki ce kin koshi", jin yadda sautin muryarshi ya fita da alamun babu wasa a tare dashi ne ya sa ta sauko daga kan kadon ta zauna akan rug ďin dake shimfiďe a gaban gadonta.



Buďe leda yayi ya fito da naďin foil paper ya buďe ya ďora akan plate, gashin nama ne da akayi shi ruwa-ruwa a ciki. Sannan ya fito da kwalin fresh milk ta hollandia ya zuba a cup yace mata "Bismillah maza ďauki ki ci" yana tura plate ďin naman gabanta.



Kaďan taci naman sai fresh milk ďin data shanye duka ta ture plate ďin tare da cewa "na koshi" ta tashi ta shiga toilet ta wanko bakinta sannan ta fito. Kan gadon ta hau ta kwanta sai dai zuciyarta fal take da tsoron Yaya Aliyu.



Shi kam naman shi yaja yaci ya koshi ya kora da fresh milk ďin sannan ya kwashe kayan ya fita dasu. Yana shigowa ďakin idanunshi suka kai kan Maryam dake kwance a kan gadon. "Kina nufin a haka zaki kwanta bacci ba zaki saka nighty ba?" yace a cikin 'yar karamar murya tamkar mai yin raďa.



Saukowa tayi daga kan gadon ta buďe wardrobe ta ďauki kayan bacci riga da wando cotton kalar lilac ta shiga toilet ta saka. Haka nan taji tana kunyar fitowa daga toilet ďin a haka duk da dai kayan nata masu kauri ne.



Ta daďe a tsaye cikin toilet ďin ta rasa ta yadda zata fito har sai da Yaya Aliyu ya leka yace mata "me kike yi ne a bathroom ďin baki fito ba har yanzu" sannan ta iya fita.



Kan gadon kawai ta nufa ta hau ta kwanta tare da rufe jikinta da quilt. Bata daďe da kwanciya ba Yaya Aliyu ya kashe fitilar ďakin ya hau kan gadon ya kwanta. Mummunar faďuwar gaba ce ta sameta don kuwa wani irin tsoro ne ya ziyarceta ganinsu kwance akan gado ďaya.



Cikin wata iriyar sassanyar murya taji shi yana cewa "Maryam kin yi barci ne?", ďumin iskar data fito daga bakinshi ta saukar mata da wata irin kasala da har ta kasa amsa mishi. Hannayenshi ya saka gaba ďaya ya juyo da ita tana facing ďinshi, hannu ya saka ya zare  hular dake kanta sannan ya cire hair band ďin da ta ďaure dogon gashinta dashi ya hau shafa gashin a hankali.



A hankali kuma taji hannayen nashi suna bin sauran sassan jikinta, gabaki ďaya jikinta ne ya ďauki rawa amma Yaya Aliyu bai kula ba sai ma ďora bakinshi da yayi akan nata yana kissing ďinta passionately.



UMMASGHAR.

Nuna zumudi da matukar fito da maitar soyayya a fili, shi ke sanya gajiyawa ga dayan da ya zamo abokin tarayya a soyayya, don haka dole ne sai anyi ta cikin taku da nuna kulawa amma ba'a zake da yawa ba.

Masu iya magana suna cewa, "ido wa ka raina...? Amsar kuma itace, wanda nake gani kullum" ba a ce kar ki/ka dinga kula masoyayarka ba sai dai ana so kar ka cika nuna zakewa.

Da yake yanzu zamani ne na amfani da social media ko waya hannu ,to ko ba ka je ba zaka iya aikawa da dan gajeran sako don masoyi/ masoyiya ta san kana tare da ita.

Don haka masoya su kula da wannan, domin yawan naci yakan haifar da matsala, nacin zuwa hira a kowanne lokaci nacin kiran waya, har ma da tura sakon text messeges a wasu lokutan wasu lokuta masoyi/masoyiya za taiya warewa don turawa masoyinta sakon nuna soyayya da kulawa haka nan wani lokaci masoyi zai ware wanda zai iya ziyartar masoyiyarsa domin zantawa, da gabatar da wasu batutuwa don kara dankon soyayya a tsakaninsu rashin kulawa kuma zai iya jawo wasu matsaloli su faru ga masoyan, amma dai an fi son kulawar ta zamo mai tsari, tsari mai kyau ta yadda masoyi/masoyiya ba zata gaji da masoyinta ba, ko kuma masoyi ya gajiya da masoyiyarsa ba dole ne ya zamo an samu kyakkyawar mu'amala ta soyayya da kauna tare da amincewa juna ta hanyar da zata zamo mai tsafta kuma ya kasance ana dan bada gaf saboda yin nazarin abinda kanfi saurin farantawa masoyi ko masoyiya rai tare da samar da kyakkyawan nishadi mai armashi.

              ✥✥✥. **SAKONNIN MASOYA** ✥✥✥

💗 na tabbatar so yanayin sa yakan sauya daga farin launi zuwa kore.

💗 sonki yana cikin zuciyata, amma ina kokwanton kada ya zama tsuntsu ya tashi, idan har na ya kasance kin ci gaba da nuna rashin kulawarki a kaina.

💗 kyakkyawa mai kyan tsari,a duk lokacin da nake kallonki, tamkar kyakkywar fulawa mai furanni ma'abota debe kewa da sanya nishadi a zuciya ki kan zamo min.

💗 kiyi min agaji, ki tausaya min, ki tallafe ni, ki amince dani a cikin zuciyarki, sonki ya gama shiga jikina.

💗 kada ki bar ni shawagi tamkar tsuntsu a sararin SAMANIYA. SONKI NAKE HAR ZUCI.
 
                                     ❀❀** MAZA **❀❀

●- kyauta ta musamman a gare ki, ke kadai, domin faranta ranki ya abar kaunata, baya ga kaina dana baki, ga kuma kyautar FUREN SO.

✦ abar alfaharina, ina sonki fiye da adadin lissafinki, adadin da zai iya zamowa tamkar zubar ruwan sama a lokacin damina.
Ke kadai ce tawa.

✦ na zamo tamkar agwagwa, ina iyo a cikin kogin sonki.
Da za ki tallafa, da kin kawo karshen iyon da nake yi da ninkaya domin gudun gazawar gwiyawuna a lokacin da igiya ruwa ta nadeni.

Na kasance tamkar kifi a cikin ruwa, idan nayi gabas sai kuma na dawo nayi yamma, idan nayi kudu, sai kuma na dawo nayi arewa.

                                   ❊❊** MATA **❊❊

✥ dawainiya nake da sonka a cikin zuciyata, da sannu zaka fahimci ni masoyiyarka ce ta hakika, na zana zanen fulawar so a tafin hannuna nayi nufin nuna maka domin ka fahimci yanayin zancen da sonka yayi a cikin zuciyata.

✥ ina sonka tamkar yadda ba zan iya bayyana maka ba, ina sonka tamkar yadda baza ka iya kirga adadin ruwan sama ba kada ka zubar da hawayenka, yayin da wani ya bata maka rai, tuna da wacce kake so, ka ke kauna, sai zuciyarka tayi fari.

ina sonka abin kaunata na kasance a cikin masi kasa bacci yayin da dare ya tsala, bani da komai sai tunaninki, har wani lokacin gari kan waye ban iya runtsawa ba nasan wannan yana faruwa ne saboda irin tsantsar soyayyar da nake miki.

Shin ko kema haka ne? Tattausan lafazin ki abin kwatantawa.
Komai naki daban dana sauran 'yanmata da zan kwana ina misalta kyawun halittarki, ba zan iya kaiwa karshe ba, koda kuwa zan wanzu ina yi har karshen rayuwata.
