[1/6, 6:03 PM] ‪+234 814 366 7721‬: ☀ *SOYAYYAR AUREN MU DAN ALLAH* ☀

   ☞ farin Ciki ma'aurata / sirrin rike miji ☜
🌐www.sirinrikemiji.com
☏+2348037538596

ina so ’yan uwana ma’aurata da ma samari da ’yan mata waxanda suka xaura kyakkyawar niyyar aure su fahimdi duk auren da aka gina shi da tubalin hakuri kawai ba tare da an haxa da tubalin soyayya, kyautatawa da nishadantarwa ba, to tabbas irin wannan aure ba ya dorewa, ko ya dore ma ba a cikin kwandiyar hankali da annashuwa ba. 

Yana da matukar muhimmandi ma’aurata da masu niyyar aure su zamanto zudiyoyinsu na xauke da kyakkawar niyyar ibadar aure saboda Allah (s.w.t).

 Namijin da ya yi aure ba don Allah ba shi ne wanda
kullum idan zai shigo gidansa sai ya hade rai kamar
kumurdin maciji yana kumburi wai shi namiji ne dole a ba shi girma.

Kasandewar namiji shi ne shugaban iyalinsa wanda hakkin kula da iyalin ke rataye a wuyansa, zan yi amfani da wannan dama wajen isar mana da sakonnin shawarwari waxanda i sha Allah za su taimaka ainun wajen samun zaman lafiya da dorewar zamantakewar aure. Ga su kamar
haka;

①. Ka tuna da sadaukarwar da ta yi maka: Xan uwa saurara ka ji. Ba kai kaxai ba ne namiji a duniya, kuma ba kai kaxai ne namijn da yake son aurenta ba. Kuna da yawa watakila ma kun kai dozin kowa da gaske yake. Amma wannan baiwar Allah duk ta share su ta zabeka saboda a wajenta ka fi sauran. Su kuwa sauran watakila daga dikinsu akwai masu jin haushinta saboda rashin ba su dama. Ya kai xan
uwa don Allah idan ka tuna haka shin ba za ka yi tunanin yi mata kyautatawar da za ta rika tunani ta fi kowade made sa a a duniyar nan ba? Idan ba ka yi haka ba za ka sa ta rayu tana da-na-sanin ba ka wannan damar. Ana gane karfin namiji ne wajen kyautatawa ba kuntatawa iyalinsa ba.

②. Daukar aure a matsayin Ibada: Anas Ibn Malik (Allah Ya kara yarda da shi) ya ruwaito Annabi (s.a.w) ya de duk wanda Allah (s.w.t) ya taimaka masa ya yi aure kuma ya samu made ta-gari tamkar ya dika rabin addininsa ne. Ashe wannan ba zai sa mu mazaje mu rika xaukar aure a matsayin ibada domin samun yardar Allah (s.w.t) ba? Ya kai xan uwa shin kana ganin Allah zai dika maka rabin addininka alhali kana take hakkin iyalinka? Rayuwar auren da babu komai a dikinta sai dutarwa, kuntatawa, bakin diki
da rashin kwandiyar hankali tamkar rusa rabin addini ne. Allah Shi ne masani. Ka sake tunani ya kai xan uwa, idan har ka yi aure ne domin bauta wa Allah ta hanyar kyautatawa iyalanka da ba su hakkinsu dadai gwargwadon karfinka to babu shakka ba za ka taba tunanin xaga hannu ka bugi iyalinka ba ko ka take mata hakkinta komai kankantarsa.

③. Ka tuna kana da kanwa: ko da ba diki xaya kuka fito ba ka tuna kai ma kana da ’yar uwa made wadde ba za ka so a dutar da ita ba, kuma idan sun yi aure za ka so a de suna zaman lafiya da kwandiyar hankali. Kar ka yi abin da ba ka so a yi maka ko a yi wa wani naka. Yana da kyau ka rika kallon iyalinka matsayin matarka, kanwarka, kawarka,
Dalibarka kuma babbar na hannun damarka wadde za ka iya tuntuba domin neman wasu shawarwari idan bukatar hakan ta taso. Annabi (s.a.w) ma ya kan nemi shawarwari daga wajen iyalinsa musamman Ummul Salmah (Allah Ya kara yarda da ita) ballantana mu!.

④. Yana da kyau mu mazaje mu dire girman kai mu rika yaba wa iyalanmu bisa kokarinsu, kuma mu rika jan su a jiki muna nuna musu muhimmandinsu a rayuwarmu, su ma mata su kara zage damtse wajen nuna ladabi da biyayya ga mazajensu domin hakan yana inganta soyayyar rayuwar aure. Maigida ka kasande mai yaba wa girkinta, kwalliyarta da sauran ayyukan gida. Mata suna son hakan domin yin
hakan yana kara musu kaimi wajen kokarin kyautata wa mazajensu ta hanyoyi daban-daban..

A karshe ina kira ga ’yan uwana maza da mata da mu tattara dukkan daxaxxun kalamai na soyayya da irin kyautatawar da suka saba yi wa junansu kafin su yi aure zuwa dikin rayuwarmu ta aure. Barin waxannnan sinadaran a waje yana yin illa sosai ga tubalin zamantakewar ma’auratan. Saboda haka al’ummar Hausawa ya kamata mu tashi tsaye wajen ganin mun zama abin misaltuwa idan ana maganar kyan rayuwa da zamantakewar aure. Allah Ya
sa mu dade, Amin.

ALAMOMIN CIWON SANYI

1 fitar kuraje a gaban mace
2 fitar da farin ruwa a gaban mace
3 jin zafi lokacin saduwa maimakon mace taji dadi
4 fitar fitsari da zafi
5 jin motsi a cikin jikinta.

NAMIJI CIWON SANYI

1 fitar farin ruwa a gabansa
2 kurji a gabansa
3 bakinsa yayi ja koma yayi kuraje
4 RASHIN KARFINSA NA MAZAKUTA
5 yaji wani abu kamar tana yawo a jikinsa.

akwai matanda basayin sha'awa ko basa jin dadi saduwa ko ni'imarsu ta dauke to yanda za'a magance wannan matsala shine

wannan hadi a shayi safe da yamma.

ga mijinta, zaki samu

① GYARA JIKI DA DILKA:

□ kurkur
□ dilka
□ zuma
□ lemun tsami.

  lemun tsami ya kasance lemun tsami shine ruwan da za'a kwaba sosai.
 Sai ki shafe jiki da shi Bayan minti 10 Sai ki murje jikinki Sai ki wanka.

Zaki iya zuba ruwan lalli na gargajiya kadan cikin ruwan wanka.

Abin lura Nonuwan mata sun kasu kashi biyu, akwai mata
masu manya nonuwa. Sannan akwai masu kananan nonuwa zanso nayi bayaninsu daya
bayan daya.

*👙👙 MANYA NONUWA 👙👙*


Su wadannan nau'in nonuwa suna da matukar,daukar hankalin da namiji Musamman in ya kasance sabuwar balaga Irin wadannan nau'in nonuwa sukan ciki kirjin
budurwa a lokacin da take ganiyar kuruciyarta to
amma da zarar tayi aure ta haihu shikenan sai nonuwan su koma su fadi gaba daya kamar an
fasa Leda. Mata masu irin wadannan nonuwan ba su cike burge mazajensu ba√


*👙👙 KANANAN NONUWA 👙👙*

Su wadannan nau'in nonuwa sune suka fi daukar hankalin mazaje to amma ba duk maza ne ma'abota irin wadannan nonuwa ke daukar hankali ba sannan kuma su wadannan kananan
nonuwa sun kasu kashi biyune:

👙 Mai kan tasa, su nau'in wadannan nonuwa sukan
tsiro ne daga kirjin budurwa da kaurinsu sannan kuma suna da fadi daga tushe irin wadannan
nonuwa koda yaro yasha su basa faduwa sai dai su koma su tsaya cak tamkar ja sabuwar budurwa.

•••👙 nau`in nonuwa na biyu kuwa sune mafiya kankantar a cikin nonuwa mata su wadannan
nonuwa suna da tsawo kadan amma basu da kauri.

 Kuma idan yaro ya sha su basa faduwa gaba daya sai dai su dan sunkuya sannan daga samansu su dago kadan mata masu irin
wadannan nonuwa na burge mazajensu sosai~

       *🤦🏽‍♂💁🏽‍♂•••• MAZA ••••🕺🏽*

Idan muka fahimci wanna matsala zamu Gina duk wasu magani da zamu kawo insha Allah.

√ Azzakari maza sun kasu kashi-kashi amma zan yi kokarin kawo maku bayanai akan wasu daga
ciki•••

Akwai wani malami masanin ilimi jima'i yace azzakari dogo ne kakkaura kuma cikin sa kashi
ne Sannan daga waje yana zagaye ne da fata.

 ya kara da cewa shi wanna Zakari baya gajiya da jima'i tare da zuba maniyyi ma'abocin wannan Zakari yakan kai sama da shekaru saba'in ba tare da zakarin nasa yayi rauni ba (70)year 

2 shi wannan shi wannan Zakari cikinsa cike yace da jijiyoyi sannan zakaye yake da fata.
Ma'abocin wannan Zakari yana 
 farantwa mata wajen kwanciyar jima'i sai dai  yakan fara samun
rauni ne daga shekaru (60).


3 sai kuma mafi rauni daga cikinsu ita wannan cikinsa tsoka nama ce sai kuma yan tsirarun
jijiyoyi sannan fata da ta rufe shi mafi yawanci mazaje wannan zamani ma'abota irin wannan
Zakari sunfi yawa. 

Sannan shi wannan Zakari ya
kan fara samun rauni ne daga shekaru hamshi zuwa kasa(50).

*•• AZZAKARIN DA BAYA TASHI ••*

Akwai wasu mazaje da azzakari su baya tashi wasu.

• HALITTARSU
• CIWO
• SIHIRI

In aka nemi magani ana iya samun waraka Mafi yawan abinda yake kawo haka shine saurayi ya kasa abokin hamayyansa wajen Neman aure
Haka yana sanya wanda aka kasan yayi wa angon asiri•


*•• SUFFOFIN INZALI MAZA DA MATA*


Yana da kyau idan miji ya biya bukatarsa da matarsa to ya dakata kadan har sai bukatar
matar tasa ta biya•

Domin rashin dakata mata ta biya tata bukatar na iya cutar da ita Kuma yana iya haifar da tsana a tsakaninku amma kuma idan itace ta rigashi inzali to anso ya sauka daga kanta domin cigaba da jima'i da ita bayan tayi inzali na iya cutar da ita•


🤦🏽‍♂√ ALAMOMIN INZALI MATA√🤦🏽‍♂

• alama ta farko miji zai ga gumi ya tsatatsafo mata a goshi.

• miji zai ji matarsa ta makalkale shi.

• akwai wacce kunya take kamata bata iya hada ido da mijinta.

• akwai wadda gabobin suke saki gaba daya.

• akwai kuma wacce razana take jin tayi inzali.

• akwai wacce take rufe idanunta da hannayenta.

• akwai wacce take ture mijinta daga kanta.

*ALAMOMIN INZALI releasing MAZA*

@ akwai wanda zai saki jikinsa kamar ya mutu.
@ akwai wanda yake kuka
@ akwai wanda yake dukan shimfida da hannunsa.
@ akwai wanda Yale rungume matarsa kamar ya tsagata.
@ akwai wanda Yale shure-shure
@ akwal wanda. Yake rintse idanusa ya cinje fatar bakinsa.

*√ SUFFOFIN KWANCIYAR JIMA'I √*


Kwanciyar gaba da gaba Yadda ake yi wannan kwanciyar kuwa shine, Mace ta kwanta akan gadon bayanta ta wara cinyoyinta, shi kuma miji ya kwanta akan ruwan
cikinta, amma ya dan dafa gado ko shimfida da suke kai,do min ya rage nauyinsa akan mata tasa ,sai ya sanya ciyoyinsa a tsakanin nata.

Sannan sai ya sanya azzakarinsa cikin farjinta sannu a hankali wanna kwanciyar na da kyau
sosai sannan kuma tana baiwa MA'AURATA damar yin shafe shafe da gugar Juna Kwanciyar bangare daya Wannan kwanciya ta kasu kashi biyu ne Akwai kwanciyar bangare daya ta gaba akwai kuma ta baya Kwanciya bangare daya ta gaba wannan
kwanciya mace kan kwanta ne ta gefenta nadama, shi ma namiji sai yayi irin wannan kwanciyar ya fuskanci matar tasa, amma dole ne sai matar ta daga kafarta daya kadan sannan namiji zai iya sanya azzakarinsa cikin farjinta.

•• kwanciyar bangare daya ta baya ••

Wannan kwanciya ana yinta ne kamar yadda ake yin kwanciyar bangare daya ta gaba• banbancin
kawai shine ita wannan ta baya akeyi ••

•~ jima'i zaune ~•

Yadda akeyin wannan jima'i in shine namiji zai zauna ita Kuma matar zata zauna akan ciyoyinsa, sannan sai ta taba cinyoyinta shi ma namiji ya dan bude gwuiwoyinsa domin ya raba cinyoyin matar tasa. Sai ya shiga da azzakarinsa sannu a hankali.

•• tsukakken farji ••

Tsukakken farji na matukar taimakawa MA'AURATA su sami dadi dandanon jima'insu sabanin wawakeken farji mai fadi
mata a dinga gyara farji da nono domin wanna itacemace
Yawan maniyyi sa sanya ma'aurata su sami
dandanon mai gamsarwa a wurin jima'i saboda yake da mahinmanci ma'aurata su cika abinci mai gina jiki da kara lafiya ta yadda zasu samu yai wataccen ruwan maniyyi a jikinsu.

• wake da albasa
• naman kaji da kwai
• ayaba da lemo
• gwanda da inibi da dai sauransu.

• cikakken azzakari
Idan azzakarin mai gida ya kasance karam
Farjin matarsa kuma ya kasance mai fadi to hakika ma'aurata ba zasu mi jin dadin dandanon jima'insu ba.

√ karfin azzakarin

Karfin azzakari na matukar taimakawa ma'aurata
ta yadda zasu more dadin dandanon jima'insu ya kamata maigida ya rika kula da lafiyar azzakarin sa sosai Na kawo wanna ne domin gaba daya matsala zata zama ta wanna ne insha Allah.

√ MAGANIN mutuwar mazakuta √
× MAGANIN karfin mazakuta da karfin jiki × Karfi kuzari
• madara tana inganta mazakuta
Ga namiji da yake saurin inzali releasing
Ya samu
• cucumber
• zuma

Zaki markada cucumber ba tare da kin fere ba sai ki zuba zuma a ciki zaki iya sakawa a cikin
farji domin yayi sanyi saboda maigida yaji dadin sha.

√ tsukewar gaban mace √

• garin zogale
• man kadanya
• alif kadan
• kwaro
Zaki hade kwaro da alif ki daka su suyi laushi sai ki tankade ki ake sai ki hada da garin zogale sai ki hada su cikin man da ake ambato ki kwabasu guri daya bayan sallar magariba sai ki diba kiyi matsi da shi a gabanki idan ya samu tsayin away dayaba jikinki sai ki wanke da ruwan dimi zaki iya samun hulba ki tafasa idan ruwan ya sha iska
sai ki wanke.

•• GYARAN NONO••

Kunun alkama da madara zaki yi shi sau biyu a rana zaki yi hakan kafin sati biyu a yi iyaye da
kuma sati biyu bayan iyaye.

GYARAN NONO

Hulba za a samu a tafasa ki rinka gasa nono da shi sai kuma a shafa man hulba za a ga abin
mamaki 

GYARAN NONO

A tafasa hulba a gasa nono, sai a shafa kwan salwa a kuma FASA kwan salwan guda uku a
sha.

 *👙 ​AKWAI ℳACE WADDA BATA DA CIKAR NONO.​ 👙*

*yadda danganta da irin tsarin da halitta take.*

 *👙 mace mai girman jiki ( kiba) Zaki sameta da manya nono. 👙*

*👙 mace mai siranta Zaki sameta da karamin nono. 👙*
 

*To daga lokacin fa nono yake lalacewa daga lokacin da mace ta haihu musamman haihuwa farko.*

*Haka kuma akan sami mace mai gangar jiki amma nono ta karamin.*

*Ko ki ga mace siririya nononta manya.*

*To wannan kuma ya samo asali daga gadon da tayi daga bangaren mahaifa.*

*Idan ya kasance yan uwa mahaifinta mata suna da manya nono to itama zata iya kasancewa mai manya nono.*

*To idan kika kasance mai daya daga ciki wadannan kina kuma bukatar gyara to ga hanyar.*

🔛GEFEN HAMMATA👙

☀Yar uwa idan kika iya biyawa oga bukata ta wannan hanyar wato hammatarki,hmmmm to da oga yaji dadi,yadda zakiyi 

☀saiki kama bananar🍌🍌🍌🍌oga ki matseta (either left or right hand)ki zauna ko kwance sai oga ya sanya bananarsa🍌🍌🍌tsakani yana sokawa,idan da man (cream)saiki dan shafa mata don saukin sokawa haka kuma kina kama (twice)kina matsewa hmmmmmmmm harya biya bukatarsa

🙌🏾HANNU🙌🏾

Kowa yasan yadda ake kama banana 🍌🍌🍌🍌da hannu a murza akama (twice)a matsa haka zaki dinga yi masa harya kawo

👄BAKI👄

Bawai kawai kiss ake da baki ba,harda biyawa oga bukata yayin (period)

Wasu matan ko kiss basu iya ba don haka zasu koyi yadda akeyinsa

Hmmmmmmmm ina kike yar uwa kisani wallahi idan kik gwada yiwa oga hakan yayinda yake bukace domin hmmmmm lallai zaki sha mamaki domin zaki ga yadda oga zaikamayi idan mah ace kin gwane

Alokacin da kika kama zakarin sa saiki saka abakinki amman kafin ki saka saiki dan fara lasata kina lasawa sama sama saiki dan kamu dai dai wajan dan kan kaciyarsa ki tsotsa kina murzawa saiki sakata doka kinayi kina cirewa kina tsotsa,wai dadi kan dadi amman sai kingwada,


Wallahi mata kocire konya domin reke mazajenko da kyau kosani wani lokacin idan kona (period)shike sawa mazajanko so shiga wani hali

Amman idan konayi musu haka ai shikenna

👞TAFIN KAFA👞

Yar uwa saiki saka oga ya kwanta rigir gine ya ware kafarsa kamar zaki masa kaciya sai kisa tautausar tafin kafarki guda biyu kina murmurza bananar🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌sa ki taba kanta kinataba (twice)har saikinga ya kawo

💧NONO💧

Da yawanmu musan yadda ake biyawa oga bukata da nono 

Kisani bawai anyi shidan kawai ki bawa jariri bane yadda ake (sucking)haka zaki wa oga wato ki hada masa su guri daya,shi kuma yasa bananarsa🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌a tsakiya yayita sakata kada ki tsaya haka ki dinga tufa mata miyau (yawu)danya samu sauki

🎱KULAWA🎱

Duk wadannan abunuwan bazasu samu ba sai kin iya wasa da miji wato ki zama mace wadda bata da kunya a wajansa,domin shine zai sa yabiya masa bukatarsa da kyau

👎🏻ABIN LURA👎🏻

Yar uwa kada ki bari ya sadu dake,idan kina haila wato (period)don hakan sabawa Allah ne da manzonsa,hakanan ki nisanxi sanya banana🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌🍌cikin duburan ki wato (duwawu)yin hakan haramun ne,💥

a kunnansa kina yi masa wasa dashi...take
maigida zai hau gantsarewa tare dayin nishin
dadi...

saman bananarsa da hannunki daya,kina wasa da
ita kamar kina yi masa tafiyar tsutsa take zai fara
kuka kuka ko gurnanin shidewa...

dire bakinsa,ki rufe bakinki da nasa kiyi ta wasa
da halshenki cikin bakinsa daya hannun kuma kin
tallafo bayansa kina yi masa susa a keuarsa
zuwa kasan wuyansa...sa mai gida tsalle kenan
idan bakiyi sa'aba a hakama sai yayi releasing
don dadi...

matse matsin duwawunsa...ba shakka mai gida
in mai saurin kukane take zai fara yi miki kukan
dadi...

jikinki...ki bararraje sosai yayin daya fara
kusantarki...hadi dayi masa 'yan koke koke da
sumbatun dadi koda kuwa ba dadin kike
jiba..1annan ma na kara narkar da maigida...yasa

*YADDA AKE TSOKANA SHA'AWA🙈*
kafin a sami gamsuwa wurin jima'i,ya zama dole
a ga cewa an tsokano sha'awa,ta yadda jiki zai
zama a shirye don yin jima'i.
Ana fara tsokano sha'awa ne ta hanyar wasa da
nono.musamman kan nonon.sabuda wannan
sashe yana da jin tabi musamman ma idan ana
shafarsa da harshe,ko da yatsa,ko kuma a rika
tsotsarsa.Idan an shafe shi sosai da harshe,ko da
yatsa,ko kuma aka tsotsa shi yana mikewa kamar
yadda beli yake mikewa,in an tsokano shi.Yana
daga abinda yake kara armashi,mutum ya rika
wasa da kan nono tare da beli a lokaci
guda.Wannan yana sa mace ta samu jin dadi.

zufa a goshin ta

da mijin ta

suke saki gaba daya

idanunta da hannayenta

* ALLAH YASA MUDACE
ZUWA GA YAN UWA MATA*
Irin Zane-zanen nan da 'Yan matan zamanin nan
kukeyi a kafafunku da hannayenku, yana daga
cikin dalilan da suke jan hakalin Aljanun soyayya
su shiga jikinku su aureku, su hanaku aure.
Sauran dalilan sun hada da Zantukan batsa irin
wanda kukeyi da samarinku a waya, ko chatting
musamman cikin tsakiyar dare, wasu ma ta haka
suke biya ma kansu bukata. Kuma wannan ne
yakan kai su zuwa ga aikata zina da junansu.
Shi Aljani yana gefe yana jin abinda kuke
tattaunawa. Kuma daga nan shima idan tasa
sha'awar ta motsa sai ya shiga jikinki ya ci gaba
da zuwa yana saduwa dake, tunda kin nuna cewa
ke Mazinaciya ce.
Barin kai babu dankwalin ko kuma barin silin
gaashi ko kitso awaje, shima babban dalili ne.
Domin kuwa duk lokacin da Mace ta bar gashin
kanta babu rufi, to Mala'iku zasu kauce daga
wajen sai Shaitanun Aljanu su maye gurbinsu, su
shiga jikinta.
Hakanan sanya matsatsun Sutura ko kuma
Tufafin da yake nuna Qirjin Mace afili, ko bayanta,
ko fesa turare mai mugun Kamshi in za'a fita
Unguwa.
Kamar yadda kika sanya domin daukar hankalin
mazaje, to fa bayan Mazajen Bil Adam, har
Mazajen Aljanu ma suna kamuwa da sha'awar
Jima'I dake.
Akwai wata Matar da take aikata irin wannan, tun
tana budurwa, Ashe wani Aljani mai suna Umar
ya riga ya shiga jikinta.
Bayan tayi aure, kullum sai Aljanin yazo ya sadu
da ita. Har da rana ko da daddare. Ko agaban
Mutane sai yazo ya kwanta da ita.
Su mutanen ba zasu gani ba, amma ita tana gani
kuma tana jinsa yana saduwa da ita.
Data haifi yaro ma, sai da Aljanin ya shanye
Qafar yaron ya mayar dashi Gurgu. (Kamar yadda
yake fada da bakinsa).
Daga karshe ta warke. Amma munfi sati 3 muna
fama dashi kafin daga karshe Allah ya taimakemu
akansa ya mutu.
Duk wanda ya karanta wannan sakon, munyi izini
kowa ya tura ma Contacts dinsa. Ko Allah zai sa
'yan uwanmu Mata su fahimci hadarin da suke
jefa kansu

kenan, nan da nan zakiji yace to taho muje mu

NI'IMAR MACE* =================
Na shigo ne a yau don yin nazari tare da tunatar
da ku matsalolin da ake samu a ban daki na
kwayoyin cututtuka. Ina masu fama da kwayoyin
cuta da ake samu a yayin zaman biyan bukata a
ban daki? Dalilin yin magana a kan wannan cutar
don kusan jama’a da dama suna fama da ‘Toilet
Infection’ a Turance.
Ya kamata uwargida ta fahimci cewa kwayoyin
cutar da ake samu a ban daki suna da hatsari
matuka ga ‘ya mace. Na farko suna hana
haihuwa, kwayoyin cutar suna saurin busar da
duk ni’imar mace. Wannan ya sa duk kwaliyyar da
kike yi, bata lokaci ne, maigida ba ze gani ba,
saboda ya san idan ya kusance ki lokacin
*(SADUWA DAKE)*, ba ki da wani dandano a tare
da ke. Irin haka ke haifar da matsaloli a tsakanin
ma’aurata, don ba abin mamaki ba ne uwargida
ta yi tunanin maigida ya tsane ta ne, alhali babu
wata tsana, ke ce dai ba ki kulawa da kanki
yadda ya kamata.
Yana da kyau uwargida ta dauki wannan da
mahimmanci wajen gano bakin zaren, kana ta yi
tsayin daka don magance cutar baki dayanta.
Shin me ya kamata ki yi don magance cutukan da
ake kamuwa da su ban daki? Ki tanadi wadannan
ayayyakin kamar haka:
*👉🏾1* Lalle da ganyen magarya, ki rika shiga ciki
kina zama
*👉🏾2* Bayan nan kuma, ki samu man Zaitun, man
Tafarnuwa, man Hulbah, ki hada su da miski, sai
a rika turawa a gindin ki Wannan babban sinadari
ne matuka yana inganta mace ta kasance mace
mai amsa sunanta, sannan ya warkar da
cututtukan.
*👉🏾3*Za ki iya samun bagaruwa da ganyen
magarya , garin Hulbah, garin Habbatus-sauda, ki
hada su wuri daya, ki tafasa su sosai , idan kika
sauke, ki bar shi ya huce amma da duminsa ki
rika zama a ciki.
*👉🏾4* Ki samu man Tafarnuwa, man Hulba, man
Habbah, ki dinga sha a kai- a kai, shi kuma zai
kashe miki cututtukan da ke cikinki.
*👉🏾5* Amfani da miski musanman bayan gama
al’ada yana matukar taimakawa, sannan kuma
yana dawo miki da ni’imar da kika rasa lokacin
da kike al’ada.
*6*Za ki samu saiwar Zogale da Tafarnuwa ki
dafa su a tare, idan kika sauke, ki bar shi ya
huce, sai ki zauna a ciki da dan duminsa, har sai
ya huce gaba daya za ki fita.
Bayan duk wadannan, ya ke uwarigda da sauran
aiki, domin ana son ki dinga amfani da ruwan
dumi mussanman lokacin da kike al’ada.
Amma mafi mahimmanci a rika tsaftace ban daki
a koda yaushe, don rashin tsaftace shi zai iya
haifar da cututtukan da ba za a iya sanin
hakikansu ba. Kana kuna mutum ya kasance mai
wanke hannayensa a duk lokacin da ya fito daga
ban daki da sabulu ba ruwa kawai ba.
Da fatan za ku yi amfani da wannan damar wajen
inganta rayuwarmu, tun kafin cututtuka su ci
galabanku.
Haka kuma bayan amfani da albasa don maganin
rashin dandano da rigakafin wasu cututtuka, har
ila yau ta yarda da amfani da albasa wajen
maganin sanyi da tari asma da ciwon sanyi
(bronchitis).
Albasa kan rage maikon dake cikin jini. A kasar
Indiya a wasu wuraren da basa yin amfani da
albasa akan same su da maikon cikin jini da
cushe jijiyoyin dake tafiyar da jini akan wadanda
suke amfani da tafarnuwa da kuma albasa.
Albasa na bada kariya wajen kara kumburi game
cutar daji.
Har ila yau albasa na bada kariya wajen ciwon
ciki, da cutar daji da sauran cututtuka. Tana
karawa huhu karfi musamman ga masu cutar
asma.
A wani bangaren kuma, yana da kyau a lura da
cewa, idan an yanka albasa rabi, to kodai a sa a
cikin firinji ko a yar da sauran don kuwa idan aka
bar ta ta kwana a yanke, in har an yi amfani da
ita za ta cutar da mutum don ita albassa ta
kasance kamar kura ce ga ‘kwayoyin
cuta==========
*ABUBUWAN DAKE KARAWA HAKORA HASKE👄*

Lura da hakori na daya daga cikin hanyoyin
dakan kara fitar da kima hadida kamalar
mutum.
Duk yadda mutum yakai ga iya kwalliya hadida
kwarewa wurin daukar wanka daxarar yagaxa
tafannin kula da hakoransa saikaga gabadaya
kwalliyar ta lalace, dankuwa yagaxa tafannin
bawa hakoransa kulawar data dace.
Danhaka wannan wata hanyace daxata dawowa
mutum kima, martaba hadida darajar
hakoranki/ka koda kuwa hakoran sunyi irin
baki ko tsatsa tacikine haka kuma yakan yaki
kwayoyin cutar dakan haifarwa mutum warin
baki.

*👉🏾1-STRAWBERRIES*
Kinemi ganyen itacen strawberry kiyankashi
kanana-kanana kidinga cuda hakoran dashi,
yana sanya hakora haske sosai haka kuma yana
kore dattin dake makalewa ajikin hakora,
hakanan yana sanya baki fitar da iska me
dadin kamshi.
*👉🏾2-LEMON ZAKI(ORANGE)*
Kisamu lemon xaki mekyau meruwa kiyanka
kimatse ruwan sannan ki guntsi ruwan abakinki
sannan kisanya brush kidinga diddirxawa lungu
da sako sannan kixubar kiwanke da ruwa.
Yanasa hakora suyi kashar kamar kankara.
*👉🏾3-LEMON TSAMI(LEMON)*
Kisamu lemon tsami kiyanka ki matse ruwan
sannan ki sanya abakinki kiwanke kowane
lumgu da saki na bakin,z
yana fitar da duk wani dabbara-dabbara *✍note Idan Akwai mai tambaya Ko neman shawara Ko neman magani muna sayar da magani kala kala kamar su maganin girman nono (breast)maganin sanyi (infection) maganin karawa mace kugu(hips) da maganin matsi Ki koma kamar sabuwar budurwa Akwai kuma maganin yan matan da suka rasa budurcinsu da maganin farin jini ga yan Mata da,zawarawa maganin karpin maza🍌🙈dakuma na karin Ni ima

  HANYOYI 16 DA UWARGIDA ZATA BI DON INGANTA NI'IMAR JIKINTA

🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹

⚜ KANKANA🍉::za'a samu kankana a hada ta da gwanda a feraye a markada su a blender asha za'a samu ni'ima a jiki


⚜DABINO:::za'a samu danyen dabino wanda ya fara nuna a dinga ci shima yana kara ni'ima 

⚜KUNUN DABINO🤔::: uwargida zata sami dabinonta ta cire kwallayan ta jikashi idan yayi taushi sosai zata markada shi a blender ta saka madara shima yana kara ni'ima sosai 😋😄


⚜ZOGALE🌿::: cin kwandon zogale a yanka mishi kwai yana kara ni'ima kuma kisamu zogalen ki me kyau ki shanya shi a inuwa idan ya bushi Sai dakashi kiringa shi da madara yana kara ni 'ima sosai 

⚜YA'YAN ZOGALE::: uwargida ki samu ya'yan zogale ta barsu su bushe ta dake su a hade da dabino da cikude ta dinga sha da nono zata yi mamaki sosai hmmm


⚜LEMON AYA ::da kwakwa -uwargida zaki samu ayarki ta jikata ta jiku sosai sai ki yanka kwakwarki kananan ko ta gurza a greader ta hada kwakwar da ayar ta markada ta tace tasa sugar ko zuma tasha zaki shi mamaki 


⚜FARAR SHINKAFA:::: uwargida zaki samu shinkafarki ki wanki ta idan ki gama wanki war saiki shan yata ta bushe idan ta bushidin saiki samu ya"yan zogale ki hadi su da bushi sheyar shinkafarki ki dakasu sosai saiki tankade su kiringa shi da madara ko nono hmmmm zaki shi mamaki 


⚜GANYEN IDON ZAKARA::: ki samu ganyen idon zakaran ki hada shi da dabino ki dakashi ki dinga sha da nono 


⚜ ZAITUN:::mace datake fama da bushewar farji zata samu zaitun tasha cokali biyu sanan ta dinga zubawa a farjinta insha Allahu za'a dace 


⚜ALKAMA::uwargida zaki samu alkamarki surfa a niko miki ita garin zata soya shi a tukunya har yayi ja sai ta ringa deba kina shi da nono mai kyau da zuma kisha zaki yi kamar sau uku hmmmm


⚜KOKONBA🥒:: yar uwata zaki samu cocomber ki feraye ta yanka tumatir da albasaki yanka  dafaffen kwai guda uku saiki cin😋😋😄 shima yana kara ni'ima sosai


⚜ZUMA DA GARIN HABBATUSSAUD🍯:: uwargida zaki samu zuma mai kyau ki. zuba garin habbatussaida da man zaitun ki juyashi zaki dinga shan babban cokali biyu safe da yamma insha Allahu zaki samu ni'ima

⚜MADARA PEAK 🥛::uwargida zaki samu madara peak gwangwani daya ki fasa danyan kwai ki buga da cokali har sai ya daina kumfa zaki shan zaki samu ni'ima sosai ana da sanyayyar la'asar aki sha 


⚜RUWAN RAKE ::zaki samu ta kirba rake a turmi ta samu abin tata mai kyau ki maste ruwan ki saka zuma cokali biyu zaki samu ni'ima sosai kuma ki ringa shin rake da dayawa ki ringa sha


⚜ AYA :: haka kuma yar'uwata zaki samu aya ki wanki ta nika ki soya sama sama ki cire jan bawon zaki samu cokali da dabino ki hada su gaba daya ki daka ki dinga sha da nono ko madara 

⚜YA'YAN ZOGALE ::yar wata zaki samu ya'yan zogale ki dakashi ki dinga sha da nono ko madara
 

   ⚜⚜ FADAKARWA ⚜⚜


A duk lokacin da mace taki cikin damuwa ko tashin hankali ni'imar jikinki tana daukewa don haka sai a kula adaina sa abu a rai 
              kuma dukkan wan yan nan magane dana fadisu  basa cottar da jikin dan adam ku kena da samye idan kikai amfani da daya daka cikin su Inshi Allahu zaki samu ni'ima

*SARRAFA ZOGALE DOMIN KISAMU NI.IMA*

Duk wani sassan jikin zogale babu inda bamu fadi yanda ake sarrafashi ba 'ya'yansa da icensa jijiyarsa tareda furensa ballantana uwa uba ganyensa don haka Ku rinka bincika adreshinmu na yanar gizo 


Wannan kuma na ni.ima ne zallah wanda ake cewa adon mace dan haka ganyen zogalen zaki samu ki wanke ki tabbatar babu datti saiki sai kuma cocumber  ki fereshi ki yanyanka ki hada ki markade da blander saiki tace ruwan sannan ki zuba madara peak da zuma aciki a ajiyeshi anasha da yamma zakiyi mamaki kafin dare kin gama cika


Ga wadanda zogale yake batawa ciki kuma suna iya saka jar kanwa kadan aciki

*✤ GYARA DA KANKI ✤

Whatsapp
09081886635

Abin lura Nonuwan mata sun kasu kashi biyu, akwai mata
masu manya nonuwa. Sannan akwai masu kananan nonuwa zanso nayi bayaninsu daya
bayan daya.

*👙👙 MANYA NONUWA 👙👙*


Su wadannan nau'in nonuwa suna da matukar,daukar hankalin da namiji Musamman in ya kasance sabuwar balaga Irin wadannan nau'in nonuwa sukan ciki kirjin
budurwa a lokacin da take ganiyar kuruciyarta to
amma da zarar tayi aure ta haihu shikenan sai nonuwan su koma su fadi gaba daya kamar an
fasa Leda. Mata masu irin wadannan nonuwan ba su cike burge mazajensu ba√


*👙👙 KANANAN NONUWA 👙👙*

Su wadannan nau'in nonuwa sune suka fi daukar hankalin mazaje to amma ba duk maza ne ma'abota irin wadannan nonuwa ke daukar hankali ba sannan kuma su wadannan kananan
nonuwa sun kasu kashi biyune:

👙 Mai kan tasa, su nau'in wadannan nonuwa sukan
tsiro ne daga kirjin budurwa da kaurinsu sannan kuma suna da fadi daga tushe irin wadannan
nonuwa koda yaro yasha su basa faduwa sai dai su koma su tsaya cak tamkar ja sabuwar budurwa.

•••👙 nau`in nonuwa na biyu kuwa sune mafiya kankantar a cikin nonuwa mata su wadannan
nonuwa suna da tsawo kadan amma basu da kauri.

 Kuma idan yaro ya sha su basa faduwa gaba daya sai dai su dan sunkuya sannan daga samansu su dago kadan mata masu irin
wadannan nonuwa na burge mazajensu sosai~

       *🤦🏽‍♂💁🏽‍♂•••• MAZA ••••🕺🏽*

Idan muka fahimci wanna matsala zamu Gina duk wasu magani da zamu kawo insha Allah.

√ Azzakari maza sun kasu kashi-kashi amma zan yi kokarin kawo maku bayanai akan wasu daga
ciki•••

Akwai wani malami masanin ilimi jima'i yace azzakari dogo ne kakkaura kuma cikin sa kashi
ne Sannan daga waje yana zagaye ne da fata.

 ya kara da cewa shi wanna Zakari baya gajiya da jima'i tare da zuba maniyyi ma'abocin wannan Zakari yakan kai sama da shekaru saba'in ba tare da zakarin nasa yayi rauni ba (70)year 

2 shi wannan shi wannan Zakari cikinsa cike yace da jijiyoyi sannan zakaye yake da fata.
Ma'abocin wannan Zakari yana 
 farantwa mata wajen kwanciyar jima'i sai dai yakan fara samun
rauni ne daga shekaru (60).


3 sai kuma mafi rauni daga cikinsu ita wannan cikinsa tsoka nama ce sai kuma yan tsirarun
jijiyoyi sannan fata da ta rufe shi mafi yawanci mazaje wannan zamani ma'abota irin wannan
Zakari sunfi yawa. 

Sannan shi wannan Zakari ya
kan fara samun rauni ne daga shekaru hamshi zuwa kasa(50).

*•• AZZAKARIN DA BAYA TASHI ••*

Akwai wasu mazaje da azzakari su baya tashi wasu.

• HALITTARSU
• CIWO
• SIHIRI

In aka nemi magani ana iya samun waraka Mafi yawan abinda yake kawo haka shine saurayi ya kasa abokin hamayyansa wajen Neman aure
Haka yana sanya wanda aka kasan yayi wa angon asiri•


*•• SUFFOFIN INZALI MAZA DA MATA*


Yana da kyau idan miji ya biya bukatarsa da matarsa to ya dakata kadan har sai bukatar
matar tasa ta biya•

Domin rashin dakata mata ta biya tata bukatar na iya cutar da ita Kuma yana iya haifar da tsana a tsakaninku amma kuma idan itace ta rigashi inzali to anso ya sauka daga kanta domin cigaba da jima'i da ita bayan tayi inzali na iya cutar da ita•


🤦🏽‍♂√ ALAMOMIN INZALI MATA√🤦🏽‍♂

• alama ta farko miji zai ga gumi ya tsatatsafo mata a goshi.

• miji zai ji matarsa ta makalkale shi.

• akwai wacce kunya take kamata bata iya hada ido da mijinta.

• akwai wadda gabobin suke saki gaba daya.

• akwai kuma wacce razana take jin tayi inzali.

• akwai wacce take rufe idanunta da hannayenta.

• akwai wacce take ture mijinta daga kanta.

*ALAMOMIN INZALI releasing MAZA*

@ akwai wanda zai saki jikinsa kamar ya mutu.
@ akwai wanda yake kuka
@ akwai wanda yake dukan shimfida da hannunsa.
@ akwai wanda Yale rungume matarsa kamar ya tsagata.
@ akwai wanda Yale shure-shure
@ akwal wanda. Yake rintse idanusa ya cinje fatar bakinsa.

*√ SUFFOFIN KWANCIYAR JIMA'I √*


Kwanciyar gaba da gaba Yadda ake yi wannan kwanciyar kuwa shine, Mace ta kwanta akan gadon bayanta ta wara cinyoyinta, shi kuma miji ya kwanta akan ruwan
cikinta, amma ya dan dafa gado ko shimfida da suke kai,do min ya rage nauyinsa akan mata tasa ,sai ya sanya ciyoyinsa a tsakanin nata.

Sannan sai ya sanya azzakarinsa cikin farjinta sannu a hankali wanna kwanciyar na da kyau
sosai sannan kuma tana baiwa MA'AURATA damar yin shafe shafe da gugar Juna Kwanciyar bangare daya Wannan kwanciya ta kasu kashi biyu ne Akwai kwanciyar bangare daya ta gaba akwai kuma ta baya Kwanciya bangare daya ta gaba wannan
kwanciya mace kan kwanta ne ta gefenta nadama, shi ma namiji sai yayi irin wannan kwanciyar ya fuskanci matar tasa, amma dole ne sai matar ta daga kafarta daya kadan sannan namiji zai iya sanya azzakarinsa cikin farjinta.

•• kwanciyar bangare daya ta baya ••

Wannan kwanciya ana yinta ne kamar yadda ake yin kwanciyar bangare daya ta gaba• banbancin
kawai shine ita wannan ta baya akeyi ••

•~ jima'i zaune ~•

Yadda akeyin wannan jima'i in shine namiji zai zauna ita Kuma matar zata zauna akan ciyoyinsa, sannan sai ta taba cinyoyinta shi ma namiji ya dan bude gwuiwoyinsa domin ya raba cinyoyin matar tasa. Sai ya shiga da azzakarinsa sannu a hankali.

•• tsukakken farji ••

Tsukakken farji na matukar taimakawa MA'AURATA su sami dadi dandanon jima'insu sabanin wawakeken farji mai fadi
mata a dinga gyara farji da nono domin wanna itacemace
Yawan maniyyi sa sanya ma'aurata su sami
dandanon mai gamsarwa a wurin jima'i saboda yake da mahinmanci ma'aurata su cika abinci mai gina jiki da kara lafiya ta yadda zasu samu yai wataccen ruwan maniyyi a jikinsu.

• wake da albasa
• naman kaji da kwai
• ayaba da lemo
• gwanda da inibi da dai sauransu.

• cikakken azzakari
Idan azzakarin mai gida ya kasance karam
Farjin matarsa kuma ya kasance mai fadi to hakika ma'aurata ba zasu mi jin dadin dandanon jima'insu ba.

√ karfin azzakarin

Karfin azzakari na matukar taimakawa ma'aurata
ta yadda zasu more dadin dandanon jima'insu ya kamata maigida ya rika kula da lafiyar azzakarin sa sosai Na kawo wanna ne domin gaba daya matsala zata zama ta wanna ne insha Allah.

√ MAGANIN mutuwar mazakuta √
× MAGANIN karfin mazakuta da karfin jiki × Karfi kuzari
• madara tana inganta mazakuta
Ga namiji da yake saurin inzali releasing
Ya samu
• cucumber
• zuma

Zaki markada cucumber ba tare da kin fere ba sai ki zuba zuma a ciki zaki iya sakawa a cikin
farji domin yayi sanyi saboda maigida yaji dadin sha.

√ tsukewar gaban mace √

• garin zogale
• man kadanya
• alif kadan
• kwaro
Zaki hade kwaro da alif ki daka su suyi laushi sai ki tankade ki ake sai ki hada da garin zogale sai ki hada su cikin man da ake ambato ki kwabasu guri daya bayan sallar magariba sai ki diba kiyi matsi da shi a gabanki idan ya samu tsayin away dayaba jikinki sai ki wanke da ruwan dimi zaki iya samun hulba ki tafasa idan ruwan ya sha iska
sai ki wanke.

•• GYARAN NONO••

Kunun alkama da madara zaki yi shi sau biyu a rana zaki yi hakan kafin sati biyu a yi iyaye da
kuma sati biyu bayan . .

GYARAN NONO

Hulba za a samu a tafasa ki rinka gasa nono da shi sai kuma a shafa man hulba za a ga abin
mamaki 

GYARAN NONO

A tafasa hulba a gasa nono, sai a shafa kwan salwa a kuma FASA kwan salwan guda uku a
sha.

*_Kashi na hudu (4)_*
✍🏾 *Admin musa musa*
👑👑👑👑👑👑👑👑👑👑
*TSUMI MAI KYAU DA MARA KYAU* Tsumi: akwai tsimi mai kyau da mara kyau mara kyau yana tsinka jikin mace wata har jini yake sata na ba gaira ba dalili. Ga hadin tsumi ki yi da hannun ki yafi kyau ki nemi sasaken baure, kananfari, zuma, citta, mazarkwaila. Za ki tafasa sasaken baure ya dahu sosai sai ki daka kanumfari me yawa da citta yar kadan ki zuba akai, ki saka mazarkwailan da zuma amma zaki cire icen kafin ki zuba hadin, sai ki sauke ki dinga sha daidai kima idan ya huce.
Ku samu zogale ku wanke shi ku nika shi tare da dabino da kuma kwakwa sai ku tace kusa zuma tare da madara sai ku saka ya yi sanyi bayan kungama sallar mangarib sai ku sha.
•Ana so mace ta kula da gabanta domin Allah ya sa namiji ya kwallafa ransa gare shi. Barinsa ya lalace kamar zubar da kimarki ne a wajen sa kada ki bar shi ya yi wari, kada ki bar shi ya yi fadi. Domin masana sun ce duk lokacin da aka yi jima’i farjin mace yana karafadi shi kuma nasa yana rage girma to kinga nasa na rage girma na ki na fadi zai kuma ba kya kula da shi, ba zai rika jin gamsuwa ba. Don haka sai ya fara tunanin kin tsufa ke ma ki fara ganin ya za ma rago shi ya sa yawanci ba a samun gamsuwa. Kuma ba kowane namiji ba ne zai iya fadawa matarsa gabanta ya kara girma ba.Don haka mu kula.

*_SHAYIN MA AURATA_*
akwai hadin shayi kala kala wanda maza da mata ke amfani dasu wanda idan kuna tareda wannan shafin nasan kun karantasu abaya shine naga ya kamata yanzu musake kawo wani kalan musamman a irin wannan lokacin sanyin
wannan shayi da kuke gani ana bukatar abubuwa kamar haka kwai/kanunfari/
minanas/lefton/leomon tsami/sai zuma/
kamar da dare ya kamata ajika kanunfari da minanas ya kwana acikin ruwa da safe sai asake tafasashi sai atace ruwan sai kuma asamu kwai na kajin gida kamar guda uku sai afasa ajuye aciki dama kuma lokacinda ake tafasa wannan ruwan ya kasance akwai lefton aciki to yanzu sai amatse lemon tsami aciki sai kuma azuba zuma agauraya sosai nan take ashanye da zafinsa wanan kuma koda kinada ciki matukar kinashan danyen kwai zaki iya sha yana aiki sosai ajikin mace da namiji nusamman mata masu fama da bushewar gaba shi kuma namiji me gajiya da wuri zakaga namiji yana bukata amma ya gaji wannan yana amfani sosai kunga zai zama farin cikin megida da uwargida

_Cukwul wanda yawansa zai Kai guda uku sai ki samu garin alkama gwangwanin daya sai aya itama gwangwanin daya sai ki daka su zasu zama gari ki tankade ki samu nonon saniya idan kuma bakyashan nonon saniya ki samu madara ki zuba wannan garin kamar cokali 3 ki dama kina shan kullum Sau 1 sannan ki Lura lokacin da zakiyi wanka ki tafasa ruwa da garin hulba a ciki ki Bari yayi sanyi sai ki wanke nonon da shi sannan Kiyi wankan._

*✰ RAYUWAR AURE ✰*

_Idan kuma kwanciya sukayi kinaso su tsaya sai ki nemo wadannan kayan zasu tashi_

♜ hulba
♜♜ ruwan dumi

*ki kwaba hulba da ruwan dumi, wato garin hulba ya sanyi kauri kar yayi ruwa sosai, sai kin tabbatar kin gama abinda zakiyi, kin so kwanciya sai ki shafa, ki kawo ( breziya ) damammiya ki saka, da safe sai ki wanke da ruwan dumi, shima wannan ( matar aure zatayi )*

[1/12, 8:57 PM] ‪+234 703 504 4912‬: KI GYARA DA KANKI GROUP

👸🏼👸🏼👸🏼👸🏼👸🏼👸🏼👸🏼👸🏼👸🏼

  HANYOYI 16 DA UWARGIDA ZATA BI DON INGANTA NI'IMAR JIKINTA

🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹

⚜ KANKANA🍉::za'a samu kankana a hada ta da gwanda a feraye a markada su a blender asha za'a samu ni'ima a jiki


⚜DABINO:::za'a samu danyen dabino wanda ya fara nuna a dinga ci shima yana kara ni'ima 

⚜KUNUN DABINO🤔::: uwargida zata sami dabinonta ta cire kwallayan ta jikashi idan yayi taushi sosai zata markada shi a blender ta saka madara shima yana kara ni'ima sosai 😋😄


⚜ZOGALE🌿::: cin kwandon zogale a yanka mishi kwai yana kara ni'ima kuma kisamu zogalen ki me kyau ki shanya shi a inuwa idan ya bushi Sai dakashi kiringa shi da madara yana kara ni 'ima sosai 

⚜YA'YAN ZOGALE::: uwargida ki samu ya'yan zogale ta barsu su bushe ta dake su a hade da dabino da cikude ta dinga sha da nono zata yi mamaki sosai hmmm


⚜LEMON AYA ::da kwakwa -uwargida zaki samu ayarki ta jikata ta jiku sosai sai ki yanka kwakwarki kananan ko ta gurza a greader ta hada kwakwar da ayar ta markada ta tace tasa sugar ko zuma tasha zaki shi mamaki 


⚜FARAR SHINKAFA:::: uwargida zaki samu shinkafarki ki wanki ta idan ki gama wanki war saiki shan yata ta bushe idan ta bushidin saiki samu ya"yan zogale ki hadi su da bushi sheyar shinkafarki ki dakasu sosai saiki tankade su kiringa shi da madara ko nono hmmmm zaki shi mamaki 


⚜GANYEN IDON ZAKARA::: ki samu ganyen idon zakaran ki hada shi da dabino ki dakashi ki dinga sha da nono 


⚜ ZAITUN:::mace datake fama da bushewar farji zata samu zaitun tasha cokali biyu sanan ta dinga zubawa a farjinta insha Allahu za'a dace 


⚜ALKAMA::uwargida zaki samu alkamarki surfa a niko miki ita garin zata soya shi a tukunya har yayi ja sai ta ringa deba kina shi da nono mai kyau da zuma kisha zaki yi kamar sau uku hmmmm


⚜KOKONBA🥒:: yar uwata zaki samu cocomber ki feraye ta yanka tumatir da albasaki yanka  dafaffen kwai guda uku saiki cin😋😋😄 shima yana kara ni'ima sosai


⚜ZUMA DA GARIN HABBATUSSAUD🍯:: uwargida zaki samu zuma mai kyau ki. zuba garin habbatussaida da man zaitun ki juyashi zaki dinga shan babban cokali biyu safe da yamma insha Allahu zaki samu ni'ima

⚜MADARA PEAK 🥛::uwargida zaki samu madara peak gwangwani daya ki fasa danyan kwai ki buga da cokali har sai ya daina kumfa zaki shan zaki samu ni'ima sosai ana da sanyayyar la'asar aki sha 


⚜RUWAN RAKE ::zaki samu ta kirba rake a turmi ta samu abin tata mai kyau ki maste ruwan ki saka zuma cokali biyu zaki samu ni'ima sosai kuma ki ringa shin rake da dayawa ki ringa sha


⚜ AYA :: haka kuma yar'uwata zaki samu aya ki wanki ta nika ki soya sama sama ki cire jan bawon zaki samu cokali da dabino ki hada su gaba daya ki daka ki dinga sha da nono ko madara 

⚜YA'YAN ZOGALE ::yar wata zaki samu ya'yan zogale ki dakashi ki dinga sha da nono ko madara
 

   ⚜⚜ FADAKARWA ⚜⚜


A duk lokacin da mace taki cikin damuwa ko tashin hankali ni'imar jikinki tana daukewa don haka sai a kula adaina sa abu a rai 
              kuma dukkan wan yan nan magane dana fadisu  basa cottar da jikin dan adam ku kena da samye idan kikai amfani da daya daka cikin su Inshi Allahu zaki samu ni'ima

Ki rike ruwan kwai kisa lipton dafaffe ba suga ki kada kidinga sha xaki sha mamaki
[1/13, 8:23 AM] Uwani: 💑TATTALIN MIJI💑Yar uwa ki bude kunnenki gawani sirri amma don Allah idan kina da kishiya ban yafe ku hadu da miji ki musguna mata sabida idan kinyi wannan me house bazai sake jin dadi wata mace ba, ki samu busheshiyar kubewarki cokali uku ki matse lemon tsami aciki da madara kizauna ki shanye ki dibi kadan ki hada da dakeken bagaruwa kiyi matsi dashi na awa daya sai ki wanke to fa ranar oga sai yayi kukan agagwa
[6:33PM, 1/26/201 [5:38PM, 12/28/2014] : 💐💐 Ana so ko da yaushe idan mijinki zai kusance ki yaji ki a matse kike, ba''a son lokacin da miji zai kusanci matarsa ya wuce siririf. Don haka ya ke da kyau mace ta rika kula da gabanta kar ya bude. Abubuwan da ke matse mace suna da yawa misali
💐 Bagaruwan hausa.....ana dafa ta da ganyen magarya ko ita kadai a rika wanke gaba dashi ko ki zuba a baho ki zauna a ciki da dumin kaman 30mins a kalla sau biyu a sati
💐 Kanunfari ana dafa shi a sha da zuma da zafi zafi ko ki jika ya kwana da safe ki tace kisha da madara da zuma. Ana kuma dafa ta a zauna a ciki da dumin ta ko a rika tsarki ds ruwan ko kuma a zuba kanunfari a garwashi a tsugunna shi ma sau 2 a sati
💐 Kwallon mangwaro idan kika fasa zaki ga dan ciki fari haka, ana busar dashi a daka a kwaba da zuma arika matsi da shi bayan isha'I idan zaki kwanta bacci ki wanke ko kuma ki dafa dan cikin da bagaruwa ki wuni tsarki dashi ko ki zauna a ciki shima a kalla 3x a sati
💐Almiski fari ko ja ki daka kanunfari ki tankadr yai laushi sai ki kwaba da miskin da man zaitun yawaita amfani dashi na matse mace sosai kuma kullum hq cikin kamshi....yana gyara macen da ta haihu sosai musamman da jinin haihuwa ya dauke ki fara amfani dashi har ki ar'bain...
💐 duk wanda ya karanta bai yi comment ba to kar ya dauka ya kai wani gun ka bar mun abuna anan gidan plss.
[10:29AM, 12/28/2014] ‪‬: MEKIKE NEMA BAYAN SO WAJEN MAIGIDA???    Yar'uwata kigwada wannan Wallahi wallahi zakisha mamaki indai NI'IMA ne saidai kifadama wani.                     ►1.Ki nemi Dabino wanda ba busasshe ba (lubiya) da Kankana mai yashi. kici dabinon sosai sai ki sha kankana daga baya.ki aikata haka kamar bayan La'asar                                                                    ►2. Kisami man Hulba da pure madara kota shanu ko peak ta ruwa sai ki hada ki aje yayi 1hr kafin ki kwanta.Idan zaki kwanta sai kisha sai ki tsaya kamar 3mins saiki kwanta.                                    ►3. Kisami lalle 1cup kisa a ruwa ki dafa sai kijuye kisa a baho kizauna Wallahi kam zaki matse. ko kinsan tsarki da Sabulu na iya causing cancer agabanki? Musamman detol dominshi yana kashe kwayoyine agaban macce damasu amfani da marar amfani..kisami KALTUFA(brown venigar) kirinka tsarki dashi. Kiyi sharing ma yan'uwa mata kema kisami Lada.  Sadakatujjariya
[9:30PM, 3/28/2015] ‪ ABUBUWAN DAKESA MACE TAFITA DAGA ZUCIYAR MIJINTA
          1.RIKO
Riko shine idan an aikatamata wani laifi kabar abin aranka batare da kayafe ba.
Uwargida kada kizamo mai riko domin hakan ba karamin jamaki matsala ba zaiyi musamman idan mijinki nada saurin fushi . Saboda haka idan abu yafaru mudinga hakuri domin mata ansanmu da hakuri da juriya👍idan akai abu to dazaran ya wuce to amaida komi ba komi bane domin aljannarmu tana karkashin su sai sun daga zamu samu mata mudinga hakuri aduk lamuran mu👍 sai muga mundace

        2. YAWON MITA
Yar'uwa kar zizamto cikin mata masu yawan mita a gurin maji
Abu baya wucewa ayita dawo da magana baya wanan zai haddasamaki matsala domin zaki fita ranshi. Idan abu yawuce to ayi hakuri abarshi adaina tuna baya 

         3. FUSHI
Uwargida kar kamto mai yawan fushi ko nunama miji kincika fushi 
Karkimanta Allah da kansa "yace yanatare da masu hakuri"shin bakison Allah yazamto yana tare dake kowane lokaci
Yar'uwa kisama ranki hakuri fushi banaki bane domin karkashin wani kike kowayace zomu zauna zomu sabane  
Hakuri shine ribarmu

          4.RASHIN IYA GIRKI
   
Da anxo maganar girki sai naji tsoro tare da jin kunya 
Haba yar'uwa yakamata ace iyayen mu nakoyamana girki 
Wlh wallahi wlh samun yar aiki ba gata bane
Ina gatan yake kina can kwance yar aiki na saye zuciyar mijinki da dadan abinci
yar'uwa/uwargida mutashi tsaye mukoyi girki kodan saye zuciyar miji
Domin namiji nason matar da ta iya girki  
Zakiga namiji na gayyato abokanai zuwa gidan shi don suci abinci saboda yasan bazata bashi kunya
amma idan baki iyaba fa zai fara tunanin kara aure wato yayi maki😳😳KISHIYA
Hmmm mata mu gyara

       5.KAZANTA
Uwargida ayi tsafta kodon lfyr jikinkin 
karki manta tsafta nadaga cikin addini
Yar'uwa idan ba tsaftar yazakiyi ibada
Sanan kisani tsafta nasa miji yasoki sanan yaji bayada kamarki  zakiga kowane lokaci yana manne dake yana shakar kamshinki
Idan kuwa bakida rsafta da yabaki kudin cefane bakikara ganin shi sai dare domin koyadawo  ba abinda zaigani sai bacin rai har kiginga cewa yadainasonki aa badaina sonkiyayiba kazantarki tajawo maki
Sanan kisani kazanta tama mabudin kara aure ce wato yayimaki kishiya
 Pls kozakiyi chatting yazamto kin gyara  ko ina sanan yazamto kema kingyara jikinki da na yaranki kuma idan mai 🏩 yadawo abashi kulawa abar cht
Nidai sholy baruwana 
Lokacinda zai karowata baninan  ni sholy nafada nafita
 
         6.KULA DA SHINFIDAR MIJI

Mata muna sakaci wajen bawa miji hakkinsa kinaso amma kitsaya gulma wai jan aji  ina ajin yake bayan yagama saninki lungu lungu ba inda baisaniba ajikinki
To wallahi ki gyara ki dinga bashi hakkin shi yadda yakamata wanan shi zaisa mijinki yasoki kuma ki mallakeshi FROM ADMINS TATTALIN MIJI Afnan wurma (09026337325)
6ter safiya (08027480246)
6[truncated by WhatsApp]
[1/13, 10:58 AM] ‪+227 99 05 55 97‬: Dakin mijina.......???


Dakin Mijinki 
*shine Filin Jihadinki, 
*shine Masallacinki, 
*shine Makarantarki wacce acikin zaki karantar da Manyan gobe.
*Shine mutuncinki
*Shine jin dadinki
*Shine rufin asirinki
* shine walwalarki
*shi ne komai naki
*shine filin da zaki nemi aljannarki

Mijina.........????

Mijinki shine 
*Ticket dinki na Aljannah idan kin kyautata masa. Kuma shine 
*Ticket dinki na Wuta idan kin Sa'ba masa.
* shine abokinki
* shine abokin shawarki
*shine maganin matsalrki
*abokin wasanki
*abokin tattaunawarki
*shine komai naki

Don haka ki rike abinki da kyau, kar ki bari Shaitanun fili ko na 'boye su rabaki da hanyar samun yardar Allah. Domin yardar Mijinki ita ce yardar Allah awajenki.

Idan wani abu ya dameki, yi sauri kiyi alwala kiyi nafila, kiyi ma Annabinki Salati, ki karanta Littafin Ubangijinki.. Sannan kiyi addu'a ki roki Allah ya magance miki

Karki hau DOKIN SHAITAN (FUSHI, KO GIRMAN KAI) duk lokacin da kuka bata da Maigidanki, ki bashi hakuri (KODA KECE DA GASKIYA). 

Ki guji zuwa wajen bokaye da 'yan duba, babu abunda zasu baki wanda Allah bai dashi.

Indai kinyi imanin cewa Komai awajen Allah yake, to mai zai kaiki wajen BOKAYE MAKIYAN ALLAH DA MANZONSA??..

Ya Allah ka shiryemu baki daya.
KI ISAR DASHI ZUWAGA KOWACE ME AURE SABIDA TAYIWA MIJINTA ADDU A KIJIRA LADANKI KUMA GA ALLAH.
Ya ubangiji mai mulki da mallaka Ka mallakamin wanda kamallaka masa lamarina,
Ya Allah Ka shiryaminshi Ka maidashi farincikin idaniyata, kar kuma yaga wata idan ba niba,
Ya Allah Ka gyara tsakaninmu kar Kasa fushin Ka a tsakaninmu Ka saka fushinka akan maqiyin Ka dakuma maqiyinmu.
Allah Ka  boye masa aybina kuma Ka boyemin aybinshi,
Kuma Ka bayana masa kyawawan abubuwana nima Ka bayyana mashi,
Kuma Ka bani yarda da abinda karubutamin Ka kuma sakamin albarka aciki,
Allah Ka azirtani da soyayarshi da yardanshi da kuma gaskiyan zancenshi,
In kuma yayi fishi Ka jefe bakinshi da kalman  La ilaha ilallah,  Ka kuma kautarda fishinshi da lahaula wala quwata illa billah,
Ya Allah Ka azurtani da tausayin miji da ya'ya' dakuma kudin halal mara adadi, da kuma karatun alqur'aani har abada,
Ya Allah Ka daidaita tsakanin  kowace mace da mijinta,  kuma Ka sa qauna babba atsakaninsu Ka kuma kore hassada atsakaninsu........
(KUYI SHARING DAN MALA IKU ZASUCE MIKI KEMA ALLAH YAMIKI IRINSHI).
KU ISAR DASHI GA MA AURATA.
[1/13, 10:59 AM] ‪+227 99 05 55 97‬: 👙 *MAGANIN YA MUTSEWAR NONO* 👙

☏+2348141712330
☞ islamic medical center
・ sirrin rike miji ・

*HADI NA FARKO*


☞ Aya
☞ Gyada
☞ Agada(plantain)
☞ Madara.

Yar uwa ki wanke ayarki sai ki hada da gyada ki markada su ki tace Dama kin rigada kin yanka plantain kin busar dashi kin mai dashi gari kin kuma tankade
Sai ki dinga diban garin nan kina hada wa da madarar ruwa ki dinga sha.

             *HADI NA BIYU*

✛ Madara
✛ Albasa
✛ Garin gero
✛ Zuma.

Ki yanyan ka albasarki sai ki sa a tukunya da ruwa ki tafasa ,sai ya tafasa sosai har ruwan ya canza launi zuwa baqi Sai ki juye ruwan a kofi sannan ki dauko zumar ki mai kyau ludayi daya da garin gero ludayi daya da madarar ruwa guda daya sai ki juyesu dika a cikin tafasashen ruwan albasan nan kina sha
Amma fa yar uwa wani hanzari ba gudu ba yar uwa karki bari ya wuce awa ashirin da hudu baki shanye hadin ba.

           *HADIN KARIN HIPS*

Yar uwa ki samu:

✦ Abarba
✦ Lemu
✦ Ayaba
☞ Gwanda
☞ Kankana
☞ Zuma
☞ Madara ruwa ta Peak.

Yar uwa ki mar kadasu sai ki zuba zuma da madarar peak ki dinga sha da safe Yar uwa ki samu dankalin turawa ki dafa sai ki bari ya sha iska ki dama shi da madarar shanu ko nono kisa zuma ki yina kina sha cikin wata daya hips zasu fito idan Allah ya yarda.

[1/13, 10:59 AM] ‪+227 99 05 55 97‬: Ⅲ✥ *MACE SAI DA JAN AJI* ✥Ⅲ

■ *IYA KULA SAURAYI DA JAN AJI* ■
»☏+2348141712330

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
*IDAN* kina tafiya "
idan saurayi yayi miki magana kada kiyi saurin juyowa Ki Bari ya Kara Sannan Ki kulashi, kada Ki zo wucewa ta majalisar samari ya zama Na kina kallonsu a'a kada kiyi haka:
    Idan kina haka saurayi ma zai Ga cewar daman so kike a kulaki don haka ma Ki ka fito don kiyi tallan kanki.
  
✥ *FURUCI MAI KYAU GA SAURAYI* ✥

 wajibi ne mu Iya kyawawan kalami Ga samari dama sauran mutane Tun farko a matsayin Ki Na budurwa Ki zama Mai kamala Ko burin ta zamo haka to Yana da kyau ta San irin kalamin da zata Iya tsakanin ta da iyayeta, Ko da tana da yan'uwa maza to tayi kokarin tayi biyayya a Kansu.

Idan har mun kiyaye wanna to hakane zai faru Ga rayiwar mutane da suka Kama 

A lokacin da saurayi yace Yana sonki to Ki tsaya Ki nutsu kiga shin ya dace Ki tsaya ki saurareshi Ko da bakya sonshi to kiyi masa kalamai masu kyau don Ku rabu lafiya shi ma Sai yaji dadi duk nacinshi kuwa.

☞ *KISSAR ZAMANTAKEWA DA MIJI* ☜
☏+2348141712330

YANA da kyau kin Iya zama da miji Ki kasance kin Iya wadannan halaye to dole aso zama dake yar'uwa saboda mace Mai wadannan dabi'u tana da shiga rai matuka itace wadda ba a tafiya ta kwanaki ba tare da itaba wato baya so suyi nesa da juna.
➽ *KO KINA SO KI KASANCE IRIN HAKA*

❁ ya kasance kuna da fahimta juna.

❁ kin Iya kyautata mu'amular Ku.

❁ kin Iya tsafta a kowanne yanayi.

❁ kin Iya kwalliyar tsakar gida data daki da kin dauka duk daya Ce Inda baki sani ba Yanzu kin Dan.......

❁ kin Iya magana dashi a kowanne Hali ya dace.

❁ kina da hakuri da juriya.

❁ kin Iya boye sirrin Ku Yana daga cikin kuskure babba daga haduwa da kawarki a social media Sai Ki Fara bata labari sirrin Ki.

❁ kin Iya zaman lafiya da iyayensa.

❁ kin Iya zaman lafiya da makusanta.

❁ kin Iya salo-salo Na kwanciya.

❁ kin Iya girke-girke ba indomi ba.

✧ *IDAN MUN KULA DA WANNAN ZAMU DACE...* ✧

  ✪ *MAHADAN NI"IMA* ✪
☏+2348141712330

KO KISAN SIRRIN KANKANA 🍉

Kankana tana da sirrinka masu yawan gaske idan mace tana bukatar Ni'ima sosai Ki dinga shan kankana.

 🥓 *BAGARUWA SIRRIN CE* 🥓

Ki wanke Ki tafasa da Ki ringa yawan tsarki da ita tana MAGUNGUNA.

♛ zata yi miki maganin duk wata cuta data samu ( farji ).

♛ koda yaushe Zaki kasancewa Mai gida a hade.

♛ Ana kwaba ta da Zuma a dauka a ringa matse gaba dashi.

■ *MAI TSOHUWA YARINYA* ■

□ man zaitun
 □ man tafarnuwa
   □ Zuma 
Zaki Ki hadasu guri daya Ki ringa Dan kwala da auduga kina matse gabanki dashi.

✥ citta
 ✥ kanunfari
   ✥ Zuma
Ki zuba a robar swan Ki barshi ya jiku Sai Ki tace ruwan Ki sha Zaki Ga abin..

        ■ *GYARAN NONO* ■

Zaki ringa kunun alkama Ki zuba madara Ki sha sau Biyu a Rana Zaki yi bayan sati Biyu da yaye da kuma kafin yaye to Sai kiga salo.

hakika namiji yana da wani sirrin wanda va kowacce mace ta san wannan sirrin ba sai wacce Allah ya sanar da ita, shi namiji ya kasance mai tsanani son:

» karairaya
» rangwada
» kissa
» shagwaba
» kalaman soyayya

 duk macen da ta san  wadannan kuma take aikatasu hakika zata zama tauraruwa a zuciyar mijinta.

   babu ko shakka wadannan kam na daga cikin abubuwa mafi muhimmanci dake taka muhimmuyar rawa wajen sace zuciyar namiji, ya kasance kin tanadi wani suna na musamman da zaki dinga kiran mijinki dashi kamar yadda kikeso.

     *MAGANA TA GASKIYA*

  a wannan fannin a nan ne aka yiwa matan hausawa nisa, don da yawa sune basu dauki hakan a wani abu mai muhimmanci dake iya jefa tsantsar sonki a zuciyar mijinki ba.

 
*KINA SO KI MALLAKI MIJINKI* 

 sai kin dage wajen iya kalaman soyayya don sune masu kwantarwa da namijih hankali koda kuwa an bata masa rai ko hankalinsa ya tashi.

sannan yana daga cikin sirrin namiji ki iya gabatar da zahirin soyayya hakika tsakaninki da mijinki bafa jin kunya ki saki jikinki ki nuna masa soyayya domin duk wani hade-hadw da manne-manne da zakiyi idan har baki iya kalaman soyayya ba da ita kanta soyayyar to gaskiya da sauran ki.

misali idan ya kasance ku biyu ne akayi sa'a baki iyaba ko kuma kice kina jin kunya amma ita abokiyar zamanki ta iya sai kiga yana zumudi a duk lokacin da akace yaune ranar kwananta.

  don haka dole sai kin dage kin jajirce kin iya salo-salo na soyayya.

    sannan daga cikin sirrin namiji a wajen jima'i karki zauna shirim baki tabuka komai, ya kasance kema kianki kina gabatar da salo na shagwaba da duk wani yanayi da zai iya saki nuna masa cewa kefa kina jin dadin wanna jima'i dashi.

  HANYOYI 16 DA UWARGIDA ZATA BI DON INGANTA NI'IMAR JIKINTA

🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹

⚜ KANKANA🍉::za'a samu kankana a hada ta da gwanda a feraye a markada su a blender asha za'a samu ni'ima a jiki


⚜DABINO:::za'a samu danyen dabino wanda ya fara nuna a dinga ci shima yana kara ni'ima 

⚜KUNUN DABINO🤔::: uwargida zata sami dabinonta ta cire kwallayan ta jikashi idan yayi taushi sosai zata markada shi a blender ta saka madara shima yana kara ni'ima sosai 😋😄


⚜ZOGALE🌿::: cin kwandon zogale a yanka mishi kwai yana kara ni'ima kuma kisamu zogalen ki me kyau ki shanya shi a inuwa idan ya bushi Sai dakashi kiringa shi da madara yana kara ni 'ima sosai 

⚜YA'YAN ZOGALE::: uwargida ki samu ya'yan zogale ta barsu su bushe ta dake su a hade da dabino da cikude ta dinga sha da nono zata yi mamaki sosai hmmm


⚜LEMON AYA ::da kwakwa -uwargida zaki samu ayarki ta jikata ta jiku sosai sai ki yanka kwakwarki kananan ko ta gurza a greader ta hada kwakwar da ayar ta markada ta tace tasa sugar ko zuma tasha zaki shi mamaki 


⚜FARAR SHINKAFA:::: uwargida zaki samu shinkafarki ki wanki ta idan ki gama wanki war saiki shan yata ta bushe idan ta bushidin saiki samu ya"yan zogale ki hadi su da bushi sheyar shinkafarki ki dakasu sosai saiki tankade su kiringa shi da madara ko nono hmmmm zaki shi mamaki 


⚜GANYEN IDON ZAKARA::: ki samu ganyen idon zakaran ki hada shi da dabino ki dakashi ki dinga sha da nono 


⚜ ZAITUN:::mace datake fama da bushewar farji zata samu zaitun tasha cokali biyu sanan ta dinga zubawa a farjinta insha Allahu za'a dace 


⚜ALKAMA::uwargida zaki samu alkamarki surfa a niko miki ita garin zata soya shi a tukunya har yayi ja sai ta ringa deba kina shi da nono mai kyau da zuma kisha zaki yi kamar sau uku hmmmm


⚜KOKONBA🥒:: yar uwata zaki samu cocomber ki feraye ta yanka tumatir da albasaki yanka  dafaffen kwai guda uku saiki cin😋😋😄 shima yana kara ni'ima sosai


⚜ZUMA DA GARIN HABBATUSSAUD🍯:: uwargida zaki samu zuma mai kyau ki. zuba garin habbatussaida da man zaitun ki juyashi zaki dinga shan babban cokali biyu safe da yamma insha Allahu zaki samu ni'ima

⚜MADARA PEAK 🥛::uwargida zaki samu madara peak gwangwani daya ki fasa danyan kwai ki buga da cokali har sai ya daina kumfa zaki shan zaki samu ni'ima sosai ana da sanyayyar la'asar aki sha 


⚜RUWAN RAKE ::zaki samu ta kirba rake a turmi ta samu abin tata mai kyau ki maste ruwan ki saka zuma cokali biyu zaki samu ni'ima sosai kuma ki ringa shin rake da dayawa ki ringa sha


⚜ AYA :: haka kuma yar'uwata zaki samu aya ki wanki ta nika ki soya sama sama ki cire jan bawon zaki samu cokali da dabino ki hada su gaba daya ki daka ki dinga sha da nono ko madara 

⚜YA'YAN ZOGALE ::yar wata zaki samu ya'yan zogale ki dakashi ki dinga sha da nono ko madara
 

   ⚜⚜ FADAKARWA ⚜⚜


A duk lokacin da mace taki cikin damuwa ko tashin hankali ni'imar jikinki tana daukewa don haka sai a kula adaina sa abu a rai 
              kuma dukkan wan yan nan magane dana fadisu  basa cottar da jikin dan adam ku kena da samye idan kikai amfani da daya daka cikin su Inshi Allahu zaki samu ni'ima

[1/13, 9:26 PM] ‪+234 813 119 8619‬: DA UWARGIDA ZA TA GANE
A yayin da maigida ya zo miki da rawar kafarsa, wai shi da siyasa da dabara, yana kwantar da kai da nufin gabatar miki da bukatarsa ta kawo miki abokiyar zama. Ke ma ki tari batun nasa da maraba lale, nuna masa rashin damuwarsa, yi masa fatan alkhairi, raka shi da lafuzza irin su:-
Allah ya tabbatar mana da alkhairi ! Allah ya sa abokiyar zama ce ! Allah ya hada kawunanmu ! Allah ya ba ka abin da zaka dauki dawainiyarmu ! Allah ya ba ka ikon yin adalci a tsakaninmu !
Ina mai tabbatar miki da cewa: wannan shine garkuwarki ta farko da za ta fara tsare miki kissar amarya, ita ce barazanar farko da za ta fara rikita lissafin amarya mai shirin shigowa gidanki, ita ce shimfidar farko da za ta saka wa maigida aminta da ke, da toshe kunnensa daga zancen duk wani mai kokarin bata ki a wajensa.
Matakin gaba kuma, sai mun hadu a karo na gaba.
Na bar ki lafiya !
[1/13, 9:29 PM] ‪+234 813 119 8619‬: DA UWARGIDA ZA TA GANE (2)
Mataki na gaba:-
Daga ranar da kika san da maganar karin auren, dage da yin addu`ar Allah ya tabbatar da abin da ya fi zama alkhairi, ki kuma nemi tsari daga Allah game da sharrinta da kuma sharrin shaidani.
Lokacin da yake hada kayan lefensa, ba da taki gudunmawar wajen taya shi kyakkyawan zabi, ba shi kyakkyawar shawara, idan ma za ki iya rinka tara masa a dakinki.
Idan har Allah ya tabbatar da lamarin, nuna kazar-kazar dinki, kada ki bari jama`a su gane rakinki ko karayarki, ko kuma razanarki, `yan uwan miji ne ko naki, ko na amarya ko ma kawayenki (domin baiyanar wadannan daga gare ki, farinciki zai zamo a wajen wadansu, watakila ma har akwai makusantanki).
Idan ranar biki ta zo, lokacin jere (idan Allah ya kaddara cewa gida daya za ku zauna), toshe kunnenki, ki kuma runtse ganinki, babu ruwanki da kalaman masu zuwa jere, domin wadansu shedanci ne zai kawo su, watakila ma a gaiyar sodi suke.
Ranar kawo amarya, toshe kunnenki, runtse ganinki, yi kokarin hana jama`arki su yi kokarin taya ki kishi, ki kuma tuna cewa: ana gama taron biki, ko wace mace dakin mijinta za ta koma, ke kadai za a bari, sai amaryarki, sai kuma maigidanku, da za a ce ki bi danginki, wata cewa za ta yi: gidanta ba daki, wata ta ce: maigidanta ba zai amince zamanki ba, wata ta ce: da dai kin yi hakuri, kin san komai dan hakuri ne, wata kuwa cewa za ta yi: ba dai gidana ba, kada ki je nima ki kashe min nawa auren !
Daukar wannan matakin shi zai taimaka wajen toshe kafar shaidanu na cikin ko wane jinsi !
Don haka a dai daure a aiwatar, wata rana sai kin ba mu labari !
Sai kuma mun hadu a mataki na gaba, insha`allahu !
[1/13, 9:29 PM] ‪+234 810 772 5558‬: 👩‍❤‍👩gangariyar mace qroup👩‍❤‍👩.                                                                ❄Kuna raina ina alfahari daku❄.                                                                           💋💋💋💋💋💋💋💋💋💋💋.                                                                                          Kina amsa suna mace kikezama duku duku kamar ba mace ba haba kawata tashi kigyara kizama cikekkiyar mace tsaftarke itace abun burgewa agun me 🏡
[1/13, 9:30 PM] ‪+234 813 119 8619‬: DA UWARGIDA ZA TA GANE (3)
Mataki na gaba:-
Ranar da aka kawo amarya, daren wannan rana shine dare mafi duhu, mafi tsawo a rayuwar aurenki, shine siradi mafi wahalar tsallakewa gare ki a dorewar zaman lafiyarki da maigidanki. Kwanakin cin amarcin nan sune ranakun jarrabawa mafi wahalar ci dangane da dada samun gindin zama a cikin zuciyar maigidanki.
Babban abin da wadannan ranaku su ke bukata daga wurinki: toshe kunne, runtse gani, yi wa maigida uzuri da kuma kyakkyawan zato. A wadannan ranaku ne amarya take kokarin gamsar da maigida cewa, ita ce ta fi ki kuruciya, ita ta fi ki iya tarairaya, ita ta fi ki iya kwalliya, ita ta fiki iya nuna soyaiya, ita ta fi ki iya adana miji.
Kalubalenki shine, ki nuna mata cewa ita ba ta gabanki, ki nuna mata cewa ke ma fa har yanzu da sauranki, ki tabbatar wa da maigida cewa  ke ce fa tsohuwar zumar da ita a ke bukata domin maganin matsalolin gidanku.
Babban abinda za ki saka a ranki shine: duk rawar kai, da dokin sabunta, da iya yi na amarya, na dan wani lokaci ne, amma fa idan ke din kina da: juriya, hakuri, wayo, dabara, iya sarrafa da namiji, karanta halayen jama`a, da iya zama da su. Idan kuwa ki ka rasa wadannan, to kin zama soriyo, domin kuwa lokacin ne amarya ta ke yin amfani da dabarunta, da kwarewarta na kissa, ta dasa tata kujerar a cikin zuciyar maigidanku, ta haka miki rijiyar da idan ki ka fada, fitowarki daga cikinta, ba karamin jan aiki ba ne ! Sai dai fa da za ki iya kokarin kwatanta halayen nan da na ce miki ranakun suna bukata, da magana ce ta: ta fara laulayi kawai, daga nan kuma, dole ta bar miki abinki, ko da kuwa ranta bai so ba.
Abin da kike bukatar yi a tsakanin wadannan ranakun ko watannin shine: ki shiga sabuwar makaranta ta karin ilmin iya zama da miji. Ba wai ina nufin za ki fita daga gidanki domin halartar wata makarantar ba ne, idan haka kika fahimta har yanzu uwargida da akwai sauranki. Amma dai ki biyo ni a hankali za ki fahimci abin da nake nufi.
Sai mun hadu a kaso na gaba insha`allahu !
[1/13, 9:31 PM] ‪+234 813 119 8619‬: DA UWARGIDA ZA TA GANE (4)
A kashin da ya gabata na ce kina bukatar shiga makaranta, to ga yadda bayanin ya ke:-
Makarantar da za ki shiga fa a gidanki ta ke, kawai abin da kike bukata; sa ido, nutsuwa, lura, nazari, da kuma jefar da girman kai. Bude idanunki sarai, ki lura da sababbin abubuwan da amarya ta zo da su na tarairayar miji, (idan dai ko ba wadanda sai an shiga daki ta ke yin su ba ne, ko kuma wadanda munana ne sun saba wa shari`a, wadannan ne sun haura huruminki). Kada ki nuna kishinki a kan hakan (sabbin abubuwan da ta zo da su), ke ma rungume su, ki dora su akan naki kyawawan dabarun da ki ke da su, aiwatar da su a wajen maigidanki ba tare da kin nuna masa karara cewa gasa ki ke yi da amarya ba.
Wata shawarar da zan kara miki ita ce: yi kokarin danne zuciyarki, da kishinki, ka da ki fara lissafa wa maigida laifin amaryarki, ko wani hali da ta ke nuna miki na takala (idan ma har da akwai faruwar irin hakan), share ta, nuna mata kamar ma ke ba ki gane ba, gintse abin a cikin zuciyarki, ke ma yi mata irin wannan abin da ta ke yi miki, a fakaice fa ta hanyar dabara ba ta hanyar husuma, ko takaddama, ko fito-na-fito,  ko ka ce-na ce ba, domin an ce wanzami ba ya son jarfa. Kada ki kuskura ki fara yin korafin abubuwan da take yi miki na raini, ko na nuna miki iyakarki, kyale ta ita ta fara yi a wajen maigida, ke kuma daga nan sai ki kafa mata hujjoji a gabansa, wadanda za su tabbatar da cewa, ita ce ta ke yi miki wadannan abubuwan, ke kuma ki ka ki tanka mata don kada ku tayar masa da hankali.
Daukar irin wannan salo na hikimar ramuwa ba tare da an yi husuma ba, ya kan tabbatar wa da maigida, da ma sauran mutanen da ke tare da ku, ko su kan zo muku cewa; ke ba mai son husuma ba ce, ba mai zafin kishi ba ce, ba maketaciya ba ce, zai kuma tabbatar da hakurinki, da jajircewarki wajen tabbatar da kwanciyar hankalin maigidanku, da hadin kan `ya`yanku, da zaman lafiya da abokiyar zamanki.
Babban kalubalen da ke gabanki shine: ki tabbatar cewa; ke dai ba kya zaluntar abokiyar zaman naki, domin Allah ya haramta zalunci. Yi iya kokarinki ki gamsar da maigida a aikace cewa; ke a shirye ki ke ki sadaukar da farincikinki domin dorewar nasa farincikin, nuna masa cewa ke babbar damuwarki ita ce: hadin kanku ku matansa, da `ya`yansa, da kuma samuwar cikakken aminci da zaman lafiya a cikin gidansa, amma fa ya zamo ba ki saka yaudara, ko ha`inci, ko kaidi a cikin lamarin ba. 
Nasarar gamsar da maigida cewa kina da duk wannan nagartar da na zaiyano miki ita ce: za ta sa ya amince da ke, amincewar da babu wani wanda zai gamsar da shi cewa kina da mugun kulli, ko mugunta, ko cutarwa ga abokiyar zamanki, za ki dada samun gindin zama a cikin kokon zuciyarsa, ki kasance ke ce ainihin lamba daya (1st Lady) a tsakanin matansa, kawar da kujerarki zai iya zama abu mafi wahala ga duk wata matar da ta hada miji da ke, sai dai fa idan ko maigidan ne mai butulci ko mara hangen nasa, ko kuma hannun malaman tsibbu ya daka wawa cikin gidanku, wannan kuma sai ki dauke shi jarrabawa ce daga mahaliccinki, idan kuma hakan ne ya faru, to lamarin zai zamanto miki kaffara a wajen ubangijinki !
A kashi na gaba insha`allahu zan baiyana miki sirrin ba ki shawarar daukar dukkan matakan da na zaiyano miki.
Sai kin sake ji na Uwargida Sarautar Mata !

*・SHAWARA GA AMARE・*

①. Tun da dai ke budurwace baki taba aure ba, to ki guji duk wasu kayan da’a ko hakkin maye da za a ba ki don ki sha, domin tun asali irin wadannan magunguna an yi su ne don matan da suka dan jima cikin aure kuma zumar sha’awarsu ta dan fara sanyi.

Wadanda ba su taba aure ba kuwa zumarsu na nan da zafinta, don haka babu wani dalili na zukakata da irin sinadaran zukakawa;

wannan ke sa nan gaba a samu rikirkicewar sha’awa domin yamutsa ta din da aka yi da wadannan sinadarai maimakon a bar ta ta tafiyar da kanta a kan irin tsarin da Allah Ya tsara mata.

②. Amma kina iya....

*Yadda Ake Mayar Da Mata ’Yanlele:*

• Islamic medical center
☏+2348037538596
• www.sirinrikemiji.com

Babu macen da ba ta son mijin ta ya rinka ji da ita, yana nuna mata soyayya da girmamawa.

 Yin haka na kara wa mace jin ta fi kowace mace ko jin ta a saman duniya, sannan duk yarintar mace ko tsufanta tana son mijinta ya rinka daukarta a matsayin ‘yar karamar yarinya wadda na taba bayani a kan hakan.

 Ma’ana ya rinka kula da ita kamar yadda zai kula da karamar yarinya, ya rinka tunawa da kuriciyarta da ya sani a da kafin ya aureta.
Saboda haka idan ba ka yin haka to daga yau ka fara don matarka ta rinka jin ita ma ta kai mace, ta samu farin ciki da jin dadin zaman aure. 

Na tabbata yin hakan na bayar da kwanciyar hankali a cikin gida, sannan na kara dankon soyayya sosai.

Rinka kula da irin sabon kayan da take sawa ko wani sabon abu da ta canja, kamar yin kitso, kunshi da kwalliya sai ka yaba da nuna birgewa a tare da kai.

 Duk wani sabon canji da ka gani yana da kyau ka san da shi, in na yabawa ne ka yaba in kuma na magana ne ka yi wannan shine zai kara tabbatar mata da kana damuwa da ita.

Kalmar yarinta kada ya rabu da bakin ka, kamar ...

https://sirinrikemiji.blogspot.com.ng/2018/01/yadda-ake-mayarda-mace-yar-lele.html

ZAMANTAKEWA MA'AURATA:

 Abinda ake nufi da zamantakewa shine mace ta zama mata ta gari, mutuniyar kirki wacce duk al’umma suka shaideta da mutuntaka a zamanta na aure. 

Kula da Maigida, yara, iyayen miji da kuma malamanta da ma sauran mutane baki daya.

 Daga cikin abubuwan da zasu taimakawa mace ta zama ta gari sun hada da :

☛ islamic medical center

(1)Warin gaba (odour):- 

Warin gaba na 'ya'ya mata yana samuwa saboda wasu dalilai da suke jawo shi kamar haka:

1- Tafiya ba wando.
2- qin wanke farji bayan jima'i.
3-qin wanke farji da ganyen magarya da misali bayan an yi al'ada.
4-barin wando ya kai kwana uku a jiki.
5-kama ruwa da ruwa mai sanyi qarara.
6-Qin wanke gaba bayan an tsuguna a Masai.
7-Mace ta ringa biyawa kanta buqata da hannu ko wani abu.
Ki sani cewa war yana fitowa daga gurare uku kamar haka:-

Hammata.
Farji.
Baki.

Saboda haka lallai ne ki bada kulawa ta musamman a wannan gurare.

FA'IDA;
Mace mai son kar miji yaji wari a gareta yayin saduwa sai ta nemi:

a)Miski. 
b)Ambar 
c)Ganyen magarya
d)Rihatul Hubbi. 
e)Zam-zam.
f)Ma'ul – miyahi

Ki haxasu guri xaya ki tafasa kaxan in ya huce ki zuba a buta ki qar ruwa dashi kuma ki shafe gefen farjinki da cinyoyinki da qirjinki to zaki mamaki yadda mijinki zai riqeqi da kyau da nuna soyayya a gareki.

  HANYOYI 16 DA UWARGIDA ZATA BI DON INGANTA NI'IMAR JIKINTA

🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹

⚜ KANKANA🍉::za'a samu kankana a hada ta da gwanda a feraye a markada su a blender asha za'a samu ni'ima a jiki


⚜DABINO:::za'a samu danyen dabino wanda ya fara nuna a dinga ci shima yana kara ni'ima 

⚜KUNUN DABINO🤔::: uwargida zata sami dabinonta ta cire kwallayan ta jikashi idan yayi taushi sosai zata markada shi a blender ta saka madara shima yana kara ni'ima sosai 😋😄


⚜ZOGALE🌿::: cin kwandon zogale a yanka mishi kwai yana kara ni'ima kuma kisamu zogalen ki me kyau ki shanya shi a inuwa idan ya bushi Sai dakashi kiringa shi da madara yana kara ni 'ima sosai 

⚜YA'YAN ZOGALE::: uwargida ki samu ya'yan zogale ta barsu su bushe ta dake su a hade da dabino da cikude ta dinga sha da nono zata yi mamaki sosai hmmm


⚜LEMON AYA ::da kwakwa -uwargida zaki samu ayarki ta jikata ta jiku sosai sai ki yanka kwakwarki kananan ko ta gurza a greader ta hada kwakwar da ayar ta markada ta tace tasa sugar ko zuma tasha zaki shi mamaki 


⚜FARAR SHINKAFA:::: uwargida zaki samu shinkafarki ki wanki ta idan ki gama wanki war saiki shan yata ta bushe idan ta bushidin saiki samu ya"yan zogale ki hadi su da bushi sheyar shinkafarki ki dakasu sosai saiki tankade su kiringa shi da madara ko nono hmmmm zaki shi mamaki 


⚜GANYEN IDON ZAKARA::: ki samu ganyen idon zakaran ki hada shi da dabino ki dakashi ki dinga sha da nono 


⚜ ZAITUN:::mace datake fama da bushewar farji zata samu zaitun tasha cokali biyu sanan ta dinga zubawa a farjinta insha Allahu za'a dace 


⚜ALKAMA::uwargida zaki samu alkamarki surfa a niko miki ita garin zata soya shi a tukunya har yayi ja sai ta ringa deba kina shi da nono mai kyau da zuma kisha zaki yi kamar sau uku hmmmm


⚜KOKONBA🥒:: yar uwata zaki samu cocomber ki feraye ta yanka tumatir da albasaki yanka  dafaffen kwai guda uku saiki cin😋😋😄 shima yana kara ni'ima sosai


⚜ZUMA DA GARIN HABBATUSSAUD🍯:: uwargida zaki samu zuma mai kyau ki. zuba garin habbatussaida da man zaitun ki juyashi zaki dinga shan babban cokali biyu safe da yamma insha Allahu zaki samu ni'ima

⚜MADARA PEAK 🥛::uwargida zaki samu madara peak gwangwani daya ki fasa danyan kwai ki buga da cokali har sai ya daina kumfa zaki shan zaki samu ni'ima sosai ana da sanyayyar la'asar aki sha 


⚜RUWAN RAKE ::zaki samu ta kirba rake a turmi ta samu abin tata mai kyau ki maste ruwan ki saka zuma cokali biyu zaki samu ni'ima sosai kuma ki ringa shin rake da dayawa ki ringa sha


⚜ AYA :: haka kuma yar'uwata zaki samu aya ki wanki ta nika ki soya sama sama ki cire jan bawon zaki samu cokali da dabino ki hada su gaba daya ki daka ki dinga sha da nono ko madara 

⚜YA'YAN ZOGALE ::yar wata zaki samu ya'yan zogale ki dakashi ki dinga sha da nono ko madara
 

   ⚜⚜ FADAKARWA ⚜⚜


A duk lokacin da mace taki cikin damuwa ko tashin hankali ni'imar jikinki tana daukewa don haka sai a kula adaina sa abu a rai 
              kuma dukkan wan yan nan magane dana fadisu  basa cottar da jikin dan adam ku kena da samye idan kikai amfani da daya daka cikin su Inshi Allahu zaki samu ni'ima

*YADDA AKE YI*

Yar uwa ki samu roba ki fasa kwai a ciki (iya yawan da zaki iya cinyewa,kamar biyu haka)sai ki wanke gadali ko farar albasa ko kuma dika biyun ki yanyanka a kan kwan ki barbaďa maggi ki kawo garin kanumfari ki sa sai ki yanyanka tumatir a ciki sai ki kaďa da kyau, ki ďora farantin suya a kan wuta ki zuba man zaitun (Dan bada man gyada zaki soya ba)idan ya ďau zafi sai ki zuba kwan a ciki ki soya amma kar ki bari ya 'kame ki barshi da ruwa ruwa, sama sama zaki soya shi, ki sauke ki cinye abinki, ni'ima kam ba'a magana 🙈🙈🙊🙊.

*YADDA ZA KIYI*

Yar uwa ki nemi zuma mai kyau farar sa'ka ki ajiye a gefe,sai ki samu tumatur manya jajjaye ki wanke su ki yanka sannan ki ďauko dabino ki bare ki shanya ya bushe sai ki daka ya zamo gari sai ki zuba a cikin roba ki ďauko tumatur da kika yanyanka ki zuba a ciki, sannan ki ďauko zuma ki zuba a kai ki juya sosai sai ki kafa kai ki shanye shi wannan hadin yana da matukar kyau idan kina yawan yi zaki kasance a ji'ke a ko da yaushe cikin ni'ima, gashi kuma bai da wuyar hadawa 🙈🙈🙉🙉

Kankana
Lemon zaki

*YADDA AKE YI*

Yar uwa ki haďa ďanyar gyaďa, kankana, abarba da ayaba waje ďaya ki zuba a blender ki markaďa sai ki tace a roba ko kwano sannan ki ďauko zuma ki zuba a kai ki matse lemon zaki a ciki ki dinga sha...habawa zaki sha yabo a wajan oga idan kika ďimanci shan wannan haďin akai akai.

*KI KULA DA KANKI GROUP👰*

08032629076
Maman Usman

Ban hana a tura wa yar uwa ko group ba amma duk wacce ta canza min post ban yafe ba.
[1/14, 2:32 PM] ‪+234 703 504 4912‬: *KI KULA DA KANKI GROUP* 👰

*HADIN KAZA MAI NONON RA'KUMI*

Yar uwa ki nemi budurwar kaza a yanka a fige ta amma fa kar a yanka ta gunduwa gunduwa ki barta a gudan ta ki sata a tukunya sai ki samu nonon rakumi ki zuba a ciki(shi ne a madadin ruwa dan ba zaki sa ruwa a ciki ba)ki samu magarya ki tafasa ki juye ruwan a cikin kazar,ki đauko citta da dakakken kanumfari da kuma minannas sai ki zuba a ciki ki ďora akan wuta bayan wani lokaci sai ki jajjaga kayan miya ki zuba a ciki.....ki bari ta dahu sai ki sauke ki cinye kazarki ki shanye romon tas,wannan hadin yana da matukar kyau yar uwa ki gwada zaki sha yabo a wajan mai gida🙈🙈🙈🙈🙈

*KI KULA DA KANKI GROUP* 👰

*KAYAN HADI*

*YADDA ZAKI HADA*

Uwar gida ki samu budurwar kazar ki cire kayan cikin ta gaba ďaya kamar zaki gasa sai ki ďauko saiwar malmo ki jera a cikin kazar sannan ki samu zaren ďinki mai tsafta ki ďaure kafafun ta dashi, sai ki ďauko nonon rakumi da ruwan kabewa ki zuba a ciki ki đauko garin kanumfari da garin zogale da kuma hakkin daka ki zuba a kai ki rufe idan ya fara tafasa sai ki sa gishiri da maggi kaďan ki barshi yayi laushi sosai in ruwan ya rage saura kaďan sai ki sauke ki cinye kazar kuma ki shanye sauran romon......wannan haďin na daďewa a jiki sosai.

🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁

*_Matsalolin maaurata_*


⌛⌛⌛⌛⌛⌛⌛⌛⌛⌛⌛


Yawan xargi. Kidinga xargin mijinki wannan matsalace babba kikasance mai kawaici koda kinsan kina dagaskiya akan abinda kike xargin wani kuma kawai kina haukane kawai da shirme bemasan kinayiba 

Kome xaki kikasance kinayi cikin ilimi da tunani bakidinga xagin mijinki kamar keke auran bashiba allah yasa mudace. 


🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁


Kiguji hassada gaduk abinda yakema danginsa kina Dada bashi karfin gwiewa saikiga kinsami kwanciyar hankali da mijinki amma wasu matan wllh ko iyayan mijinsu akaima abu yanxu xasununa ransu yabaci sunfiso gada su sai yayansu saikuma nasu dangi tokisani wllh indai wannan hanyar kikebi kigyara kodan kiyi kima da daraja a idan mijinki domin wannan shima matsalace babba game wannan Halin. 

🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁


Kixama mai iya magana da mijinki mata dayawa basusan yaxasuyama maxajansu magana duk matar datasankanta xakisameta mai iya sarrafa harshanta agun mijinta baduk maganar data xomikiba kimakamasa wannan batarbiyabace inkinkasance mai iya magana xaki samu matsayi namusanman agunsa. 


⌛⌛⌛⌛⌛⌛⌛⌛⌛⌛⌛

Duka duka ananxandakata saiwani makwan in allah yakaimu 


🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁🍁


Bissalam 



⏳ummu salma⏳

*W33KLY PR3GNANCY TRACK3R*
⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁

Assalamu alaikum wa rahmatullah....

Yau xamu dora daga sati na tara a program din mu na rainon ciki....

*☆☆☆Week nine☆☆☆* 

_Wannan satin shine farkon sati a wata na uku  kuma sati na bakwa daga satin conceptn girman dan tayi ya kai kamar girman agwaluma☺..._ 

_duk da haka ba kowa ne xae iya noticin kina dauke da juna biyu amma wasu xasu iya lura da hakan...._

_A wannan satin xamu lura laulayi yana qaru abisab satittikan baya.._

_Xaki lura a jikinki a a wajen saka sutura xakiga ya matse ki wajen qugun(hips) da kuma wajen nonuwan....duk da dai ba lalle wani ya gane kina da juna biyu_

_A wannan satin  mahaifa ta dan qara girma bangon ta yana da talewa a hankali a hankali...a wannan satin yana da kyau ku nemi mae me kyau mae dauke da vitamin A & E dan gudun samuwr nankarwa_

_a wannan satin likita xae iya turaki ultra sound dan ganin lafiyr jariri kuma bugun zuciyar jariri yana kai 130-150 beats per minute..._

_sae dae muce Allah qara lfy ya kuma raba lfy🤣_

```zata samu dabino ta shanya shi ya bushe sai ta had'a da wannan cukwi d'in ta bayar a nik'a mata ta tankad'e sai ta sami zam-zam ta had'a a mazubi mai murfi a zuba wannan dabinon da cukwi d'in akan zumar ajuya sosae za'a ga yayi kyau sosae sai a rude a saamu wannan zam zam d'in da ya zama mai kyau ba Wanda akayi mix ba kullum sai ki d'ebo wannan zumar da aka kwab'ata da dabino da cukwi sai ki d'ebi iya wadda kikeso sai ki had'a da zuba madara ko ki sha haka. Insha Allah zakiji ni'ima ta mamaki, in kuma mace ta samu kanta a rashin haihuwa ga yanda zatayi zata samu zam zam shima mai kyau ta ajiye shi duk sands zata sadu da mijinta ta zuba zamzam d'in a cikin Kofi ta karanta fatiha kafa (40) d'in ta sha da yardar ubangijin musulunci zata haihu.```
