⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁
MATSO KIJI SIRRIN MOWA 
🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛
 Mai sauraro barkanmu da arzikin sake jibantar juna awannan dandalinmu mai taken matso kiji sirrin mowa wanda a yau insha Allah zan amsa muku tambayoyinku dana samu awajen yar uwa abokiyar aiki wato aunty meryamerth kubiyoni donjin yadda zata kaya 
KADADAI KUMANTA WANNAN FILIN NA MOWA NE BAMA GAYYATAR BORA 💃
⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁
      AMSA:1
Lallai yau antabo babban zance 
     Idan akace iya magana azaman takewar aure ana nufin mace tasan irin maganar da zata dunga fitowa daga bakinta izuwa kunnen mijinta,yazama dole agareki kisan irin kalaman dazasu dinga fita alokacin dakuke magana da oga,iya magana yana daya daya daga cikin abunda yake taka muhimmiyar rawa wajen gyaruwa ko lalacewar aure.
dayawa yawan mata basusan su nutsu su tattaro hankulansu lokacin da suke maga da mai gida ba ,sai dai duk lafazin dayazo bakinsu su fadeshi kansu tsaye wanda wannan bakaramar matsala bace garemu,tunda Allah yahadamu zama da su tofa dole musan irin kalmomin dazamu irinka gaya musu don sakasu farin ciki da walwala,kuma musan irin wata magana zamuyi da miji lokacin farin ciki da kuma lokacin bacin rai .
inafata zamu kiyaye 
🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛
to masu saurarenmu anan zandan daka sai mun kara haduwa a tambaya tagaba wassalam 

     hajja bara 💕
[1/14, 2:55 PM] ‪+227 99 83 43 97‬: ⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁
A gaskia ana son mace ta xamana mae kunya amma a xamantakewar aure babu maganar kunya tsakaninki da miji...

Ki nuna kunyar ki lokaci da kk ba ku kae bane maana da da mijinki da kuma third party....kuma mutum na uku xae iya kasancewa yan uwan miji ko naki,yaranki,abokan ango ko qawayenki wasu ma har gaban abokan xamansu suke nuna rashin kunya dan su musgunana musu sauransu...

Wasu matan basa nuna kunyar nuna wa miji solon soyayya ko a gaban waye...to jima ban hana ba...ko gaban waye nuna kin damu da shi kuma kina son shi amma kiyi aiki da lura ba yadda xaa yada kunyar ki a tafi da ke bakin dunia...

Wasu matan basa jin kunyar rungome miji a gaban kishi ko yi masa kiss gaban abokae da yara irin wannan rashin kunyar xubar miki mutunci xata yi da kuma rage maki daraja...

Mowa ita ce wadda ke cire kunya lokacin da take daga ita sae mijinta...ta cire kunya ta faranta masa da salo salo har yaji in bata kusa da shi yana kewarta...

Kuji yin batsa barkatae da soki burutsu gaban miji dan harshen ki ba qaramin tasiri yake dashi ba wajen bayyana dabiunki da fassara ko ke wacce...

Kar ki dauki wata shawara yi wa miji batsa....ban hanaki iya salo salon gamsar da shi ba amma ban da batsa...
⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁⌛🍁
[1/14, 4:18 PM] ‪+234 806 606 7121‬: *_CUCUMBER TANA DA SIRRUKA DAMA A TATTARE DA RAYUWAR DAN ADAM_*
✍🏽 *ADMIN MUSA MUSA*
🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒
     🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆
🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒
*Kashi Kashi Har Kashi (5)*
*Ga Kashi Na Daya (1)*
Cucumber tana da sirruka da dama a
tattare da rayuwar dan adam, domin
masana kiwon lafiya sun bayar da umarnin a yawaita yin amfani da ita saboda irin sirrukanta a jiki. Kadan daga cikin
amfaninta ga rayuwarmu ta yau da kullum sun hada da:
1. Narkar Da Kitse:
Duk mai yawan amfani da Cucumber zai rika samun isasshen lafiya, karin ni’imar
jiki da kwarjini. Wannan ta sa mata suke yawaita sanya barinta a kan idanuwansu. Dalili a fili ne cewa a daidai lokacin da mace ta sanya Cucumber a kan fuskarta, Cucumber za ta tsotse duk rubabben kitse da ke tattare a kan fatar kwayar idanunta nata, domin tana da wasu sinadaran da ke
warkar da irin wadannan cutukan na kan fata. Ba ma a fatar idanu kawai ba, an nuna cewa mutum zai iya gyara Cucumber ya dora kan duk inda yake masa ciwo, ko inda fata ta sami matsala. Sannu a hankali komai zai gushe kuma zai samu waraka nan take.
✍🏽 *ADMIN MUSA MUSA*
*+2348039235265*
[1/14, 4:18 PM] ‪+234 806 606 7121‬: *_CUCUMBER TANA DA SIRRUKA DAMA A TATTARE DA RAYUWAR DAN ADAM_*
✍🏽 *ADMIN MUSA MUSA*
🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒
     🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆
🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒
*Kashi Kashi Har Kashi (5)*
*Ga Kashi Na Biyu (2)*
2. Kore Yana Da Raba: So tari idan mutum ya yi wanka da ruwan zafi, raba za ta rufe duk wani gilashin da ke dakin wankan ko kuma bayan ya fito zai
rasa yadda zai kalli madubi sabo irin
wannan rabar da yana a wasu lokutan. Daya daga cikin sirrukan Cucumber su ne
da arar ka shafa shi a kan gilashin, daga
lokacin zai washe kuma mutum ya ci gaba da amfani da kayansa lafiya lau.
3. Ciwon Kai: A duk lokacin da mutum ya sha wahalar aiki ko gajiyar musamman, wadanda ke haddasa nauyin jiki a lokacin da aka tashi daga bacci, muddin ya dan ci Cucumber kafin ya kwanta, zai tashi tamkar wanda ya wuni yana motsa jiki.
✍🏽 *ADMIN MUSA MUSA*
*+2348039235265*
[1/14, 4:18 PM] ‪+234 806 606 7121‬: *_CUCUMBER TANA DA SIRRUKA DAMA A TATTARE DA RAYUWAR DAN ADAM_*
✍🏽 *ADMIN MUSA MUSA*
🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒
     🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆
🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒
*Kashi Kashi Har Kashi (5)*
*Ga Kashi Na Uku (3)*
4. Warkar Da Radadi: A wasu lokutan mutum ya kan iya samun
buguwar wata gaba a jikinsa, har ta kai shi da yin kara saboda da radadin da zai iya ji
daga gare shi. Amma a duk lokacin da ki
ka shafa Cucumber a wajen da irin wannan radadin ya samu, nan da nan radadin da zafi za su gushe saboda irin sirrin da ke
cikin Cucumber.
5. Share Datti A Kan Bango: Kamar yadda muka ambata Cucumber tana da sirruka daban-daban bila-adadin, sai dai mutum ya takaita ga wadanda ya sani
kawai. Ko ka san za ka iya amfani da ita
wajen share kowane irin nau’i na datti ko
zane a bango da yara ke yi da abin
rubutunsu? Da zarar ka bare Cucumber ka shafe a kan zanen, zai bace tamkar babu
wani zanen da aka taba yi a wajen.
✍🏽 *ADMIN MUSA MUSA*
*+2348039235265*
[1/14, 4:18 PM] ‪+234 806 606 7121‬: *_CUCUMBER TANA DA SIRRUKA DAMA A TATTARE DA RAYUWAR DAN ADAM_*
✍🏽 *ADMIN MUSA MUSA*
🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒
     🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆
🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒🥒
*Kashi Kashi Har Kashi (5)*
*Ga Kashi Na Hudu (4)*
6. Warkar Da Warin Baki: Da yawa daga cikin mutane suna fama da matsalar warin baki. Muddin za su yi magana bakinsu ya rika wari ainun ta yadda ba za a so matsawa kusa da su ba. Idan kina da wannan matsalar kawai ki
bare Cucumber, ki sanya a cikin bakinki
sai ki rike shi a daidai saman bakin da harshe kimamin Sakan 30. Daga nan ki tofar da ita a kasa. Idan kika luzumci wannan, warin bakinki zai kau ba tare da
bata lokaci ba.
7. Cire Tsatsa:
Uwarigda da zarar kin lura a cikin kayan girkinki akwai wadanda suka yi tsatsa, maza ki yi amfani da Cucumber, da zarar
kin yayyanka ta, kika yi amfani da ita a kan kwanukan. Ba ma goge tsatsar kadai zai yi ba, kin hutar da kanki da yin amfani da wasu sinadaran da za su iya cutar da ‘ya’yanki.

*Kashi Kashi Har Kashi (5)*
*Ga Kashi Na Biyar (5)*
8. Karin Kuzari: A duk lokacin da gajiya ta yi miki yawa, maimakon kwanciya don ki huta, kawai ki
yanka Cucumber ki ci kadan, za ki
wartsake nan da nan.
9. Gyara Fatar Fuska: Ina masu amfani da mayuka masu lalata
fuska ko bata jiki? Da zarar zarar kin
yayyanka Cucumber kika dora a wuta ya
tausa sosai, kawai ki bude marfin tukunyar sai ki sanya fuskarki don dumin ruwan ya
shafi fuskarki. Daga nan za ki ga yadda
fuskarki za ta koma ba tare da wata
matsala ba.
10. Wankin Takalmi:
Idan kika yayyanka Cucumber, za ki iya
amfani da shi wajen gyarawa da wanke
takalmin maigida. Yin amfani da ita ba
kawai za ta sanya takalmin yin sheki ba kawai, za ta tsotse duk ruwan da ke jikin takalmin.

*GYARAN KIRJINKI ( nono )*

*kowanne miji akwai irin abinda yafi burgeshi a jikin matarsa.*
*yi kokari ki dinga sarrafa masa wannan abin da gyaranshi da kyau.*

*ki zama mai biya masa bukatarsa dabarun bayyanar da tudun kirjinki ga mijinki.*

*idan kinki to akwai mata masu tallar abubuwansu a'arha zai gani*

✥ ofisoshi
✥ kasuwanni
✥ bakin titina
*da zarar kin fara haihuwa musamman kirjinki bai da tudu to ki daina zama ba rigar mama.*
*tsabtsaxe rigunan mamanki akai akai da fesa musu turare kafin kisa daga rigunan mamanki sun fara saki, yi maza ki sake sababbi.*

*ki dinga siyan dozen 12 ko F kadai ma zasu isheki.*

_sai sunfi dadewa basu sakiba idan rigar mama ta saki nono baya tsayawa cak_

_ba a sa turare a nono maigidanki na sa baki zai ji daci._

_barin maigidanki yayi wasa dasu kuma da tsotsarsu na sawa su ciko_
_ki kiyayi magunguna na bature da wanda basu da inganci akwai masu kyau amma ki duba ya karfinsu ya inganci su._
_kirjinki dukiyarkice kar garin gyaran gira a rasa ido._
_ki godewa Allah a yarda ya hallicceki duk yadda kike akwai wacce bata kai kiba._
*halittarki da kiketa korafi wata kuma shi take kwadayin ki nemi hanyoyin na halal don inganta kirjinki.*
*SHAWARA GA YAN'MATA KAN SAURIN KWANCIYAR NONO*
*kina budurwa kinaso kada nononki ya zube kafin aurenki ?*
*ki daina saka damanmun kaya kuma babu brez ko kirinka tsalle da sauransu kuma ki daina kwanciya rub da ciki ko ki rinka daga zani sama kina damesu daurin kirji*
*kuma sannan rashin shan kayan marmari da rashin saka brez suma suna kawo saurin zubewar nono.*
*GYARAN NONON AMARYA WAJAN KWANCIYA*
*gyaran nono a wajen kowacce mace kashi uku ne*
✥ _akwai nonon da ya kwanta akeso su tashi su tsaya"_
✥ _akwai kanana anaso su kara girma_
✥ _akwai kuma wanda girma sukayi da yawa anaso a rage su._
*kuma yanzu zamuyi bayani a kan tsayuwar da kuma girmansa*
*MENENE YAKESA NONO YA KWANTA ?*
➽ akwai yawan tsalle.
➽ akwai yawab kamasu.
✧ wani kuma nonon haka yake yanada tsayi dama dole yayi saurin kwanciya.
✧ sai kuma shekaru 30 zuwa sama
*MENENE YAKESA NONO SU ZAMA KANANA ?*
✥ akwai halitta wata dama haka Allah yayita nononta kanana.
✥ akwai kwanciya a kansu.
✥ akwai daurin kirji da zani
✥ akwai saka matsatsiyar rigarsa ( brezy )
*YAYA ZA'A GYARAN NONO KANANA ?*
*Idan nononki kanana ne kinaso suyi manya kamar yadda kikeso daidai kina iya yin wanna domin samun lafiya nonon ki.*
□ cukwui
□ garin alkama
□ aya
□ nonon saniya
□ madara
□ garin hulba
*cukwul wanda yawansa zai kai guda uku sai ki samu garin alkama gwangwani daya sai aya itama gwangwani daya sai ki dakasu zasu zama gari ki tankade.*
_ki samu nonon saniya idan kuma bakyashan nono saniya ki samu madara ki zuba wannan garin kamar cokali 3 ki dama kina sha kullum sau 1 sannan ki lura lokacin da zakiyi wanka
ki tafasa ruwa da garin hulba a ciki kibari yayi sanyi sai ki wanke nonon dashi sannan kiyi wankan"
wannan hadin matar aure wanda tayi yaye zatayi sannan budurwa itama duk.
*KWANCIYAR NONO*
*idan kuma kwanciya sukayi kinaso su tsaya sai ki nemo wadanan kayan zasu tashi.*
✥ hulba
✥ ruwan dumi
*ki kwaba hulba da ruwan dumi wato garin hulba ya danyi kauri kar yayi ruwa sosai sai kin tabbatar kin gama abinda zakiyi*
kinzo kwanciya sai ki shafa ki kawo brezy damammiya ki saka da safe sai ki wanke da ruwan dumi shima matar aure duk da budurwa
amma idan kina da kiba sau da yawa nonon ki zai zama manya saboda kiba
*wannan hadin matar aure wanda tayi yaye zatayi*
sannan budurwa itama duk.
*KWANCIYAR NONO*
_idan kuma kwanciya sukayi kinaso su tsaya sai ki nemo wadanan kayan zasu tashi._
*GYARAN NONO*
.
*Nono (Breast) Yana daga cikin Ni'imar da Allah ya yiwa 'ya'ya mata domin su shayar da 'ya'yansu kuma Surarsu da kyawonsu ya kara bayyana.*
.
_Akwai tarin Abubuwa wayanda ke kwantar da Nonon 'ya'ya mata amma kafin mukai ga wannan bayanin ya kamata mu san ko (Breast din) kala nawa ne._
.
*Bincike Ya nuna Breast din mata ya kasu kashi 8 daga cikin kashi 8 bincike ya nuna kashi 3 ne basa faduwa kashi biyar su suka fi saurin faduwa saboda sunfi kashi na farko girma.*
.
_Idan Macce na kula da Breast dinta ko da yana cikin kashi 5 masu faduwa to wannan kular da take masa shi zai sanya ya ya cika cif-cif cif ba tare da an gane ya fadi ba._
.
*MEKE KAWO ZUBEWAR NONO?*
*Akwai Abubuwa masu yawan Gaske dake kawo Zubewar Breast zan kawo wasu in bar wasu, Daga Ciki akwai;*
.
1. Kwanciya Jicce.
2. Daurin Zane a Kirji.
3. Rashin cin abinci mai kyawo.
4. Rashin sanya Brr idan aka haihu.
5. Yawan Wasa dasu ba'a lokacin Jima'i ba. Dss.
.
*WANE MATAKI ZA'A DAUKA DON GUDUN ZUBEWARSU?*
*Da Farko yana da kyau a lokacin da Macce ta haihu ta rika sanya Brr tana kwanciya da ita.*
.
*Na Biyu a guji Daura Zane a Kirji musamman Idan ba ana sanye da Brr ba.*
.
*Daga karshe a guji Kwanciya a Jicce.*
.
*YA ZA'A GYARA WAYANDA SUKA KWANTA?*
_Hanya ta Farko A nemi Man Hulba Cokali 2 Man Si'itir Cokali 2 Man Ridi Cokali 2 a rika shan Cokali 2 Sau 3 A yini. Sannan a Hada Man Hulbar dana Si'Itir a Rika shafawa a jikin Breast din ayi haka na tsawon Sati 4 In shaa Allahu za'a ga mamaki da Iznin Allah._
*GYARA NONONKI DOMIN DAUKAR HANKALIN MAZA*
*TSAYUWARSU*
*ki kwaba hulba da ruwan dumi,wato garin hulba yadanyi kauri kar yayi ruwa sosai,saikin tabbatar kin gama abunda zakiyi,kinzo kwanciya,saiki shafa,ki kawo brezia damammiya kisaka,da safe saiki wanke da ruw an dumii,zakisha mamaki*
*GIRMANSU*
_kisamu yis ,shima ki kwaba da ruwa mai dan dumi,saikin tabbatar kinyi kusan shiga wanka saiki shafa,akalla minti shabiyar ko goma saiki wanke._
*SU TSAYA SUYI LAUSHI*
*ki samu alkama ki wanketa,amma karki surfa saikin nikata,ki rinka sha da madara safe da dare*
*GYARASU SUYI KYAU*
shine hanya mafi sauki,ya kasance kullum kina shafa man hulba akai,koda wanka kka fito,manda zaki shafa a jikinki daban ,nonon kuma hulban,sannan kina shan man yansun,cokali daya kullum
*LAUSHI DA DADIN KAMASU*
kisamu garin hulba saiki saka cikin tafashashen,ruwa,saiki dauko tsumma ko towel,kina gasa nonon dashi,kina mammatsawa,inkika gama saiki,shafa musu man hulban
*BARI NABAKU SHAWARA*
kisa shape din nonon da brzia da zakina sakawa,saboda kowanne da irinsa,kuma karki sa matsatstsen babubrezia brezia,yana mata nono,da kuma zama da daurin kirgi duk,sunada matala, kidena kwanciya akan nono ki dena yawan tsalle da duk abinda zaisa su wahala.

[9:30PM, 3/28/2015] ‪ ABUBUWAN DAKESA MACE TAFITA DAGA ZUCIYAR MIJINTA
          1.RIKO
Riko shine idan an aikatamata wani laifi kabar abin aranka batare da kayafe ba.
Uwargida kada kizamo mai riko domin hakan ba karamin jamaki matsala ba zaiyi musamman idan mijinki nada saurin fushi . Saboda haka idan abu yafaru mudinga hakuri domin mata ansanmu da hakuri da juriya👍idan akai abu to dazaran ya wuce to amaida komi ba komi bane domin aljannarmu tana karkashin su sai sun daga zamu samu mata mudinga hakuri aduk lamuran mu👍 sai muga mundace

        2. YAWON MITA
Yar'uwa kar zizamto cikin mata masu yawan mita a gurin maji
Abu baya wucewa ayita dawo da magana baya wanan zai haddasamaki matsala domin zaki fita ranshi. Idan abu yawuce to ayi hakuri abarshi adaina tuna baya 

         3. FUSHI
Uwargida kar kamto mai yawan fushi ko nunama miji kincika fushi 
Karkimanta Allah da kansa "yace yanatare da masu hakuri"shin bakison Allah yazamto yana tare dake kowane lokaci
Yar'uwa kisama ranki hakuri fushi banaki bane domin karkashin wani kike kowayace zomu zauna zomu sabane  
Hakuri shine ribarmu

          4.RASHIN IYA GIRKI
   
Da anxo maganar girki sai naji tsoro tare da jin kunya 
Haba yar'uwa yakamata ace iyayen mu nakoyamana girki 
Wlh wallahi wlh samun yar aiki ba gata bane
Ina gatan yake kina can kwance yar aiki na saye zuciyar mijinki da dadan abinci
yar'uwa/uwargida mutashi tsaye mukoyi girki kodan saye zuciyar miji
Domin namiji nason matar da ta iya girki  
Zakiga namiji na gayyato abokanai zuwa gidan shi don suci abinci saboda yasan bazata bashi kunya
amma idan baki iyaba fa zai fara tunanin kara aure wato yayi maki😳😳KISHIYA
Hmmm mata mu gyara

       5.KAZANTA
Uwargida ayi tsafta kodon lfyr jikinkin 
karki manta tsafta nadaga cikin addini
Yar'uwa idan ba tsaftar yazakiyi ibada
Sanan kisani tsafta nasa miji yasoki sanan yaji bayada kamarki  zakiga kowane lokaci yana manne dake yana shakar kamshinki
Idan kuwa bakida rsafta da yabaki kudin cefane bakikara ganin shi sai dare domin koyadawo  ba abinda zaigani sai bacin rai har kiginga cewa yadainasonki aa badaina sonkiyayiba kazantarki tajawo maki
Sanan kisani kazanta tama mabudin kara aure ce wato yayimaki kishiya
 Pls kozakiyi chatting yazamto kin gyara  ko ina sanan yazamto kema kingyara jikinki da na yaranki kuma idan mai 🏩 yadawo abashi kulawa abar cht
Nidai sholy baruwana 
Lokacinda zai karowata baninan  ni sholy nafada nafita
 
         6.KULA DA SHINFIDAR MIJI

Mata muna sakaci wajen bawa miji hakkinsa kinaso amma kitsaya gulma wai jan aji  ina ajin yake bayan yagama saninki lungu lungu ba inda baisaniba ajikinki

💋 *KISS YANA MATUKAR KARA SOYAYYA GA MA"AURATA* 💋

☞ Amma a dinga wanke baki sosai saboda tsaro 🤔

*Ya ke uwar gida, ko amarya, ko kin san cewa yiwa mai gida ko ango sumba ya kansa hankalinsa ya dawo kanki kuwa.*

*To ki saurara kiji, yakamata kisan cewa sumba (kiss), yana da matukar muhimmanci mara misali a rayuwar aure, wajen kara dankon soyayya tsakaninki da mai gida.*

Dan duk lokacin da zaki yiwa mai gida sumba (kiss), zai ji a
ransa ashe baki kyamar sa, kuma baki gudunsa, kema
kuma haka zaki ajeye a ranki in ya yi miki.

Kuma yin sumba (kiss), sakanin ma'aurata, watau mata da miji, yana taka rawar gani wajen motsa sha'awan juna, kuma ita sumba (kiss), bawai sai a baki kadai ne kawai ake
yinta ba, ko ina a jikin mijin ki za ki iya yi masa, shima
kuma miji zai iya sumbartar matar sa a ko ina a jikinta,
kamar su, fuskarta, bakinta, nononta, goshinta, cibiyarta.
Da dai sauran su.

Kuma yin sumba (kiss), alama ce dake nuna irin tsananin son da ma'aurata kema juna.

Ba wayewa ba ne, don matar ka tama sumba, sai kamata
kallon yar iska, ko don mijin ki ya miki sumba ki masa
kallon da iska, to wallahi wannan jahilci ne, idan kuna ganin kuma kariya ne to sai a tambayi mallaman addi ni, aji
gaskiyar lamarin.

💋💋💋💋💋💋💋💋💋💋💋💋

💋 *DUBARA TA ITACE YIWA MIJINA SUMBA(KISS)* 💋

kamar dai uwar gida ta tambayi marya cewa me kike yiwa mai gida ne naga duk hankalinshi ya dawo kanki sai tace sumba(kiss)

saboda haka yake uwar gida yakamata kisan cewa kiss
yana da matukar muhimmanci marar misali wajen kara dankon soyayya tsakaninki da mai gida
dan duk lokacin da zaki yiwa mai gida kiss zai ji aransa
ashe baki kyamarsa kuma baki gudunsa kema haka zaki aji ranki in ya yi maki kuma yinsa yana taka rawar gani wajen motsa sha'warku, kuma ita kiss nan bawai sai baki da baki ne kawai ake yinta ba ko ina a jikin mijinki zaki iya yi masa, shima kuma miji zai iya kiss matarsa a ko ina ajikinta kamarsu.

👙 NONONTA, 
💋 BAKINTA,
 💁🏼 FUSKARTA,
 GOSHINTA,
 CIBIYARTA,
 DA DAI SAURANSU; 

kuma yana daga cikin manya-manya abubuwanda ke kara dankon soyayya tsakanin mata da miji da kuma motsa sha'awa,kuma alama ce dake nuna irin tsananin son da kikewa mijinki shima kuma haka lalle wannan ba karamar dabara bace,ki jaraba uwar gida zaki dace da yarda Allah.

*ABIN LURA*

mata da yawa suna manta wanna bansan ko kunya bace tasa bata kiss kiss yanada amfani ga miji yar'uwa inda bakiyi ki gwada koda sau daya ne zaki sha mamaki.

*KI FARKA DAGA DOGON BACCI DA KIKEYI💆🏼💆🏼*

*_SHAYIN MA AURATA_*
akwai hadin shayi kala kala wanda maza da mata ke amfani dasu wanda idan kuna tareda wannan shafin nasan kun karantasu abaya shine naga ya kamata yanzu musake kawo wani kalan musamman a irin wannan lokacin sanyin
wannan shayi da kuke gani ana bukatar abubuwa kamar haka kwai/kanunfari/
minanas/lefton/leomon tsami/sai zuma/
kamar da dare ya kamata ajika kanunfari da minanas ya kwana acikin ruwa da safe sai asake tafasashi sai atace ruwan sai kuma asamu kwai na kajin gida kamar guda uku sai afasa ajuye aciki dama kuma lokacinda ake tafasa wannan ruwan ya kasance akwai lefton aciki to yanzu sai amatse lemon tsami aciki sai kuma azuba zuma agauraya sosai nan take ashanye da zafinsa wanan kuma koda kinada ciki matukar kinashan danyen kwai zaki iya sha yana aiki sosai ajikin mace da namiji nusamman mata masu fama da bushewar gaba shi kuma namiji me gajiya da wuri zakaga namiji yana bukata amma ya gaji wannan yana amfani sosai kunga zai zama farin cikin megida da uwargida

[3:24PM, 12/17/2015] ?+234 803 065 9515?: [5:52PM, 7/23/2015] Esha ?'s abdul: YADDA MACE ZATA GYARA GABANTA.......
Ana so ko da yaushe idan miji
zai kusanci matarsa
yaji a matse kike, ba''a son
lokacin da miji zai
kusanci matarsa ya wuce siririf.
Don haka ya ke da
kyau mace ta rika kula da
gabanta kar ya bude.
Abubuwan da ke matse mace
suna da yawa misali
Bagaruwan hausa.....ana dafa
ta da ganyen
magarya ko ita kadai a rika
wanke gaba dashi ko
ki zuba a baho ki zauna a ciki
da dumin kaman
30mins a kalla sau biyu a sati
Kanunfari ana dafa shi a sha da
zuma da zafi zafi
ko ki jika ya kwana da safe ki
tace kisha da
madara da zuma.
Ana kuma dafa ta a zauna a
ciki da dumin ta ko a
rika tsarki ds ruwan ko kuma a
zuba kanunfari a
garwashi a tsugunna shi ma
sau 2 a sati
Kwallon mangwaro idan kika
fasa zaki ga dan ciki
fari haka, ana busar dashi a
daka a kwaba da
zuma arika matsi da shi bayan
isha'I idan zaki
kwanta bacci ki wanke ko kuma
ki dafa dan cikin
da bagaruwa ki wuni tsarki
dashi ko ki zauna a ciki
shima a kalla 3x a sati
Almiski fari ko ja ki daka
kanunfari ki tankadr yai
laushi sai ki kwaba da miskin
da man zaitun
yawaita amfani dashi na matse
mace sosai kuma
kullum hq cikin
kamshi..Yake..yana gyara
macen
da ta haihu sosai musamman
da jinin haihuwa ya
dauke ki fara amfani dashi har
ki ar'bain..
[5:52PM, 7/23/2015] Esha ?'s abdul: *MAGUNGUNAN DA SUKE QARAWA MATA NI'IMA*                                                        wayanda ake hada su da ayar Allah su zauna daram a jikin ya mace,ayar Allah ba wasa ba.....*SURATUL KHAFI,KANKANA,ZUMA*                                Ana rubuta suratul khafi kafa daya,sai ki mutsuttsuke kankanar,ki sa rariya ki tace,ki matse dusar sosai ya zamo iya ruwan kankanar ne kawai,sai ki samu zuma farar saqa sai ki zuba a ciki,ki juya ki sha...Yar'uwa wlh wlh da xaki daure ki yi kamar sau uku da kin gama samun miji a hannu,domin sai kin zame masa autar mata,don tunani zai rinqa yi anya zai samu cikakkiyar mace mai gamsasshiyar ni'ima kamarki...lallai kiyi qoqari kiyi don karda a barki a baya...Amman ban yarda Mai kishiya tayiba duk mai kishiyan datayi ban yafemata ba...saidai in xaki bata kuyi tare...Allah yasa mudace

**QAMSHI ADAN UWARGIDA DAGABORNO GIDAN QAMSHI

**Wannan karonnazo maku da wanihadaddenqamshi nawanka dan dawwamar qamshiajikinkiuwargida...kuma yanasa jiki yaikyausosai

Kayan hadi.. 1)Lalle na gargajiya 2)Madararturaren sandal bakur 2)MadararturarenMisk 3)Madarar turaren Lexus 4)Ruwa...

Procedure..... Zaki zuba ruwa atukunya maikyau saiki zuba garin lalle nagargajiya.....kibarsu su tafasa saiki sauqekitace shi...

.kizuba wannan madararturaren kimaida kangaushi ki tabbata su hadu saikisauqe inyahuce saiki zuba a jarka 4litrebayan kinyiwankan sabulu kin gama......saikizubawannan ruwan hadin naki kadan aruwakiyiwanka dashi karki goge jikin ki datowelkibarshi ya bushe a jikin ki

?MU GIARA JIKINMU MATA MASU HADIN KAI ?

Kisamu Ganyan dalbejiya zuma man zaitun sabulun gana dudu osun
yanda zakiyi
:kihadasu guri daya kidinga wanka dasu, zakiga yanda fatar jikinki zata
canza.
Gyaran jiki 2
sabulun salo sabulun ghana lemun tsami kurkur saiki hadasu guri guda ki
dinga wanka shima yana gyra jiki fata tadinga sheqi da sulbi.
Gyaran jiki 3
man ridi man kwakwa man habbatussauda turaren miski ki hadasu guri
daya kizuba turaren miski ki rinka shafawa. Fatarki zatayi kyau da laushi
da kamshi
gyaran jiki 4
kisamu bawon lemun zaki kishanya ya bushe sai ki dakashi ki kwaba da
ruwa ki rika shafe fuska da sauran jikinki zuwa minti 30 sai ki shiga
wonka.
Gyaran jiki 5
kisamu albabunaj ki kwaba shi da ruwan kwai kishafe jikinki dashi
wannan hadin yana matukar gyara fatan mace, bayan kin wanke zaki iya
shafa kowane kalar mai da kike amfani da shi.
Gyaran jiki 6
garin alkama zuma madara peak ki hadasu guri guda ki cakuda su sai
kidinga shafawa kafin kishiga wanka kiringa yin haka zakiga abin
mamaki .
Gyaran fuska 1
hanyoyin gyran fuska tayi sumul tayi haske kurajen fuska sufita:
kisamu tumatur da madara peak ki hadasu guri guda ki kwaba dai-dai
yanda zai isheki ki shafe fuskar ki yasamu tsawon minti talatin afuskarki
sai ki wanke, yana gyara fuska sosai.
Gyaran fuska 2
kisamu zuma saiki matsa lemun tsami acikinta kishafa a fuskarki yasamu
minti 20 saiki shafa man zaitun akan fuskar bayan kin wanketa.
Gyaran fuska 3
ki samu tumatur nunanne ki fitar da Y'ayan cikin kizubar sai ki rinka
gogawa a fuska kafin kishiga wanka yana cire kurajen fuska sosai.
Kubi yoni kuji yanda zaku gyara gashinku da yanda zaku hada turarukan
kamshin jiki.....

Hajiya gyara shimfida kan me house yaji dadin hq sosai. Hajiya tun yamma kinsha kayan karin ni'ima, kin gama girki, kinsha wanka kin tsara kwalliyarki da kananun kaya, ki turara gidanki, kin shafa turare me dadin kamshi akan bed din sha'anin. Kinajin karar motar me house yi sauri kije kice my dear marhababuka, idan da kaya a hannunsa yi maza ki karba idan kinzo karbar kidan turo kirjinki gaba yadda zai gansu a tsaitsaye sai ki dan manna masa kiss a kumatu ki ruqo hannunsa ku shiga ciki. Hajiya cirewa me house takalminsa bayan ya zauna, yi kokari ki dan samo masa ruwa me sanyi, kice my d ga wannan kadan sha kafin kayi wanka kaci abinci kai masa cup din daidai bakinsa idan ya gama sha, sai kice cikin s [truncated by [3:24PM, 12/17/2015] ?+234 803 065 9515?: Macen datake fama da ciwon Mara lokacin Al'ada zata samu

      Masara rawaya ?
      'Ya'yan kankana?
?Sai ki hadasu gaba daya ki zuba cikin ruwa har sai sunfara tsiro saikisa kwando ki tsane  ki shimfida buhu ki bazasu su bushe sosai.
       Saiki bayar anika maki suzama gari .
    Sai ki sami nononki mai kyau, kindirmo ki tsiyaya a Kofi, ki debi hadin garin ki dama.
  Said ki mike tsaye, kisha kina tsayen .
 Shi atsaye ake shansa baa zaune ko a tsugunne ba.
  Idan kina damawa kinasha a tsaye, sai kinga yadda nonuwanki  zasu sauya suyi girma, subaki mamaki.

[3:24PM, 12/17/2015] ?+234 803 065 9515?: Daga??QASAITACIYAR MACE????group mata kusaurara kuji wani sirri rudarda mai?saka mai?kyauta hana mai?kishiya wadannan babu wadda ta iya sai wayayyiyar mace??.kifara jaraba wannan yar uwa kisha mamaki.                          STIMIN BAURE kisamu sassaken baure kixuba masa ruwa kidora akan wuta yatafasa xakiga ya canxa kala sannan kisauke daman kin daka kanun fari sai kixuba garin sannan ki xuba xuma da maxarkeaika sai ki mayar dashi kan wuta idan yaatafasa xaki jishi yana kamshi sai ki sauke kirika sha sau2 arana SIRRIN KANUN FARI kisamu kanun fari kidakeshi sai kixuba awuta kihada dxuma kitafa sai kixubashi a gora bottle sai kidaka ridi ki aje da yamma kisha xaki sha mamaki. Kisamu garin kanun fari kidinga xuba table spoon acikin peak milk kinasha da yamma daily.kidafa kanun farinki isashe kidinga starki dashi warm xaki stuke, ki niimce, kikara xaki hmmmm hajiya sai kin gwada xaki bani story. [3:24PM, 12/17/2015] ?+234 803 065 9515?: [5:52PM, 7/23/2015] Esha ?'s abdul: YADDA MACE ZATA GYARA GABANTA.......
Ana so ko da yaushe idan miji
zai kusanci matarsa
yaji a matse kike, ba''a son
lokacin da miji zai
kusanci matarsa ya wuce siririf.
Don haka ya ke da
kyau mace ta rika kula da
gabanta kar ya bude.
Abubuwan da ke matse mace
suna da yawa misali
Bagaruwan hausa.....ana dafa
ta da ganyen
magarya ko ita kadai a rika
wanke gaba dashi ko
ki zuba a baho ki zauna a ciki
da dumin kaman
30mins a kalla sau biyu a sati
Kanunfari ana dafa shi a sha da
zuma da zafi zafi
ko ki jika ya kwana da safe ki
tace kisha da
madara da zuma.
Ana kuma dafa ta a zauna a
ciki da dumin ta ko a
rika tsarki ds ruwan ko kuma a
zuba kanunfari a
garwashi a tsugunna shi ma
sau 2 a sati
Kwallon mangwaro idan kika
fasa zaki ga dan ciki
fari haka, ana busar dashi a
daka a kwaba da
zuma arika matsi da shi bayan
isha'I idan zaki
kwanta bacci ki wanke ko kuma
ki dafa dan cikin
da bagaruwa ki wuni tsarki
dashi ko ki zauna a ciki
shima a kalla 3x a sati
Almiski fari ko ja ki daka
kanunfari ki tankadr yai
laushi sai ki kwaba da miskin
da man zaitun
yawaita amfani dashi na matse
mace sosai kuma
kullum hq cikin
kamshi..Yake..yana gyara
macen
da ta haihu sosai musamman
da jinin haihuwa ya
dauke ki fara amfani dashi har
ki ar'bain..
[5:52PM, 7/23/2015] Esha ?'s abdul: *MAGUNGUNAN DA SUKE QARAWA MATA NI'IMA*                                                        wayanda ake hada su da ayar Allah su zauna daram a jikin ya mace,ayar Allah ba wasa ba.....*SURATUL KHAFI,KANKANA,ZUMA*                                Ana rubuta suratul khafi kafa daya,sai ki mutsuttsuke kankanar,ki sa rariya ki tace,ki matse dusar sosai ya zamo iya ruwan kankanar ne kawai,sai ki samu zuma farar saqa sai ki zuba a ciki,ki juya ki sha...Yar'uwa wlh wlh da xaki daure ki yi kamar sau uku da kin gama samun miji a hannu,domin sai kin zame masa autar mata,don tunani zai rinqa yi anya zai samu cikakkiyar mace mai gamsasshiyar ni'ima kamarki...lallai kiyi qoqari kiyi don karda a barki a baya...Amman ban yarda Mai kishiya tayiba duk mai kishiyan datayi ban yafemata ba...saidai in xaki bata kuyi tare...Allah yasa mudace

**QAMSHI ADAN UWARGIDA DAGABORNO GIDAN QAMSHI

**Wannan karonnazo maku da wanihadaddenqamshi nawanka dan dawwamar qamshiajikinkiuwargida...kuma yanasa jiki yaikyausosai

Kayan hadi.. 1)Lalle na gargajiya 2)Madararturaren sandal bakur 2)MadararturarenMisk 3)Madarar turaren Lexus 4)Ruwa...

Procedure..... Zaki zuba ruwa atukunya maikyau saiki zuba garin lalle nagargajiya.....kibarsu su tafasa saiki sauqekitace shi...

.kizuba wannan madararturaren kimaida kangaushi ki tabbata su hadu saikisauqe inyahuce saiki zuba a jarka 4litrebayan kinyiwankan sabulu kin gama......saikizubawannan ruwan hadin naki kadan aruwakiyiwanka dashi karki goge jikin ki datowelkibarshi ya bushe a jikin ki

?MU GIARA JIKINMU MATA MASU HADIN KAI ?

Kisamu Ganyan dalbejiya zuma man zaitun sabulun gana dudu osun
yanda zakiyi
:kihadasu guri daya kidinga wanka dasu, zakiga yanda fatar jikinki zata
canza.
Gyaran jiki 2
sabulun salo sabulun ghana lemun tsami kurkur saiki hadasu guri guda ki
dinga wanka shima yana gyra jiki fata tadinga sheqi da sulbi.
Gyaran jiki 3
man ridi man kwakwa man habbatussauda turaren miski ki hadasu guri
daya kizuba turaren miski ki rinka shafawa. Fatarki zatayi kyau da laushi
da kamshi
gyaran jiki 4
kisamu bawon lemun zaki kishanya ya bushe sai ki dakashi ki kwaba da
ruwa ki rika shafe fuska da sauran jikinki zuwa minti 30 sai ki shiga
wonka.
Gyaran jiki 5
kisamu albabunaj ki kwaba shi da ruwan kwai kishafe jikinki dashi
wannan hadin yana matukar gyara fatan mace, bayan kin wanke zaki iya
shafa kowane kalar mai da kike amfani da shi.
Gyaran jiki 6
garin alkama zuma madara peak ki hadasu guri guda ki cakuda su sai
kidinga shafawa kafin kishiga wanka kiringa yin haka zakiga abin
mamaki .
Gyaran fuska 1
hanyoyin gyran fuska tayi sumul tayi haske kurajen fuska sufita:
kisamu tumatur da madara peak ki hadasu guri guda ki kwaba dai-dai
yanda zai isheki ki shafe fuskar ki yasamu tsawon minti talatin afuskarki
sai ki wanke, yana gyara fuska sosai.
Gyaran fuska 2
kisamu zuma saiki matsa lemun tsami acikinta kishafa a fuskarki yasamu
minti 20 saiki shafa man zaitun akan fuskar bayan kin wanketa.
Gyaran fuska 3
ki samu tumatur nunanne ki fitar da Y'ayan cikin kizubar sai ki rinka
gogawa a fuska kafin kishiga wanka yana cire kurajen fuska sosai.
Kubi yoni kuji yanda zaku gyara gashinku da yanda zaku hada turarukan
kamshin jiki.....
